Summary Heading: Great customer service and care by all but 1, but don’t let that spoil your views or day…There ate diamonds in the rough
Summary: Miguel was awesome, went above and beyond to help me check in and make my morning wonderful…thank you so so much… you started my day off pleasantly..,   Jesse the security guard was also awesome helping my daughter and I get our stuff in and taking care of that night even though not his job or in job description. He was very kind and so patient thank you!!! Especially when not being helped by the other gentle man behind the desk and him having such an attitude!!!   Thankful for those who try and make a difference and treat you with respect!!!
Manager Response: Brandy, thank you for taking the time to recognize the team and our hotel. Miguel and Jesse are great people and we are thrilled that they are our partners. Humans some times have off days and we always hope to limit those. Appreciate your understanding and support.  Hope you and your daughter have a great remainder of your trip!

Summary: I selected this rating because I have stayed here back in 2018 and loved the hotel. Although the pandemic has put some holds on certain things Embassy Suites has tried to make things good. Breakfast was being served but in a box with two choices. California has more rules than other states but still a hot breakfast was served. House cleaning as long as you let the desk know you will get it but they need a 24 hr advanced notice to them. Employees have changed, but still great. Ron the manager, is super great, he would go out of his way to do whatever to make you comfortable , and happy. Blake his right hand man who works nights will do the same. Whoever wrote that terrible review on Blake could not be anymore wrong. When you check in you will get a ticket for breakfast for every
Manager Response: It was great to read a review from someone who has so much understanding about the entire situation we are faced with in our businesses at this time. We believe there is a lot of frustration and we understand that the pandemic has affected us all. We are grateful to serve great people like yourself who recognize situations for what they are and also respect the job that the team is doing to make the best out of everything. We want nothing but the best for our customers, of course! Thank you so much for your support and patronage. Hope you summer is the best yet!

Summary: Breakfast buffet is okay, Cook on site for fresh eggs as you whish.  Front desk will do the extra mile to help, they took the time to call a taxi for me because I had decided not to purchase an international plan.
Manager Response: We love our business travelers! This is such a great location to travel on business as well. Airport is close and we are in the heart of Irvine's business area. with soi much around us it really helps guests stay productive and relax if they wish.  Thank you for staying with us! The team appreciates being able to serve.

Summary Heading: Great stay - would stay again when in the area
Summary: Very happy with our stay, clean room and as a diamond member was upgraded to a high floor.  Breakfast staff was very good, cleaned up quickly and line for omelet/eggs was quick.  Had skim milk and fresh fruit. Convenient for Orange County Airport.
Room tip: Parking is a bit of a walk, drop off luggage before park car.
Manager Response: We were so pleased to read that one of our most valued guests enjoyed their stay. You are well traveled and loyal to Hilton so this is so important to us all. The location of the hotel is amazing if you are going to go anywhere in the OC. Hope to serve you again soon!

Summary: We made a stop at Irvine from San Diego during the winter break. The hotel and room are maintained very well, and very clean. The staffs are very friendly and professionally trained. Everything running smoothly. Complimentary breakfast is a big plus and it is with high quality.
Room tip: With their floor planning, I think all rooms are quiet.
Manager Response: Sounds like a nice trip, we are proud that we were part of it. Thank you for staying with us and recognizing the hard work that our team puts into the hotel for our guests. It is so important that amazing guests like yourself always feel the hotel is a great place.  Hope to serve you again.

Summary Heading: Great place for family and kids
Summary: What an awesome place. My kids love it and wants to come back for the second time. They loved the room, breakfast buffet and pool as well. My wife and i like the bar area. Friendly staff and and bar area as well. I recommend to stay here   Mario
Room tip: Corner Suite are large and by the elevators
Manager Response: We are very grateful to read of your great experience. The team is very proud, and we really appreciate knowing that the hard work is recognized by the good people out there. It really is a great location and hotel.  We hope to serve you and your family again. Thank you

Summary: everyone was always ready to help with any needs! I got early check-in n late check out because of our flights. The shuttle driver was sick so they got someone else to drive us to the airport at no cost.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing that the hotel is a great place. We are so glad to serve you and we hope to do so again soon.  We wish you all the best!

Summary Heading: All the rooms are suits, suitable for big groups and large families
Summary: Very convenient for large families, all rooms are suits, some with a double Queen beds. Very reasonable price and in a very good location, in the heart of Orange County.  It is surrounded by all activities, restaurants and entertainments.
Manager Response: Thank you for noting some of the greatest qualities of our hotel. You do not get the room size at any other brand and it is why we are the favourite brand for guests needing more space. The location of the hotel can not be beat if you are looking to explore Orange County. Thank you for staying with us, it was a pleasure to serve you and your family.

Summary: Nice hotel that's close to the airport.  Guests enjoy a free hot breakfast that tastes good.  Staff is friendly and rooms were nice.  My only complaint is that the towels were filled with lint; it was everywhere!  I will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for nice comments on the hotel and staff. Our team really prides itself on service and most of our guests really do recognize this. We appreciate you greatly.  Thanks for the note on the towels, we will see why this occurred and take care of it.  Hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: Happy hour reception. Is animal crackers, Cheez itz, goldfish, and sad tortilla chips with a terrible salsa wannabe. Starbucks was only open 1 day and then didn’t have stuff. The breakfast made 2 in the party sick. Einstein bagels saved the day. Room ok but sinks would take overnight to drain after maintenance fixed. Just gave up.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback. The hotel is always attempting to improve everything we can. The reception snacks are meant to match the environment which changes from time to time. It is important to note that the offerings are meant to be snacks and are not intended to be any kind of meal replacement. This is simply more insight into the situation but none the less we will always look to improve areas. Starbucks was closed during the Holiday season and we understand that this could have been a disappointment. We are sorry that members in your party did not feel weel and we hope that they are feeling better. We have not been notified by any guests of any kind of issue while they were at the hotel but we will always investigate. Thank you for your comments and we will look to improve wherever possible. Hope to serve you again.

Summary: Toilet was broken and some kind of black mold in shower. They moved us to the next door room. Did not offer to help with the move nothing. The room was not as bad but still a bit grungy, old and even clean surfaces look dirty.
Manager Response: We sincerely apologize that you had a bad experience. Obviously this is not typical or what we want nay guest feel. Even with our best intentions perfection is not possible and we are also sad when we fail you.  From what you stated it sounds like the team did come up with a quick resolution but did not assume the need for help in moving. We will we work towards improving our services based on your feedback and we do hope you give us another chance in the future.

Summary: Beautiful property. Well-maintained, clean, and quiet. Nicely decorated for the holiday season.   Was able to get complimentary early check-in and late check-out with no hassle, no third degree, no begging, no bargaining, no problem. Even for Hilton Honors Diamond Members such as myself, one doesn't always get these requests so easily and effortlessly granted.   Ample parking, even though the lot is separated  from the building (no direct access). Somewhat  inconvenient, but wasn't too bad.  Starbucks on property open from 6:30am-1pm is a nice feature.   The complimentary evening reception with two complimentary drinks per guest is very nice.   Made-to-order omolette is always a plus!   Karina was a wonderful front desk agent! Friendly, fast and efficient.
Manager Response: We were thrilled that a Diamond Member like yourself had such a wonderful experience! This is our goal and we thank you for your loyalty. It is really great when we are able to meet the expectations of our most valued guests.  We appreciate you mentioning Karia, people like her are exactly what makes us special.  Happy Holidays!

Summary: I really enjoy when I stay at this hotel. I go about once a month and the staff is always friendly and accommodating. Rigo the bartender is the best! He serves at the nightly 'manager's reception' and throughout the rest of the evening. Once he knows you're name he doesn't forget it! Oh...and the rooms are clean and comfortable!
Manager Response: We are beyond honored to read how you feel about the hotel and team. It is our goal to have every guest feel the same way. Rigo is an awesome person, and we are so fortunate to have him as a colleague.  We hope you have a great Holdiay season and look forward to your return, drinks on us!

Summary: This an wonderful place to stay. Clean, friendly staff. Beds and and pillows amazing. Love the rooms. Plus free breakfast, which by the way was fantastic . The rooms are many suites,  I like my sleeping quarters are in the back. I don't hear any noises. I totally recommend that in stay here while you visit Orange County area
Manager Response: The job is very rewarding for us when we have such great people to take care of! Thank you for taking the time to share your positivity as we know that the majority of our guests really appreciate the hotel and staff. We hope you have amazing Holidays and that we serve you again soon.

Summary: Excellent hotel. Friendly staff that goes beyond.  Breakfast in the morning was good and the best when a hotel offers this option.  I look for hotels that offer breakfast.  The rooms are spacious and very clean. It was like being at home.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the recognition. The hotel is a great place, and the team really tries to make sure our guests enjoy their stay. Hope you have a wonderful Holiday Season!

Summary Heading: Very tiny room - uncomfortable with no room to walk around
Summary: I have been to many Embassy suites over decades and all of them were big rooms with 2 queen beds or long and a large sitting room attached with microwave and small fridge It never entered my head that it would not be so . We paid $200 for the room and when we entered  it there was a small desk and a chair and a queen bed  3 ft away with a foot on either side and a door leading to the bathroom. There was no microwave or fridge and very little space to move around. It was extremely cramped, a quarter of what it used to be.  The front desk was unhelpful and kind of said that they had divided the previous rooms to make more rooms and that many guests had the same reaction as we did   It was a bad cramped experience and we will never go back again Please look into this carefully. We
Manager Response: Absolutely sounds like you needed the suite and booked one of the few standard rooms that we offer. Please make sure that when booking anywhere that you look at the room types. Our hotel does have standard rooms not just suites. Those are the cheaper option but many times guests want the suite which is clearly what you wanted. If there is anything we can do to assist please contact us at the hotel. We would love the opportunity to have you again and make sure you are in the suite that you want this next time. Let us know and we would be happy to assist and make sure you are satisfied. Thank you

Summary: We stayed here just for two nights since our Airbnb stay was over but our trip was extended. The room was very comfortable & had everything we needed for just the two nights. The pool was so warm & felt amazing. It is a small pool, but it was perfect for a little dip. It is very close to the airport, but you can’t hear any loud noises, which is great. They were very kind & accommodating. Our room wasn’t ready when we arrived, but they held our bags for us so we could walk around & go for a dip in the pool. They called us when it was ready & we headed right up there & someone was waiting for us to guide us to our bags. We had an issue in our room & within 4 minutes they were up there with new keys for a new room. They were incredibly kind & we felt like we mattered. If I have to
Manager Response: We were very pleased to read that our team took such great care of you. Thank you for taking the time to be positive and recognize the hotel. The team really cares and will always go out of their way to help our loyal guests.  Hope you are getting ready for a great Thanksgiving! Thank you

Summary: When I made a booking, I did not receive any notifications that the room has a problem with noise from elevator. We stayed in the hotel for 4 days. The toiletries were limited for 2 persons. We had a problem to connect to WI-FI. The cost and quality of the room was unfair.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. From reading the comments it seems that you did not like your room location. Was the team not able to assist you in moving potentially? This is the typical action if possible when a guest lets us know that they are not comfortable. As we do not know how many guests may be with you in your room we always provide the standard amounts. Was the team not able to provide you with additional toiletries? This is a very standard request and we do feel we could have handled this quickly. The team will take your feedback and always try to improve. Overall it seems that you did like the hotel and we hope to serve you again and provide an even better experience.

Summary: When you stay at Embassy Suites you get exactly what is advertised: a Clean Room, a Cocktail Reception Every Night, a Delicious Breakfast Every Morning, a very nice Exercise Room, and an Indoor Heated Pool.  No worries.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positivity! The team really cares about our guests and they get very motivated when they see that they are serving great people. The hotel is a great place and it matters most to us that the guests we appreciate come back and enjoy the hotel. Hope you have a great Halloween!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel close to SNA airport
Summary: Hotel is nice, complimentary breakfast is good..made to order omelets are great! Fitness center is small but has many options. Beautiful location for walking in the sunshine..Starbucks inside is convenient! Good value for 2-room suite
Manager Response: We appreciate you being our guest! Thank you for positive feedback. The hotel is in a great location and we have some of the best amenities and associates available. The team hopes to serve you again soon.  Enjoy your Halloween!

Summary: Great service all around from check in, to the breakfast servers, to the bar staff! I stay here regularly and always have a clean room, easy parking, airport adjacent, and walking distance to restaurants if needed.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for being our guest and for recognizing the team! They work so hard to do the best we can for our guests, and it means the world to us all to have this recognized by the amazing people we serve.  Our hotel is in a very special and unique location and the restaurants across from us are some of the best in the entire area.

Summary Heading: Oh goodness, these guys are the worst.
Summary: I spent my entire stay at your hotel with NO AIRCONDITIONING. I called every day of my stay asking for help with the air-conditioning in my room because my room felt like a sauna - the hallway outside was cooler than my room - and guess what? I had no choice but to sleep in the hot room. It was suffocating.  The engineer came on the THIRD day and tells me yes, the room is hot and the air conditioning unit is not cooling. He fixes it and leaves. I come back a few hours later and my room is hot AGAIN. I call for help again and the engineer comes back tells me again yes, the room is hot and the air conditioning unit is not cooling. What's worse is that he says the air conditioning unit is actually NEW.  What a nightmare, I couldn't wait to end my stay.  I let the manager know my
Manager Response: We are so sorry that we failed you and that your stay was impacted by this. The team is looking at this so we can understand how we possibly could have missed our communcation while you were here. Items like this do occur in rooms everywhere but we are typically so much better at making sure our guests are aware of what is taking place, and that we do what we can to help the situation. Our property does not have any feedback cards so we are confused with who you may have spoken with, as well we do not have any male managers at the front office.  Thank you for mentioning that there were some good parts about our location. We agree with you that what occurred would have made a negative impact on your visit. We hope to learn from this and always want the opportunity to make issues right for our guests.

Summary Heading: Not a friendly place - look elsewhere  - charged me twice
Summary: I stay in roughly 70 hotels a year. I generally stay at Marriott‘s and never have any issues. One of my friends decided to book this room and stay at the Embassy suites in Orange, Irvine. We stayed in a different Hilton the day before. I was just as disappointed in both locations. Staff seems miserable. Not welcoming. We explained the issues we had at the previous location and the original lady at the front desk was trying to be pleasant. Then a manager came by, Sophia, she was very disrespectful and not very friendly to work with. I would expect better service from a reputable organization. Breakfast is served until 9 AM. So in the event that you are not an early riser you are SOL. I would recommend staying elsewhere and if Hilton sees this please retrain your managers
Manager Response: We appreciate your perception on this interaction and situation but we do find that many important details are missing. None the less we still offer our apologies that this is what you felt and that we were not able to satisfy your needs. Every guest has their right decide where they wish to stay and we respect that. As much as we want to satisfy every individuals demands we also understand that it would be foolish to believe that we will. Whenever a conflict arises we do our best to help our guests but also are limited by not being able to  provide everything that they may demand. In this situation the behavior of the staff was professional even while dealing with a very difficult interaction. It is hard that "customer service" has somehow become an expectation for team members to endure abuse. We proud to work with such high character individuals and we appreciate the challenges they face daily.

Summary: Room as well as the hotel was extra clean.  Superior service in the bar.  Food was great - breakfast buffet as well as dinner in the bar area.  Staff in the entire hotel was welcoming and pleasant.  This was my teams second stay at this hotel and it did not disappoint.  Starbucks on site is also great!
Manager Response: Thank you so much! It is so important to our team that our most loyal guests recognize their hard work and efforts. It is such a great hotel and having great guests like you and your team is all the matters to us.  Hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: Spent a week there and had nothing but shoddy service.  Had to ask 3 times to get the garbafencans emptied and not a single visit from housekeeping (despite requests) for additional towels.  Bed was never made.  The amenities said two free drinks...  that means less than 1 oz of liquor in a 8noz glass... come on, at least try.  Asked for 2 double shots and was charged $48... $12 and ounce for rum... disgusting prices and the bartender was a jerk when serving it.    This place is a rip off.  Dont eat or drink there.    Enjoy the rooms and leave... you are charged extra to park in their multistory empty garage anyway so come and go often.  These charges are unnecessary and stupid.    Don better ES.
Manager Response: We were glad to read that you felt the rooms were nice.  Please accept our apologies for the confusion with the housekeeping service requests. Seems very odd that we could not get this done for you for three days. We will look into what occurred so we can understand better.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: We had a wonderful time.   Hotel was accommodating on our demands and changing length of stay,  hospitality and crew were friendly and professional.  Parking is convenient even with several high school teams parking and staying at hotel.  The best chicken tenders I have ever had for dinner!! Great family experience!!!
Manager Response: We were happy to read about your wonderful experience at the hotel. The team takes pride in serving our most amazing guests and we are grateful for your support. Thinking about our chicken tenders has made me hungry for certain! Looking forward to serving you again. Thank you.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a special family gathering.
Summary: We recently held a family reunion at the Embassy Suites, Irvine.  I had the pleasure of working with Jasmine Stewart to coordinate the event.  Jasmine, along with the staff at the hotel during our trip, was professional and courteous.  We all had a great time. The hotel location was very convenient and close to beaches and other activities. It is a facility I would return to in the future.
Manager Response: Jasmine is a great person and one example of the kind of people we are so proud to work with here. This is a wonderful place, and we are grateful for your recognition. The team look forward to serving you again! Thank you.

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at Embassy Suites Irvine OC Airport
Summary: I stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine OC Airport location every time I come to town for work.  The hotel is close to everywhere I am going to need to be while in town.  However, the reason I stay there is the staff - from the Shuttle Driver, Front Desk, Housekeeping and Breakfast/Restaurant - they are friendly, helpful and ready to assist if needed.
Manager Response: We are beyond grateful to our loyal guests who have and do support us. Nothing means more to the team than to know that our true guests see the hard work and value what we do. We have some of the best people working here and I thank you for recognizing that. Hope to serve you again soon!

Summary Heading: A nice hotel very close to SNA
Summary: We have stayed at many Embassy Suites in the past and this one we were very pleasantly surprised on how well this one is run and maintained.  The check in was very easy and the room and hotel itself is so clean and well appointed.  The breakfast was great and the evening reception was a nice treat!
Manager Response: We really can not thank you enough for choosing our hotel and providing some positive feedback that we know most of our guests agree with. The team has really worked so hard to keep the hotel thriving through what has been a very tough time for everyone. They are so grateful to read that their hard work is appreciated by the people that matter most.  We hope to serve you again soon. Have a wonderful upcoming Labor Day!

Summary Heading: For the area, it's an OK hotel..Needs some refreshing up in the rooms.
Summary: The hotel in general is ok, Based on the rate for the area, it's high but the happy hour and breakfast makeup for it(somewhat). Great service in the bar/lounge area and the dinner meals aren't bad.   we did experience the following...  During my stay in room 428, the maintenance group let themselves into my room at 8am in the morning without as much as a phone call first. Luckily, the bedroom door was closed but it scared my wife. I have a few issues with this situation.. One(1) if your going to do work like this, make sure the person in the room is aware of it before hand and it's being done at a mutually agreed apond time frame. Second(2), they could have called before letting themselves into our room that morning. We paid alot to stay at this particular hotel..and I wasn't
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. From your comments it seems that if we had not made the mistake, you would have enjoyed the hotel. We were sorry to read of the mistake that occurred during your visit. Please provide us an email or phone number to connect with you as our team would like to at least apologize properly.

Summary Heading: Short Term Lookin For Long Term
Summary: We live in Arizona and I am going to have surgery at HOAG Hospital in Newport Beach.  Due to the surgery, we went to Orange County to check out accomodations for the future long-term stay.  We stayed at a couple different hotels with suites and visited a couple more to find the room(s) that would meet our needs.  We stayed at Embassy Suites in a two room suite with two queen beds.  It was clean,  very spacious and comfortable.  Besides the suite, the on-site restaurant and the ability to get housekeeping on request made our decision easy to choose this hotel.  The staff (front desk, catering, and sales rep) were most understanding of my situation and cordially spent the time needed to coordinate the arrangements for our future stay.
Manager Response: We hope that you are recovering well.  It was a pleasure to serve you during your time of need.  The team is grateful that you shared your experience. They really care and it is important to us that our most valuable guests recognize and appreciate this. We hope to serve you again but next time during a vacation trip.  All the best!

Summary Heading: Great experience with friendly staff and accomodations
Summary: Great room, plenty of space and clean location with extra friendly staff. Breakfast was excellent as was the complimentary happy hour. Laundry facilities where just what we needed as well and the location was close to may options for shopping and dining. We would definitely return on our next trip to OC.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great recognition! It is a pleasure to serve our guests and we are so thankful when guests like yourself find the time to tell the team how good they have done. Most of our guests have great experiences. It is a special place, but our great guests make it the best! We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: I had a big room without a window to aisle therefore not noisy. Many other rooms might be due to Hotels interior design. Breakfast is poor and coffee is bad. Staff is OK and complimentary drink is a bonus. In general rooms need to be renovated. Might be an option in Irvine.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the #1 feature of the hotel, the suites are much bigger than other hotels.  We look to improve everywhere we can as most guests really enjoy the breakfast. The team would love to serve you again and hopefully be even better.

Summary: We had a great stay. Check in was easy, quick, and painless. In fact, when we got to the hotel, the hotel had run out of studio rooms, and we got a complimentary upgrade to a suite. Not to mention we got complimentary drinks at the bar. Woot woot!  The room was clean with plenty of nice amenities, like two tvs with dish network, coffee maker, a good selecting of teas and coffee, and nice lotions and shampoos and such.  Breakfast was great. We got there early so there was hardly any line for the omelet bar. There was a great selection of buffet items, coffees, cereals, juices, and fruit. Nothing to complain about there.  The shuttle service was great. Our shuttle driver went out of his way to take us to a nearby restaurant, which wasn’t even a service they typically offer as
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience. Most of our guests have a great time here but we tend to not always hear from them. The positivity is appreciated as the team really works hard to provide what we feel is a great hotel. Most of our guests do as well.  You must be well traveled as coming down for breakfast earlier really does provide the best experience as many guests choose to come down at the last half hour. We always recommend this.  We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: Very disappointed for a Hilton property: carpets were dirty & torn, and bathroom floor was not cleaned properly. Although pales in comparison to the room condition, asked at check in about the “happy hour” but were not provided cards which are apparently now required.
Manager Response: Mr. Gold- We are sorry that your room was not up to standard. It does sound like the room should not have been given out if this was the shape of it. We locate the mistake and repair what is needed.  The Happy Hour situation should have been easily resolved by visiting the front desk.  We are disappointed that we did not have the opportunity to correct these for you as I am confident, we could. There will be mistakes, anywhere and everywhere, but with communication we should be able to make it right, in most situations.  Please accept our apology and we hope to have the opportunity to serve you again.

Summary Heading: If you are a HiltonDiamond don’t expect any benefits.
Summary: Stayed at this hotel because me and my wife bought tickets to the Hyatt Newport Beach Jazz Concert series.  I asked for a room with a better view because our room was facing the garage and hotel air condition units and was told that they don’t do upgrades. If I wanted a room with a Mountain View it would cost $40.00. I declined because my stay was only for one night. Been Hilton Diamond for over 12 years and never had a hotel tell me they don’t do upgrades. I could see if the hotel was full. They were not. Would never stay here again.
Manager Response: We are sorry that you did not like that an upgrade to the executive floor would have been charged. Hilton Diamond members know that Embassy Suites does not provide complimentary upgrades as our suites are universal, this is a brand standard. I simply note this as a reminder as some other Hilton brands are able to do this at times. This is because they have various room types. We do not want to disappoint any guest and we can only hope that you can understand that what you requested was simply not available at no charge. The team will of course do it's best not to disappoint our guests in any way that we can avoid that. We thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: would not stay at this location again
Summary: the water pressure in the bathroom sink was extremly low troughout the stay. the floors did not seems were clean good. found ladies long hair a few places, the reception closed at 6:30 and they immediately remove everything. at 6:32 everything is packed away and they are not courteous to give you anything.  breakfast was not quality at all. and they had one chef cooking eggs for the entire hotel guest of 300 or what so many that stayed int he hotel and you can imagine the lines. front desk people were not curteous at all. I personally would avoid to stay at this embassy suites.
Manager Response: We apologize that this was your experience. The team will look into your feedback and improve wherever possible. Our goal is to satisfy our guests and we typically achieve this. It is also disappointing to us that we missed the mark with you. While you are the hotel we encourage you to bring up any challenges so that we can assist and hopefully resolve the matter when we actually can do something about it. The goal is always perfection but we are realistic in that this is not something that can always happen .We want you to be satisfied and I know we will do everything in our power to hopefully make that happen. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: It was good, then it was bad and now it is getting worse. I have been booking this hotel for over 15 years and now I finally came to the point where enough is enough. This was my last visit. Unfriendly front desk, AC not working, air vent in the bathroom was not working, room was never cleaned. Breakfast bad and very crowded.
Manager Response: Please accept our very sincere apologies for letting you down. The team works very hard to do the best that we can. We especially do not want to disappoint our most loyal guests. We really regret not being able to speak to you while you were here as I am confident that we could have at least helped some of this situation. Mistakes will happen, not just here, everywhere and in every business.  We are sorry that we did not have that opportunity and we are again sorry we disappointed you. We will work on being better, that is a promise.  Thank you for being our loyal guest and we hope to somehow have you back again.

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels and I stay at great hotels
Summary: I read 8 pages of reviews and kept coming up with way more good than back so I thought I'd give it a try...I'm so happy I did. I've never been here before and thought what a beautiful place. The atrium area was charming and inviting, Check in was a breeze and the gal was so sweet...my thoughts are you get what you give... She gave us water, explained to us about the free cocktails till 6:30pm. It was easy. We went up to our room...it was not dark at all, big and bright, perfect would be my words. The bed was exactly as I like it, not too soft or hard and lovely large pillows. We went down for drinks and asked about the restaurant, our waiter was fast, friendly and helpful. Food was hot and good.  Breakfast the next day was the best in any hotel...the omelet station was fast and
Manager Response: Pat- Thank you so much for taking the time to write your review of our hotel. It is so important for us to hear more from the vast majority of our guests who really enjoy what the hotel is all about. We know your time is valuable and that like most of our satisfied guests it is difficult to carve out the time to tell us how much you enjoyed the hotel. It really means so much to us that you shared your positivity. It is a great place and we have so many amazing people we serve like you. Hope you have a wonderful summer!

Summary: Hotel made guests sign, not just acknowledge, additional policy regarding guests behavior.    Front desk person very rude and condescending and she wasnt qualified to do her job.  They need better training and weeding out bad apples
Manager Response: Please accept our apologies for the perceived behaviour of our team member. This is very atypical of any of our staff and we will look into the circumstances that revolved around your interaction in order to learn more, and hopefully coach our team member. We do provide a courtesy letter to guests arriving in larger groups to help them with understanding hotel policies. These are standard policies are not new by any means and only meant as a helpful reminder.  It does seem like most of your experience was positive and we appreciate you choosing our location. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: The staff was very welcoming. I arrived hours before check-in and fully expected to pass the time in the lobby. They instead found a room that was ready and I was able to relax in my own room. Later that evening I realized the a/c wasn’t working. The front desk graciously offered to move me immediately but also called maintenance.  Within 15 minutes someone came with all the right knowledge, and equipment, to assess the issue and get the a/c running. When the shuttle was running late on my departure date the manager offered to call a Lyft for me at the hotels expense! I would never expect perfection, but the staff here went out of their way to make my stay perfect in spite of a hiccup here and there. And the breakfast, btw, and welcome reception, are awesome! Clean rooms, comfy
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize the hotel and team. This means so much to us all. The team works so hard and getting that recognition goes so far for all of us. Situations do occur and the team is always prepared to assist in any way they can. During these times of constant unwarranted negativity from the minority of our customers it means so much that our loyal guests take the time to share what is commonplace here. We know that your time is precious, and we are very grateful for your voice.  We hope you have amazing summer!

Summary: I stayed here for 4 nights.    First if your a diamond member like myself,  you have to go search out your benefits.   ( water. Etc) The lobby and Star Bucks are the best part of the property.   The hallway carpet is faded and old.  The rooms are dark and appear they were furnished about 10 years ago.  They are clean and the bathrooms are good size.  Just old.   There is no maid service unless you request by 8 am.  I called at 8:30 and was denied.  I requested they clean the rest of the days.   The next day someone went into my room and left the door ajar.  It was unlocked on open.   I left early that day and shook the door to make sure it was closed.  I travel a lot and always do that.  I was stupid and went into the room.  Everything was fine and untouched.  Also no maid
Manager Response: Thank you for your thorough explanation on your particular experience. We were pleased to read that some core items in choosing a hotel stood out to you as well. The hotel being clean and having a good breakfast are key and we thank you for noting this. The new cleaning service standards are confusing for guests right now and we understand that change is difficult. The team will look into the situation you mention with housekeeping so that we can understand the actual circumstances. We would be happy to speak with you at any time. Please contact the hotel at 949-553-8332 and we will gladly be available for you. Most importantly, we apologize that your stay was not perfect and we do aim for every guest to have the best experience possible. Hopefully we can improve and serve you again.

Summary: The air conditioning was out for over 24 hours and then that got fixed and since then we have had dozens of children running wild, screaming, going up and down the elevators and stairwells. We have complained multiple times and management hasn't done anything to help. It's an embarrassment that adults allow their children to act like they are in an active prison riot and more embarrassing that Embassy Suites apparently condones this behavior.
Manager Response: We were sorry to see that your stay was impacted by the poor behavior of other guests at the hotel. The team absolutely attempted to address the concerns brought to our attention. The entitled and selfish behavior of certain people is not just something that you see at our hotel but is unfortunately a larger issue we face everywhere today. The only thing that we can hope for is some understanding in regards to what we are all dealing with, as this is surely something you notice in public these days on a consistent basis. The team will look to improve our response in every way humanly possible. There is always something we could do better but these are not normal situations and they are truly difficult to attempt to approach.  This is a much larger issue and there are many circumstances involved which the hotel unfortunately does not control. We really wish it was as simple as stated but that is not the reality of what we were facing. That said, we are sorry this occurred and again we will do our best to play our part and improve where we can. Thank you

Summary: Unfortunately I decided to stay at this Hotel on my birthday, I checked in and like other reviews here the A/C was not working in my room, I was sweating just sitting there, called the front desk, and complained, they said they would send a A/C technician up with keys to my room.  I waited and the tech arrived quickly he asked me to leave the room while he worked on the A/C….  I felt uncomfortable with this so I asked him to give me a few minutes while I put some stuff away, I couldn’t understand why I would need to leave my room I don’t believe there was an access door to the condenser or blower unit only the wall mounted thermostat, so anyway, I literally packed all my belongings into my bags and put them in the small closet, and left the room.  Earlier I had taken off my
Manager Response: Whenever a situation with a lost item comes up we do feel for the individual that is involved  as we know how terrible it is when we misplace, or forget something. Our only hope is that there can be some understanding in what a challenging situation that places the hotel in as well. It is impossible to account for something we do not hold ourselves, and have no account of for obvious reasons. The hotel is working with you in order to do everything we possibly can to help your situation. It is understandable that you are frustrated and regret the situation. We also never want any guest to lose anything. The team will continue to assist in the process in all ways that we are able.

Summary: The courtesy shuttle from the airport with our driver Ruben was fantastic -- very personable & offered many insights for a fabulous introduction to start our first visit to Irvine. The fish tacos at Vibrante was the best fish taco I've ever eaten. The hotel architecture is stunning. The complimentary omelette breakfast was an absolute delight and the lady helping at the breakfast area went out of her way to clean a table so that we could be seated immediately. The climate control inside the room was excellent. There seems to be an unlimited supply of hot water in the showers. The front desk staff are amazing. The shuttle driver to the airport offered to drive us almost ten minutes before the official first shuttle departure time out of his own consideration. The water available
Manager Response: We were very happy to read your review on the hotel! It seems that the majority of all the core items in your experience were great. It was so nice to read your recognition of Ruben. He is an amazing person and an example of our great staff which we are so fortunate to have. Do not hesitate to call us while you are at the hotel and have us replace anything you encounter that is not up to your standard. We try to be perfect but understand that we will not be. However, we are here to serve you and we want to make sure that everything is to your liking.  The team sends its thanks, and we hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: The staff was gracious, the rooms comfortable and clean, breakfast was plentiful. I love the atrium lobby full of plants. We enjoyed the pool and made good use of Starbucks. The staff went out of their way to help us when my daughter sprained her ankle in the lobby just by stepping down wrong. We could not have asked for a better place to stay.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recognizing the great work our team is trying to do for our guests. It goes a long way in keeping our team motivated to provide the service we possibly can. Our team really cares and were grateful for you taking the time to be positive. Please let us know if we can assist in any way.

Summary Heading: General tone of property is, “we really do not care”.
Summary: Staff clearly not interested in making our stay anything special. Rooms were nice and property was nice after completing renovations a few years ago. Breakfast was not the typical excellent embassy suites breakfast- many missing items and no interest in the staff restocking. Check in was slow and line was long. Very disappointing stay. Walls were quite thin so I could here the conversation of the guests next door and above me. Nice location, safe area, plenty of parking although overpriced at $30 nightly rate to park. Comfortable beds and linens.
Manager Response: We were really surprised to read this as our staff is generally noted for being great with our guests. It seems that we missed an opportunity with you and for that we do apologize. The team will review the notes that have and see where we can improve. Our hope is to serve you again some day.

Summary: Excellent service, cleanliness and overall friendly, helpful attitudes by everyone I dealt with, especially the shuttle driver Ameer, who was pleasant from picking us up to going the extra mile to provide hot breakfast to go for us, really appreciated and above & beyond.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recognizing Amir and the hotel! He is a great example of how much the people that do these jobs care and want guests to be taken care of. At time when we mostly only hear negative feedback on mistakes, it truly is a delight to share this with our team. There are so many guests that appreciate them and realize all that they do. Thank you for being a positive person and sharing that with our team. It is a pleasure to serve you.

Summary: Below expectations. Room was cold took forever to heat up. Room carpets felt dirty and old. Breakfast chef used same utencils and grill for every order (cross contamination of pork products when I dont eat pork). Parking expensive.
Manager Response: We really are sorry to read again that you were not satisfied with your stay. As mentioned in person, we will do our best to address the areas you mentioned. We typically tend to do well for most guests, but we understand that we are not perfect and can make mistakes. We are sorry that we did not meet your expectations and hope to grow from the experience.

Summary Heading: Location was good, but there were issues.
Summary: We booked 4 nights at the Hilton Embassy Suites in December 2021.  From the outside, it seems ok.  But we experienced a few issues: Housekeeping  service was by request only, but, we requested service 2 days in a row and there was no service provided I finally went to the lobby and asked the staff to give me towels The breakfast was poorly staffed for the number of customers and the food disappeared instantly. It appears that this hotel caters to tour groups so the crowd at breakfast can be intense When we checked in, we found toenail clipping on the dark carpet in our room.  It was an indication of the housekeeping staff issues. Parking is expensive and is very awkward to access the hotel. You was outside and up stops to get to the hotel. Since it was raining, this was
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive mention and the constructive feedback. As a note, Hilton Hotels have moved towards a housekeeping service program that asks our guests to simply request services when needed. Once you did this we should have been able to take care of your request. We will look into where we had a challenge and correct this were possible. The hotel is very popular as our location and bran offerings are very strong. You will most likely encounter a busy environment when staying here. The team always does it's best to service all of our guests needs. The team will work on the areas you pointed out and we do hope to constantly improve as this is our goal. We are grateful to you and all our guests for supporting us and we hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: This hotel needs a major upgrade both in the hotel and food selection. Consistency is key In a chain. Embassy Suites in Glendale and Walnut Creek make this one look like a motel 6. Would not recommend.
Manager Response: We always take our guests feedback with sincerity.  The team wants to always improve and that is our ongoing collective goal. We appreciate your response and hope that we can understand the details needed to strive towards meeting all of our guests different expectations. Thank you

Summary Heading: Don’t stay here if you have an early morning flight
Summary: When I checked in at around six in the evening, I asked if we could get a shuttle to pick us up at our rental car drop off location. The front desk person said she would check, but that the driver was only allowed to go to the airport. When following up, she said that wouldn’t be possible, it was too far. We went and dropped our car off at the rental car drop off location which by the way I had given her the address, and it was literally 400 feet from the airport entrance.  We ended up walking back the 1.6 miles to the hotel. The next morning the shuttle service started 15 minutes later than we needed to leave to get to the airport. So we paid $54 for a Uber to the airport. The whole purpose of staying at this particular location was the proximity to the airport and the car drop
Manager Response: I sincerely apologize on behalf of the hotel for failing you in regards to the complementary shuttle service. The shuttle has a specific stop at the local airport. We do not offer service outside of the airport at this time for very obvious and specific reasons. Our commitment is to ensure we can service guests coming to and from the actual airport. It is unfortunate that in the conversation the information could not have developed further where you could have been picked up at the airport, if as you state you could have walked over to the area of pickup for this service. Further, it was again an issue when you wanted to leave to the airport and we will look into this as well. The team has specific hours that service the actual flights that take place every day and you should not have had any issue leaving the hotel at our designated times. I could see how frustrating this could be and I know that this was a communication issue that we need to understand so we can help in these situations. It does seem that the core of our business which is the room you purchased was up to expectation, we were happy to see that. Again, our apologies and we do hope you will give us an opportunity to make this right.  Thank you

Summary Heading: Poor management, lots of noise, no masks
Summary: Very disappointing stay the first night. There were dozens of kids running up and down the hallways and going up and down the elevators shouting. They were not supervised and weren’t wearing masks. I could hear them from inside my room with the TV on and management said there was nothing they could do. The noise and disruption went on for at least three hours.
Manager Response: We were sorry to read that other guests disturbed your stay. It is one of the most challenging situations in our business as it places us in the middle of an interaction that we hope most reasonable people could see is at the least very challenging. It is not that we do not want to control the situation it is that we are limited in what we can do. As you can imagine there is no external support for trying to keep "kids controlled" when their own parents are not doing so. The team does attempt to speak to these individuals as best we can and we understand that the results at times are not what we wanted. We can only hope that you can understand that this is not an easy situation. We regret that your stay was impacted by this.  One thing that we always want our guests to keep in mind when choosing  a location is that Embassy Suites hotels are very popular with families and weekends always tend can have an environment where active kids are present.

Summary: Breakfast was the BEST! Loved everything about this hotel! Very welcoming, and atmosphere was great. Staff in the front was great! I'm big on location, and this one was in a good, safe area. No complaints here!
Manager Response: Thank you for love, we all need it! Hope we can serve more guests like you in 2022.

Summary: The carport in my room was all torn and brought it up to front desk attention and did not do anything or offered to change my room. The towels were ALWAYS dirty and smelly. The kitchen workers were super stingy with the portioning of the food.
Manager Response: We will look at your comments for our improvement. The team is sorry that you were not impressed and we will try harder.  Thank you

Summary Heading: No masks compliance and high parking fee mandated $30/night.
Summary: Be aware that the hotel staff does not mandate the state required mask policy throughout the hotel.  From a public health standpoint, the guests are non complaint with safety protocols.  The mandated parking fee of $30 per night is quite steep.
Manager Response: The hotel absolutely does mandate masks but we unfortunately are not able to physically place a mask on a  unwilling person. The local authorities also do not help in these kinds of matters as they are not able to intervene in this instances. We are doing the best we can with the world we are all living in. Hope that we can all have some understanding for that.  Parking is lower than the market average for our airport location.  We hope you are well and thank you for being our guest.

Summary: We stayed at this location on 12/20-12/21 while I was in the area for Laser Eye Surgery. My husband checked-in around 1:30 and was told the room wasn’t ready, so they put us in one of the “studio” rooms. It was absolutely the smallest room I’ve ever stayed in. One of the reasons we chose this hotel was to have a 2-room suite so my husband could work while I slept after my procedure. They also didn’t have the cocktail reception at all, despite the Hilton website saying that it was simply “modified”. The hot tub was also “out of order”. Breakfast was sub-par… the selection was limited compared to what were used to with this particular hotel chain and the eggs were extremely runny. From our experience, this particular location is not worthy of the brand name. We paid about $140 for
Manager Response: We are sorry that you were disappointed. In looking at your reservation the studio room was selected when  you booked. We encourage guests to make sure they look at what the booking may be as many Embassy hotels do provide studios at lower rates. The social hour is available and we provide guests with vouchers in order to obtain a maximum of two drinks per night, this is the Embassy Suites standard. We understand that it is new but we do feel it improves the experience for everyone involved. The team will look into the suggestions for our improvement as that is our goal. We hope to do better and apologize that you were not satisfied.

Summary Heading: We’ve stayed here several time and always been happy. Our last visit was not fun or relaxing. Kids running in the
Summary: We’ve stayed here several time and always been happy. Our last visit was not fun or relaxing. Kids running in the hallways and playing on the luggage carts. Ran out of food quickly. They watered down the oatmeal even adding more water when I told the lady.
Manager Response: We were sorry to read that you did not enjoy your last visit to the hotel. The hotel is very popular with families and groups as it's core amenities and room size fit what these individuals are searching for in a hotel. We completely understand and agree with the frustrating scenarios we deal with today with people, in general, not exhibiting respect for other human beings. Even with our best attempts to control children, or most likely adults, we are left with the inability to cover every needed aspect of poor human behavior. It is sad that this is common place, not just at the hotel, but everywhere today. We will attempt to do better in the areas mentioned and we are always trying to improve ourselves. All we can hope for is an understanding to how difficult of situation this is and that it is not just the hotel not doing our part. Hope to serve you again as you mentioned you have enjoyed it before.  Thank you

Summary Heading: Very Disappointed. Rooms are Poorly maintained
Summary: We travel all of the time but this Hass to be the worst hotel that we’ve ever stayed in. The interior rooms were very rundown. The couches had stains and tears. The AC unit was peeling away from the wall and the locks on the bedroom doors did not work. We also can’t get extra blankets from the sTaft. We asked three different times. The breakfast was so bland but the worst part was it was the same time exact thing three days in a row. Also, the free drink tickets that they gave us really weren’t free. The guy at the bar charged us $20 for our two drinks even after we gave him our to drink tickets!
Manager Response: We apologize that we missed the mark with your stay. It does seem that there were some issues that we would need to investigate on our end as we agree that this should not have been your experience. Some of this does seem that it could have been corrected with some simple communication. We are sorry that this was not able to happen and we hope to improve where we can. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Great location, very close to SNA. We have stayed here many times, including the wedding party for my daughter’s party. They have remodeled some of the rooms so they look much better. Embassy always has a great breakfast but we were surprised that they were not cooking made-to-order omelets on Saturday and Sunday. Instead we were offered scrambled eggs, diced potatoes, and sausage. Also, they will only clean and service the rooms if you stay longer than 4 nights. We had to ask the front desk for toilet paper, Kleenex, and extra towels. We were there for three nights.
Manager Response: Thank you for noting the great experience and location. During times when the capacity of the hotel is high we do move away from certain aspects of services that we would not be able to provide appropriately due to the amount of people. Housekeeping service is now based on advance request and this is a new Hilton standard. We apologize that this was not explained well and we can always provide amenities upon request. This should never be an issue.

Summary: Human being is a plus in any business and this hotel has good quality of that resource. The location is very goo, coffee, restaurants, are close. Complimentary drinks is an extra plus, Sunday morning free breakfast, well jus love this hotel
Manager Response: Having great human beings to serve is also the most important  factor for us as well. You are just that and it is a pleasure to serve you. Most things turn out well with those that are positive and look to be positive to others. We wish you all the best and hope your Thanksgiving is full of joy. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Comfortable bed. Couldn’t hear any outside noises. Starbucks in lobby!! Staff is friendly. TVs have good picture quality. Good complimentary hot breakfast. Parking structure felt safe. Would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your positive experience! It so important for to us to know that the team's efforts are recognized by our most valued guests. Overall the hotel is a great place and having great guests always is the most important ingredient. We hope you Holidays are bright!

Summary: Really enjoyed the convenience to John Wayne airport, easy of in/out (although 30/day for parking is too much), excellent breakfast and having Starbucks in the lobby is a bonus. Bed was creaky and mattress  needs replacing but overall great stay!
Manager Response: We really enjoyed serving you! Thank you fro recognizing how great the hotel is. Parking in the area is charged at most locations due to the proximity of the airport. You will find that our property is actually on the lower side of the areas parking rates for overnight. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: The extra blankets at this place are old and uncomfortable. My daughter slept on the pull out sofa which was comfortable but hated the blanket she had to use. I called to ask for a replacement as well as an additional blanket and was brought another old blanket. I asked if they had anything newer and was told no. This is a good hotel and I’m not sure why they’d skimp on bedding? It’s the little things like bedding that make a stay.
Manager Response: We apologize that you did not like the blanket. those blankets are meant to produce a good amount of warmth, and if it is not too cold we have heard that they are not comfortable for some people. Putting a flat sheet on first really helps because it adds comfort and builds a nice amount of heating.  We thank you for noticing that we are a great hotel. Let us know when you are back next time and we can figure out an alternative. Please know we are not skimping, those blankets are not cheap. They just are meant for a specific function and not everyone likes that. I am sure we can find an alternative for you certainly.  Thank you

Summary: Worst place ever due to staff Members Lola and Ron ManagerWorst hotel ever I would never waste my time staying at that hotel even dealing with the staff booking.com even knew the people are rude ones in the People like that should not be working
Manager Response: It seems that there was a real challenge with your booking, we were sorry to see this. Typically our team members are noted for being very accommodating. At times this does come up when a challenge is had and there is a lack of understanding in regards to what might be taking place. This is a very hard situation as the staff may not be able to do what is being requested and as such will most likely be viewed in a negative way.. We apologize that this occurred and the team absolutely does not want any guest to feel this way, regardless of what occurred.

Summary: Never stayed at embassy Suites before and honestly didn’t look at any pictures beforehand. Was very surprised at how beautiful it was and how nice the room was! Plus Starbucks in the lobby! Will definitely Be staying here again in the future.
Manager Response: We were so happy that you chose to stay with us! Thank you for the gracious comments. The team works hard to do the best we can for our guests. When we learn that our guests are appreciating this it really makes everything worth while. We are here to serve you and want to do all we can. Have a wonderful weekend!

Summary: Old blood stains. Should I say more? Very disappointed in this hotel. At this point I’m just writing to make the 200 minimum requirement because I don’t complain. I just won’t return. This location does not represent Embassy’s image.
Manager Response: The team did reach out to you in regards to this in order to apologize as we noticed the other postings to this same issue.. We are confident that any issue like this can be resolved at the property, given the opportunity. People are not perfect and we will never act like we are. Things can get missed and we truly do regret when this occurs. Again, we do always strive to make any issue right and I do think we could have done this in this instance. We again apologize and regret our errors. If we can do anything for you please reach out and let us know. We would love the opportunity to make it right as unfortunately we can not take back the human error. Thank you

Summary: I stayed for the weekend for a job interview and the hotel was great. The food at the restaurant was amazing and the room was very quiet. Great comfortable atmosphere. Very close to the highway and shops.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest! It was such a pleasure to serve you. We are so happy to see our core guests start to return to business travel as we have missed them dearly. Your recognition is appreciated and the insights from our core guests are always appreciated. We all look forward to serving you again. Hope the interview went well!

Summary: All my expectations were exceeded! As a disabled individual the ADA rooms are a perfect accommodation and the staff was extremely friendly and helpful! Everything was clean and sanitized and I will definitely be returning!
Manager Response: Thank  you so much for the great review! We look to ensure all guests have a great experience. Looking forward to serving you again soon!

Summary: Great location in Irvine. Friendly staff and clean accommodations. Everything you could want in a hotel is here except a bellman and valet parking. Other than that, it was a perfect stay. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We strive to be perfect and we appreciate you noticing the teams hard work! It is a blessing to have such great guests at our hotel and we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: Poor covid safety protocols.  Most people do not wear masks inside.  Not all employees wear masks.  No covid safety guidelines/requirements posted or spoken of at time of check-in. Room was clean and spacious room (studio queen bed). Room is cleaned only upon request.  Easy access to highways and the airport.
Manager Response: The hotel follows the Orange County COVID protocol as we are required. These may differ from areas you have been or are at. We understand this creates confusion but would like to be clear that we are following our local guidelines.  Guidelines are avaible at the entry to the hotel and online as expected. We apologize for the confusion that this situation is creating in our world but we are doing our part as best we can.  Thank you for the nice comments about the room.

Summary Heading: What a difference and what a nice experience
Summary: What a difference. After our horrible experience at the Embassy Suites in Downey (see separate review) we check in at the E.S. in Irvine (Main street) for our last 4 nights in California. We were greeted by Lola and she was a wonderful, polite and friendly lady. We got a very nice room and the entire hotel @embassysuites Irvine is managed well. It's clean well maintained and much better looked after. Breakfast has a much better selection and every staff member we met or engaged with was super friendly and respectful to their customers. Location is perfect and as central as you can stay in OC. We would definitely stay back there again when travelling back to California and can highly recommend the E.S. in Irvine for both leisure and business travellers alike.
Manager Response: We were so proud to see that Lola made such an impact. Our team really are the difference and we are so happy to have such great people to work with here. The hotel really is an amazing place and we are always grateful when our guests recognize the efforts. Our sister hotels are all trying and in this tough situation we do apologize that any guest is not getting what they expect. We are confident that every one of our hotels is working to improve and they too are looking forward to progress. Hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: The parking was very expensive for the amenities we received. Breakfast ended at 9am which is way too early for a vacation. This used to be 10am. Staff was nice when we were there. Overall, I will probably stay somewhere else although we love the Embassy. I guess it’s the changing of the times.
Manager Response: We were glad to read that the staff were nice and it does seem that overall you enjoyed the hotel. The additional room is really what sets our hotel apart from the competition in terms of product. Its is double the size of standard hotel rooms which is a lot. Parking is charged at most hotels in our area, we actually are a value when compared to similar hotels in the area. Our team hops to serve you again and we understand that every guest has choices. Thank you again.

Summary: Very clean and had a Starbucks inside. Great for business and a quick trip. Easy to get to off the 405. Only wished parking garage had an entrance to hotel. Instead you have to go out of garage and walk up to hotel
Manager Response: Location of the hotel really is super. Right in the middle of the OC, close to airport and the major freeway that runs through the County. We really appreciate the feedback form trusted sources and well traveled guests. The hopes to serve you again soon!

Summary: I paid $15 to park in the parking garage and then I got charged an additional $30 from You guys… and none of your vending machines had and items in it. I also never got credit back my $30! I am still waiting on it…
Manager Response: We were sorry to read that you had challenges with overflow parking. It can be confusing and we do apologize for that.  The team can absolutely assist with getting any due credits back to you. Please call 949-553-8332 and any front desk agent can assist with looking into this for you.  The hotel does not have vending machines anywhere on site. We do have a small market at the front of our hotel. There may be some confusion on this point certainly.  We appreciate you being our guest and it seems like the hotel served it's purpose outside of having a challenge with parking. We look forward to resolving that as well. Thank you

Summary: Gréât location. Rooms and property are very nice. Parking was hard with my oversized vehicle but otherwise service was awesome. Lola and Michelle were excellent. The restaurant except for Steve left a lot to be desired and breakfast was ok.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing our team members, they make this a special place.  The location is tops and we are glad you were ale to enjoy the OC.  We will contotuie to enhance our dining as we are able and look forward to constant improvements.  Have a great Holiday!

Summary Heading: Good stay at Embassy Suites hotel
Summary: This hotel with good location and good service, the staffs all are nice. The price matched to the quality. If they can clear the smell from bath sink and bathtub, I will consider it perfectly. I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: We were glad to read that you had a good stay! The team will research your comments on the room and we are confident that this can be fixed.  Hope to serve you again soon. All the best!

Summary Heading: Used to love this hotel, it’s gone down hill
Summary: Dried food on the floor when I checked in. Room looked like it had not been cleaned. Called front desk after walking in room they said they would make a note of it. WOW. Didn’t offer to switch rooms or anything. Went to front desk in the morning they gave me the email of house keeping to address the situation. Until I told them I would like to switch rooms. Next room was in a little better shape. Tried to reach manager via email as well as phone calls and messages at front desk for several days no contact back at all  Sad
Manager Response: Hard not to be loved anymore. We do apologize that it was not up to your standard at this time. The team understands that it is not the same as "before" and we all are working very hard to get us back up to a better situation.  The situation described is very different from the point of view of the indidualvs involved. Typically these people are very responsive and we are sure something is missing in the facts if this is how they approached your needs. Not at all like our team. We do apologize and hope to improve where possible. In speaking to management here we have not had contact but always want to help where we can.

Summary: Best hotel stay I’ve had in a long time. The entire staff was friendly especially the bar and the Starbucks crew. I will definitely stay here anytime I’m in the area. It’s in a business area but it’s easy to get anywhere you need to go.
Manager Response: Wow, we are honored by your review! These days positivity is in short supply and the team can be discouraged by all the negative jabs. Your decency and support means more to us than we can express. Thank you for being honest and seeing that the hotel really is doing well for our guests. Our team hopes to have the pleasure to serve you again.

Summary: Softball team and families stayed early August 2021. Great location. Spacious rooms.  Great for families.  Centrally located for various options for visitors.  Courteous and helpful staff.  Clean for the number of people using this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for being our guest. It was so amazing to see all the kids get back to playing after a crazy year for everyone. The team really is doing the best it can and it means a lot to read that guests are recognizing the efforts. Hope you have a great summer and we hope to see the team playing again soon.

Summary Heading: Keep the snarky comments to yourself, please.  Paying guests should not have to listen to this BS
Summary: Internet is incredibly spotty and slow. I was receiving less than 2 Mbps from my room, which is unacceptable in a digital-necessitated age. I talked to the front desk about this and asked if anything could be done, such as raising my speed, to which I was told: “if we did that, then we wouldn’t have a business.” After talking some more, this employee did agree to offer a higher internet plan (edit: which doesn’t even exist, there appears to be one universal speed), but his initial response had already ruined my experience permanently. I do feel a bit bad for him, as the technology at a hotel with these rates needs a desperate upgrade. That part is clearly not his fault. I would prefer straight, no sarcasm answers, as well as not being hung up on rudely, though, as that IS in his
Manager Response: Our team should never respond in this manner regardless of the circumstance. Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel for this. It is true that we can not raise individual speeds as the internet is tied and needs to provide access for all guests. At times it can be a challenge if the system is being overwhelmed by demand. These days demand increases so quickly it is very difficult to keep up. We are sorry that that you experienced an issue. Most importantly we will follow up with our team members in regards to appropriate responses.

Summary Heading: Better off staying at one of the chain’s lower brand hotel, they will be better.
Summary: Comfortable room. Nice lobby. Expensive parking and tight spots.  Spots fill up and have to park in non-parking spots (ask hotel prior to doing it). There  is a security that seems to ticket cars (probably ones without parking permit).  Breakfast was not good.  The Hampton Inn has a much better breakfast.  Breakfast only for 2 hours. If you go after the first hour they have run out of items.  They only offered eggs, bacon or sausage (depending on day), potatoes.  They have, but run out of pancakes, bagel, bread, cream cheese.  Only have two people working in cooking and serving breakfast so there is always a long line.  It is too much work for them two.  You can tell they are trying hard, but impossible to keep up.  They also have two types of cereals.  Hampton Inn usually
Manager Response: We were glad that the room and lobby were noted positively. The room is the reason guests stay at hotels and this is a crucial point for all of us in hotels. One very important item with our hotel is that our guests are provided a suite when they book it. This means our rooms are twice the size of other brands. This is very important when comparing pricing or level of hotel.  Parking is charged as with most large hotels anywhere, especially near an airport.  Breakfast is being modified regularly as possible and we know that our guests want more and more enhancements. We hope to continue to improve this and meet the requests of our core guests.  We hope your next visit to a Hilton hotel is to your liking and we are sorry to learn that we did not meet your needs. The team always looks to improve and we thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Blake at the front desk deserves the worst Hilton employee ever award! Amazingly audacious! i’m hilton diamond and they treated me so bad, who knows how they handle regular customer service. They didn’t have a room available for us and he tells me to just take my money an leave after a 15h flight and with 3 kids. Well played Hilton!
Manager Response: We are sorry to read that there was a service issue. It does seem that much of the specifics might be missing in this commentary and we hope that everyone can better understand what actually caused the situation. The team never wants to disappoint and when situations arise that are challenging we truly want to do the best we can with the given circumstances.

Summary Heading: staff was not welcoming.  Was harassed by security throughout duration of the trip.
Summary: The positive thing is they honored my rate for two rooms.   Front desk was not welcoming and did not want take the extra step to help guests.  Asked about the use of conference room and automatically said no without any attempt to try and make something happen.  Security at location stalked guests through the whole stay.  Literally standing over our shoulder as we ate, pics to prove it as well.....
Manager Response: We were sorry to read that you felt our team was not welcoming. I personally recall spending time with attempting to get your last minute request for space organized. We understand that you would have wanted to the team to handle this but event room sales are not something that they are familiar with. Regardless, they should always be pleasant and typically are. I did personally follow up with the team to let them know how you perceived them that day that we spoke.  Security at the hotel only engages guests when they need to. We would need to understand why they may have been perceived as "stalking" you. We are confident that none of them would be comfortable doing this without any reason. That also said we are sorry that you were not satisfied with our services. The team always looks to improve and this will be brought to everyone's attention. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Rooms need to be updated; old smell (maybe smoke?); Not the cleanest rooms (carpets filthy); found 2 large roaches. Yikes! Felt like I was staying at a motel.  Service was fine, but this isn't a hotel I would choose again.  We stayed for almost 2 weeks and therefore wanted a good value.  However, you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: It was hard to read that you stayed with for an extended stay and we could not make things right. That is not typical and it is unfortunate. Things will come up and any property but we like to believe that we can take care of them. We are sorry that we failed you. The team will look into your comments and of course try to learn how we could have done better.

Summary: The Embassy Suites brand is normally a pretty reliable brand and we like it. So we were more than a bit surprised at the issues we have had. Please forgive the long-winded description. We booked two separate rooms for our family and requested that they be adjacent. The agent we spoke to agreed.
