When we arrived (early), the two adjacent rooms were not ready but they gave us two non-adjacent rooms and told us that when we returned that evening, we could move from one of the rooms to an adjacent room. When we returned, the agent told us there was no such request on record and somewhat implied that I was lying. I just gave up as it was not worth fighting about. The room my wife and I had was mostly comfortable, but the mattress on the bed seemed to be either very old or else very
Manager Response: My sincerest apologies for what seems to be an obviously frustrating situation.  Everything you describes should have been addressed while you were here on property and it is hard to understand why some of it occurred at all. Your concern with the bathroom has been shared and we will look into how this became possible.  I am sorry that your stay was poor and I will work with our team to address this.  Please feel free to contact the hotel and ask for the General Manager at this point if no one has connected with you still.

Summary: We are diamond members and always appreciate the consistency of Embassy Suites, this stay was no different. *Great customer service.  *Clean rooms.  *Welcoming front desk and common areas.  *Proximity to John Wayne Airport is ideal.  *Close to great shopping and restaurants.
Manager Response: Thank you for your Loyalty to Hilton! Nothing is more important to us than our most honored guests.  Being that you travel so often it really validates what we are trying to do. We are not perfect by any means but we do absolutely try our best for our guests.  The place is fantastic and is located in the best possible area for allowing exploration of the OC.  Hope that your summer is going great and we look forward to serving you at your next Hilton.

Summary: Clean and good location. Car needed. Breakfast free, but worse the airplane food. Breakfast hours in the weekend not flexible.  Hotel crew were very nice. If the hotel will restore the traditional breakfast we most likely stay there again.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing the great work from our service staff. It is really the most important thing to us.  We are glad that you were here over the fantastic Holiday and that you enjoyed yourself.  The breakfast is consistently being looked at and we hope to move forward with enhancements soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but filthy furniture. I was so disgusted.
Summary: I had to ask for three bed sheets to cover up the sofa and chair before I allowed my kids can crawl on them. The furniture was disgustingly dirty. I was so disappointed. My daughter started to get sick on the last day. She came home with a fever.
Manager Response: We were surprised to read that the team was not able to take care of the mistake. At times when dealing with human beings things can get missed. That said, it seems like a simple solution to notify the team and have them take care of that. It is disappointing that for some reason this was not able to be the case. We are sorry to learn that your daughter got sick and hope she is feeling better. The team will look to improve and we hope that you have a good rest of your 2021 summer.

Summary: I enjoyed the serene atmosphere of this hotel and the cleanliness and structure of the rooms. The staff was very friendly. The restaurant looked very appealing. It was conveniently great that the hotel has a Starbucks inside. I genuinely look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: We look forward to serving you again! Thank you so much for recognizing the positive aspects of our hotel and for sharing your positivity. It is obvious that you are well traveled and we take pride in serving our most upstanding guests.  Hope your summer is amazing!

Summary Heading: Perfect spacious and clean family hotel
Summary: Wonderful experience at this hotel while traveling with frail parents and young kid. Amy at the front desk was incredibly helpful! Kind and friendly. The hotel was terrific - rooms were spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Thank you for noticing the great job Amy did! We were so happy to read that and I am certain she is very grateful as well.  We hope you have a great Holiday and an amazing summer!  See you again.

Summary: Love this hotel. Staff were great, open area to sit with family, comfort, suite rooms and cleanliness is awesome. Loved having Starbucks in the hotel. Parking, elevators, housekeeping items were all great!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you were happy! This is our goal for every guest and it is so special when the match is made. The reason there is such a variety of hotels is because different people want different things. When the guest choses the right hotel it makes things click.  The team appreciates your kind recognition of our efforts and we hope to serve you again.  Come back for the fair this month, it will be awesome!

Summary: CON:  - elevators not working - pool not open  - no housekeeping service - parking is around the corner and down the ramp - walk up and down from the parking lot is via multiple flights of stairs - air conditioning didn’t work (despite maintenance “fixing” it) - $30 parking fee - no valet cart to bring luggage to room - an entry driveway so narrow that drivers had to rush to load unload / or constantly move cars  PRO:  Leaving this dump.
Manager Response: We were sorry to read that your experience was so bad. The team regrets that everything seemed to be wrong.  Elevators did go down and we were able to get them up within a few hours, we know that is rough and wish that we can prevent something like that.  The pool was closed for repairs.  Housekeeping service is available upon request in advance, we are sorry this was not clear.  The parking garage is around the corner and there is a fee to park there.  A/C should work and can go down for various reasons, we should have been able to do something.  Valet carts are available but are first come first serve.  We wish we could change the structure of the driveway.  We understand that you did not like the hotel, we are sorry this was the case. None the less we still wish you all the best.

Summary: Thank you so much to Blake for taking care of my daughter and her friend on their first ever road trip. After they had a bad experience in another hotel on their way down from Oregon, I called ahead to make sure all would be ok with their stay! He instantly said “no worries…we will take care of them”!!! And that he did! They always felt safe and knew if they needed anything they could ask for Blake! It helped this mama know her girl was being taken care of!!!!! Thank you!
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing our team member for his great efforts. We work with special people who really have a true talent for taking care of others.  Sounds like an awesome trip, we wish you even more fun.  Have a great 4th of July!

Summary: My room was clean and spacious. I appreciated the microwave and mini fridge. The complimentary breakfast was great. The staff were friendly and accommodating. This property makes a lot of sense for business travel or nearby sports tournament events. Otherwise, I wouldn’t recommend this hotel as a good base for exploring Orange County. It’s not close to any attractions.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great recognition of our efforts. It has been so hard for us all and it means the world to us that our best traveled guests understand that great efforts we are putting forth.  The hotel is centrally located in Orange County so if you plan to explore different areas we are a very good option to navigate from. Its a big area and there is a whole world of things to do.  Have a great summer!

Summary: The cleanliness of this room was disappointing to say the least. There was hair ON THE TOILET and in the bathtub. Someone else’s hair ties with hair in it was left on the side table in the living area. There were 4 long black hairs IN my bed. There was an old rusted earring on the floor which indicated it wasn’t vacuumed which is not ok since I have a crawling infant.  I asked for my room to be cleaned as the garbage cans were overflowing. My request “fell through the cracks and no one was available to come do it because we are so busy”. They did send somebody up to vacuum the room and empty the garbage cans, however they did not put a garbage bag back into the cans and left them in the middle of the floor. I also asked for more towels and I was brought five hand towels How is a
Manager Response: We were sorry to read that you were disappointed. Something must have been very wrong as we are confident that a room as you describe could not have been cleaned and ready for any guest. There may have been some sort of clerical error. Please accept our apologies as we understand that we failed your expectations. As our business progresses out of the pandemic we are finding ourselves challenged to communicate that the business is still recovering. It is a long road ahead to "normal" and we know that our guests want it to be as it was ASAP. So do we and we apologize as work through this tough transition together. All we can ask for is understanding. Thank you for being our guest and we will look into improving in every way possible.

Summary: Embassy suites in Irvine charges an additional $30/day for parking. That was never mentioned at the time of booking my reservation with a live person.  It was a rude awakening! The concierge was insulting!! The ac in our room didn’t work, the front desk said they would send someone up with the room keys to the new room, we waited outside our room, luggage in hand and the keys never made it up.. I had to call the front desk again (after 20 minutes of waiting) for them to tell me, “he should have been there already” Nope! Very unsatisfactory
Manager Response: We do apologize that you were not aware of the parking fee at the hotel. In looking at our website to confirm we do see that this is clearly notated there. It is challenging to ensure communication of every aspect of the hotel any particular guest may want to be aware of. This is the reason as to why our website is the primary source of guest use in order for every guest to be able to make choices based on everything they may need. Parking is charged at the vast majority of hotels in the area as we do all operate near a major airport. We obviously do not want any guest to be surprised or disappointed and we feel badly that this was your situation. I am confident that the need to change rooms also added to your initial disappointment. The team will use your feedback in our attempts to always improve and we hope to always get better.

Summary: Service was great. Daniel, Amy and Jasmine we’re very nice. Hotel was very nice and great location. Main thing was room needs to be updated and cleaned from top to bottom! Starbucks service wasn’t nice
Manager Response: We really appreciate you recognizing the great people that make this place what it is! The team is very proud. Thank you for the feedback and we will look to improve everywhere we can.

Summary: Selecting a room was super easy. It's mobile check-in and contact-less interaction.  The bedroom was super quiet. I would have given this place a 5, but here's what made the score go down.  * The bathroom smelled like someone was smoking a cigar through the vents. I complained the 1st moment we walked into the room and they sent someone to spray the air. I even put packets of coffee to hopefully remove the awful smell. No use. we stayed there for 4 days/3 nights. I should have left and found another accommodation.  They mentioned that they offered to switch rooms, but they were completely sold out for 2 queens. * Parking is managed by Irvine. So, I received two parking violation warnings for parking in the parking lot and the garage of the hotel. Remember if you are a
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback on the hotel. It looks like we did very well in many important areas. The hotel is clean and we are very cautious in this environment with making sure we are as safe as humanly possible.  The situation with your room seems very odd and I am surprised that we could not remedy this. There must be something else that we were missing and we will make sure to note your concerns. Our team always wants to improve for our guests.

Summary: My stay here was good, just had a few hiccups.  Like the water not draining when taking a shower and the bed sinking in.  Breakfast was cold sack lunch like I was in elementary school, could of been better.  Overall nice place!
Manager Response: Thank you for your support.  We will look to enhance our offerings as our business recovers and we hope that is very soon.

Summary: Embassy Suites Irvine does not know how to handle reservations that were made before arrival. I came in a day before my daughter and her family arrived at the hotel on Main to talk to them about a reservation that I made in my daughters name for three nights. I had booked the reservation so that the charge would be covered by me. It turned out that only the first night was charged to me and my daughter was billed for two other nights. This was very disappointing. Any business that can't manage their billing is not a company that I wish to frequent. Add to that the fact that there was a broken nozzle in the bar area that was never fixed and the rooms looked old and worn down. All in all if you're here on business it would be adequate for a night since it is near the airport.
Manager Response: We apologize that there was so much confusion with the arrangement. Please note that what you were looking to do is not typical and hence can come with some challenges. Our first and foremost concern with any unusual reservation such as this to ensure that we mitigate any potential fraud that could harm an innocent party.  That said, we are sorry that these errors occurred. I promise you that the team was trying to do their best to figure this all out and they simply failed. It was not what we wanted to happen obviously. We will take all your comments and look to improve where possible.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel a few years ago and it was wonderful, boy how things change. We checked in and we paid for a corner suite which we got the first night. First off the furniture in the sitting room was so dirty we would not even sit on it(have pictures but to sure on how to post them on here). The water in the bar area did not work so called down to the desk to tell them but no one ever showed. The next morning we get up to shower and we have no hot water, we had no choice but to take a cold shower. We had to get to our granddaughter’s memorial service so we were on a time line. As we left we stopped at the front desk to inform them of the water problem and was told the water is turned off In that part of the building so way would put anyone in that part of the hotel. Was
Manager Response: Please accept our condolences for your loss. We can not imagine how difficult it must be to travel under such circumstances.  Further we apologize that we failed you during this very difficult time. It is never our intention to have any guest feel unsatisfied by our services. I am certain the team will look into your comments and understand where we can improve moving forward. If there is anything we can do for you please contact me directly.  We wish you and your family all the best during this very hard time. Once again our sincerest of apologies.   Jeff Mitrovic  General Manager 949-705-5151

Summary Heading: Was one of my favorite hotels. Now I won’t go back.
Summary: It’s easy to say what you can’t do. Takes some thought and caring to figure out what you CAN DO. No restaurant, buffet, room service, housekeeping, exercise room, swimming pool, or even a friendly attitude. A dismal, depressing experience that we terminated a day early and left. The bed was comfortable, hence two stars.
Manager Response: We are sorry we disappointed you. The balance between regulations, public safety and being able to actually run a business in this environment is very challenging. We completely understand how guests could be disappointed by this and we regret that.  Our staff should always convey a pleasant attitude and we are shocked to learn that they did not. This is not what we are usually recognized for. Overall we understand and we will try to do better.  Hope you are safe and well. The team hopes to redeem itself once the true pressing matters of the time are behind us.

Summary Heading: Glad It's still open during COVID-19......!!!!
Summary: Only stayed for one night, so nothing too much to say.  Room was clean, Complimentary Happy Hour and breakfast are always a plus, though "omelette chef" could probably pay a little closer attention to what's being ordered.
Manager Response: We appreciate the positivity and support during this difficult time for all of us. The team wishes you all the best and we hope to serve all of our amazing guests again soon.

Summary: Stayed here because it was on the list to stay to play;My daughter played in the All American games. There were several groups of athletes staying also. One group was a rugby team, who were very loud & rude. Reported them to front desk who handled the situation good. Front desk employees were very nice, good staff. Breakfast was delicious. The omelets were awesome. The evening reception of snacks and drinks were nice to enjoy after coming from a long day at the softball fields. The only complaint was that we had the rooms reserved. But when we got there, my parents room wasn't cleaned. They tried to remedy it by changing their rooms but we like our rooms to be close to each other. We come from Oklahoma so we did notice that the water had a odor of sewage. But sure it's not the
Manager Response: We're glad to hear that your overall experience was great! We do the best we can to make sure that we satisfy everyone's need as much as possible! We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Great Place to Stay, Clean Rooms, Great Breakfast! Staff was very helpful when check-in and when eating dinner services was amazing! Rooms are spacious and clean, you truly get what you pay for. I will continue stay here!
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you found the to your liking. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the not too distant future.

Summary: I stayed at the Embassy Suites in Irvine for a business trip and had a great stay!  The complimentary breakfast is way better than your average continental breakfast.  There are so many options:  Made to order Omelettes, bagels, cereal, fruit, and serve yourself eggs, bacon, pancakes.  I was very impressed!    I was also pleasantly surprised by a nightly complimentary happy hour for guests!  This included beer and wine and surprisingly wasn't too crowded.    There is a large indoor atrium in the hotel which makes for a nice open feel.  The room was spacious and included a mini fridge as well as a separate living room.  One thing to note is that my fridge froze any of my drinks even when set on the lowest setting.    One downside I found is that the parking lot is somewhat of a
Manager Response: We are super happy that you enjoyed your visit so much! It is our goal to please out guests and we love hearing how delighted you were. Our amenities are in a class of their own, there is no other hotel that matches our brand.  We look forward to serving you again on your next visit.

Summary: Hotel was convenient to city amenities and was attended to very well in its upkeep and cleanliness. Staff was kind and helpful.Breakfast and Evening Reception were excellent added features with gracious variety.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback! I am glad that you enjoyed the great amenities at our hotel. It is so important to read that our staff is making a difference. They truly do care about our guests and it means so much to them that it is recognized. We truly look forward to serving you again.

Summary: Great facility and awesome staff. Starbucks in the main lobby was great. I will definitely be back to this location. The Breakfast provided was simply perfect as well as the Managers nightly meet and greet. Thanks so much for your Professionalism.
Manager Response: Thank you and we're glad that you enjoyed your stay with us! We take pride in the service we provide to our wonderful guest, we hope to see you again soon!

Summary: I’m a player of the UH Water Polo team, and we come often to the mainland to participate in tournaments. We usually stay at the Irvine Embassy Suites, and the housekeeping staff always make me feel like I’m at home, especially Catalina. She is always very kind and nice to us, and after a long day of games and hard practices, I really appreciate this personal treatment, as well as she always has our rooms on point, and at the right time. It is always a pleasure to come here.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to recognize the extremely hard working people that clean our hotel. Catalina is an example of the amazing group of people the work behind the scenes to ensure our guests are taken care of. Most of the time this incredibly hard work goes unnoticed. It means a lot that you mentioned this in our world of negativity.  It was a pleasure to serve your awesome group. Your team was very professional, kind and focused on what they came here to do. That makes our job a pleasure.  Hope to serve you again soon. All the best!

Summary: I have really been disappointed in the hotel the past year.  As a frequent visitor, the hotel has taken a turn for the worse the past year.  The menu changes and inability to keep the rooms cool are becoming all to common, and are frustrating.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We pride ourselves on being very flexible for our frequent guests. I am certain that with the full kitchen we have at our disposal that we can accommodate the needs our most valued guests require. The new menu has been met with great overall approval, but we understand that not everyone may like it. I do feel confident that we can always find a way to ensure your satisfaction. The AC challenges you mention can occur in any room at any location at any time. It is unfortunate that you have experienced this more often at our location, that should not be the case. We take this very seriously and are continually addressing any of these concerns brought our way. We love to serve you again and if I can be of serve please contact me directly. I know we will take great care of you.  My apologies for the disappointment, it is not what we strive for.

Summary: Bat staff and wait staff are the worst. Got kicked out a certain area for absolutely doing nothing wrong. Rates are high, parking rates are high, internet sucks. Beds are uncomfortable I recommend you stay away from this place if you can. Not what I expect from a Hilton brand hotel
Manager Response: We apologize that you felt that our team was not as accommodating as they should be. There are unfortunate situations that occur where the team must take action in order to ensure we do not have a situation where we have loss of control over behavior inside of our establishment. In any area where liquor is served that is a responsibility we must adhere to. During these types of situations communication may be lost due to the overall challenge that is being addressed. Our goal is to ensure every guest is enjoying the hotel and this can be a difficult balance for sure. The team will always look to improve in how we handle any situation and I am certain we always can. The intentions were honest and necessary, and we are sorry that you were impacted.

Summary: I stayed at the Embassy Suites Hotel in Irvine at the Orange County Airport on Valentine's Day. I had a business commitment scheduled for late that evening so I thought it would be more convenient if I brought dinner from home.  I asked a staff member who worked in the hotel restaurant if I could have a plate, silverware and cloth napkin and was told no. They offered me plastic silverware, paper plate and napkin. My meal consisted of filet mignon, blanched brussel sprouts, baked potato and lobster tail. I reached out to room service and requested the same items which they did provide me with. I ordered a piece of pie a la mode just to make sure I wasn't going to be turned down for a second time. It cost me $20. Overall stay was good and the digital key check in was awesome!
Manager Response: Hi Good day!  I do apologized for the experience you had with us! Unfortunately our silverware and glass plates are only for restaurant and room service only. Our housekeepers delivered what they had in stock in their office. I'm glad your overall stay was great and the digital key was convenient for you.

Summary Heading: Great breakfast buffet and complementary happy hour!
Summary: I stayed here with a group for work and it was very good. The hotel lobby and reception area is very open and has a good feel to it. My coworkers and I went to the complementary happy hour every evening and it was a very fun atmosphere. The breakfast buffet was very good and you could also get a maid to order omelette. The coffee was sub par. However they do have a Starbucks where you can purchase whatever you’d like from there. Be aware that parking cost $28 per day Which I thought was overpriced. There is nothing really within walking distance so if you want to go eat anywhere or go out you have to drive.
Manager Response: We really appreciate you taking the time to show positivity towards our teams efforts. Our goal is to have guests experience the hotel exactly as you described it. It gives me great pleasure to see that we did a great job, and that we were recognized for it. It truly is a great place filled with great people.  Thank you

Summary Heading: Family Disney trip off beaten path
Summary: Flew into SNA and didnt want to rent a car. This hotel has free airport shuttle, free breakfast, hot tub, free wifi (if signed up with Hilton Honors) and accommodations for 4 adults in two separate rooms at a one-room price. Exactly what we wanted. Btw 8 night stay, 6th floor room.  The good:  Nice, clean hotel, friendly staff, Starbucks and restaurant on site, easy access, loved shuttle to/from airport and a free, warm breakfast each morning. Made to Order means they will make omelets, bfast sandwiches, etc for you with variety of ingredients. Used Lyft (~$20 one-way trip to Disney), and linked accts with Hilton to earn extra points. Bed itself was comfortable. Room has small fridge, microwave, keurig, two tvs in our suite. Room service a plus. If you go during the week this is
Manager Response: We hope you enjoyed your visit to Disney! Thank you for great insights into our hotel. The team is proud that we were able to provide you with a pleasant stay. The hotel is very popular and family's love our brand for large rooms and amenities we provide. It's a busy place for good reason so we agree that every guest should anticipate a lot of activity.  Hope to serve you again.

Summary: Room was filthy...brunch was less than satisfactory.  Go up the street to another Hilton or Marriott property.  Parking spaces taken by employees despite 25.00 nightly charge for parking to guests.  Not an enjoyable stay at all!
Manager Response: We apologize that we failed your expectations on this trip. Our team is utilizing your feedback in order to understand what changes we can make. We appreciate that travelers have many choices when choosing accommodations and must find what they feel is the right fit for them. Most of our guests enjoy being here and rightly choose our location. Our goal is to improve where we can and to ensure we understand where we made mistakes, everyone makes them. Hopefully when given the opportunity to correct a situation we take that step and make things right for our guest. If there is anything we can do at this point please contact us at the hotel.  Thank you

Summary: Excellent experience  Very suitable for medium size families as their suites has one bedroom and a small living with sofa bed. Also has microwave and fridge. The staff there are super friendly. Kids had fun in the indoor pool also they appreciate the family happy hour upon arrival. The breakfast was great as well
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you had a great stay.We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the not too distant future.  Sincerely,  Richmound Hollero Front Office Supervisor richmound.hollero@hilton.com  (949) 553-8332

Summary: This property always delivers. We have stayed here (maybe) ten times. We tried another brand once but returned to Embassy on subsequent trips.  The staff is warm and welcoming and they get you into your room in a snap - which is appreciated on late night arrivals.  The complimentary breakfast is so good I tend to over indulge.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking a moment to share your experience. I am happy to hear you had a great stay.We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel in the not too distant future.  Sincerely,  Richmound Hollero Front Office Supervisor richmound.hollero@hilton.com  (949) 553-8332

Summary: We stayed there for 1 night. The checkout was fast and the staff was friendly and had a smile on his face. The room was spacious. The bed is fluffy and comfy. Bathroom is clean and had neutrogina products. We didn’t catch the free breakfast but having a ready to order eggs and omelet is a big plus. And as most hotels the parking is a subcharge.
Manager Response: We appreciate your positive feedback! Hopefully we see you again soon!

Summary: Hotel staff at check in was awful.  Their attitude was like they didn’t care if you were happy there.  We waited over 2 hours to be able to finally check in.  They didn’t care that we waited so long.  They only cared about being able to chat with each other
Manager Response: We apologize that our team's actions left you with the perception that they did not care about your challenges. This is absolutely not what our team is about. As we don't know the full details behind your check in we can not comment on the circumstances that led to the disappointment. That said, it is obvious that our communication was not what it should have been. For this we do apologize. The team will focus on this instance and ensure we learn to improve our communication to guests waiting for check in. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Stay here at your own risk!!
Summary: I wasn’t able to check in early, and was told that I’m cheating the system by trying to check in early... even though I was just traveling all through the night. There was urine on 4 sets of sheets they put on my bed. And they didn’t even acknowledge it. I had to physically watch and check the sheets before I’d let maintenance leave. The customer service was horrible and even after complaining numerous times, I wasn’t even offered an apology. I would have cancelled my reservation based on not being able to check in early, but it was non-refundable at that point.
Manager Response: We do apologize that our polices upset you during this stay. Most hotels are not able to check guests in before other guests have left. For this reason we do recommended booking the amount of nights needed in order to ensure your personal travel arrangements are able to be accommodated. The team is apologetic that we could not meet your needs, and that we failed in accommodating you in the way that you desired. As we always are looking to improve we will share your insights with the team and work on being better wherever possible.

Summary: Stayed here for two nights. The hotel staff was very friendly upon arrival. The rooms are a great size and very clean. The noise level was very low at night, which was great. The breakfast in the morning was good - enjoyed the made-to-order Omelet station.   Location wise it’s less than 30 minutes to Newport Beach and Laguna Beach (with not traffic). It was nice to able to access those beach towns but not have to pay the price to stay there!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments. You found out the amazing secret of our location. We are very close to all the great parts of Orange County and offer the perfect location to experience the area.  The team is very appreciative of your recognition. Hope to serve you again.

Summary: I wanted to let everyone know that the front desk crew are second to none.  Alexander and Richmound (the supervisor) was very helpful.  They are surely an asset to this company.  I would recommend this hotel just because of the front lobby service
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recognizing our team members! They are the difference and we are so lucky to have people like Alex and Richmond serving our guests. Your recognition of them goes a long way in making sure they know their efforts are worth it. We are grateful that you took the time to be positive. It is an honor to serve guests like yourself, we are lucky you chose us.

Summary Heading: Great customer service, nice hotel & Starbucks inside!
Summary: Loved the hotel in general, good restaurant and great breakfast. People at the front desk (Dorothy and Alex) super kind and always able to help! I felt at home :) House keeping daily and on time. Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Thank you for great recommendation. It makes us very proud when guests recognize the hard work of our team. They truly do care and without them it simply is not a hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great hotel near Orange County Airport
Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a business trip, but had my college aged son with me for some personal time in LA later in the week. The staff here is so accommodating! The shuttle picks up from the Orange County Airport and will take you anywhere within a 3 mile radius of the hotel. Great when you don't have a car. The rooms are updated and clean, and it is so nice to have extra space when travelling with family. Will definitely stay again when in the area.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a wonderful time going around Los Angeles. It's an amazing city with endless activities and sights. We are always proud to play a small role in our guests fantastic experiences around our city and location. This is an amazing place to stay but there is so much more outside our doors that we hope every guest takes full advantage of. Hope to have you again at some point this year. Thank you

Summary: Hotel was very clean and the staff was great , check in was a breeze. Breakfast was great. Location was in a business area but close to places to eat for dinner. They have a starbucks inside which was nice.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments on your visit with us. We also feel this is a great place to be. Not only because of the unbeatable amenities and location at the heart of Orange County, but most importantly because of our hard working team. We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: We typically stay at an Embassy Suites for the extra room, breakfast and manager's special.  Originally we planned to stay at the Embassy Suites Santa Ana for three nights.  Bad decision.  The heating/air is on some sort of program for the entire hotel where there is no heat or air if the outside temperature is between 55-70 degrees.  They call it Neutrality.  We called it insane.  The result, we were burning up in our room with no A/C and dead air.  Next morning we called the Embassy in Irvine, explained our night of horror and asked if we could get an early check in.  Although the hotel was booked the night before, Marlene got us a very, very early check in, a Hilton Honors discount, and a clean, beautifully remodeled room in a quiet location!!!  The room had double pane
Manager Response: Marlene is a great person and we are very lucky to have her as part of our team. We pride ourselves on having some amazing people to work with who really care about our guests. Things can and will occur at any establishment. Working together with our guests to solve any challenge is something we are always ready to do. You can not always solve everything we our team is willing to attempt to make our guests as happy as possible.  The hotel is located in an exceptional area when it comes to being in the heart of everything Orange County has to offer. We are glad you took advantage and got out to enjoy this amazing place.  We hope to serve you again this year!

Summary: Restaurant was said to be opened at 11:00 a.m. Didn't open until 3 p.m. I see they have now changed this on their website. Breakfast was pretty good but impossible if you had small children or with someone in a wheelchair as there were no trays and so you had to carry each item across a crowded room to your table.I asked if I could get a tray to bring my disabled husband his food but was told that there were no trays available until room service began at 3 p.m. Quite a few trips with coffee, juice, eggs, silverware, etc.  Room never cooled off even after engineer came twice and said it was fixed. Had issues with the accessible room. Management and someone from corporate were supposed to contact me or get back to me, but hasn't happened yet.  No vending machines even though there
Manager Response: Thank you for feedback. Based on your rating it does seem that hotel fit your needs, but that obviously we had some opportunities to do better. We apologize that the change in restaurant hours was not better communicated. There were attempts made to ensure there was a decent transition but we are well aware that their will unfortunately always be some areas missed. We regret that this impacted you. The hotel team absolutely could have done better to assist during breakfast, we were there to serve and you should not have had to rely on a tray. It is disappointing that we were not able to step up and help, this is not common for our team. The signage for vending is universal and we apologize if it was misleading. You correct that soft drinks and snacks are provided in a market area next to our front desk.  We will take your feedback as a learning and make sure we do better going forward. Our hopes are to serve you again and showcase are improvement in this new year.

Summary: My wife booked this room. Turns out she booked a studio room? I wasn't aware Embassy Suites also had Embassy "Studios". This location is in a heavily corporate/office area, so I'm guessing that is the reason for studios. Not worth it. Too small. Not worth the 40 dollar savings. Stay in Suites. Also, AC system was broken and would not cool. Couldn't sleep all night. Windows don't open either. So we were stuck in a Studio sized sauna. I love Embassy Suites overall at other locations. Just make sure it is an actual Suite and that cooling/heating system works. I hope this studio thing is not a new thing to make more rooms for $$. Embassy suites has been great otherwise.
Manager Response: It is important to take note of what booking you may be making at our hotel. We do have studios available which cater to single travelers, and those looking for a lower priced option. We do regret that you had a poor stay and we will be looking into making sure the rooms are as comfortable as possible. If there is anything we can do at this point to make this right please reach out to me.  Jeff. Mitrovic General Manager 949-705-5151

Summary: The hotel is in a great location close to Newport Beach and Laguna Beach.  However the rooms were not very clean. The carpets and the bathroom was not the cleanest.  Overall breakfast and parking was good.  It is still a great price for the area.
Manager Response: Dear Gulcin B,  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your stay with us. We truly appreciate your feedback and while we’re so happy you enjoyed our breakfast and location, we are very sorry for the cleanliness of your room. We will address your comments with our team as we work to improve our guest experience. Your input is genuinely helpful, and we hope you will come visit us in the future.

Summary: Perfect hotel near Disneyland. Rooms are great size and worked well for our trip. Can’t beat the free breakfast and evening reception as well. The Suites are huge compared to standard hotel. Parking was easy.
Manager Response: We are so pleased that you enjoyed your time visiting the big mouse here in town! Our hotel offers a superior location to get around the OC, and as you testified the amenities can not be matched. The team is proud that we played a small role in your fun filled visit. We wish you all the best in this new year.  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites - Always a Great Experience
Summary: We have used Embassy Suites in the past for both business and leisure. The mini suites provide a nice feel of a piece of home - distinct bedroom, bath and living rooms. The suite was clean and inviting. The free hot breakfast accomodation is always a plus. The host staff and housekeeping staff are friendly and professional in all our interactions. The price paid is worth the experience we had expected for it and received.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review! The team really tries to meet all of our guests needs. Most of the time we are more than successful. Our brand is truly in class of it's own and is popular for good reason. What you described could not be said any better. We appreciate support of our most loyal guests.  All the best this New Year!

Summary Heading: Oh so perfect, but stay away from the 07-08 rooms.
Summary: I was in 708 and the service elevator was so loud. Breakfast was great but just be sure you get there earlier. Food does run out. The pictures you see of the evening reception food does not match what we got. There was mostly nachos and sone pretzels. Yes, they did have the drinks and it was usually quiet and comfortable.
Manager Response: We appreciate the rating, it does seem that hotel was able to meet your expectations during your visit.  Based on individual sensitive's you can always be in a situation where a certain room does not fit your need. The team here is always willing to make sure we try to accommodate every guest as best possible. At times our complimentary areas can become very overwhelmed with guest traffic, because they are so popular. During these times the team does everything it can to keep up. We apologize that we may have fallen short at periods, please know we put our best efforts toward making sure that is not the case. We look forward to serving you again in this new year soon. All the best!

Summary: We inadvertently showed up at another site we had previously stayed only to find we were actually booked at this site.  I'm so glad we made that mistake.  This site was more modern, felt cleaner, and was a definite upgrade.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great comments about your unexpected visit. We were very fortunate to have you with us. Most guests really do love the place as it is one of the best hotels around. We hope to serve you again soon.  Happy Holidays!

Summary Heading: Loyalty does not have its benefits at this location
Summary: I travel extensively for work, and I try to stay with the Hilton family of hotels.  As a Diamond member, I think this level of loyalty should (at the very least) be acknowledged during check in.  It seems, though, that the Embassy Suites in Irvine does not give any acknowledgement or benefits to their most loyal customers.  I was greeted by a front desk person who obviously did not want to be there.  I then arrived at my room ... which was located at the back of the building with a direct view of the garage and the HVAC unit...(photo attached).  Obviously the noise from this location was a factor as well.  I understand that the Embassy Suites brand caters more towards families, and I appreciate the fact that I can fit all of my family in a single room.  If/when I travel for
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty to Hilton. Our staff typically does an excellent job at recognizing our most loyal members. It is a shame that for some reason this was not the case with your visit. I would appreciate the opportunity to better understand your situation in hopes of us correcting any issues for our improvement. Please contact me at 949-705-5151. I look forward to making this right.

Summary: I arrived late from a three hour drive and it was great to be greeted by Alex at the front desk.  She was extremely pleasant and happy.  She was also very efficient!  The rooms need an update.  The bathroom needs a serious facelift.  I also think house keeping needs to be on top of it better, there were candy wrappers on the floor and the bathroom drain was left out.  Just because the room is outdated it can still be cleaned.   Overall, the staff made up for it!
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing our staff member, this means so much! We will work with our housekeeping team on the items you have pointed out. I am confident that we can address these accidental challenges. We hope you have any amazing Holiday!

Summary Heading: Not what I expect from an Embassy Suite
Summary: The employee who checked us in was uninterested in what he was doing and not friendly at all.  The carpet in the room was NASTY and the mattress on the pull out was horrible and uncomfortable.The best part of the stay was the reception downstairs.
Manager Response: Please accept my apologies for our hotel not meeting your standards. Issues can arise at any property but I do feel our team is not typically perceived like this. Our hopes are to learn more about your stay so that we can attempt to address these concerns. Our goal is to improve and fix anything we can. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further. 949-705-5151

Summary: This is a wonderful place to stay. Very clean room, nice room setting. Very helpful staff and extremely quick response to our service requests. Awesome complementary breakfast with abundant food.  Great value.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing our hotel and for mentioning that we were great. The team tries so hard and it is appreciated that our guests recognize this. Most of the time we really do get it right.  We hope your Holidays are filled with joy!

Summary: Clean property,  friendly staff , good value with breakfast and evening reception.  Very quiet, easy parking. Very modern. Definitely worth the money and would stay here again. Large comfortable room and easy Internet access.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the recognition. We were proud to read that our hotel met your expectations. It is a great place. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Stayed for 5 nights during Thanksgiving and was super impressed by the quality of the breakfast probably the best I have ever had at a hotel or resort.  It was super busy for 2 days with line ups but things remained under control.  The rooms were comfortable although bed was too soft for my personal liking.  Overall great value.
Manager Response: Breakfast is a very important meal come Thanksgiving time. Waiting until the later lunch/dinner means you need the right start to the day. We pride ourselves on having one of the best breakfasts anywhere. We are proud that you chose us during this special time of year. Happy Holidays!

Summary: Great place to stay! We stayed here in Nov and in Dec. Clean, Quiet, Ambience of the hotel is great u feel good walking in and checking out. Starbucks on premises. Close to restaurants. I will always stay here on my way through Cali.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us. Our guests are the reason we do what we do. We can not appreciate you enough. Happy Holidays to you!

Summary: This property is conveniently located near the Orange County airport. The daily manager's reception and hot breakfast with made to order omelets are a nice perk.  The bed was very comfortable and location was quiet.  The squishy soft carpets in the corridors, which all overlook a central atrium, absorb a lot of noise, making it very quiet.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great review on our hotel! We were glad to read that you enjoyed your stay with us. The place is an amazing location and we are dedicated to doing our best for our guests.

Summary Heading: Dirty and unsafe room.  Horrible and rude assistant manager.
Summary: Room was dirty.  Bed sheets and pillows smelly.  Towel smelled like curry.  Curtain had fecal materials and blood stain on it. Breakfast was terrible.   The food quality had gone down so much.  The plates they were using were cheap plastic plates.   Omelet tasted bad too.  Cook sprayed enormous amount of vegetable oil out of a can on the eggs and the vegetables.  It made the omelet very oily and inedible. Pastries were old and tasteless.
Manager Response: Your experience indeed seems horrible. We are surprised that this occurred and that we were not made aware of such obvious issues. Please accept my apologies on behalf of the hotel. It seems that something very wrong must have occurred for all this to take place. I would not blame anyone for not wanting to be in this described environment. This is obviously not something that could happen at our property with any malice on our part. Your comments will be shared and we will address anything possible. If I can be of service at this point please contact me directly as I am available for our guests. 949-705-5151

Summary: I have stayed many times at this hotel on business trips going back 20 years and this place is better every time I stay there. Full Starbucks in the lobby, what else do you need? Clean rooms, standard breakfast, attentive staff, easy parking. Thank you, keep up the great work, ESbyH!
Manager Response: We appreciate your time in sharing your experience. The hotel is located in a central business district of Irvine. This makes very convenient to do business and then also enjoy all that the OC has to offer to visitors. Your loyalty is greatly appreciated. We respect our business travelers who spend so much time away, and trust to do it with us.  Hope your New Year is filled with joy!

Summary: This means it's well-located, clean, with large sleeping areas, and a free cooked-to-breakfast. Embassy Suites are always my first choice when I travel for all of the aforementioned reasons. The only negative was the $28 per night parking.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. We were glad to read that you felt our hotel kept up to our brand promise. Embassy Suites are known for their great amenities which really set us apart from other hotels. The hotel does charge for parking, as most local hotels do. The proximity to the airport and local businesses makes our area one where parking is in very high demand. Location is truly in the heart of the OC.  We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: It's been amazing  stay as any other Embassy Suites service  , from the front desk with Dorothy welcome and assistance to free happy hour and breakfast   I really do recommend this very nice Hotel close to the Jonh Wayne Airport free shuttle picking me up there I felt so especial guest . Thank you for this one more experience from Hilton  Hotel Family
Manager Response: Thank you so much for mentioning our team member in your review. The team takes so much pride in service, and this will be very welcomed recognition. We appreciate you bringing your family here, and we look forward to having you again soon.

Summary: This is only my 2nd time staying at embassy suites. I'm usually ans Air BNB girl. I'm so much comfortable here since the room has an actual living room completely separate from the bedroom. It's so nice to relax in these rooms. They even have a mini fridge microwave if needed, they are placed very discreetly. TV in both bedroom and living room. The coffee in room is actually very good, thanks to Coffee Bean & Tea Leaf.  I'm really happy with this room. It's very updated and modern.  They have complimentary breakfast, I'll try that this morning.  And the best surprise for me ar least, they have a full Starbucks in the lobby. The website offered a package with valet parking which I opted for, but when i arrived was told they don't have valet parking, only self parking. So be
Manager Response: You are spot on with your assessment! Thank you for taking the time to notice what we provide here. Our hotel really has a great capability to provide most guests with everything they need, and more. You are correct that we do not have valet parking and I will check on that to make sure. If there is anything I can assist with please contact me directly. 949-705-5151. Looking forward to serving you again.

Summary: Definitely take time to go use all the resources at this hotel. I didn't and I feel a missed out on some stuff. Breakfast is actually really good - also the atrium above the restaurant is really pleasant.
Manager Response: We will have to make sure you get to enjoy all of our amenities on your next visits. Our hotel is know for our breakfast and social hour, just to name a few items. Sometimes when you are having such a great time in the area you don't have the time to enjoy the hotel as much. We love being a small part of our guest's Orange County adventures. So much to do out here!

Summary: I stayed one night. The hotel is the standard Embassy Suites. There is a full service Star Bucks in the lobby. The staff were all very friendly. The bed was very comfortable. If I had any complaint, it’s that the dinner menu offers very little to choose from. Outside of that, not a bad stay. I would stay here again
Manager Response: We appreciate you noticing that our staff really is tops. They really strive to do the best they can for our guests. These days that's not a small ask and we are so grateful when someone takes the time to notice. Thank you. Next time you are here feel free to inquire about our specials and options that our chef may have for food service. I trust our team enough to be able to provide some options that would assist with any dietary need.  Hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: Nov.2019 trip to OC, had fun and hope to do it again. Eventhough it was fun trip but still there was a few short comings in the hotel. It really became crowded for few days.  breakfast quality was poor  parking got full with no space to park and $25 a night Jack's up the room price high enough to look at alternatives.
Manager Response: So happy to read that your enjoyed your trip to the hotel. The OC is an amazing area! The hotel is very popular for good reason. The location, room size, breakfast and social hour make it a truly unmatched value. We will pass on your notes to our food team as they really try hard to please the hundreds of guests we serve regularly. Most of the time they are successful but we can agree that we always need to strive to improve. Most area hotels do charge for parking as we are close to a major airport and business centers. We really hope you come back and stay with us again. The team is confident in what we provide and we know we can improve upon the items that you were concerned about. Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary Heading: One of the nicest Embassy Suites!
Summary: Every time I stay here, the employees make me feel so special.  I love that there is a Starbucks in the lobby and the free breakfast options. I can always get my egg white omelet!  The room is so clean and I love the extra space.  I stay here always while in Irvine.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for saying that we are one of the nicest Embassy Suites! That is quite an honor as our brand is recognized as being a class leader within global hotels. I could not agree more with your description of our establishment. We feel special every time we come into the hotel ourselves. Thank you for your loyalty, and for the honor of being able to serve you.  All the best!

Summary: I like this place. Specially staff. My flight was early and landed here early morning. Donna have done her best to accommodate me also changed my room accidentally selected wrong. Thanks Donna! Nice experience!
Manager Response: So happy to read that our staff took great care of you. They are amazing people and always want to do their best for our guests. Thank you for your time, and for being our guest!

Summary Heading: Very favorable experience, top-notch service, definitely recommend
Summary: I had a very favorable experience during a business stay last week, and in fact am returinng next week for another stay.  The hotel delivers against everything you would want in a hotel:  clean, comfortable, quiet room; nice ambience, pleasant and helpful staff.  The complimentary breakfast has a variety of offerings, ranging from healthy (fresh fruit, oatmeal) to maybe not-so-healthy (French toast, pastries).  I like that they have a soda fountain, recognizing that some people like diet soda instead of coffee in the morning.  The fitness center and pool are pretty decent, though in my case I opted to enjoy the warm California sunshine and go for a run instead (the "San Diego Creek Trail" is about a mile away and makes for a nice run).  Internet access was plenty good.  Room was
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the extensive review on our hotel. It was a pleasure to read and you really had the detail right in regards to the hotel and location. Simply put it is a great place. We have special people working here and we obviously also have some amazing guests that stay with us. We look forward to having you again and can not thank you enough for your time.

Summary Heading: The Embassy Suites staff is exceptional friendly and service minded.
Summary: as tourleader of a large Dutch group we have chosen the Embassy Suites for a stay of four nights. There are reasons to we choose and recommend the hotel. Ideally located, rooms-en suite and spacious. Great breakfast and our group enjoyed the daily happy hours with free beverages to enjoy in the spacious atrium.  I worked closely with Jasmine Stewart, head of the sales department. Jasmine offered an exceptional service and went above and beyond to serve my customers and was very involved. Highly recommended. recommended,
Manager Response: It was such a pleasure to serve you all. You are wonderful people and learning about your culture was an additional joy for all of us. Jasmine is simply one of the best sales people around. She truly cares about our clients and will stop at nothing to ensure they are well taken care of.  Het Beste!

Summary: i really enjoyed our one night stay at this hotel. it is very reminiscent of the older Embassy suites and was exactly the lay out of one in New Jersey that we also enjoyed staying at 2 years ago.  there was lots of room for breakfast and we did not have to squeeze in a corner or eat off of our laps as has happened at other Embassys.  the room was very spacious and clean , very appreciated.
Manager Response: We love that you noticed our hotels nostalgic charm. We really pride ourselves on reminding guests of the hotels of old that were legendary. Walking into our atrium really brings a sense to the arrival that made hotels so popular. The team was prod to see that we treated you well and that you enjoyed the hotel.  Hope to serve you again soon.

Summary: I enjoyed the room and the managers reception w/ free drinks. I was new to the digital key, so had a hiccup but staff was helpful. Room was really nice, w/ a comfy bed- my only complaint is I had two stained towels... The restaurant had pretty good food chicken Marsala was good!
Manager Response: Thank you for saying that our hotel is a great place to stay. Our social hour is a really cool feature and a great time for guests to relax. The chef will be very happy to see that you enjoyed his special that day! He takes so much pride in the quality of his meals. Thanks for noting the area we missed as well. We will need to do better in this area and ensure that kind of mistake is rare, as most are. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Staff is very friendly and always helpful.  Airport shuttle very helpful when arriving later in the evening.  Hotel and room is clean, food is good and very close to my office.  Travel once a month at least and have never had any problems or issues.
Manager Response: So glad to see that our amazing staff is taking care of guests. We really take pride in doing all we can for the people that chose to stay with us. Thank you for making us your hotel of choice. We are honored by that. Really appreciate the feedback. See you next month.

Summary: Great place to stay!Great customer service, breakfast bar, rooms(except that the floor had bad stains in the front room) Huge shout out to manager  Luis in Lost and Found! I accidentally left my tablet and he went over and beyond to return it to me! Thank you for a great visit!
Manager Response: Luis is an awesome person! We are very fortunate to have co workers like him here. He truly cares and always wants to make things right for our guests.  Thank you for recognizing him and the hotel.

Summary: We loved the location and cleanliness of the hotel. It's a relatively new property and was away from the hustle and bustle of its sister hotel on Dyer. The beds and pillows were very comfortable, the parking was great and the staff  was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: That you so much for the great review on the hotel! We agree with you that this truly is a perfect location. Thank you for your faith and allowing us to serve you. We look forward to the pleasure of having you with us again.

Summary: This a great hotel for quality and service, especially for the price. I would highly recommend for all types of travel from business to pleasure. The restaurant has excellent food and the staff are very welcoming.
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive review and comments about the hotel. Our staff is amazing and they  will be energized by your recognition, it really goes a long way. The location of our Embassy Suites in Irvine coupled with what our brand can provide to any guest, really is the best value in the business.  Hope to serve you again soon.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel - well worth the rate + parking
Summary: Nice hotel, very clean room and good buffet breakfast with made to order omelettes. $25/night for parking is a joke, though.  Everybody hates getting nickel-and-dimed. The location is great - convenient to airport and restaurants. It’s amazingly quiet too - we saw airplanes come and go all weekend but heard absolutely nothing - not from outside, not from next door. I guess that plus the omelets make up for the $25 parking. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for great comments about our hotel. We are happy that you were able to enjoy one of our amazing omelets! The chef takes great pride in making these and he will be thrilled to read that you enjoyed them so much.  Being that hotel is located so close to an airport you can imagine that travelers are always looking for parking options. We do understand that not paying for parking would be a preference but the location does require us to maintain a charge for that service.  The team looks forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Rude and inefficient Front Desk Staff in the evening.
Summary: I confirmed my extension of my stay to two of their staff in the morning. When I arrived in the evening the lady in the front desk would not let me in the tom coz she said I’m not checked in yet. They asked me my credit card number twice that day. She let me wait for quite some time to check in and I told them to give me the key but she didn’t hand it to me right away. I asked her to give me the receipt I. The first night and she looked at me word while the invoice was being printed . She told me that she doesn’t deserve to be attended tat way and I told her that I also did not deserve to be attended ride Ike what she did. I called for toiletries the ne t morning and the front desk asked me At this time? And I told her Yes At this time. Where’s the customer service that I
Manager Response: We apologize for the confusion with check in. Our staff is typically recognized for their great service and this instance absolutely seems out of character for the team. Your feedback will be utilized to ensure we understand where we failed and how we can improve. Our guests are extremely important to us and we never want them to perceive us as not being hospitable. I am confident that this misunderstanding could have been resolved, and we are sorry that for some reason it was not. Our hopes are to serve you again and show our improvement.

Summary: We took a family trip to Disneyland and stayed at this hotel because of the price and location. Clean rooms and great breakfast. The staff was very friendly. This is our second time staying at this hotel. We were pleasantly happy with both visits and plan to return in the future.
Manager Response: Thank you choosing to stay with us again! We know that their are options for our guests but we are very proud that we offer such an amazing value. They hotel is an excellent place to stay when visiting the house of the mouse near by.  We are certain your family had an amazing time and we are proud to be part of those memories.  See you on the next trip.

Summary Heading: Embassy is always strong but don't expect much from the happy hour
Summary: The Embassy Suites it's always a wonderful experience. This hotel was no exception to that rule. The room was extremely clean, and the amenities well-appointed as usual. Our main disappointment however with the Orange County airport Embassy Suite in Irvine was that the happy hour was not up to our normal Embassy Suites standard. They served cold cheese sauce with chips like you would get at a ballpark, and animal crackers like you would serve to kids. I have been to many Embassy Suites where you have had peanuts and even Deli slices and cheeses. I was actually a little shocked at this experience. In fact, my wife and I cut our time short during the happy hour because it just wasn't worth it.
Manager Response: We really appreciate the five star rating! The hotel is in an amazing location, and we do feel it offers the best experience in town. Our property ensures that we follow the guidelines for all of our amenities. We understand that other properties may forgo what our brand stands for in search of highlighting themselves. Our hotel does not support this as we know that it creates an issue where guests are misled. That said, we constantly review our offerings and will look to incorporate whatever we can while staying true to our brand promise.  Thank you for being a loyal guest.

Summary: The room was super clean. The whole facility smelled excellent, the food was delicious for the price. The bar has happy hour everyday and the staff was very accommodating. My family really enjoyed the stay.
Manager Response: We look forward to having you back! The team was super excited to read that you and your family enjoyed your visit to our hotel. The team does their best and nothing is more important to us then when our guests our able to truly enjoy themselves.  See you at happy hour.

Summary: Excellent staff and great location for direct access to the highways, airport and transit to either San Diego or Los Angeles areas. The evening reception was surprisingly bland and economical. The breakfast options were feasible and the staff very friendly and attentive. The gym was very, very antiquated for a Hilton hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for the recognition of our staff. They are truly what sets us apart and they work very hard. The team is always so appreciative when our guests praise their efforts.  Our location is amazing, and we are looking forward to having you back on your next trip.

Summary: Great Room, lovely ambiance inside the hotel. Breathtaking view from the inside area overlooking the lobby. Elegant vibe. Jacuzzi and pool were inside that was pretty cool too. Great breakfast. Would stay here again in a heartbeat. Check out time is 12 Bonus!!
Manager Response: We are so glad that you had a wonderful night out! The hotel is beautiful due to the special atrium arrangement. It truly is a great place to relax and enjoy the local area.  Looking forward to serving you once again.

Summary: I hope as a HiltonHonors Diamond member this was just a bad experience, but my room floor was filthy and the air conditioner did not work.  Additionally, checking in on this specific occasion, I do not see the value of even being a HiltonHonors Diamond member.  We could not even get complimentary parking in an partially empty lot with a $25 per night rate.
Manager Response: Our elite members are very important to us. We apologize that we failed you on this occasion. The team will utilize this experience as a learning opportunity and we hope to improve, which always our goal. The hotel does have parking which is charged at the rate of $25 per night. This is a fee that every guest with a car is charged, and disclosed on our website. Our hopes are that you will return and that we can attempt to improve upon this last visit. If I can be of personal service in any way please reach out at anytime. We always want to make it right for all of our guests, but of course especially for our loyal Diamond guests such as yourself.  Thank you for the opportunity.  949-705-5151 Jeff.Mitrovic@Hilton.com

Summary: Perfect business hotel and then some. All amenities as promised.  Comfortable beds. Friendly staff. Lots of outlets for the electronics road warrior. Prompt shuttle service to airport. Clean and comfortable.  I’ll be back
Manager Response: It is wonderful to read that we took care of you while you were in Irvine. Our business partners are extremely important to us, and we take pride in making sure they have everything they need while here. We appreciate your business and look forward to your return.

Summary: The hotel was very nice and staff were always helpful. A special shout-out to Johnny Jenkins, who was extremely helpful and made sure that the customer satisfaction experience was top notch! Johnny went above and beyond and is dedicated to making sure guests have an enjoyable, stress-free experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing our team member! We are grateful that we have guests who take the time to point out when our team does a great job. Our goal is always to have every guest feel well taken care of. Looking forward to serving you again.

Summary: Very nice facility. I will start staying at Hilton Embassy Suites more often. I enjoyed the managers reception. Hotel was very clean Staff was very nice Meeting rooms were clean Breakfast was great  They let us use the shuttle to go to a restaurant.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great comments! We are so proud when guests experience our brand for the first time, and really see how amazing of a value we are. The services we offer are not equaled by any other brand and really set us apart. Having you as a guest was a pleasure and we look forward to serving you over and over again.

Summary: This hotel is 2 miles away from the SFO airport which makes getting in and out very easy.  The hotel is clean and offers a large variety of rooms.   They offer a nice complimentary breakfast which is nice.  Overall the room quality is good and the bed was very comfortable.   The hotel also has a parking garage for guests
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comment about our hotel.  It is near the SNA airport and really does offer an outstanding location for any travel to the Orange County area. We pride ourselves on offering our guests a great lodging option and are very pleased to receive the positive feedback. Our team looks forward to serving you again soon.

Summary: This is the best Embassy Suite I have stayed in. We missed the free drinks because we had to leave early for dinner, but had a nice glass of wine and the bartender was very pleasant. The free breakfast very good and I enjoyed the omelette bar.
Manager Response: Thank you for the amazing comments. Our brand is one of the best out there. To be recognized by our guest as being one of the best is truly special. Our team was very proud to read your comments. We are grateful to have guests like yourself with us and we look forward to your return.  Drinks on us!

Summary: Pool is very small and the room housing it reeks of chlorine. Jacuzzi was completely covered in foam and too hot. The brown, black, gray and beige color scheme is by unattractive. Service was excellent, as was the breakfast. Neither the safe nor the bathroom exhaust fan worked in the room.
Manager Response: We were very happy to see that our service was excellent. Our breakfast is awesome and we really appreciate you noting that. The team will review the areas we could improve upon and address all things possible. Our apologies for failing you in those areas, we will work to improve.  Our hopes are to have you back with us again.  Thank you

Summary: Dorothy from front desk made my weekend amazing, from the room I got to the service she provided everything was amazing. very friendly person and would love to come back again to stay at the hotel and have her assist me again and again.
Manager Response: Dorothy is a special person and we are proud to work alongside her. The special care she has for guests is a talent that we all appreciate so much.  The entire team thanks you for being our guest and we look forward to serving you again.

Summary: We paid for a two night stay this past weekend, we weren’t able to come the first night and we told them of our delays. We show up the following day to find out they canceled our reservations and that we no longer had a room! What!!! Who does that. Then this is the best part, they say to us that they are completely sold out of rooms! Really!!! We go back online, pull up a room from Hotels.com and see they obviously have a room. We were forced to book another room ( we traveled 3 hours and won’t sleep in our car) and began the hour long back and forth between hotels.com and Embassy Suites management (Stephanie). She told  us that it’s common practice how they handled the situation. I call it thievery. To add insult to injury, we got our bill for the one night stay and they
Manager Response: We apologize that there was so much confusion created due to the change in plans. The hotel does not want any guest to have this perception as we understand what it is like to feel this way. Booking through third parties will always place the respective hotel in a position where they would like to help, but have no authority over the party guests choose to book with. The guest is not able to utilize us for changes as the guest did not purchase from the hotel. We regularly advise guests to understand the commitments they are making when dealing with a third party, but we will always do our best to assist our guests in any way we can. Our understanding was the manager on duty was able to work through this with you and assist where we could. If that is not the case please contact me directly and I will assist in anyway that I can. We apologize for your frustration and do understand your feelings.  Contact at 949-705-5151

Summary: This was an annual California girl's trip with my sister and niece. We decided to try the Newport area and check out Catalina Island. This hotel was in an excellent area! It's central to Huntington Beach and Newport Beach. I heard Laguna Beach is not too far either. We checked out Huntington Beach one day and the rest of the weekend went back and forth to Newport. We were able to take several cruises, ferry to Catalina, and parasail all from the same area in Newport! The drive from the hotel was maybe 15 minutes and easy freeway/street drive! The neighborhood was not congested at all and overflow parking was provided Saturday night so parking was not an issue. They also had plenty of security patrolling the hotel and parking garage even though it was in a good neighborhood. As a
Manager Response: Sounds like you had an absolutely amazing weekend! We are so happy that we were a part of that experience. You really highlighted just how amazing our hotel and area are. There is an endless amount of activities to do here and we really do place you in the middle of it all. People like Katina make this a very special place in deed. Just give us a reasonable opportunity to serve you, we honestly rarely disappoint.  Looking forward to your next adventure, can we come too?  Thank you!

Summary: A superior embassy hotel.  Good snacks in the evening and yummy breakfast.  Love the convenience to the airport.  No need for a two hour checkin before flights with this location.  Updated rooms are a plus!
Manager Response: We were very proud to read your recognition of the team's hard work. The hotel brand is an absolutely amazing value and we enjoy surprising our guests with what we have to offer. The convenience of being just blocks away from Orange Counties only airport makes travel to our area a breeze.

Summary: Nice hotel and good breakfast! Good location too, not far from beaches. We were five in the room and there was enough space in the room. Next time I will use this hotel again if I return to Orange County.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to comment about your stay. We were pleased to see that you felt the hotel satisfied your needs. It is a major plus to have the best beaches in Southern California so close by!

Summary Heading: All around a very good experience.
Summary: Staff without exception were personable and friendly. Rooms were ready and clean. Firm beds to my liking.  Two small complaints, we arrived with 20 minutes left in the managers reception and most of the food was gone. We had to asked that one of the food items to be restocked. The second one is more about the Embassy Suites brand, the kinds of food available during the Managers Reception vary from widely from the different Embassy Suites Hotel.
Manager Response: We are so thankful that you took the time to recognize the hard work of our team. These days it is so important to hear the good that people do on a regular basis. Our team really works hard and we are honored to serve people like you.  The Embassy Suites social hour is meant to provide a reprieve for our guests. We serve a couple drinks and offer light snacks to get you started for your evening. Some partners do not follow the standards and this leads to confusion. Our team will always do our best to provide what our guests need.  Thank you for being our guest. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you again.

Summary: Hotel and furnishings are dated. Refrigerator did not work in room and front desk didn’t do anything. Pool area was nice. Breakfast was fine. Bed was comfortable. Not bad, just not up to Hilton standards.
Manager Response: We are glad that you enjoyed some aspects of our hotel. When something is brought to our teams attention they should always work to get that corrected, if possible. Something like what you mentioned does not sound like anything we could not have handled. I will work with our team to better understand the situation and how we can improve.
