We are confident that on your next trip you will notice an improvement, as this is always our goal.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary Heading: Too many stains on carpet and furniture
Summary: Room 510 had too many stains on carpet, sofa and even on the shower curtain. The atrium is smaller compared to other Embassy Suites. Person who checked us in was not very friendly, didn’t attempt to make any eye contact and seemed snooty.  Breakfast selection is so-so compared to other Embassy Suites and hotels in the area.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback about the stay. We will take your information so that we can look into the situation further. Please feel free to also communicate with us while you are staying at the hotel. Situations may arise we our goal is always to correct them while our guests are still with us.  This will be shared with our team as we must strive to do better. Please accept my apologies on behalf of our staff.

Summary: Stayed here during USA Water Polo jr. Olympics. We have 2 kids playing in different age groups. 18 pools for JO's this was a gret location one kid had a few South other had North. Fantastic Location! Early breakfast for those 7am games!
Manager Response: It was so great to have your team here with us during this amazing event! Serving these serious youth athletes is absolutely a highlight for our team. Our hotel is in an excellent location for sports groups in this area. Playing our small role in getting you ready to compete is something we are very proud of. We were happy to see that you all had such a great time.  Look forward to seeing you on the next trip.

Summary: The check in was incredibly friendly and informative. Really started my week there off right. The premium Happy hour was great with great brands like Maker’s Mark. The rooms are spacious and clean. Would definitely stay there again
Manager Response: Thank you so much for recognizing our team's service. It is so important that they see their hard work making an impact. The upgrade option for the evening social hour is the best deal in town. You can not find that caliber of liquors for the price we offer to our guests.  We all look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: So many great benefits to staying here.
Summary: We were part of a home building group,34 of us, staying at this Embassy Suites and we all had a great time!  We were here for 3 nights. The breakfast was excellent, lots of choices.  They have a happy hour, and the margaritas made me happy.  The rooms were large and well kept and the bathroom was an excellent size.  Highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: It was so great to serve you all! The hotel is designed to make our guests visit more enjoyable. The suites serve a great purpose for both shorter and longer visits to the area. Thank you for recognizing the breakfast and bar quality. This is huge benefit to our guests and we are so happy you got to enjoy.  Please feel free to reach out on your next visit and we will make sure the margaritas are ready!

Summary: Had a good time. Good amenities.  Good breakfast. The staff at the reception were not friendly. The language of one of them was too difficult to understand. The parking is very expensive.   Overall a good experience.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star recommendation! We will take your comments to our team and ensure that any language barriers are approached correctly.  Your understanding is appreciated and we look forward to serving you on your next trip.

Summary: Parking lot over flows on the weekends. Suites are very quiet. Good breakfast, lots of food.  Hotel staff very friendly and helpful. Checking in was very time consuming and took more time than it should as there were not enough check in staff.  My suite was very clean but lacked an alarm clock and refrigerator.  Note: I requested a small room so no refrigerator. Most rooms do have this.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments on the visit. We are very happy that you found the hotel to your liking. The hotel is very popular, for good reason based on our guest feedback, and at times the capacity can create potential for some expected lag. We will take your feedback and make sure that we address all possible items to ensure we always improve. Nothing is more important than our guests and we really appreciate your willingness to help us be better. The team looks forward to your return.

Summary: This is the worst hotel I’ve ever been in my entire experience as a traveler. We reserved a one bedroom king size suite with a view. We even called them that we are arriving early morning the next day and they didn’t even tell us that they’re changing our room reservation, no communication at all.when we arrived they gave us a queen size studio. I was so upset because I drove all the way from Northern California and I was so tired and I expected my room to be ready. I think they gave our room to somebody to make more money while in fact they already made money from us.So when I came back to the front desk to complain about my reservation, the front desk manager , I think her name was Kimberley, told me to wait and she’ll get somebody to clean a room to fit our reservation when
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience about your recent stay at our hotel. We strive to provide gracious, engaging and caring service and sincerely appreciate your feedback and we're very sorry you were unhappy. You are correct in that you made a reservation for a particular room type. Our understanding is that you did not arrive on the scheduled date of your reservation. As you can imagine this very much changes the situation and we did have to change your accommodations based on our full occupancy for that night. Our team members did attempt to inform you of this change during their conversation with you over the phone. It does seem that we missed something in our attempts. In speaking with you in person, our Front Office Manager expressed our sincerest apologies and made sure that we were able to get you accommodation in the fastest manner possible.   I apologize that we were unable to take care of your needs as anticipated. We will take your comments under consideration as we continually work to improve our guest experience. I do feel we did our very best considering the circumstance. It is never any of our intention to leave a guest disappointed, regardless of the situation. We are very sorry for that and we hope you will consider staying with us in the future.

Summary: I am very pleased with all of the accommodations while on our stay.  The hotel was very clean, the staff was friendly, and the room was perfect. The breakfast was delicious and prepared to order.  The ease of the checkin and check out process was great.  The only downside was finding parking close to the main entrance as all the spots were full, so we had to park in the garage and the take our stuff up to the room. I defiantly will return the next time we are in town!!!
Manager Response: We are so happy that you had a Wonderful Stay! It is very important to us that our guests are well taken care of. The Embassy Suites brand has so much to offer compared to the amenities at other, also very good, brands. We pride ourselves at giving our guests more. The hotel is very popular and there are times that the neighboring parking lot is necessary to use for some guests. We apologize for any confusion with this.  We look forward to having you back.

Summary: Location is excellent for travel in and out of Orange County, and the extra living space is welcome.  That is about it.  The quality of the breakfast buffet has really dropped and after 2 days of powdered eggs you are ready to eat elsewhere.  The also don't allow you to eat food from outside in the main lobby area which is tough when you have a team trying to eat a quick bite together.
Manager Response: We appreciate that overall the hotel met your needs.  Our breakfast has variety but we do understand that after some time our guests may tried everything, and crave an alternative. The public spaces are restricted from outside food and beverage, it is very similar to what any establishment would need to have in place. We fully understand that at times it can be unwanted if a group of people would like to host a get together. For this reason the hotel does offer meeting space that can be utilized for this need. It is an option, but we understand that some groups would prefer to simply to utilize the public area. As it is for all guests these policies are in place. We do apologize if this created any challenge as that is obviously not the intention.  We are glad your group enjoyed themselves and we hope to serve you again.

Summary: I am traveling with a disabled family member. I needed to have 2 rooms close to each other. At checking, Dorothy helped me. She immediately knew who I was and that I had requested the 2 rooms to be nearby. She spent a lot of time at the computer trying to figure out a way to make it happen, for the entire length of stay. This is a busy hotel will lots of business people as well as youth sports teams. But Dorothy made it happen, which makes our trip much easier.
Manager Response: It makes me very proud to read your comments. Dorothy is a great ambassador of the kind of hospitality we strive to provide. Given the opportunity accommodated. Thank you for taking the time to give our team member the well deserved praise.

Summary: Great hotel in Irvine! Breakfast is good, happy hour is Great! Wonderful staff I come here all the time when i checked in a sweet lady Dorothy is always so nice and welcoming, always as a smile on her face. I highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: So glad that you enjoyed the awesome amenities we offer. Our full breakfast and happy hour are highlights of the hotel in terms of amenities offered. Dorothy is a special person and always does her best for our guests.  Looking forward to serving you again.

Summary Heading: Great service, clean, and close to everything
Summary: Wonderful hotel with a terrific breakfast every morning. Just be prepared to pay a little extra each day if you're bringing a car that needs to be parked in their garage ($30 a night). Great and wondeful front desk staff. The on site Starbucks is also a big bonus.
Manager Response: Our breakfast is always happy to read that you enjoyed the hard work they put into feeding so many of our guests.  We look forward to serving you again.

Summary Heading: Good value for money. Lackluster breakfast. Tight Parking. Paid WiFi
Summary: Clean. Accessible. Nice interior and atrium theme. Very tight parking ($25/night). WiFi not free unless you sign up w/ a Hilton program. Breakfast is NOTHING like the photos on their website!  Front desk and breakfast usually understaffed. Night restaurant is very expensive.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback on your stay. We typically see great things about the services offered, but we are realistic in that their are items that can always be better. The team will review the areas you pointed out and address anything we can. Our hopes are to serve you again.

Summary: Need upgrade the mattress, the mattress is drooping to the center, this had made me and my wife a hard time to go sleep and had backache in the whole morning. Other than that, good stay with family to check out the Irvine area. Parking structure fee $25 per night but very limited space, some spaces are too compact which some cars parked took 2 spaces which waste the parking spot. I rather have parking space with standard size instead of compact size.
Manager Response: We are happy to see that overall you felt that hotel provided a good experience. The team would want to take a look at the mattress that you mentioned. Please contact me directly so that we can review where you stayed during the visit. 949-705-5151 or Jeff.Mitrovic@Hilton.com Thank you

Summary: I have been to plenty of hotels, but embassy suites takes the cake every time. Unbeatable suites, breakfast, amenities and customer service. I would come back here and recommend friends any time! Thank you for an awesome 4 day stay.
Manager Response: We love our guests! Thank you for staying with us, we are so proud to serve you.

Summary: Never let's me down staying here. Breakfast buffet and evening reception are amazing. The beds are comfortable and the staff was very friendly and helpful! My kids loves it too! The only thing is the hot tub had way to much chlorine in it.
Manager Response: Thank you for coming back and staying with us. Your comments on our consistency were very inspiring for our staff. So glad your kids had a great time with us during the visit. I remember hotels were my favorite travel experience as kid.

Summary: We had a wonderful time at this hotel! The staff was very friendly and were able to let our family check in a few hours early, which was very helpful with 3 kids. The room was clean and spacious with the extra suite area. We loved being able to come back from a long day at the beach and grab some snacks and drinks at the happy hour! Breakfast was wonderful, lots of options to choose from and makes it very easy to have it all right there when your traveling with kids. Thanks for a great stay!
Manager Response: The hotel is a great place for families and really anyone traveling to the area. As a parent myself I was really happy to see that your kids enjoyed themselves. It can be a challenge to travel as a family and we are proud to recognized for being able to help families refresh on their travels. The suites are perfect for anyone who likes more space, and who doesn't like an inclusive happy hour. See you on the next trip, drinks on us!

Summary: Love this location- we have been coming here for years! Excellent location, excellent hotel with great accommodations! Dorothy at the front desk made our latest stay here the best one yet! She was so kind and willing to help every single time I went to the front desk! She even took the time to find us a king suite at the last minute and was such a pleasant person! I can’t say enough about her outstanding service! Can’t wait to go back!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your loyalty. Our team is honored to be able to serve you on a regular basis. There is nothing more important than taking care of our loyal Hilton customers. Dorothy is a special person and she demonstrates great pride in making sure every guest has a great stay. We are very lucky to have people like her working at our hotel.  We look forward to serving you over and over again.

Summary: Very clean hotel, easy parking, and friendly staff.  The breakfast was the best complementary breakfast I’ve ever had, it included so many options so there’s something for everyone!  Elevators are fast and there is a Starbucks onsite. The location was perfect for me, close to the airport and the business location I was traveling to.  Highly recommend!
Manager Response: We really appreciate the positive response in regards to your visit. The team really does all it can to ensure our guests are cared for. Our breakfast really can not be beat compared to any other inclusive breakfast option.  Let me know next time you are in town. You must try the new Starbucks tea selections for this summer.  Thank you again for being our guest.

Summary: Gorgeous room, incredible breakfast and amazing staff who truly goes above and beyond for their customers. Such a memorable experience for our family!  We had a wonderful vacation this Summer and would definitely return to not only thos hotel but the Embassy Suites/Hilton Hotels chain. Thank you.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure to serve you and your family! It is an amazing place to have a vacation and we are proud to be part of these lasting memories. We really appreciate the praise of our staff, they really do care.  Hope to see you next year as well.

Summary: The stay here was excellent. The staff was extremely helpful, and the breakfast was just like being st home. All in all a thumbs up 👍I recommend Embassy Suites to everyone if they are all this great.
Manager Response: Coming to the OC is for sure one of the most fun trips you can take. Our hotel is proud that we are able to serve many guests who come to the area to enjoy all we have to offer. The breakfast offered really is a great amenity we provide for every guest. I am all for not cooking or searching for a restaurant whenever possible.   The brand is popular for a reason and we are so happy you were able to enjoy that.  Hope to serve you again soon.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay - well location - top notch facilities
Summary: Stayed at this facility as it was by a meeting and an event.  The price was good given the suite size.  Everything was top notch including the fitness center.  The staff was friendly and helpful.  I'd definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: We were so happy to read that we took great care of you! The hotel is truly a great place. I agree that given the opportunity our staff is absolutely top notch.  See you on your next trip to Irvine.

Summary: Beautiful Hotel to stay with the best breakfast and amenities. My kids love the pool and enjoy swimming have wonderful time. Parking was fantastic to me because my disability to carry the luggage in and out.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments on the hotel. We are glad that the kids enjoyed the pool. Looking forward to serving you again.

Summary: Thise is my 3rd time that me and  my family we stay at thise hotel,The hotel location is very near the Orange county airport ,It only 5 mints drive to the hotel from the airport .and the service is very good ,also the rooms are very clean,and very good sleeping beds .and the quality of the food is very good .
Manager Response: We appreciate your loyalty. The team is very proud that we earned your trust. Our hotel really is a great place and our people always do their best for our guests. Thank you for being our guest. It is a pleasure to serve you and your family. Please let us know when you will be returning so we can ensure you are well taken care of again.  Enjoy your summer.

Summary: My extended family gathered in Irvine for a memorial. Part of the family stayed at the AC Marriott and part stayed at the Irvine Marriott. We stayed at Embassy Suites. We liked the two-room suite, but we were less than impressed with other aspects of the stay, some of which can be helped. First, parking was a challenge in that you cannot enter the hotel from the garage. Second, and this has been mentioned in other reviews, there are unsupervised kids everywhere. The pool and exercise rooms are overrun by them, rendering them unusable by adults.  Now, I have no problem with kids, but certain policies could be in place that made parents take a more active role. We saw a security guard patrolling the halls outside guest rooms. Maybe he could also check the pool and exercise areas
Manager Response: The team here sends it's condolences. We are sorry for your loss. Our hotel does host a variety of guests and as with most hotels, there are times we have a larger volume of children. The hotel team always attempts to do it's best to ensure our guests are safe and comfortable. As in any situation involving human beings, at times we find ourselves challenged to address every potential situation that may evolve. We will take your comments and use them to improve wherever possible.  Thank you

Summary: I travel a lot and many different countries and cities.  Embassy hotels are usually a hit or miss.  This definitely a mistake.  The accommodations were the worst.  I never been to a hotel that stops breakfast at 9:00 am with no ability to order. Who eats at 6:00 am?
Manager Response: We apologize that our hotel did not fit your needs. Our breakfast hours are selected and adjusted to satisfy what the majority of our guests are looking for. These hours are posted and available publicly. We understand that the hours can at times lead to individual disappointment. That said, our hotel has a restaurant and we are always willing to attempt to put something together to suit our guests basic needs. It was unfortunate that we missed an opportunity to offer this to you. Our hopes are to do better in the future.  Thank you

Summary Heading: Great location if you are going to UC Irvine
Summary: Our family group of 11 stayed here for the graduation weekend in June.  Embassy Suites are fabulous.  And this one lived up to the reputation.  Large rooms with microwave and refrigerators, 2 TVs, Queen room could sleep 6, using the sleeper sofa.  Indoor pool and spa and outside patio.  We loved the breakfast and the evening reception.  The hotel provides courtesy airport pickup, an amenity which seems to be disapearing with Uber and Lyft availability.  The shuttle even took us to the University and picked us up.  We will stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Go Anteaters! Congratulations to the new graduate! We were very excited to read that you enjoyed your stay. The hotel is truly amazing and most guests find exactly what they need when they choose us.  Thank you for recognizing our hotel.

Summary: For the last 2 years, I have brought my son's Basketball Team down to SoCal and we have stayed at the Embassy Suites by Hilton Irvine-Orange County.  Each year we are greeted with excellent service and accommodations.  Jasmine Stewart has been my Group Sales Rep and she does any excellent job of making sure our stay is first class.
Manager Response: Our sales team is simply the best! Jasmine is a great example of how our groups are well taken care of from start to finish. We always look forward to the young athletes that take their talents seriously, and it is pleasure to serve them. The team look forward to next year.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: our stay at this embassy suites was excellent. the check-in process was great, easy and cordial. our room was very comfortable, clean, and roomy space wise.the pool was good, the breakfast was excellent, offering a super variety of foods from omelets fresh cooked to fresh fruits to pancakes. the nightly hospitality event was exceptional!
Manager Response: Thank you for the positive comments about our hotel and staff. The breakfast really is an amazing feature of our hotel. The team was very proud to read that we took great care of you. Hope to serve you again soon.

Summary Heading: Lacking on service, and a hotel filled with children.
Summary: I was staying here for a weekend of conference things. The hotel was overrun by children and families. The breakfast was pretty average.  And with some of the hotel staff I got the feeling that it was an inconvience that I was asking for things I needed to go to the DInner I was going to. It was in manner and attitude. The suite was huge, and I drowned in it as a single person.  Definitely not a place for singletons to stay.  Building looks tired and old and needs a modern refurbishment.
Manager Response: The hotel brand is a family favorite for many reasons. Similarly, most guest enjoy the exceptional amenities that we offer. We do thankfully have a huge variety of people that stay with us, and we are grateful that they stay with us. The staff is typically noted for providing great service and I apologize that they were challenged to help you the way that they should. I personally apologize that my attempts to communicate with you prior to your arrival did not  make it to you. If we could have connected as hoped I strongly believe we could have avoided some disappointment due to your particular needs. I take full responsibility for failing you on this visit. We accept all guest feedback and always look to improve everywhere possible. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: The staff was great and the room was very clean.  I didn't have breakfast, however, i did have dinner in the restaurant....fish tacos which was good.  Thank you for a great stay!  I will be back next time I fly out of John Wayne.
Manager Response: The fish tacos at Vibrante are the best! Our restaurant definitely has the great SoCal favorites our guests crave. We are so glad you enjoyed your dinner and your overall stay. Next time you are here try the Flautas, so good!

Summary: I would definitely stay at the Embassy Suites next time I am in Irvine.  Checking in was quick and easy.  The room was ample, clean and quiet.  Food and drink were great.  The staff made me feel welcome.  Couldn't have asked for a nicer stay.  Thank you!
Manager Response: It was very nice to read that you had a great stay. The hotel really is a great place. I was most proud to read that the staff made you feel welcome. Your comments are really appreciated, as the team enjoys the positive messages we get from our guests. We do look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: good location and great breakfast options
Summary: The hotel is only blocks from John Wayne airport so that was a plus.  The breakfast options are also very good and allowed our team to meet in the early morning to get ready for the day.  The room /hotel decor is a bit dated and could use some sprucing up.  Also the exercise room is pretty small.
Manager Response: The hotel is in a ideal location when visiting the Orange County area. We are glad that we met your needs and that the team was able to enjoy themselves. Thank you for your time.

Summary: I called Hilton Irvine to help me with a situation regarding a cancellation issue.  He was able to resolve it and I appreciated his help.  I had an unexpected travel situation and he worked with me to resolve my problem. He was very cordial and went out of his way to make it easy.  It's rare when people go out of their way to make a hard situations easy.  Thank you De'Andre
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing the great comments about our staff member. Our team is focused on helping our guests whenever possible. I was glad to see that we were so willing to do what was best for our guest. We hope to serve you again in the future.

Summary: Great value for money. Rooms were very spacious and clean. Hotel also offer complimentary evening reception and shuttle to near points of interests.Only breakfast bufet was slightly crowded and there was a minimum variety of meal. I would like to thank receptionist Dorothy. Such a nice person, whose kindly help me to solve a problem with invoice.Thank you.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback. We also feel that Embassy Suites as a brand offers more value than any other hotel brand. It was a pleasure to read that our staff member provided the kind of service that makes us standout. The team looks forward to serving you again.

Summary: It's always a good stay. We checked in close to midnight and it was a night of just rest and sleep for the next day. When I woke up... I had to wait for breakfast to start at 730. My only down fall of my stay.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a great birthday! Thank you for choosing to stay with us during this special event. Weekend breakfast hours are modified to suit the majority of our guests needs. We know there will be times that this will not work for every guest. I am confident our staff can offer alternatives in these rare occasions. Once again, Happy Birthday and we wish you many more!

Summary Heading: Great People Who Make A Difference...
Summary: Selene in the Restaurant helped me with the computer station like a pro. She was my waitress the day before. Dorothy at the front desk was always qued into everything....nothing went unattended... everything about the facility was tops but these folks were special.
Manager Response: We could not agree with your title any more. Our hotel has been fortunate to have some amazing people working here. Selene and Dorothy are just two examples of the great people that work hard every day so that our guests can have a great travel experience. It is so important for us to hear this positive praise as it motivates our team; their efforts are recognized. I am grateful to you for taking the time to honor our associates with your comments.  We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: Excellent quality was delivered as expected in an Embassy Suites hotel. The highlight was dinner, where the service was superb and the food met my tastes (Tortilla soup, steak fajitas, beer) and a basketball game on TV.
Manager Response: Vibrante restaurant offers some excellent choices for diners around the Irvine area. It really is a perfect place to relax and enjoy our living room style atrium. It is so fun to see guests getting excited about their teams playing down the stretch in the playoffs. The team was happy to serve you and we look forward to your return. Make sure you try our famous Flautas next time, so good!

Summary Heading: The Place to Stay in Orange County!
Summary: If you're planning a group trip in Orange County I would highly recommend the Embassy Suites in Irvine.  We arrived later in the evening and the front desk was amazing and we we're checked in quickly and they had great customer service.  The breakfast was delicious and they had lots of choices (not to mention many of our group members enjoyed the Starbucks in the lobby).  Also, Jasmine the Seniors Sales Manager is the BEST at handling any of your booking needs.
Manager Response: Jasmine is part of one of the best teams around! Our Embassy Suites in Irvine is tailor made for groups that are coming to the Orange County area. The hotel amenities are often noted as being exactly what our groups need. With a team that understands what you our guests are looking for, you really are in great hands. We are delighted that we took great care of you and that you took the time to share.  See you next time.

Summary: If you walk into this place and you see a sour face man named Daniel. I would walk right back out. Because of this persons attitude and not at all welcoming. I took me and my family right out of there to Homewood hotel a mile away and was very pleased. I would never spend my money on somewhere where I’m not getting treated right.
Manager Response: Mr. H, we appreciate all feedback both good and bad for continuous improvement of our guest experience and associate training.  I was sorry to hear your experience this week was not satisfactory.  We value all our guests, and especially our loyal Honors members.  Hilton Honors is a fantastic program allowing guests to redeem points towards complimentary stays.  The redemption value is for room and tax charges, and not incidentals.  Our hotel does lease parking in the structure adjacent to the hotel.  It is pay parking which is disclosed on our website where the reservation was booked.  We understand that you were able to cancel your stay and have the Honors points refunded immediately at your request to accommodate your relocation to an alternative hotel.  We have discussed your situation thoroughly and if you would like to have further conversation please contact me directly at any time.  Sincerely, Jeff Mitrovic General Manager (949) 705-5151

Summary Heading: They will Pick your pocket for 25 Bucks per night!!
Summary: Very pleasant Hotel until they pick your pocket for $ 25.00 bucks per night.  If they can't charge you a RESORT fee so they stick you for Parking.  The Hotel is right next to TWO large parking structures.
Manager Response: We regret that the parking situation at our property caused you to feel this way. The hotel does have an area of designated parking inside the parking structure. There is a fee associated with parking at the property, or structure, and we do our best to advise guests of this. Our website states this, and the structure itself has signage posted. It is crucial to be aware of these kinds of things as most hotels do have fees associated with certain items around their properties.

Summary: Nice hotel, seems to have been re done lately. Happy hour is the same as other Embassy Suites and the Bfast also.   The restaurant is small but the food is top notch and the bar service is great.   The gym is NOT what anything to be excited about, very small 2 treadmills ( old) 2 stair machines ( old) and that’s about it.
Manager Response: We were glad to see that you enjoyed the hotel, and that we provided what our brand is known for. Consistency throughout our brand is extremely important to us, so we can ensure our guests are not confused by differences that can lead to disappointment. The amenities offered at Embassy Suites are not matched by any other full service hotel, we are very proud of this.

Summary Heading: Dorothy, the best front desk person
Summary: If you need anything, and need it done quickly and pleasantly, go to Dorothy. She helped me with charges in 5 seconds that others couldn't handle in two days. I'm happy she's at the hotel as the rest of the staff aren't as pleasant as Dorothy.
Manager Response: We truly appreciate the praise for Dorothy, as she is a genuinely great person. Our staff is by far the best part of our property. The team will share your feedback and make sure we all continue to provide the service our guests have recognized us for. It was great to see that we were able to assist. Hope to be able to serve you again.

Summary: I stayed at the Embassy Suites and was great by the most friendly staff.  Especially Dorothy - she really made my day.  ❤️❤️❤️. I love the rooms and they for breakfast, they have an omelet maker.   Best place to stay!
Manager Response: Dorothy is an awesome person! She is a great example of the type of people we have the pleasure of working with here at the Embassy Suites in Irvine. Our customers are the most important thing about our hotel and we are proud to have your recognition. We look forward to your return. Ask the chef to make you his special omelet, it is amazing!

Summary: Delicious breakfast, it was an absolute highlight. Wonderful suite style rooms. Very comfortable and welcoming. I highly recommend this hotel. The staff were very helpful and friendly. The location was perfect.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for mentioning that our hotel was Fantastic! That is quite a compliment. Our staff really appreciates the encouragement with recognition of their efforts. They are truly the ones that make this a great place to stay.  Doesn't hurt that the location is very convenient for travel to the OC.  We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: This is a good location, friendly staff, relatively clean for the price category, decent free breakfast. Parking situation is not great – no elevators, no ramp for luggage to get to the hotel – but is somewhat workable.
Manager Response: We are glad to read that you enjoyed your stay at our property. The staff is the highlight of an amazing location with great amenities. The parking structure that the hotel utilizes is next to the hotel. If you need any assistance please ask our staff, we will be happy to explain anything about our location. Looking forward to the next visit.

Summary Heading: Not helpful location for business travelers
Summary: After a long trip in from LAX arrived at the Hotel and early check in request was not honored on a Thursday. Rushed off to business meeting unable to freshen up or store luggage upon return room still barely ready. The room had a wet smell and was cold, heater not working properly but jet lagged and tired from work after a simple request for different room was denied without a lot of explanation I went to bed. I am used to breakfast being available starting at 6am in other Embassy Suites not at this hotel. I will be sure and not book this hotel again, it has not been a pleasant stay. I will add that this Embassy Suites is Not Sweet at all
Manager Response: We regret that your stay was not as expected. This is not typical of our location. There are times when we can not accommodate certain requests or particular schedules, that is an unfortunate reality of any business. Our team typically responds very well and ensures we communicate to do our best with any need. We will share your comments to understand how we can improve. I do hope you reconsider and stay with us again, I'm certain that we will serve you better.

Summary: Terrific location, close to airport with shuttle service. Complimentary breakfast and happy hour reception are a great way to start and finish the day. Walking distance to some terrific restaurants, too.
Manager Response: We do feel that we are the best hotel in the Irvine area near John Wayne Airport. Thank you for your feedback. Our team is always proud to learn when we have done well in providing service to our guests.  See you on your next trip.

Summary: The only complaint I have on this hotel is the parking.  All other amenities and hotel is very nice.  Staff was pleasant.  There is a Starbucks on site.  Breakfast was better at this location than at Orlando location.
Manager Response: Thank you for the great recognition. Our breakfast truly is an outstanding service that is regularly recognized as a true delight for our guests. The hotel does utilize a paid parking structure for guest use. The secondary structure, which is also a paid area, is on the other side of the hotel. We apologize that this creates confusion at times. Both structures have signage but we understand that this may not be clear in certain occasions.  We appreciate you as a valued guest and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Excellent place, stellar room, friendly staff
Summary: The room was very nice. Staff excellent.  Breakfast very good.  I cannot comment on the value, as my company paid.  A little confusion on setting up wifi, instructions could have been better, but overall it was an excellent hotel, room, service, staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience. We are happy to see that hotel provided an excellent experience. In terms of value the Embassy Suites brand is an industry leader. The team looks forward to serving you again.

Summary: We were given three different rooms. The first smelled because it had just been painted. The second was being painted as we walked in, the third, right in front of the elevator. Don't expect breakfast to start at 6:00 AM as is claimed. Prepare for 6:15-6:20 before it is all set up. The "appetizers" the evening reception appeared to be the fruit left over from breakfast, that and chips and animal crackers. The parking charge has really increased here to $25 a night. On our way to leave the last day , the door to the parking garage wouldn't open. An employee came by to try, he couldn't do it either. We pushed the exit button and pushed on the door to no avail. We have stayed here a number of times before, the overall experience has really declined. As a former Hilton Diamond and
Manager Response: We apologize that this stay was not up to your expectation. The team will look into your feedback and ensure we improve in all areas where we can. If I can be of service in anyway please do not hesitate to contact me directly. We would want the opportunity to have you with us again and provide a better experience.

Summary: This hotel is super close to the airport. There is a very reliable shuttle service. The rooms a big with a separate living room. The is a refrigerator and sink. Nice a quite rooms. The front desk is extremely nice and helpful.
Manager Response: Thank you for the noticing how great our hotel is. The location is super. Our staff really appreciates the recognition. We are here to serve you.

Summary: The hotel is located in a very convenient location for my business needs.  The rooms are clean and comfortable.  Very easy shuttle service to/from Orange County airport.  Breakfast is always great at Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: We are happy to read that we met all of your needs. The full complimentary breakfast really is a standard that sets us apart from any other brand. Next time you are in town make some time for social hour in the evening, drinks on us!

Summary: Hotel is in great condition and easy access to all fun things in southern California.  We had a wedding in Laguna Beach and then went to Disneyland the following day.  Hotel was a great location away from the crowds.
Manager Response: What a trip! A wedding and Disneyland in the same visit. We are located in such a great part of our state that allows for so much to be seen. We are happy that you were able to relax away from the madness and still get to the places you wanted to go. All the best!

Summary: I find this hotel to be dark and dreary.  Not welcoming at all.  The free breakfast and evening socials are really good.  Although for a multi-day stay they get to be repetitive.  Parking is convenient and the location is close to SNA airport and the downtown Irvine business park.
Manager Response: Thank you for feedback on the hotel. We are pleased that you found the location and our brand amenities useful. The hotel has an open atrium in order to keep up all the natural foliage inside the hotel. It mirrors the environment outside.

Summary: My family and I loved our stay! Excellent costumers service! We are especially thankful for Dorothy at the front desk. She went above and beyond to accommodate us and make us happy. We will definitely be recommending this hotel to our friends and family.
Manager Response: Thank you for the five stars! Dorothy is an amazing women and we are very fortunate to have her with us. Our staff truly make all the difference.  Looking forward to serving you and your friends.

Summary: I was only one night at this hotel upon arrival everything was really good. But around 10 got call Saying if we didnt keep the voices down we would get kicked out. Which to me was really weird since we had 2 small children with us. On top of the the Next room guest had loud music an around 3 a.m. were talking really loud an nothing was done. Also to get a call Saying if we didnt keep our voices down we would get kicked out on the Next call I thought was ridiculous. Ive worked at Many hotels an normally thats not something you tel a guest on the first call. I believe the front desk agent was carlos my check in was 4/6/19 an checked out 4/7/19.
Manager Response: Our hotel does not have any associates by the name of Carlos. Are you certain that this was our hotel?  That said, hotels do have disturbance policies in place and they are all different based on situations at hand. Typically if you are contacted by hotel staff that means that another guest has filed a complaint of disturbance. These instance can be very challenging as we are required to act and in most occasions some guest is disappointed. It is unfortunate that this occurs and all hotels do their best to address these situations. On our end we apologize that you were disappointed by this and if it was our hotel we will continue to do our best with these disturbances. We can only hope that most of our guests are respectful enough to understand what is appropriate behavior inside a hotel. We do hope you understand these difficult situations.

Summary: Hotel very accommodating with the large group of female hockey players and families participating in the National Youth Hockey Tournament. Location is convenient to ice rinks, restaurants, beaches Airport, and Disney. Plenty of parking inside garage.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognize how amazing our location is. It is simply one of the best places to stay. It was such a pleasure to serve your hockey teams. The young athletes were amazing, respectful and conducted themselves better than most adults. It was so easy to serve you and still provide a great experience to everyone. Thank you for the amazing job you have done with grooming young adults. We so look forward to serving you again and again.

Summary: Great experience all around rooms, service, and staff. I would recommend this hotel to anyone traveling in the area. Excellent location and close to the airport, easy access to freeways, shopping, and dining!
Manager Response: We appreciate you choosing us and allowing us to serve you. Our hotel truly has everything needed for a great stay in the OC. Next time you are in make sure you head down the beach, we are only about 10-15 minutes away from world class beach activities. Looking forward to your return.

Summary: Unfriendly staff............., they don't care about any problems you have with your stay they just push you along..........  A/C dose not work very well.  Breakfast was good along as there are no large school trips there at the same time. No seating
Manager Response: We apologize that your experience was not a typical one that our guests have. Your comments will be shared with our staff to ensure we improve, everywhere possible. As you can imagine breakfast is very popular, and first come first serve. There are times when there can be a wait. We always recommend that our guests try to arrive as early as possible to avoid the peak times, later during breakfast service.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights. Room is spacious, microwave, refrigerator, large closet, table chairs, pull out sofa and a tv in front room and bedroom.   Courtyard area can be noisy but I heard nothing from back room. Slept great.   The room was very clean. Breakfast is a full breakfast but if you dont want that there is a Starbucks in the hotel.   Parking is very limited outside of parking structure. Use parking on left side of building.   Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: We love Hockey!!! Thank you for being our guest. It was a pleasure to serve such and amazing group of young athletes. The teams were so respectful and behaved like true pros. We look forward to having you again.

Summary: Great staff, great room, great experience - and extremely convenient to SNA airport. I would recommend this property to business and leisure travelers alike. Fantastic walk-in shower in the room and great service from all staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and being our guest. Our location is so convenient, as you stated. If you are coming to Orange County check us out, you will not be disappointed.

Summary: We recently stayed at the hotel for several days and had a wonderful experience. Dorothy from guest services was very friendly and helpful and assisted us get a room that met our family's needs. She provided excellent customer services and went above her call of duty to help. We liked our 2 room suite, which was very clean and comfortable. The complementary breakfast buffet was also filled with healthy choices which included lots of fruits and berries! Overall, the staff were very helpful! We'd definitely recommend our friends and family to this hotel as we have been coming here since my daughter was 1 y/o. Very family friendly :)
Manager Response: We were so pleased to see that you enjoyed your stay. Staff members like Dorothy really try their best to ensure our guests are taken care of. It is so important for them to hear the good that they do. Thank you for your positivity, it is appreciated.

Summary: I love Embassy suites and this property was in great location to beach and shopping. Breakfast options were great ! I wish pool was open but it was under construction.  I traveled to this area for a wedding and plan on returning in August . I truly enjoyed my trip .
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing. We truly believe our Embassy Suites in Irvine has it all. You mentioned the location and our amenities which really can not be beat. Our staff is so excited to serve you again, and have you enjoy our newly refreshed pool area. See you soon.

Summary: As always, the staff are outstanding, as well as the food, happy hour, complimentary full breakfasts including made to order omelettes. Over and above, a beautiful tray of chocolate covered strawberries and bottle of wine was delivered to our room since hubby and I were celebrating our Anniversary, and a surprise dessert appeared after dinner in the atrium restaurant! We'll be back since we like to visit Cali family nearby.
Manager Response: We view our hotel as our home and the team was honored to read your review. They work so hard to make this a great place for our guests and it is so important to see their hard work be recognized. Hope your Anniversary was the best yet, and we look to having you back in our home again.  Thank you

Summary: Pool was available Staff had attitude Extra towels never came Room never got cleaned which really pist me off and all supervisor said was,  well I can have someone empty your trash but that's it.  Horrible experience at a franchise hotel I have always loved.
Manager Response: We are sorry to learn that you felt the experience was not what you expected. The team has looked into this and it is unfortunate that this was not brought to our attention as we always attempt to make it right for our guests. This is a simple situation which can be handled very easily, and team does handle these on a regular basis. I agree that leisure weekends present a different type of environment at any hotel. Our team is prepared to meet the demands and challenges as best as humanly possible.

Summary Heading: Shocked - not in a good way
Summary: Empty alcohol bottles and toiletries from previous person who was staying in the room. This is not what you want at checkin, no baggage carts, nobody offered to help with bags, even when we asked, parking gates weren’t working and so much more.
Manager Response: We understand that our mistake at check in was not what any guest would expect. Please accept our apologies again for this honest human error. The manager on duty that you spoke with did take action and immediately moved you into another room. The team was glad to know that we reacted to the mistake and rectified it as soon as we were advised. Our goal is to never make any mistakes, and we do regret that you experienced this.

Summary Heading: Service level depends on individual interactions
Summary: Loved the ability to select my room in advance and get a digital key. Upon arrival, I asked the person at the front desk for a shower cap and he said he would send one up (friendly). Within just a couple of minutes of my own arrival into my room, a friendly, smiling lady from housekeeping knocked and presented two shower caps. Unfortunately, the rest of my short stay was not as positive. One phone could not connect to the Internet at all, and my other phone and my laptop got the login page but once logged in, all apps said that I was not connected. I ended up tethering to my phone in order to work. Also, the fan in the room was LOUD. I sleep with a fan on at home, but the fan in the room was 10x louder, and when it kicked in for the AC it was actually startling! (I don't startle
Manager Response: Thank you for advising us of your experience. We appreciate the great comments in regards to most of our service provided. The team we look into the areas that were not what you expected and surely address anything that we can. Our hopes are to serve you again and showcase all possible improvements.

Summary: Another fantastic stay at the Embassy Suites - Irvine location! The convenience, comfort, and amenities keep us coming back any time we have the opportunity. Thank you to Michelle Beristain and all staff who make lodging here such an enjoyable experience.
Manager Response: Michelle is an amazing person and we are so proud of her impact on our guests. Thank you for sharing your experience, and the example of how truly dedicated our team is to our guests. We look forward to your return.

Summary: I was here on a business trip and enjoyed my stay. The room was nice and clean the staff was friendly and the cocktail reception and breakfast buffet were a nice too.  I would recommend this hotel for anyone staying in Irvine CA
Manager Response: We really appreciate your support and recognition! The team works so hard and your comments truly inspire them.  Our hotel is a great place with amazing amenities that bring true value.  Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: We stayed at the hotel for an event over a 3 day period serving over 300 guests to the hotel meeting facilities.    Our experience was great all around.  Jasmine, our Sales Manager and Mo handled our event planning professionally.  Jeff, the GM sets the standard and the whole team follows.  Luis and the Housekeeping Team executed our special requests seamlessly. Pedro, was so responsive with our meeting needs.  Banquet servers:  Gabriel and Julio were awesome.  The front desk with Matt, Megan, Lawrence, Daniel and De’Andre - were all great with our in house hotel guests as well as our event attendees.   Lastly - during our first night at the hotel - we actually had time to enjoy the Reception and Jay and Rose made us feel so welcomed.  Thank you and we hope to be back next year
Manager Response: The team was proud to serve you and we are truly humbled by your kind words. Every member at the Embassy Suites Irvine is here to serve. Our guests come first as we are grateful that you choose to stay with us. Thank you for being our guest and we look forward to our next meeting.

Summary: This was our 3rd stay at this hotel. There was a glitch when I booked a 2nd room for my stay this weekend. I talked to Dorothy at the front desk and she was able to assist me and clear the problem up while I was at breakfast. There was a lot of people checking out and asking questions and she still was able to look at issue and answer several if the questions I had. Thanks Dorothy you were awesome 👍. Looking forward to our next stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for recognizing Dorothy for her excellent service! She is an example of what makes our hotel as special as it is, our people. We look forward to serving you again on your next trip to Orange County.

Summary: Mixture of friendly and unfriendly staff. Facility was up to date. Room was very nice. Breakfast was very good. As California is trying to be more environmentally conscious I feel every hotel should have filtered drinking water dispensers so patrons may refill their own  water jugs. Especially places that charge premium price. But there is nothing like that here.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your experience. Our staff is typically recognized as being one of the friendliest in the business. Although we do not have water coolers in the atrium of the hotel water is available at multiple locations inside the hotel including the breakfast area, Vibrante restaurant, Starbucks and fitness center. My hopes are that we can connect and discuss your experience and ensure we improve where possible. Please respond to my email that I sent, when you have a moment.

Summary: Walking distance to my office. Delicious complimentary breakfast, great complimentary happy hour, clean an modern property. Room service was prompt and my food was still warm.  Convenient baggage hold on check out day and shuttle to SNA made me very happy.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your thoughts on our hotel. If you are coming to the Irvine/Orange County area we offer amenities that are sure to provide you with everything you might need while traveling. The team is ready to serve you upon your return.

Summary: This Starbucks is located in the lobby of Embassy Suites in Irvine, CA. It is the best Starbucks I've been to because of the excellent customer service, the cleanliness, the quality of drinks and quickness of getting my drinks. Janhely and Madisyn make me feel like the customer is #1 and adds value to the Starbucks level of service.
Manager Response: Absolutely love hearing from all of our great customers! We love our Starbucks here at the Embassy Suites Irvine, and it is absolutely the team that makes it so great! The team looks forward to seeing you next week.

Summary Heading: Madisyn at Starbucks is the best!
Summary: Just had the best experience at Starbucks.  Madisyn is hands down the greatest!!!!   She has the best attitude and makes the best drinks.  Best coffee, best service, best Starbucks.  Would recommend this Starbucks (and Madisyn) to everyone in the area.
Manager Response: Absolutely love hearing from all of our great customers! We love our Starbucks here at the Embassy Suites Irvine, and it is absolutely the team that makes it so great!

Summary Heading: Great Starbucks location in the Hotel
Summary: When traveling having a great cup of coffee in the morning is especially important. This Starbucks checked all the boxes. I got in and out quickly with a perfect cup of Joe. Madisyn was super friendly and brightened my day. I’ll for sure stay at this location again just for the coffee.
Manager Response: The power coffee is not to be underestimated. However, we like to think that the people who make your drink with love make all the difference. It does seem that we are in agreement on this. Thank you so much for being our guest and we look forward to serving you soon.

Summary: I love going to this location which also close to my work, every morning to grab my first coffee. One great thing about going to Starbucks is no matter which store you visit, you can be assure you'll receive the same standard for their service, but once stands out and my personal fav with perfect cappuccino (coffee) made by MADISYN. She is such a happy barista out there, always cheers you up :). Keep rocking Madisyn.. aussie aussie aussie. Cheers uJ
Manager Response: We do not get tired of reading these amazing comments about our exceptional location. Our friend from down under, Madison, is one example of how fortunate we are to have great people working here. We obviously also have amazing neighbors who care about our community. Thank you for the support and we can not wait to serve you again.

Summary: I work next store to this hotel and go in at least twice a week for coffee at the Starbucks. The hotel looks to be very nice, clean and well-run. And Madyson, a barista at the Starbucks in the lobby is awesome!! She is not only extremely good and fast, she has recommended two (unusual) Latte's to me and both were great (so much so I gave up my old order). Everyone there is always very nice and friendly and the service (especially with Madyson behind the coffee bar) is the outstanding!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great comments about the Embassy Suites Irvine. We absolutely love all of our amazing neighbors and we are fortunate to be able to serve such great people. Come see Madison and team on Friday afternoon for our Free Cookie Fridays, an afternoon cookie is not to be missed.

Summary Heading: Starbucks Coffee at This Hotel is the BEST!
Summary: Madisyn you Rock!  We loved your service, if you stay her please ask for Madisyn!!  We love good customer service which is really hard to find.  Thank you so much for your exemplary attention to detail and service!
Manager Response: Thank you for yet another great comment about our amazing Starbucks crew. The entire team is filled with amazing people. We appreciate you recognizing Madison, she is a special person.  Look forward to having you back.

Summary: I was at the Embassy Suites about a month or so ago and wanted some Starbucks coffee! I was greeted by one of the friendliest servers ever in a Starbucks!! I wanted a kind of "special" drink, since I felt like I was coming down with something.  She suggested a "vitamin" type drink. She was super helpful and kind! Her name was Madisyn! Thank you for having such helpful people in your Starbucks! believe me, they are not all like that!
Manager Response: The team is proud to serve our guests. Our goal is to stand out and Madison is a major reason we do. Its all about our people and we appreciate you recognizing them.  Hope the vitamin drink kept you going!

Summary: Very long morning with 3 meetings back to back. Came in town from Boston. Stand in line. Not remembering anything. Nice young lady name Madisyn very nice ask me what would I like . Made many offers on different drinks (coffee) have.  Nice for changed when someone can help me. Thank you Ms Madisyn. For being so helpful.   Mr C Thomas CEO Date of stay: February 2019
Manager Response: Our Starbucks baristas at the Embassy Suites Irvine are simply the best! Madison is an example of how amazing the team is here. We want to enrich our guests lives in any way we can. We really appreciate the time you took to appreciate Madison, she will be so excited!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, but fitness center ... terrible.
Summary: Only two treadmills for a hotel this size is laughable. Several mornings is went to the fitness center at 5am, but the machines were already filled.  Very disappointing. For such a nice hotel, I don't understand going so cheap on this amenity.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and that you felt that the property was a nice place. The fitness center is a very popular area in the mornings and it can be frustrating when you are not able to get a spot, when you would have wanted. If it were at all possible the hotel would always opt to have more availability for our guests. Our hopes are that we can have the pleasure of serving you again. Thank you for being our guest.

Summary: Outstanding in every way!!! Clean, quiet, spacious rooms, modern Decor, and great complementary breakfast.  The best part is the staff—friendly, helpful, and with tremendous integrity. I lost an expensive earring in the room. Teresa S. found it and Luis P. made sure it was returned to me. When I offered a tip, he politely declined and said they were just happy to get it back to me. Wonderful people!!!  Best hotel in Irvine by far.
Manager Response: The people at this hotel are indeed special and rare in these times. It brings the entire team joy to learn that we upheld one of our most cherished values. Taking care of our guests is something each of us takes great pride in. We are proud that Luis and Teresa took such great care of you.

Summary: I can escape from my day-to-day stress for a much needed relaxation by taking an occasional  staycation. My personal favorite hotel is Embassy Suites. I come here to this specific location, three to four times a year.  Today however; I personally would like to take time to recognize someone. Often times we take for granted the little things people do for us. My apologies for my lack of past recognition.   I want to send a special "Thank You!" to Leticia Aviles.  Leticia Aviles, thank you very much for taking an extra step when cleaning my room.  The laying out of the hand towel, methodically placing and organizing each and every piece of my personal belongings on top of the towel did not go unnoticed. I also, thank you for your discretion of leaving the scarred paperwork on the
Manager Response: The team is honored to be considered your favorite hotel! That is a compliment that we do not take likely. Our team members, like Leticia, go out of there way to ensure our guests are cared for. It is so special to see a guest take the time to recognize this. We are grateful to serve you and look forward to your return. Thank you

Summary: The hotel was very clean, great bar, starbucks, walking distance to restaurants and beautiful sitting places.  Rooms were huge and clean.  Breakfast was amazing! The staff was so nice, they have a shuttle to drive you anywhere.
Manager Response: We are so happy that your stay was great! The hotel is exceptional in the amenities and services it provides. Our staff is second to none and given the chance they will exceed all expectations. When you are back please ask for me and we can share a Starbucks together. :)

Summary: I visit this hotel regularly as I am fond of their breakfast and the location. Unfortunately, I left my Apple AirPods and charger in the room after my last visit. I called and left a message and was contacted back by Luis Perez. Luis really went above and beyond by even offering to bring the AirPods and charger by my work as he lives close by. I am beyond ecstatic for having someone as kind as Luis to help me find my lost belongings. The professionalism in which he handled the manner was amazing. Great job Luis, and Embassy Suites. Will definitely be staying here more often because of Luis and the friendly staff.
Manager Response: The team really enjoyed reading your review! Luis is a special person and one example of the kind of hospitality our team members strive to provide to our guests. Our Embassy Suites in Irvine is truly a special place. Thank you for being our guest and for sharing some of the good that occurs here regularly. We look forward to serving you again.

Summary: I needed a small executive board room for a negotiation meeting and this Embassy Suites filled the bill.  I had some attendees flying in to Orange County so the location worked out perfectly.  With the free breakfast for guests, a restaurant open for lunch, and a Starbucks on site, we took care of all of our needs.  What stood out was the welcoming, friendly, and helpful staff.  The staff's great attitude made "another business meeting" pleasurable!  I will re-book here when I need room(s) near Orange County Airport.
Manager Response: It is a pleasure to read that we once again came through for one of our guests. The hotel's amenities truly assist us in delivering the kind of experience todays guest requires. All that said our staff truly is the magic within our hotel. We are so proud of the team's attitude and willingness to always go above for others. See you soon on your next trip to the OC!

Summary: Crazy end to the normally pleasant “happy” hour at this place.   Right before the end of happy hour at 7pm at this place I walk up and order a nightcap.  At about the same time some big goon comes out from the back and inserts himself between me and my buddy and announces happy hour is over.  We were both saying cmon be reasonable but his response was to take a very offensive stance and shove his phone in our faces inches from our noses showing that indeed it was now 7:01 and we were to leave the bar area.  Mind you this guy about 6’4 with a very muscular body and an angry look on his face.  So crazy... beyond ridiculous to be honest.   We both called Hilton being diamond members and won’t likely return to this place but I think people should be warned if your looking for a
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback.  Your incident has been well documented.  Our reception team is extremely friendly and well trained for their jobs.  If you feel our management team didn't handle your encounter with all respect please feel free to contact me directly at the hotel.  Sincerely,   Jeff Mitrovic General Manager

Summary Heading: Quality restorative family visit with my daughter
Summary: First off I do want to commend Dorthy O. At the front desk for her empathy and concern for my family.  She is a wise woman and great ambassador for the Hilton Brand.   Been a HH member since 1996 and used to use Embassy Suites for family getaways to have two separate sleeping areas and a hearty breakfast to start the day.   Now this particular ES is very business centered most guests during week on Business.  Of course plenty of seating groups to converse in some privacy.   Indoor pool and spa I used twice before it closed for balance of month to be refurbished.  Usually prefer outdoor pools but as it worked out with the winter storms a indoor spa and pool were much appreciated.   5:30 happy hour the same chips and dip with some crudités, wish they had non alcohol drinks like
Manager Response: Dear Charlie, what a wonderful story and thank you so much for spotlighting Dorothy at the front desk.  We appreciate your continued loyalty and awesome feedback.  I will make sure to share your comments with our department heads and of course Dorothy.  We hope it wont be too long until your next visit with us.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Many AC problems in rooms. Ended many ac problems - had to change rooms 3 times. Ended up in the room opposite the elevator which is typically a horribly noisy place. But surprisingly, the room and it up being quiet.
Manager Response: Nomad, we are sorry to hear about AC issues and do hope our staff was able to accommodate and that any unit reported to be under performing had the opportunity to be fixed.  We will as well look for more detail on any review sent to Hilton.  We are glad that your actual room stayed in was quiet and provided for a restful evening.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Love Embassy Suites usually, disappointed with the cleanliness in the room.
Summary: I love Embassy Suites usually; however, I was disappointed with the cleanliness in the room.  The dirt (specifically hair) I could see upon checking in to the room caused me concern with what I couldn't see as far as cleanliness is concerned.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and the housekeeping feedback.  We've discussed this with the team and definitely is not up to our standard.  Thank you again for loving Embassy Suites and we hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed here for business as it was one of my company's approved hotels and the most cost effective. I remember Embassy Suites back in the early 90's and was thinking this was going to be nothing fancy - boy was I wrong! The hotel was super modern and well kept. The suites are very spacious and maintained as well as the bathrooms. The beds were comfy and it was quiet at nice. The free breakfast was very nice with a made to order omelet station. I grabbed a quick bite to eat at the restaurant inside and that was very good. There is also a Starbucks in the lobby (prepare for a long line!). Overall, far exceeded any expectations I had. If back in the area, I would definitely stay here again and recommend you do so as well.
Manager Response: Melly022, thank you for the awesome five star recommendation and great feedback.  We're glad your company has us on the approved list and look forward to your next visit and please tell all your colleagues to come stay with us  at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: GREAT hOTEL WITH GREAT SERVICE, NICE CLEAN ROOMS AND A SUPER FREE BREAKFAST
Summary: Really great hotel with a super staff, nice quiet clean rooms and a super free made to order breakfast. Also free happy hour in evening. It is located in the business section so their are not too many restaurants or store nearby, so the use of a vehicle or their local shuttle is necessary if you want to get around to eat, shops etc.The only negative to this property is that the Starbucks in the lobby only stays open till 7PM and does not offer much and they ran out of bottled water while I was there and the vending machines in the hotel do not offer anything except soda.
Manager Response: Bruce, thank you for your recent stay and the feedback.  Our Starbucks does close at 7 pm midweek due to business volume; however, our bar and restaurant are open until 11 pm daily.  I do apologize about the water.  Our taff should have been able to grab something from the Honors supply.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Favorite place to stay in Irvine
Summary: I love staying at the Embassy Suites in Irvine.  The rooms are comfortable and clean.  The staff is very courteous and the in house restaurant  is really good if you want to stay in and eat at the hotel.  My only con about the hotel is the parking situation.  It's a garage right next to the hotel.  Back in the day, you didn't have to pay for parking and now you do.  The real issue is when people are coming by for a short visit.  They don't have a lot of places for them to park and it's a real hassle.  They shouldn't have to park in the garage if they plan to be there for only a few hours. The few outdoor spaces they have are taken up (by guests??? not sure).  Other than that, it's our go to place when we are in Orange County.
Manager Response: CyKeWh, thank you for your continued loyalty and making us your go to hotel.  The hotel does not own the parking structure and does lease space for guest parking.  It's been pay parking for nearly ten years now.  The limited exterior spaces are for quick in and out and overflow for overnight parking (charge).  We do appreciate your feedback and are looking at some alternatives for the exterior spaces.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Professional  and friendly service made our stay!  From the suite to the evening reception and cooked to order breakfast, we could not have requested more.  We celebrated a birthday during our stay, the staff went out of their way to make it extra special.
Manager Response: Anastaziam, thank you so much for spending your birthday with us.  We're so glad you had a great time and we greatly appreciate the five star recommendation!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: wonderful service and facilities and they care , good food value and have then theater , middle of everything great beakfast and room for everyone  its close by . Nice business land book. I am looking forward as you skin out have, go there and check it out
Manager Response: Thank you for your business and the strong recommendation.  We are glad you enjoyed your stay and excellent service.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at the Hilton Irvine-Orange County Airport.  The rooms were very clean and comfortable.  Everyone was warm and friendly as well as extremely helpful. I would recommend this hotel and will visit again.
Manager Response: Odyssey, we appreciate your business and the five star recommendation.  We're glad the suite accommodations and staff made this an experience that will bring you back again.  We hope to see you soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The staff was excellent in all departments beginning with checking in, room service, and consierre information and area recommendations. The room was superb... Clean, spacious, and contemporary. The design of separating the sleeping area from the social/business area is why I prefer staying at Embassy Suites. Embassy Suites does this well in making your lodging feel like an apartment versus a hotel room.
Manager Response: Nomad, than you for such a great recommendation and we're so glad you enjoyed all aspects of the hotel.  We very much appreciate your shout out to the staff.  We hope to see you back soon and please tell your friends and co-workers.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great service, accommodations and attentive staff
Summary: This is my second trip I’ve taken to this specific Embassy Suites and I have to say that I feel at home and very taken care of. The shuttles take me to restaurants, get manicures and shopping. My meeting space was beautifully appointed and I was happy with all my staff interactions. The free breakfast and on-sight Starbucks is an added plus!
Manager Response: Lorid976, thank you so much for such great detail and the awesome five star recommendation.  We're so glad you enjoyed your time with us had a successful meeting.  We'll look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great service (shout out to hard-working bartender at happy hour!), beautiful renovations--except for room 411, where we were, that either wasn't renovated, or recently held a frat party (see pix). Also the cleaning lady knocked on our door at 7:55am--AM--to clean the room. WTH. Other than that it was a great stay.  Honestly, I do recommend this hotel. It was an off stay, we've been there several times and this was our first off time.
Manager Response: BKroadtrip, thank you for your continued loyalty and we greatly appreciate your shout out to the bartender.  Please know your comments have been reviewed and our housekeeping manager will be personally reviewing suite 411 to make sure it is up to our high standards.  We appreciate the feedback to address the room issue.  We'll look forward to your next stay with us.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Good cleaning staff and front desk help. Parking for guests without charge is limited. Has a free shuttle to the airport. Good central location and freeway access. Promt check in and check out. Good breakfast options.
Manager Response: Steve, thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate the staff acknowledgment an so glad your had the opportunity to join us for the best free breakfast in Irvine.  Our airport shuttle is complimentary to John Wayne Airport and other nearby attractions from 5:30 AM to 11 PM daily.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall very pleasant experience. Comfortable beds. Felt like home away from home. We stayed three nights. My children and I thoroughly enjoyed the facility, swimming pool, breakfast, and evening reception.
Manager Response: Safari, thank you for bringing the family and enjoying some time at our hotel.  We're so pleased to hear about your very pleasant experience and that the family was able to enjoy all our amenities.  We hope to see you back next time you are traveling to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel is clean and friendly staff, parking is expensive.  Breakfast was not as great as other ES.  The buffet food (eggs and pancakes) were processed. Potatoes were very firm and had a frozen texture to them. Shelled eggs are served at the grill.  Rooms need upgrading. Otherwise the lobby and seating areas had an upgrade. Great experience with the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay..  The entire hotel went through an extensive $12 million renovation in 2016.  I will pass along your comments to our F&B team, however, please know that our chef's prepare everything in the kitchen and the buffet fresh daily.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here on a Rose Parade tour.The room overall was adequate, however don't sit on the toilet seat unless you are ready for a jolt, extremely flimsy. Front desk, really, I asked for change for a hundred dollar bill and the reply was "all I have are ones". Next, the hotel was to furnish our New Year's Eve dinner 6pm to 8pm. If we had gotten there at 7pm we would have scraps and by 7:30pm they had removed all the food. Now as far as the food went, whatever the meat was (no idea) but shoe leather best describes it. Then there was the vegetable medley, awful, and of course potatoes. If the tour management paid more than $2.00 for this pathetic meal we all got ripped off. I would not recommend this hotel, period
Manager Response: We do want to thank you for your recent stay and apologize for any service issues.  I have shared your comments with our front desk and will check with our engineering team to make sure that the toilet is properly secured.  We have heard many positive comments regarding dinner but also do take your feedback seriously.  Thank you for taking time to share your experience and giving us the opportunity for all possible improvement.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Pleasant stay with our teens and wasn't bad. Could not complain other than towels were not replaced when they cleaned our room. Very glad Starbucks was onsite.  Breakfast is ok but during our holiday stay was very busy.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing the family and spending the Holidays with us.  We're glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and do apologize for our housekeeping team missing the towels.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales
