Summary: Overall I would not recommend staying here. My 8 year old son found pills under the bed in the master bedroom and the staff was not helpful with my checking process. There is no other option for parking and you must pay $20 to park the garage that does NOT have access to the hotel. We had to carry all our luggage around the parking garage to the hotel. It was just more of an inconvenience than a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear Matt, I'm so sorry to hear about your experience and have shared and had conversation with our Housekeeping department about the suite you stayed in.  Our priority is guest safety and cleanliness and this was not to our standard.  Our front desk team should have inquired about unloading luggage at the front door and then parking which again I do apologize for it happening.  We have a huge focus on family travel and we are really sorry to have missed the mark on your recent stay.  Please contact me directly if we can further discuss and make this right for your family.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is a very nice hotel and close to the airport making early flights very easy to get to. The room was clean and the parking was easy enough to get in and get out within minutes of arrival and departure.
Manager Response: Navigate, thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We're so glad the hotel's location near Orange County Airport made your day so convenient.  We hope you'll be coming back to stay with us again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: If I could I would give this a 3.5 star rating.This hotel is great if you need more room. The living area and bedroom are very comfortable and have been updated since my last visit. The one thing that really needs improvement is the parking structure. It is very dangerous to drag your luggage where the cars drive with no pavement. I was almost afraid as it was dark and I would be hit by a car. There is no ramp from the hotel to the parking lot (which is in a separate structure), only a lot of stairs so if you have a rolling suitcase, you must drag it where the cars go (which is a very narrow road). My young daughter had to lift her rolling suitcase up the stairs. The snacks were only chips, pretzels and soda. But they did have omelettes for breakfast and even had egg white
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate your feedback.  Regular Starbucks hours at to 7:00 PM Monday through Friday, 5:00 PM Saturday and 2:00 PM Sunday.  We had limited hours only over the Holiday.  Please know our shuttle drivers are happy to take guests based upon availability within two miles of the hotel which includes the District and South Coast Plaza.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We are a family of four and Embassy Suites are tailor-made for us.   The kids are almost 9 and 6 1/2.  So, we like the two rooms... sofabed in the living room and a King in the bedroom with a door in between.  The breakfast was terrific with made-to-order omelettes to start the day.  They have everything you need but it was a little packed in there for breakfast.   The staff was helpful and very efficient.  Parking and wifi were free...???  I know, I did not believe it.   You will find the rooms to your liking, they are clean and I saw plenty of security walking around inside the hotel.    There is an indoor pool for the kids to enjoy.   I would give it a 4.5 rating.   Thanks for a comfortable stay!
Manager Response: Calbuccaneer, thank you for bringing the family and we're so glad to hear the hotel was perfect and everyone enjoyed our complimentary breakfast.  Wi-Fi is always free for Hilton Honors members.  Parking however, is pay only unless booking a parking package reservation.  We hope to see yo back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Everything you would expect while traveling. Clean,friendly,accommodating. Good location.Front desk staff was very efficient and offered help on anything we would need. Made us feel welcome and we stay at Embassy Suites because they are consistent when we travel.
Manager Response: Thank you for such a wonderful and detailed review.  We're so happy you had an excellent stay and appreciate the staff acknowledgment.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great breakfast. Dorothy our front desk lady was exceptional and welcomed us with a friendly and kind attitude. Clean rooms, spacious and great food at the restaurant. Breakfast was hot with lots of options.
Manager Response: Jessica, thank you for sharing and the very kind comments for Dorothy at the front desk.  We're glad you enjoyed breakfast and your stay.  Thank you also for the awesome five star recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: A fantastic place to stay in Orange County!
Summary: The hotel was beautiful, check in and check out were very smooth, efficient processes and all of the amenities were so enjoyable, especially the nightly evening reception. Our training attendees were all very pleased with their stays, as well, and we felt great about being able to arrange accommodations in such a fantastic location.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a detailed review.  We appreciate your business and the five star recommendation.  We hope you'll have another opportunity to bring the group back on future dates.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed at this hotel because it was close to the center where my daughter was playing volleyball. It was a nice room and the breakfast in the morning was good. The hotel was decorated nice for the holidays.
Manager Response: Erin, we appreciate your business and the five star recommendation!  Hope your daughter's team did well this weekend.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Front desk gentleman did not provide any customer service whatsoever was very rude and not personable, admitted that are card was doubled charged and did nothing to help resolve the situation in fact he hurry up and checked us in so we would get out of his way.
Manager Response: David, I am sorry to read about your experience.  I wanted to research your stay for detail; however, have no record of a David T staying at the hotel within the last week.  If it was under a different name please contact me directly so we can discuss and make sure this is resolved.  I've shared your comments with our front desk management to get any information one of our agents may recall about your situation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My girls and I just stayed 1 night, but it was the best experience I ever had, from beginning to end. The rooms where so beautiful and so comfortable and accommodating to all our needs. The complementary breakfast was so fabulous and delicious I can't wait to go back and stay longer!
Manager Response: Fearless, wow what a great story and thanks for sharing!  We're so glad to hear about your experience and the "best night ever."  We do hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The staff here are extremely gracious and professional. Thank you De'Andre and Daniel for making my stay incredible!! From the complimentary cocktails from 5p-7p nightly to the wonderful breakfast buffet. This place is the closest thing to heaven on earth!
Manager Response: Compass, thank you so much for the five star recommendation.  We'll be certain to pass along your comments to De'Andre and Daniel at the front desk.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: i was there for only two nights-- the rooms were clean and staff attentive.  I even attended the evening reception and had drinks and snacks which was very nice. I would suggest the hotel if you need a place to stay close to the airport
Manager Response: Trek, thank you for your recent stay and the awesome five star recommendation.  It's always great to hear staff comments and glad you were able to attend our evening reception.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: During this stay, I felt appreciated as a Hilton Honors Silver member. My stay here made my business trip very comfortable.  I plan on staying here in the future and I will be sure to bring my family along.
Manager Response: Eduardoc179, thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  We definitely value our Hilton Honors family at the hotel and we're glad to here you had such a pleasant business trip.  We appreciate the five star recommendation and look forward to your next stay with us.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: A gem. Amazing omelettes for breakfast
Summary: We arrived late past midnight with lots of luggage and a toddler. The staff helped bring up our luggage without us asking. I had to chase him to offer him a tip as he didn’t even expect one. Rooms are very spacious and comfortable. Breakfast is amazing. Fresh omelettes to your liking.  Freah pineapple, toast, bagels, cereal, yogurt, coffee, teabags, juice. Very good variety and good quality complimentary breakfast. Lobby is very welcoming and looks very nice. They also have snacks in the evening also complimentary. Only downside is the $20 daily self parking fee which most hotels in the area charge so I didn’t deduct any stars. If other hotels are doing it why shouldn’t they? I had the fortune of discovering this hitel years ago and stayed here again and will stay here again
Manager Response: Djayomid, thank you again for coming back to stay with us.  We love hearing awesome staff comments so thank you for sharing and we greatly appreciate your five star recommendation.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The staff and hotel were great for our holiday travels. The proximity to our daughters home was perfect. We have stayed there before and would stay again in the future. We love that it is so close to John Wayne Airport and some of us flew down and some drove.
Manager Response: Robin, thank you for coming back to stay with us again.  We're so glad to hear our location is perfect for you and it's always great to hear compliments on the staff.  We appreciate the five star recommendation!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very nice hotel to stay in with a great complimentary breakfast. Unfortunately the room for a disabled person is very noisy and for guest sleeping on the sofa bed you don't get much rest.  The shower head is not easy for the disabled person to handle, too cumbersome.  Other than that we will return to this hotel because of the overall presentation.
Manager Response: debrav735, thank you for your comments and we do appreciate the feedback on the shower head.  We will pass this along to our engineering team.  We do hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This property is our go-to hotel for visiting family in Orange County. It's modern, clean and we usually experience excellent service and value. Standards were subpar on Thanksgiving, however - cleaning staff had left by 1:00 and supplies promised weren't delivered. Lobby Starbucks was closed by noon - all without prior warning. Supplies were delivered quickly when requested the next morning and the usual great service resumed. Informing guests of changes in staff/cafe hours would be great.
Manager Response: Adventurer39808,  we appreciate your continued loyalty and do apologize for any inconvenience hours at Starbucks were Holiday shortened.  There is no reason, however, our team could not deliver on supplies as we did have staff the entire day.  We will discuss this with our housekeeping team.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: A great hotel, but still not extraordinary
Summary: Things have gotten better in Embassy Suites Irvine - Orange County from last time my family and I stayed there. Excellent location! Excellent hotel staff - polite and helpful! This is the first time I parked my car in the hotel facility - it was very easy to park and get in or out of the hotel. The morning breakfast is still very good, but appears  to have fewer items compared to our last stay there. The quality of order to omelette has gone down a little, and should be improved by proper monitoring of the chef in charge. This time also, we had problems with the microwave oven, but a hotel staff came and quickly fixed the problem. This time also we had problems with not having clean sheets, pillows, and blanket with the sofa bed. Proper and close monitoring of room by hotel
Manager Response: abdulk755, thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience and we appreciate the continued loyalty.  We are very glad you enjoyed and will discuss the service misses with those department heads.  Our breakfast selections have remained consistent and we do rotate daily specials to keep option open for guests on extended stay.  We hope to see you back again soon and appreciate the recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We have been staying at this property many times over the past 20 years. It is a very well situated and a quite comfortable hotel. During the most recent stay the front desk crew went above and beyond to help us when the help was needed.
Manager Response: Alexander, what a fantastic story and thank you for 20 years of continued loyalty.  We're so happy to hear about your front desk experience and will look forward to your next trip to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have stayed here twice recently and will again; it's near my home office, reasonably priced, the service and amenities are great.  I am a Starbucks iced tea junkie and they have a full-sized store in the lobby in addition to their own breakfast and bar/restaurant.  Pillows and mattresses are great too.  It's everything I need.
Manager Response: DaRose46, thank you for the strong five star recommendation and we're so glad our location and amenities make this your home away from home.  We were so pleased to add our full service Starbucks during the last renovation.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Hotel is as old as I am.... dirty, dated furniture... don't sit down!
Summary: I was downgraded in my room to the 9th floor... and it was so old and gross I wouldn't even sit down.  Bed/Bath were fine.  Gym was dirty and very limited in equipment, my elliptical trainer made horrendous noise.  The only bright spot was my cooked to order omelet.  Chef was grumpy, but it tasted great.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear about your recent stay.  The hotel underwent an extensive $12 million renovation in 2016.  The cleanliness and room condition are extremely important to the hotel and for all our guests to have a great experience.  Thank you for commenting on the fitness room.  We will make sure to end the engineering team today to make sure there are no issues.  We do hope you will reconsider staying with us in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Last minute trip to Orange County, we have stayed here in the past and will definitely be staying again, hopefully for more than one night! Either way, we made the most out of our overnighter! We visited Newport Beach and enjoyed our time together!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad you decided to come back and see us on this last minute trip.  We appreciate the five star recommendation and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Ok hotel, clean, comfortable beds and good amenities. Breakfast items ran out early and people had to ask and wait around for replenishment each day. Parking cost per night is high.. Will likely not stay here again.
Manager Response: Yvonne, I'm sorry to hear you had a less than perect experience at breakfast and will share this with our food and beverage team.  We are always striving to have the best breakfast in town and not just the best free breakfast in town.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is very nice and quiet place.The breakfast it’s amazing all the people and his staff are friendly and helpful .I was looking for find a temporary place to live the front desk Dorothy was helped me a lot to Find a different apartment and also direct me to know the area .I definitely recommend this hotel for family and businesses .Thank you From all the staff and good manager .
Manager Response: Saeed, thank you so much for the great recommendation.  I will be sharing your comments with Dorothy at our front desk and hope you found the ideal apartment on your relocation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here for a combination business/leisure trip, and was not disappointed. Room was well appointed, bed was comfortable, complimentary full breakfast was excellent and a nice amenity. When checking in, I would advise others to unload luggage at front, as there is no direct access to the hotel from the parking structure. The walkway from the parking garage to the hotel has 2 sets of stairs running side by side, with no ramp, leaving you to pull your luggage up the driveway where the cars are entering and exiting the parking garage. Overall, it was nice and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: jmericle, thank you for your recent stay and great tip on dropping luggage at the main entrance.  We are very happy you enjoyed both your business and leisure stay and hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Thermostat and WiFi issues, otherwise a wonderful hotel in a great location
Summary: Sleep Quality:  The minimum thermostat setting was around 75F which, for me, is entirely to hot to sleep comfortably (I prefer 65F).  WiFi:  Despite repeated attempts, I could not connect to the complimentary internet.  Everything Else:  Otherwise, this is a very nice hotel and is well situated for area businesses.  Everything is clean and well maintained. Parking:  It should be noted online that you pay for parking but, at least, there are in/out privileges so you are only charged once per day.  There were plenty of parking spaces in the garage.
Manager Response: Thank you for the thorough review and we are sorry to hear about any issues with the AC and Wi-Fi.  Our individual suite units should be hitting 65 and I hope you reported so our maintenance could take a look.  We've done extensive upgrades to the Wi-Fi including over 150 access points so will check to make sure one of the units is not down.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was my first experience with Embassy Suites and I was more than impressed. From walking in and registering, to the rooms cleanliness to the reception and complimentary breakfast. Excellent! I would not hesitate to stay again
Manager Response: lagunasun, thank you so much for sharing your experience and very happy to hear your first time at Embassy Suites was a huge success.  We're looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: 2 night stay before heading home from Orange Co
Summary: I will start off with the good things about this hotel. It is very close to the airport, and they offer free shuttle service there. The evening reception offers free drinks and snacks, and the complimentary breakfast is a nice touch with made to order omelettes. I also liked the size of the room, offering a separate living area with separate tv and couch.  However, I was expecting a bit more for what we paid per night at this hotel. When we arrived for check in (which was later around 8pm) we had our bags on a cart. The gentleman at the front desk never offered to get someone to help us with our bags. I don't know if this was because it was later than peak hours?? I was also disappointed with the overall "look" of the hotel. It looked a bit outdated with gold railings and the
Manager Response: Dear Getaway815005,  Thank you for your feedback of your recent stay with us. We sincerely apologize that you experienced a poor level of service and we were unable to meet expectations due to the condition of your bathtub; based upon your review we are actively working with our housekeeping and maintenance staff to ensure these items are addressed to avoid recurrence. Our hope is that if your travels bring you back to the area, you will consider staying with us again. We appreciate your honest feedback.

Summary: We stayed for 2 nights ( celebrating birthday)and it’s thru 3rd party ! We were given a tiny room , full bed and located at the back of ice machine. Asked the 2 agent at the front desk ( Daniel and Gabriel) if we can change the room but none of them is willing to help us! Sooo frustrating and disappointing because they are charging us an additional $100 to be moved . We are not asking for an upgrade what we’re asking is the location ( tv is located on the side of the bed , tiny small room and a full size bed for husband and wife) soooo sad !They said, it’s 3rd party reservation so they can’t do anything about it! The worst experience ever ! Not coming back to this one,and  will not recommend ! Not very kind people to deal with!
Manager Response: Dear Marian F,  Please accept my sincere apologies for not exceeding your expectations. I would like to get an opportunity to "Make It Right" for you. Please contact me directly at 949-553-8332. Thank you and I look forward to speaking with you.

Summary: Friendly front desk staffs, aside from a clean and so welcoming atmosphere when you get in the hotel. Also, I would like to recognize Carmen in made to order breakfast (omellete)who maintains her so friendly smile despite a busy long line.
Manager Response: Dear jirajida26,  Thank you for allowing us to host your stay. We truly appreciate you recognizing one of our Associates -Carmen. I will share your feedback with Carmen, and we will celebrate her success. We look forward to your return!

Summary: I want to let whomever stays here that Dorothy at the front desk was a great help! She went above and beyond to get me the help I needed and didn't make me feel like I was a bother! Thanks again Dorothy!
Manager Response: Dear Jimenez1975,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. Dorothy is our Super Star and we are very proud of her! Thank you for the recognition! I will share your comments with our entore Team. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Great Breakfast with omelet bar and a FREE Happy Hour
Summary: We came to So Cal for a friend's wedding and decided to stay here due to proximity to the airport and the venue, and the reviews on here helped us finalize our decision.   Let me tell you, this place is second to none! From the moment we walked in, we were greeted by friendly hotel and Starbuck staff. (You read that right, Starbucks staff.) There's a Starbucks right in the lobby of the hotel so of course we grabbed a much needed coffee after our long day of traveling.   With a bright, open space, the main foyer is filled with live plants and trees that almost make you feel like you're outside.   We dropped our bags in our suite (that had a separate living room) and headed down to check out the free happy hour! There were a handful of draft beers, a couple wines, and some
Manager Response: Dear Candlerphoto,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review about our hotel and our service. Our cook-to-order breakfast is definitely delicious, and it looks like we exceeded your family expectations. We are looking forward to your return to our hotel. Thank you again for your review!

Summary Heading: Excellent stay at the Embassy Suites in Irvine Orange County
Summary: Really enjoyed my stay at the hotel, staff are very friendly & professional. Room was very clean & lots of room, comfy bed. Room service was excellent, great food & friendly service. Will stay again.  I'd recommend to family and friends.
Manager Response: We appreciation the strong five star recommendation and to both family and friends.  We're so glad you enjoyed the stay and always love hearing about great service form the team.  We hope to see you and the rest of the family on any future trips to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is great. With the price of your room, you also receive complimentary breakfast buffet and Happy Hour well drinks, wine, and beer, each day! And the suites themselves are amazing. I'm telling you, they are bigger and nicer than my studio apartment!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing and what an awesome five star recommendation.  We're so glad you enjoyed our suites and all the free amenities only found at Embassy Suites Hotels.  Come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is my second stay at this location and it's been overall good.  Review is based on the King, 2 room suit... It is clean and spacious, with a very comfortable bed.... Listed below are some observations: - WiFi - it is fairly slow and not reliable; annoying resets during use -  Housekeeping- great, and very attentive -  Manager Reception - great, limited selection of wines and beers, with finger food... the bartender as well as the other staff are great... always have a smile -  Front Desk - great, friendly and helpful;  Especially Gabriel ... always willing to help -  Parking - Free parking is limited, but there is a garage but this is normal for most hotels -  Breakfast - Free, hot & cold items, and it is good... definitely can't complain.  Overall, the hotel is a great at
Manager Response: Dear Chris S,  Thank you for your review and your feedback about our Associates. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for letting us know about internet. We are upgrading our WI-FI this month, and I can assure you that we will not have any issues going forward. Thank you again for your feedback! We look forward to your return!

Summary: Outstanding new remodel.   The main siting area on the main floor is something to see.  They just did a complete overhaul and I mean complete, they hit it out of the park on this remodel!My King suite was very clean and bright.  The bathroom had plenty of room with great lighting.  The bed was comfortable and clean. This is one of my favorite stays.
Manager Response: Dear Gorving13,   Thank you for your wonderful review about our hotel. We are so happy to hear you loved our new look! I will hsare your commnets with my TEam. Thank you again and we look forward to your return!

Summary: First Time at this particular location, and was not disappointed at all....Room was very clean and, quiet....Love it....Spacious also...Buffet Breakfast was no disappointment, presentation was very applealing, also you can have eggs done your way...in any event you will not leave hungry...CONS: Only 2 of the 3 elevators were functional which at times can increase your wait times for an elevator at peak times, but no big deal....Airport Shuttle is on a request only basis, which is fine also, airport is about a mile away....I had to meet someone at the airport, during my return back to the hotel, there was shuttle shift change and was advised to take a cab back to the hotel, where they would reimburse me for the cab fare, but not any tips...Works for Me...Would I stay here
Manager Response: Dear Steve-DogerBlue,   Thank you, thank you, thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that your enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Great location and breakfast.  Comfortable rooms with interior hallways, beautiful atrium common in Embassy Suites.A good price for location and services.Note $20/day for parking which is not easily accessible.
Manager Response: Dear Kristin O,  Thank you for your review and your feedback. We are happy to know you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary: I love Embassy Suites in general because of the great value- spacious rooms, great hot breakfast and of course, free happy drinks and snacks! The Irvine location is great for all of those reasons plus exceptional service. Everyone working here is so kind and helpful...you can really tell they care. I would recommend this location over the other close by hotels because of the value. If you're flying out of John Wayne, they also provide an airport shuttle.
Manager Response: Dear wanderlust260, Thank you for your wonderful review about our property and our team! We are thrilled to know that we exceeded your expectations! Thank you for allowing us to make your trip enjoyable! It looks like you had the time to relax  during our Managers reception and try our cook-to-order breakfast.  Thank you! We look forward to your return!

Summary: We absolutely loved our stay at Embassey Suites! Dorothy was a true gem during the evening reception!!! Free food and drinks!!! Wonderful breakfast as well!Can’t wait to come back! Perfect for place to stay with small children!
Manager Response: Dear dapraykng, Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with ya. We look forward to your return !

Summary: I stay at the Embassy OC Airport every couple of months, usually for 10 days or more at a time.  The Embassy team works hard to make this "my home away from home".  A special "shout out" to the lounge team (Patty, Ancension, Lino, Ricardo, Louis).  I really enjoy hanging out with them.  So friendly and gracious.  You can tell they really enjoy working together.  The hotel rooms are quiet, and the area/location is pretty low-key, which I also like.  Definitely recommend this property.
Manager Response: Dear DuaneS238, Thank you for choosing us for your “home away from home” . We are so excited that you’re always coming to stay with us, and our associates make you feel comfortable and welcome! I will make sure to share your comments about them with all of my team. Thank you for recognizing them!  We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: The hotel has been recently renovated and was gorgeous; but, the staff's friendliness is what got the 5 star rating from me.  We were checked-in quickly, and with huge smiles from the staff.  A staff member did not just hand me a map and point to where the elevators were, they led me to them, personally, without asking.  My kids were with me, and they brought them cookies and milk in the evening, without being asked, so they could settle into their beds with full tummies, Fabulous touch!
Manager Response: Dear Daredes,  Thank you for your wonderful review about our Team and our hotel. We are thrilled to hear that we have exceeded your expectation, and your children enjoyed our fresh baked cookies and milk. We hope to see you and your family again in the near future!

Summary: Mathew from the front desk had an amazing service and helped us very well and we enjoyed our stay at embassy suites also lino and Eddie help us very well at the bar and happily enjoyed our drink it was an amazing stay thank you embassy keep the same service
Manager Response: Dear godzillarules,  Thank you so much for your kind review, and for praising our Associates. We are very proud of Mathew, Lino and Eddie. They are our Super Stars!. I will share your comments about them with everyone at the hotel. We are thrilled to hear that we exceeded your expectations!  We look forward to your return tour property!

Summary Heading: Rooms in depsrate need of renovation
Summary: Very Friendly and prompt staff. But rooms are WAY TOO Small for family.  2 beds advertised Queen could not have been.  Stains all over carpet and Sofa sleeper.  No clock on the room, no bathroom fan. desperately needs room renovations.
Manager Response: Dear wk789r,  Thank you for praising our Associates. Please accept my sincere apologies for not exceeding your expectations. All of our suites either comes with a one king or two queen beds. We would like to "Make it Right" for you. Please contact me directly at 949-553-8332. Thank you and I look forward to hearing from you. Sincerely,

Summary: This hotel has everything you need for a family stay.  Family of 4, twin boys got the comfy couch bed.  Mom and dad got the king in the bedroom.  Convenient Ice machine on every floor.  Happy hour is great.  Breakfast is fantastic.  And the onsite Starbucks is the cherry on top.  Shout out to an amazing employee - Amir.  All of the staff were great.  Attentive and so quick to respond.  But Amir was the first person we saw when we pulled up.  He helped with our luggage, offered tips, including the hotel van, and was charming and overall the provided the kind of greeting and first impression any business wants to provide to its clients.  Hold on to him, Embassy Suites!
Manager Response: Dear Simchok,  Thank you for your great review of our hotel and Amir! It looks like you truly enjoyed all of the amenities we have to offer. Our cook-to-order breakfast is the best way to start your day. Amir is our Super Star, and we are very proud of him. I am not surprise that he was very attentive and curious. Thank you for recognizing him! We look forward to seeing again at our hotel.

Summary: Great location and plenty of parking spaces. Quiet, clean and spacious room. Enjoyed the free breakfast buffet and evening reception. Service was good. Will definitely stay there again if we return to the area.
Manager Response: Dear agnesl2018,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are thrilled to hear we exceeded your expectations. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Great stay - again at Embassy Suites, Airport, Irvine
Summary: I stay at this Embassy Suites often and have done so for years and they always meet or exceed my expectations. They have spent a tremendous amount to modernize the hotel from top to bottom, from the pool, exercise and laundry areas to the restaurant, lobby and atrium areas. They even added a Starbucks! I strongly recommend this hotel if you are staying in the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Dear Michael L,  Thank you for your Loyalty, and thank you for your wonderful comments about our hotel and our services. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our amenities. Our Team takes pride in their daily tasks, and they will be happy to know that you recognized their hard work and dedications. I will make sure to celebrate their accomplishemnts! We look forward to your return!

Summary: The front desk staff performed a pleasant checkin despite being slammed. The room was clean and the bed was extremely comfortable. Two perks: nightly happy hour that had free/unlimited nachos and drinks(alcoholic and non-alcoholic) AND the complimentary DELUXE breakfast.  It had made to order omelettes as well as scrambled eggs, potatoes, pancakes, fruit, and the other cereals/breads/juices/coffee/oatmeal etc. This location also has a saltwater pool, fitness center and Starbucks. The complimentary shuttle services a 3mile radius as well as the airport. Shuttle driver Ameer  is the best staff member. Made for a great weekend
Manager Response: Dear Enna J,   Thank you for your wonderful comments! We love to hear that we exceeded your expectations. Our cook-to-order complimentary breakfast is the bets way to start your day! Ameer is our Superstar, ad he loves helping our guests. I will share your comments with him, and we will celebrate his accomplishments! We do look forward to your return to our hotel soon. Thank you!

Summary: Nice Hotel located near the airport. Busy site. Wish they had a closed room business center. Check in stay needs to find a way to great arriving guest event when their busy with 3 balls in the air. Basic service
Manager Response: Dear brandonj276,  Thank you for your review. Please accept my sincere apologies for not exceeding your expectations. I would love to speak with you directly to find what can we do better to improve our arrival process. Please contact me at 949-553-8332 at your earliest convenience. I look forward to your call.  Sincerely,

Summary: First of all this was not a leisure stay.  Our home was getting sprayed,so my family and I had to be out for one day due to the chemicals.    What a nightmare!!!!!!!! But when Dorthoy at the front desk checked me in she was extremely pleasant and  made me feel special, Emily was outstanding , and Daniel he helped me out with my Hilton Honors he went over and beyond!!!!!!!   Each one of them deserve to be recognized for there interpersonal skills and exceptional customer service!    Keep up the good work. Thank you sincerely Sandy
Manager Response: Dear  juniorlious,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review. We are very proud of Dorothy, Emily and Daniel! They are our Superstars for sure! We are very lucky to have them on our Team! We are thrilled to know that we were able to make you feel at home at our hotel. I will share your comments with all of them. We hope you will get the chance to come visit us again!

Summary: When I fly to Irvine, I always stay at the Embassy Suites hotel. The staff is great and the rooms are spacious and clean.  As a Hilton honors diamond member, they acknowledged my tier and upgraded me to the 10th floor (top floor).   The only thing that I didn’t care for was the food selection during the happy hour (5-7pm).nachos and cheese every night, not very creative.. there is a supplement. 9’ night wraps, another night fruit.  I have had better at other Embassy locations. But overall, the location is convenient to the airport and one of the nicer Embassy Hotels that I have stayed.
Manager Response: Dear Dave W,  Thank you for being Diamond Hilton Honors Member and thank you for your Loyalty! We appreciate it very much your good comments about out property and our Team. Please know that we will be changing our menu for our complimentary Managers Reception going forward to elevate our Guests experience. We look forward to your return and your future feedback!

Summary: Excellent Accomodations, Hotel was clean and service from the staff was Excellent, Very helpful and professional. Location is close to the airport and convinient to major roads. You have to pay for parking at a reduce rate
Manager Response: Dear 551nelsonm,   Thank you so much for your great review about our hotel and our Team. I am thrilled to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations during your visit. Our Team is the best in the Market and I am very proud of them! Thank you and we look forward to your return!

Summary: Stayed at this Embassy Suites in July 2018 for business.  It is one of the nicer Embassy Suites I’ve seen for sure.  The large and open building design is quite unique.  The breakfast in the morning was very solid.  Would definitely stay here again if back in town.
Manager Response: Dear Matthew M, Thank you for your wonderful review about our hotel. Our cook-to-order break is the way to start your day with, and we are  happy to hear that you liked it. We look forward to your return!

Summary: This hotel is wonderful the hotel is beautiful staff very nice and rooms were gorgeous, spacious, and super clean. Only issue was the parking garage was a little far and no ramp so when taking luggage it was cumbersome with no valet options. Otherwise our stay was wonderful once inside of the room
Manager Response: Dear Renee R,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are thrilled to hear that you had a good time while visitin us. Thank you for being our guest! We look forward to your return!

Summary: Beautiful hotel,good breakfast...however there were a few groups of sports teams. The parents of a group of these out of control children thought it was okay for them to run the hallways most of the night. The cake topper was a boom box outside in the hallway blasting for a few minutes...according to one of the parents...the kids were having fun. Going away from this getaway tired and perplexed  for the way some parents seem to have no control over their kids. In the breakfast buffet line another Mother thought it was cute that her children were out running the hallways at all hours.  Unbelievable!! I had children and travel with my grandkids, there is no way that this is going to ever be a fun activity! Next time will ask if a sporting group is going to be there, will stay
Manager Response: Dear krazykizzy123,   We are very disappointed to hear that we did not exceed your expectations. I would like to speak with you in person. Please call me at your earliest opportunity at 949-553-83323.  Thank you,

Summary: Had a business meeting at this facility and was very surprised.  Arrived late and was very surprised with the professionalism at that late hour.  My room was on the first floor, which was a concern, but when I entered, was amazed.  The layout has the bedroom on outside, so sound was never an issue.  Room was very comfortable and bathroom was perfect.  After the meeting, I chose to stay another night and enjoyed the bar and resturant.  Overall a great facility and location.  Further, the shuttle was also very convenient too.
Manager Response: Dear  Keith G, Thank you so much for your kind review of our property and our Team. We take a pride in our hotel, and we are thrilled to hear that we exceeded your expectations. It look like you also got a chance to try our restaurant Vibrante. Our chiefs love creating unique dishes, and our crafted the drinks are the best! We look forwad to your return!

Summary: Enjoyed my stay here. Room was clean, bed was very comfortable, and surprisingly quiet given location. Typical suite configuration with two rooms. Manager's reception is always a nice end to a long day. Snacks and beverages.
Manager Response: Dear Steamboat_Spgsr,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We trulkly appreciate you letting us know that everything went well with your stay with us. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: Free drinks and snacks every night for two hours, professional and friendly staff, fantastic room lay out with completely separate living area!  Clean, but some furniture is worn, refrig. And microwave, water bottles at check in.
Manager Response: Dear Mara W,  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our managers reception in the evening. It sure is a great way to end your busy work day. Thank you and we look forward to welcome you back to your hotel.

Summary: CLEAN which is most important to me. Hotel was clean in every area. Grandsons enjoyed the indoor pool . The cooked to order full breakfast was well worth staying there! Omelets in any mixture of ingredients was superb. I ordered eggs sunny side up but the rest of the family enjoyed custom omelets ANything you could desire for breakfast was available, cereal, oatmeal, fruit, crispy bacon, sausage, bagels, toast, potatoes..... The breakfast included in room rate made the say super worth it along with the cleanliness, Oh, they also had afternoon happy hour with snacks ( tortilla chips n cheese, chex mix , animal crackers and complimentary liquor)
Manager Response: Dear Jo S,   Thank you for your wonderful comments about hotel. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed our cook-to-order breakfast, and our managers reception in the evening.  We look forward to your return!

Summary: Stayed there twice this was our second time both times were because we attended a concert at five point which isn’t too far away. First stay wasn’t that great only because they put us in a room that the bathtub had dirty towels with hair on them I called service desk housekeeping came up went in there wiped down the tub but left the dirty towel with hair on it in the same spot other then that breakfast is super yummy I highly suggest getting the made to order omelet for your best buck in complimentary breakfast. Oh yeah second time we stayed there got out of the jacuzzi and my bathing suit smelled like raunchy smelly feet 🤮 don’t know why but it did other then that everything else was nice
Manager Response: Dear  sld35,   Please accept our sincere apologies for not meeting your expectations. Please be assure that we will address your concerns with our Team. We are very sorry for not being able to deliver an exceptional service. If there is anything I can do for you, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Thank you and we look forward to your next visit with us.

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful.  The free evening happy hour and hot breakfast buffet with made to order omelets  is a great value add with your stay!  The shuttle will take you anywhere within a few miles, so convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you so much for your wonderful comments. We are thrilled to hear that you had a good time at our hotel. We look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Weekend stay on my own. Staff was very polite. Room was clean and no issues. Happy hour was good. I was in and out a lot, so I didn’t spend a lot of time at the hotel. Met my expectations and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear TheTravelingMan70,  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your comments. We look forward to your return!

Summary: Clean rooms and great staff.   Dorthy was super friendly.  The breakfast and snack hour is good the team players.  Great for a team event.   Close to beach and parks and many resturant’s.     Will stay here again!!!
Manager Response: Dear coj15penn,   We are so happy to hear you had a great time at our hotel! Thank you for praising our Associate-Dorothy. We are very proud of her, and we look forward to your return!   Thank you!

Summary: I have been looking for a quiet place to stay when I visit OC. My own home is in the Colorado mountains so I am not not use to traffic noise. I have stayed in a couple of hotels in OC but all were noisy. I could finally sleep here. Room super quiet. Staff, great. Very clean room.
Manager Response: Dear ggeric717869,  Thank you for your wonderful review about our hotel and our Team! We are so happy to hear we exceeded your expectations, and you chose us as your favorite destinations. Thank you and we look forward to seeing you!

Summary: Great place to stay for any occasion, nice spacious clean lobby. One of the best free breakfasts I have ever had, much better than just continental. Clean, spacious rooms. Friendly staff. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear afergster,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback about your experience at our Embassy Suites. We are very pleased that you had a such great stay with us, starting with our famous breakfast and our amazing Associates! We look forwad to your return!

Summary Heading: Clean, convenient hotel with good free breakfast
Summary: We stayed at Embassy when visiting UC Irvine. The location is convenient, room is clean, and their free breakfast is awesome (I like omelettes). My only gripe is their parking fee of $20 (minus one star). Not too expensive compared to other hotels in metro but still, this is Irvine. I'd probably stay here again, for the omelettes :-)
Manager Response: Dear Satori_Is,  Thank you for your wonderful review. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Our cook-to-order breakfast is sure the best in the area! We look forward to your return!

Summary: We were here for our wedding, so we ended up with 20 rooms for our guests. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. Everyone had a wonderful time! They even surprised my groom and I with champagne and chocolate covered strawberries! The only thing I didn't like is that the pool is indoors.
Manager Response: Dear sjvcwc2018,  Congratulations to both of your on your Marriage! Our best wishes and many happy years together! Thank you for choosing our hotel to host your special occasion! We are thrilled to hear that all of your guests enjoyed their stay with us! Thank you! I would like to send you a gift certificate to come back to see us next year. Please contact me at 949-553-8332.  Thank you and we look forward to your return!

Summary: We stayed at this Embassy Suites recently for two nights.  We arrived about an hour earlier than the 3:00 check in time.  Room was not ready, although they said it would be in about 30 minutes.  We walked to the Mexican restaurant nearby to grab a quick appetizer and drink.  Room still wasn't ready an hour later; it took close to 2 hours, and some constant checking in with the desk (and constant different answers).  Being a lifetime Hilton Diamond, rooms are typically available prior to standard check in.  I realize there aren't always rooms available, but they should be at least by check in time, or provide you with a better estimate of when they will be.  There was unusually warm weather in the LA area while we were there so the first thing we did was try to get the air
Manager Response: Dear KelflyOh,   Thank you for your feedback. Please accept my sincere apologies that we failed to deliver the a great stay you should have during your recent trip. We would love the opportunity to regain your confidence. Please reach out to me directly. I can be reached at 949-553-8332. I look forward to speaking with you.

Summary: Stayed at EB with my 13 yr old daughter and 15 yr old son on our way to Catalina from San Diego. Easy access location, wonderful suite, great staff and of course the usual wonderful evening reception and great breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear SunsetCliffs92106,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us, and everything was perfect!  We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: Summer weekend getaway near Newport Beach and Huntington Beach
Summary: Fantastic deal!  Hotel staff was very helpful and friendly.  I went for a family getaway, and took a king bedroom suite for 3 nights just recently.  First off, the location is FANTASTIC, quiet, so easy to get on and off major highways and roads, easy to get to Huntington beach using back roads.  We loved the morning breakfast with omelet service all included with the stay.  Also evening happy hour includes snacks beer and wine also included.  What a value.  Rooms are very nice.  I would come back for sure!
Manager Response: Dear muleen,   We are happy to hear that you got the chance to enjoy our morning cook to order breakfast and our evening reception. Our hotel is for sure located in the best location in Orange County. Just a few minutes away from beautiful Orange County beaches, and all of the amazing shopping malls. Thank you for your wodnmeful review!

Summary: The customer service was excellent. My rooms were spacious, and very clean. Bathroom was nice, and clean. My bedding was excellent. The host bar was excellent, and the cook to order breakfast was very nice. Lots of food choices. I highly recommend this hotel if you are looking for an outstanding value, and great rooms. I will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Robert S,  We are so thrilled to know we exceeded your expectations! Thank you for your wonderful review! We look forward to your return!

Summary: Pleasantly surprised by the nice rooms, large and updated. Very happy with the service of this hotel - friendly and very helpful. One employee stood out in particular Dorothy at the front desk. There was an uncontrollable screaming baby behind us at check in. Nothing against the screaming baby or the mom, we have all been there before. After several minutes and no let up in site. Dorthy asked the mom if she was checking out and she would be happy to help her if she just wanted to leave her room number and she would take care of it. Problem solved. She did it in such a friendly helpful way. I appreciated it so much being a mom myself. They have a shuttle that takes you to and from the airport as well as to the shopping center. Like having the Starbucks inside the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Elaine925,  Thank you for your review and for recognizing our Associate-Dorothy!. We are so lucky to have Dorothy on our Team! She is amazing, and we are so proud of her! We are excited to know that you enjoye your stay with us. Please come back to see us again!

Summary: I have not stayed at an Embassy Suites for over 10 years as I had the impression they were kind of dated.  I know most have the atrium design which seems very 80s.  But I'm a Hilton gold member so decided it was worth checking out this brand on a recent trip to Irvine.  Very nice surprise.  The room was updated and stylish.  I still don't like the atrium but they can't really change that without building a new hotel.  Nice to get free drinks in the afternoon.  Based on this experience I'll start trying other Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: Dear John S,  Welcome back to Embassy Suites and thank you for being a valuable Gold Hilton Member! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to se you again in the near future!

Summary Heading: One of the better Embassy Suites
Summary: If you've been to a few of these, you know that they range from VERY old to brand new.  This one isn't brand new, but it is in very good shape.  The room we got (corner) was terrific.  The buffet line was well organized and moved very quickly compared to some of the others we have been to.  Parking is easy and plentiful in their garage.  It's worth mentioning that the staff on the front desk were very friendly and efficient.  We didn't use the shuttle, but several people told us it was easy and convenient, going back and forth to the airport every half hour.
Manager Response: Dear Dallas-SM,  Thank you for your great review about our property and the Team! We are so excited to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope to see you again at our beautiful hotel.

Summary: This property was recently remodeled and not one detail went unnoticed. From the front desk area to dining it all looks magnificent. The guest rooms are spacious and provide just the right amount of touch and comfort to make it your home away from home. The staff is very friendly and go the extra mile to provide the best hospitality. The food is always delicious. The Starbucks added a nice and convenient bonus to this hotel. I thoroughly enjoy this property as it’s centrally located and make it my top choice for hotel when I’m visiting the area.
Manager Response: Dear EmiliaTerry,   Thank you so much for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! It looks like you got he chance to experience our Vibrante restaurant and enjoyed our Starbucks. We take pride in our property and we excited to know we were able to exceed your expectations! We look forward to your return!

Summary: I sayed  My stay was very pleasant.I  highly recommend this hotel.Very nice breakfast and Manager reception..Rooms very clean and always very Welcome!! All the stuff were very nice and proffesional.Thank you
Manager Response: Dear alexortiz2018,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review about our hotel and our Team! We are thrilled to hear that we exceed your expectations! Thank you for being our guest! We look forward to your return!

Summary: Our CFIRE group comprising of about 50 people had a 3 day training conference at the hotel. Jasmine Stewart Sr Sales Manager helped us in fixing the event and the arrangement. We had a great professional and most courteous experience. All the meeting room arrangements, and dinner banquet went extremely well. The hotel staff were excellent and provided us a friendly service. Our entire group felt happy about the hotel and facilities offered. The location is excellent, being nearby to airport, and convinient to other amenities of the Orange county.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,   Thank you so much for your kind review about your stay. I will let Jasmine know how much you enjoyed working with her, and that everyone else at the hotel made you feel welcome! Our Team will be happy to know we have exceeded your expectations. We hope to see you in the very near future again!  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Awful Room #320 - but my fault for booking this hotel
Summary: My perspective is that of a business traveler and my preferences when traveling on business.  I travel about 4-6 nights a month and typically stay at a competing chain. I had just stayed at an Embassy Suites Chicago and thought I would try the same chain in Irvine.  I booked thru a corporate travel site and should have read the fine print.    I look for certain comforts when traveling (1) king size bed (2) productive work station (3) updated bathroom (4) proximity to my office destination (5) Microwave/Refrigerator.  This is a studio room with a queen size bed with a work station that blocks the door and has a shower tub from the 1970's.  The work station has one outlet - one would need a power strip if trying to charge more than one electronic device.  By the way, the closet is
Manager Response: Dear TpaTraveler,  Thank you for your feedback. Our hotel was one of the original designs for Embassy Suites Hotel Worldwide. Our guests have the opportunity to book one of our Studio Rooms. These rooms are not the suites, and they are clearly identified with all of the features and amenities during time of the booking. We always encourage our guests to review and confirm their choice upon completing their reservations. We hope you will give us another opportunity to host your stay while visiting Irvine.  Thank you,

Summary: Second time staying at the Embassy Suites in Irvine, California. Starting with the front desk, service is excellent throughout the hotel and restaurant. The complimentary cocktail hour is daily from 5:30 to 7:30. Besides the cocktails, they serve some finger food. The suites are very roomy and comfortable. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear  978barbarad180,  Thank you for your amazing review about our Team and our property! We are happy to hear that you chose to stay with us again during your visit to Irvine. Embassy Suites is all about making our guests happy, and we thrilled to know we were able to deliver an exceptional service during your stay with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary Heading: A 5 star+ property. Everything was done well.
Summary: A mist excellent stay! I was there with a business group of about 75 all total. Our entire group had an excellent stay. Our rooms were well taken care. The food was excellent. The breakfast buffet could not  have been better. The front desk staff was most gracious, kind, accommodating and always helpful!! Highly recommend this property for business or leisure stay!!
Manager Response: Dear heisliberty,  Thank you so much for your review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. I will share your comments with our Team, they will be happy to know we exceeded your expectations! We look forward to your future visit with us!

Summary Heading: Very friendly staff, and clean comfortable rooms
Summary: Very friendly staff, and clean comfortable rooms and common areas. I appreciate the cook to order breakfast and the POG on the drink bar, as well as the Manager's happy hour each night at 5:30. There is a Starbucks in the lobby too. Parking is a bit steep at $20 a day and is controlled by the room key. Definitely a great place to stay when in town.
Manager Response: Dear  beachbumjk,  Thank you for visiting us. We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Our delicious complimentary cook to order breakfast definitely is the right way to start your day, and ending your busy day with a Manager's reception is a bonus! I will share your comments with our team. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: It was a good place to stay, complementary breakfast was good, had a cook to specialize omelets, sausages were a little grainy, pastries were hard and dry, but everything else was in abundance and always fresh.
Manager Response: Dear tufftommy,  We are happy to here your stay was enjoyable. Thank you for your comments about breakfast. I will share your feedback with our Team. We take pride in our property and our amenities, and we will look in to your concerns. Thank you and we look fowrad to your future stay with us.

Summary Heading: Good business hotel but avoid weekends
Summary: Traditional Embassy location - atrium, comfortable rooms and beds- what you would expect for the franchise.  This location is close to sports fields in irvine so we found this location filled with softball teams which made for a noisy, unruly crew Saturday night- more like summer camp than a business hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jon C,  Thank you for your review and your feedback. We appreciate you taken the time to write us about your stay. We truly apologize for the noise inconvenience during your stay. If there is anything I can do please do not hesitate to contact me directly. thank you and we look forward to your return.

Summary: Everything from our stay was above and beyond! The hotel is newly remodeled and absolutely beautiful. It has a full service Starbucks and an excellent restaurant and bar. We had an early dinner, Sergio was very kind and helpful. He was very attentive and polite. Food was amazing. I had fish tacos, my daughter had a grilled cheese with fries. We also had queso and street corn. Holy cow was it fabulous. The GM was also out and came and checked on us. The room was very well kept and up to date. Comfy beds and pillows. Hotel is easy to find and I definitely feel safe traveling alone with my daughter here. Great customer service which seems to be lacking most places these days.  Will definitely be coming back!
Manager Response: Dear Kristen N,  Thank you for allowing us to host your stay with us! We truly appreciate your wonderful comments about Sergio and our Vibrante restaurant. Our menu has something for everyone. We are so happy to know you had a great time with your daughter! We look forward to our return!

Summary: I travel and am loyal Hilton I like Embassy suites especially when traveling non business due to the complimentary  breakfast and happy hour. This hotel has been renovated nice..clean. the bathroom mirror is amazing! The ac vent is in the main living room so the bathroom is warm unless you crank it down so low you freeze out anyone in living room. There was some sort of tournament near by bc there were a zillion kids running around the hotel all weekend. The pool was unusable bc of amount of kids. We tried to get Starbucks Saturday at 515p but it was already closed even though hotel signage said 7p. Very disappointing!!!!  Lastly the breakfast was ok..typical embassy fare lines so long too long to wait for made to order omelet. Probably due to tournament..but the STRANGEST thing
Manager Response: Dear Branchtraveler,   Thank you for your feedback. We value your comments, and we appreciate you letting us know about your stay. Please accept our sincere apologies for not making your stay perfect. All of our guests are very important to us, and we do understand your frustration with waiting in the lines. We do our best on expediting cook to order omelet. As you probably know they are delicious and we want to make sure all of our guests gets them the way they want them. We are sorry you had to wait. If there is anything I can do for you, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Thank you and we look forward to your return!

Summary: i stayed in this hotel back in 2016 and stayed again this month. The rooms are nice, close to John Wayne Airport, staff is very helpful and friendly, you get a free breakfast with stay and even a cocktail hour. Minutes away from Newport Beach(about 6 miles)  would stay here again if i am in the area
Manager Response: Dear rgellis12018, Thank you for your loyalty and your comments. We are happy to hear your enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to your return!

Summary: We stay at this hotel on every visit to Irvine, everyone trips us wonderfully polite’ rooms are very clean and hotel is maintained at a high level’ would recommend to every traveler coming to Irvine. The rooms are spacious, quiet and good views of the mountains.
Manager Response: Dear rjgbowl,   We are so happy to hear about your great stay with us! Thank you for your wonderful comments about our Team, and the facility. The views from our suites are spectacular! You can see the mountains and watch the planes taken off, Its quite the experience. I am happy to hear you were able to do this. We look forward to your return. If there is anything I can do for your please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Thank you again!

Summary Heading: You go stay in that room
Summary: You go stay in that room and rate yourself and enjoy that carpet stain as your first impression when you enter the room.  Felt like I had to keep my shoes on the entire stay.  Disgraceful to your Hilton brand
Manager Response: Dear Steve L,  Thank you for your feedback. Please contact me directly at 949-553-8332, as I would like to speak with you in person. I look forward to hearing from you.

Summary: The staff were very inefficient. We had to go three times to activate the door cards and they kept charging us for parking but we did not have car. They said they corrected the fees and we got again the parking fees in our final bill.
Manager Response: Dear jkhatu732194,  Thank you for taking the time to share feedback on your recent stay with us. We’re very sorry to hear you experienced an undesirable level of customer service and assure you we have addressed the problems you mentioned with our team to correct the issues. We appreciate you alerting us to this and hope you will give us the opportunity to make it right if you return to our area in the future.

Summary: I drove myself to the hotel from the airport, which took about 10 mins.  Parking at the hotel was a $20/day fee.  Check in was very easy and I was in my room within 15 mins.  The rooms are overall very quiet and I did not hear any plane noise.  The rooms are nice and the bed was comfortable.  The desk clerks were very helpful when I had questions.  Breakfast was a little crowded because of all the people, but they did have a good selection.  Overall, I had a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear agechick,  Thank you for your feedback. We appreciate the wonderful comments about our hotel and the team. We strive to proved an excellent service to our guests. We look forward to you return!

Summary Heading: Hubby new job at loan depot
Summary: It's hard to believe this hotel is right across from the airport I never heard a plane go by while Inside the Hotel my first night I thought I was dreaming about an earthquake the next day I heard there was an earthquake all in all nothing happened thank God the shuttle guy Mike was wonderful very nice conversations very enjoyable cruise around the neighborhood keep him he is wonderful the pool was cool all to myself the spa was perfect.....huge breakfasts. Dorothy at registration made sure i was taken care of since 1st day. My bed was perfect....jo torres.
Manager Response: Dear olayjose,  We love Loan Depot Team! Thank you for coming to visit us! We are so happy to hear that everything was great during your stay! I will make sure to share your wonderful feedback about Mike and Dorothy with all of my team! We look forward to seeing in the near future!  Thank you again!

Summary: We were able to attain a special upgrade on the Internet through the Hilton Honors web site, and were extremely surprised at the quality of the room.  The entire experience made a weary traveler sleep well.
Manager Response: Dear Gary P,   Thank you for being Hilton Honors Member. We truly appreciate your feedback about our hotel and the services. We look forward to your next visit!  Thank you!

Summary: I was staying here for 3 days while I was in town for my birthday!  I had plans go to Universal Studios as part of the trip  The check in was easy and the room was great.  I love the addition of the Starbucks.  I mentioned to one of the front desk staff that I was going to Universal, and she was nice enough to give me her souvenir popcorn container to use while I was at the park.  It was a very kind gesture.  She even had a cupcake placed in my room while I was away.  I am sorry to say that I forgot this very nice ladies name.  I will be in Orange County again in August and I will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Adam D,  Happy Belated Birthday! We are so happy to hear that our Team took good care of you! I hope you like your cupcake! The lady who went above and beyond to make your stay memorable name is Jibek. We are very proud to have her on our Team! I will make sure to let her know how much you enjoyed your stay with us!  We look forward to seeing you soon! Thank you!

Summary: We are a couple and we have to say this is an excellent place to stay in. complementarity breakfast and happy hour are the best. Very clean and spacious rooms. We always feel if we were at home when we get to Embassy Irvine. We will always remember a friendly and helpful guy called Camilo. He made sure our stay was even better than ever. He is a superstar. My wife and i are very thankful cuz of his hospitality. If we get back to Orange county, we will definitely stay at this marvellous hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Dereklovelove,  Thank you for your wonderful review! Our goal is to make sure make every guest feel welcome! I am thrilled to hear that we were able to deliver our promise! I will share your good comments about Camillo with the rest of our Team! We look forward to your next visit with us!  Thank you!

Summary Heading: Consistent High Quality and Staff Professionalism
Summary: I am an Executive that for the last year have been frequently working in Irvine, California. I always stay at the Embassy Suites in view of their consistent service Quality. I have recently experienced outstanding attention in three occasions in which I needed sudden changes in my schedule. Dorothy was the professional in charge of dealing with my urgent requests. She went many extra miles to accommodate my needs in a highly professional, polite and efficient  way. She definitely represents in genuine and practical terms Hilton's top level Quality Vision.Congratulations!!
Manager Response: Dear LF046,  Wow! Thank you for your comments about Dorothy! She is definitely our Superstar, and we are very proud of her. We truly appreciate your Loyalty, and thank you for allowing us to be of service to you! Upon your next visit, please stop by and ask for me I would love to meet you and thank you! We will see you soon! Thank you!

Summary Heading: Close to the Airport with free breakfast and happy hour snacks
Summary: Even though we had ordered a room months ago we ended up on the 3rd floor in room 329 which overlooked the entrance way and streets. Very clean and great staff all around. It has an indoor pool and hot tub and fitness center. You get the usual great Embassy breakfast buffet of made to order omelets, sausage, bacon, and scrambled eggs, pancakes, oatmeal, cereals, etc. Happy Hour snacks were usually tortilla chips and canned cheese, snack mix, and veggies. with free drinks. You do get a free newspaper everyday. For some reason our a/c and heating unit made a lot of noise all night long. Seems to cater to school athletes and conference goers. Really close to the airport but has no noise at all from airplanes. About 10-15 miles away from Disneyland and Knotts Berry Farm. Great size
Manager Response: Dear Buzzsaw22,  Thank you for staying with us and for your wonderful review! We appreciate you letting us know about noise from a/c unit. Our Engineering team was informed-thank you! We strive to provide an excellent service, and to make our guests feel at "home" away from their home. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay. Thank you for being our guests, and we hope to see you soon again!

Summary: Perfect place to spend a business trip. Huge rooms with living room and work space. Bedroom is separate so you get the opportunity to escape from work and relax in comfy bed with a nice city view. Breakfast has many options including cooked to order omelettes and daily specials. Managers reception with free well drinks is always a plus!
Manager Response: Dear beachmedic93,   Wow! Thank you for your wonderful review! We are so happy to hear that our suites, breakfast and the ambiance of our hotel exceeded your expectations! Irvine City view from our suites is remarkable! During the evening you can see gorgeous sunsets, and it looks like you were able to experience this. Thank you for staying with us! We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary Heading: Lovely hotel and Dorothy at the front desk is AMAZING!!!!!!!!!
Summary: My wife and I recently decided to escape our home in Arizona and take a trip out to sunny So Cal to see some sites!  We could not have been more pleased with this hotel and its location.  The facilities were extremely clean and the hotel is very centrally located to just about anything you can think of...shopping, entertainment, FOOD!!  I do have to say though, we were not at all prepared for the CRAZY traffic here and, most especially, we were taken back a bit by the "toll roads" as this was a new experience for us.  I am the primary driver and, being a typical man, I did not want to fess up to the fact that I was feeling very confused and a little overwhelmed about how to navigate these pesky toll roads (especially because we were in a rental car), however, the absolutely
Manager Response: Dear AlansNana,   Thank you for your wonderful review! It looks like you had an amazing vacation! We are so happy to hear that Dorothy helped you to make great memories here in Irvine. She is a Superstar, and we are very proud of her! We cannot wait to welcome you and your family back to our hotel! Please say hello to your wife from all of us! I will share your comments with Dorothy. Thank you again! We will see you soon!

Summary: My husband and I come here to stay instead of somewhere closer to Disneyland. It’s an easy Uber ride. They always have great suggestions for different food options and a shuttle to take you to them.  They have managers happy hour is a great time to meet new people and they also have a delicious made to order breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Julie K,  Thank you for choosing our hotel! Indeed, we are only a short ride away from Disneyland, and we are so happy to ear you decided to spend time with us! It's always nice to start your day with a fresh cook to order breakfast, and later in the evening to enjoy our managers reception. We are happy to hear you enjoyed both! Thank you for being our guests! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: This was a great experience for a business traveler.  Great amenities for both business and leisure stay.  Complimentary shuttle and helpful friendly staff. Great breakfast and evening reception.   Definitely staying here again
Manager Response: Dear goldd01,  Thank you very much for your review! We are so happy to hear that you have enjoyed your stay with us. I will let my Team know that they made you feel welcome! We look forward to seeing you again!

Summary: This is our favorite local Embassy Suites! We love doing staycation a, and this location never disappoints. Our family loves this location for the awesome customer service, cleanliness, and great food/drinks. The staff here is the best! We felt like family... thank you Amanda!  Gotta love complimentary happy hour! Parents happy... and kids love a good Shirley temple. We brought out our games & made it game night. So fun! Great snacks... chips, cheese sauce, fruit/ veggies, Chex, etc. nice little spread.  They are pros at the little touches...  As Hilton rewards members we got a welcome goody bag with water bottles & a candy bar. Nice touch! There were cute lavender packs at check in, which we put under our pillow to add to great sleep. Also, one night they delivered cookies &
Manager Response: Dear Katherine H,   Wow! Thank you for your wonderful review about our property, amenities and our Team! We are so happy to know that you loved our hotel, and you were able to enjoy Irvine. South Coast Plaza is a great place to shop, and District as well. Who doesn't like shopping and movies, right? Our cook to order breakfast is delicious, and our team always wants you start your day with a great meal! It so nice to hear that our little lavender bags helped you to relax at night. I will make sure to let Amanda know how much you appreciate her. She is the BEST! We look forward to seeing you and your Family soon!

Summary: Dorthy at the Front Desk was in particular VERY kind and VERY helpful.Loved the managers reception, hot tub, and the large atrium. Room was excellent, and the pillows seemed to be of really high end quality.
Manager Response: Dear jamiemertensco,  Dorothy is our Super Star, and we are very proud of her! We are so happy to hear that we were able to make your stay memorable! Thank you for being our guest! We cannot wait to see you again!

Summary: Business travel can sometimes get lonely when traveling alone but Embassy Suites staff make it their mission to treat you like a valued member of their family.  I cannot say enough about my experience here.   I will be back.
Manager Response: Dear Sharon B,   We are so happy to hear that we made you feel welcome! Thank you for being part of our Family! We look forward to your next trip, and we cannot wait to make more great memories with you!

Summary Heading: Central Location with a Couple of Issues
Summary: The overall experience with this hotel was very good. The suites are large and in generally good condition. The garage design means there is no direct access to the hotel and security is poor. The design of the internal atrium means noise can carry into rooms.
Manager Response: Dear TAHovig,   We appreciate your feedback. Our building and parking is very secure. We have 24 hours Security Company patrolling our area, and security and safety of our guests in # 1 priority. Our team is always ready to help you with your luggage, or anything else you might need. Next time when you are in town, I am happy to provide you with a tour of our property. Our room are noise prof, and we have not had any issues with the noise. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: Dorothy was really welcoming and accommodating at check-in. I appreciate the TLC. As with all Embassy Suites Hotels this one has a super nice happy hour and breakfast. I would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear gskip1015,   Thank you for your review, and for recognizing our Dorothy! We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us, and breakfast was good as well! Thank you for letting your friends know to come visits us! We look forward to your next trip!

Summary: So I stayed here in December last year and even wrote a review about my stay and the minor issues I had. There is a response to my review and the Director of sales replied to it with "Dear ShareAloha77, we're so sorry to hear about these inconveniences when it sounds like you had an overall pleasant stay at the hotel. We do hope you shared the AC issue with our team to ensure the unit is fully inspected. We will certainly make sure your next stay is spot on. Thanks for sharing. Best regards, Ken Director of Sales"   So I have stayed at this location before and it was nice, this time around was almost as good. Room was clean, hotel was overall clean, AC was still not working right and it was hot in our room again, breakfast had the usual choices that embassy suites offer. This
