Manager Response: Dear ShareAloha77,   Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay at our property. I would like to speak with you in person regarding your visit. Please contact me directly at 949-553-8332. I look forward to speaking with you.  Thank you,

Summary: I took a group of 30 to the Embassy Suites in Irvine this past week and was blown away. The hotel is absolutely beautiful. The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful.   The complimentary food that they provided for breakfast was so tasty and a great selection. We have different dietary needs which were all met. Did I mention that there was also complimentary afternoon snack and drinks from 4:30-7:30 pm.  The beds were so comfortable and the rooms were spacious and clean. I couldn't have asked for more. The rooms also have a separate sitting area from the bedroom.  The common areas of the hotel we great and the hotel had a Starbucks in the lobby.   The location seemed to be pretty close to everything. I can't wait to go back.  Thanks to Jasmine who was our point person and
Manager Response: Dear Carmen K.,  Thank you so much for your review. We are so  happy to hear that you and your guests enjoyed your stay, the food and our hospitality! We take pride in our property, and our Team is happy to know that we exceeded your expectations! I will share your comments with our Team, and we will celebrate Jasmine for a job well done!  We look forward to seeing you and your Group in the near future!

Summary: Currently staying at the Embassy in Irvine.  The staff is the highlight of the stay they are very polite and helpful.  The room is clean.  The bed is very comfortable.  The water pressure and temperature are not great.  Noise level is fine.  The area is nice, there are a few restaurants with in walking distance and there is a shuttle to take you to those that are a little farther.  The internet speed is good. The pool area is small but clean.  The workout room is also very small.  There is not an area for sitting outdoors and relaxing but I have discovered there is a place about 1/2 block away that will serve that purpose.  The food served at breakfast and happy hour is not good.  The breakfast buffet is not as large as many other Embassys (no french toast) and they ran out of
Manager Response: Dear travelersfromIndy,   Thank you for your feedback. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We hope that you can return to visit us again the near future. I would love to personally show you our outdoor Sol Terrace, where our guests can sit down relax, order food, drinks and enjoy the Southern California weather. We also do have a yoga mats available at the Front Desk that you can use for a little workout outdoors. You can always order your favorite French toast with our Chefs, at the cook to order omelet bar. Our Chefs are happy to make it for you to your liking. If there is anything I can do for you to make your stay more enjoyable in the future, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Thank you for being our Guest!

Summary: Nice hotel really close to John Wayne Airport.  Super friendly staff especially Dorothy and Michelle and the front desk.  I stayed there with my family for 8 days and they made it feel like we never left home.  Thank you so much Dorothy for all your help and professionalism.  You and Michelle are an asset to Embassy Suites.  Keep up the good work!!!
Manager Response: Dear Cman0315,  Thank you so much for your kind words about Michelle and Dorothy! We are so proud of them! We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for being our Guests! We look forward to your next visit!

Summary: Wonderful hotel and would definitely stay here again. The breakfast was amazing and my children and I had a great variety to choose from. The manager's reception was a really nice offering snacks and drinks.
Manager Response: Dear Irish101girl, thank you for sharing and we're very happy that the kids had a great time and enjoyed breakfast.  We appreciate the five star recommendation and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here for conference weekend. Dried food on the floor of room not cleaned up for whole stay, reported it, told I would be given points and stay cerificate as soon as I emailed photos, there was no follow through, I emailed pictures as asked day of check out. Still waiting for response.  In addition, The Louis bartender is rude to say the least from the managers reception when reported, he continued the behavior following night.  I will never stay here again. Customer service is terrible.
Manager Response: Dear Ty.  We're very sorry to hear about this experience and the follow through.  I will speak with our front office team today and ensure that you are contacted.  I appreciate the honest feedback and please know this is not our service standard and your comments will be addressed at our staff meeting for training purposes.  If you would like to continue this conversation please reach me at the hotel any time and I would be very happy to speak with you directly.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Almost everything about this hotel brand is great.  However! the parking fees are ridiculous!  The service and rooms are very nice, but having to pay almost $20.00 per night for parking leaves a bad taste overall.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and our accommodations.  While we do have spacious suites, free breakfast and free drinks that are key pillars of our overall value, parking charges will always vary by location.  Irvine is a pay parking destination and our rates are on the lower end to all other full service hotels in market.  The hotel does not own the parking structure and current rates are listed on all websites.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My 5 stars are due to the value and excellence of the hotel. It is not a 5 star resort but the value - clean rooms, airy lobby, restaurant and bar, free breakfast, and kind staff are great qualities for the business traveller or family on holiday.   The rooms are large and well appointed. The lounge area is very large and functional. A great property.
Manager Response: Dear zkrscasa, thank you for the awesome five star recommendation.  We're glad to hear you fully enjoyed your visit with us and do hope to see you back on any future travel to the area.  Please tell your friends.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed two nights to attend a wedding in Nixon Library. Appreciated the free shuttle service provided.    Breakfast continued later than the specified time. This is convenient to  those who slept over. Thankful for that.
Manager Response: Gleung1688, we're glad our hotel location worked out well for the wedding and sounds like you had a great stay.  Come back and see us again.  There's always a lot going on in the Orange County area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: An asset to the Embassy Suites brand
Summary: First, the shuttle driver was extremely pleasant and cordial picking up my family late in the evening from the Orange County/John Wayne airport, which is a very short drive. Check-in was smooth, and the front desk gave us all the important information about breakfast the next day, our Hilton Honors welcome bag, etc.  Breakfast is very well done and the atrium is a beautiful setting for a meal. Service was quick, and tables were kept clean even during a busy breakfast.  Rooms were in great condition and the usual "stretch" configuration of living room and bedroom separated by the bathroom in the middle.  Location is extremely convenient to the airport. A few restaurants are within walking distance, with more just a short drive down the street.  Highly recommended!
Manager Response: Chip, thank you for the very detailed review.  We're so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with excellent service from the shuttle to our awesome breakfast.  We do hope to see you back to the hotel soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed one night on our way to Mexico. Was amazingly surprised that they gave us an upgrade. Had asked for a higher floor, and upon check in, was given the highest floor (10th) and the presidential suite!!. Two bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, living area, bar area, large circular dining room table, 3 TV's. A very unexpected and pleasant surprise. Thank you. Arrived in time for the last half hour of the managers reception, which was adequate enough to satisfy our appetite. Shuttle service will take you to anywhere within a 3 mile radius which I utilized. The morning breakfast was excellent. Was there at 7:00 am and it was not crowded...no lines. Within half an hour there was more people, but the lines moved fast. The omelette cook was doing several at a time. Shuttle service was busy at
Manager Response: Dear pvlarry, thank you so much for sharing and we're very glad to have had the family the night before your vacation.  Please come back and stay with us again for a weekend getaway or another pre or post vacation stopover.  Warmest regards, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Stayed over President’s Day holiday weekend. It was sold out. Place looked nice. Room was clean. Monday morning breakfast was a disaster. Came down to a chaotic scene. Extremely long line to the omelette counter with only one staff working. Buffet breakfast also with a very long line. Only 2 staff working the dining area. Coffee, drinks and food were slow in being replenished. There were dirty plates on tables everywhere. No where to sit. Guests had to bus their own tables just to have a place to sit. General manager or assistant GM not anywhere in the facility. Dining room Director also not in  the facility. Finally the assistant GM shows up. Several Hilton Hhonors Diamond member guests had to raise concern with the AGM. Marketing employees had to help clear the mess.
Manager Response: Please except our sincerest apologies for staffing Monday morning following Presidents weekend.  Our internal communication short staffed the very busy Monday morning and although we had managers pitch in we do understand it impacted the breakfast experience.  This is certainly not our standard and please know we held a department meeting the following day to ensure this will not happen again.  We appreciate your loyalty and please reach out to me at anytime if you would like to further discuss you stay or how I can personally assist on features visits.  Warmest regards,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: This is an older property.  The room was clean  and well kept although it had a slight musty smell.  Staff was friendly, convenient to the airport with shuttle service.   The AC kept the room cool and the mattress and pillows were comfortable.  Overall great experience.
Manager Response: Dear Wesley, we appreciate your business and glad to hear you had an overall great experience.  Come back and see us again.  Warmest regards,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary Heading: I would return to this facility just to see Dorothy the Front Desk Clerk Again!
Summary: WOW!!  I am not sure where to even begin this review other than to say that EVERYTHING about my experience with this hotel was PHENOMENAL from start-to-finish :0) The accommodations are just down the road from John Wayne Airport...they are clean and inviting...the location is minutes away from just about any restaurant and/or shopping that you may want to visit...but above all else, the staff at this location was absolutely TERRIFIC, with DOROTHY going above and beyond to make certain that my every need was met, and that I had the best trip ever!!  Upon check-in, Dorothy immediately made me feel as if we had known each other forever when she greeted me with her warm smile, and I felt as if I was visiting an old friend at her home, rather than just being a temporary guest at the
Manager Response: Dear kelleynifp551502018,   Thank you so much for your review! We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our hotel. We are very proud to have Dorothy on our Team. She goes above and beyond to recognize our guests. Our guests is our priority, and we are so glad to hear that we were able to make your stay memorable. We look forward to seeing you again in the very next future!

Summary: Close to the airport, but did not hear the planes!  Complimentary shuttle to/from airport plus locations within 3 miles! My 10th floor king suite with view was perfect, remodeled and clean. Two TVs with HBO. Neutrogena toiletries.  Comfortable bed. Free breakfast included toast, fruit, cereal, but there was also yogurt, pastries, hot items and an omelet station and drinks included POG!  Small fitness room had ellipticals, treadmills, a bike and a weight set. Pool was under construction Feb 2018. Meeting room we used had tiered seating, but was cramped (set-up for 5 per row, but should have been 4 to fit comfortably).  Lunch provided by hotel was delicious. I had the caprese sandwich and also the turkey wrap.  Fries were spectacular!  Cons: Wait time for shuttle (runs every half
Manager Response: Dear SDtoSJGirl,   We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us! Thank you for letting us know that you liked cook too order breakfast, our hotel and our services. We look forward to your next stay with us!

Summary: This hotel is close to John Wayne Airport, with two restaurants close.  The property is safe and nestled.  Parking seems limited and the garage cost is $18 per day on top of your rate.  What makes this hotel special is Dorothy the desk clerk.  Thank you for your directions and recommendations.  Also noted is the superior friendliness of the wait staff and house cleaners.  All seem very unified and mission oriented.  The breakfast crew was excellent and friendly.  The omelet maker is excellent and worth the stop.  What does not work for this hotel is the 'other' desk clerks.  Most are male and have an attitude.  Most could not provide good directions, help with issues or even provide basic service (had to wait to check out while the clerk chatted with the Starbucks baristas).
Manager Response: Dear Nels F,  Thank you for your feedback. We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed our clean rooms, breakfast and Dorothy helped you with directions and answered your questions. I am going to be sharing your comments with our Team, to make sure we deliver an excellent service for our guest. We look forward to your return, and we hope you will enjoy our new upgraded pool. If there is anything I can do upon your next return to our hotel, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.  Thank you,

Summary Heading: Great and convenient place to host a business meeting
Summary: With a free airport shuttle, conference rooms just off spacious lobby that serves excellent free breakfast, this is a great choice for a business meeting with attendees flying in from other parts of the country. Very helpful, competent, reliable and attentive staff are a great reassurance that the meeting will work out, even if all is planned over the phone. Malonda Morgan in particular was great to work with.  It's a shame that despite being 1 mile from the airport and right on Main St, there is no good walking path to the airport. There are a good number of eating options within walking distance, though, which was great, and the onsite restaurant was quite nice too.
Manager Response: Dear Monica K,   Thank you for your kind words about our property and Malonda. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Malonda always goes above and beyond to help our guests, she is our Superstar! I will be sharing your comments with our Team and Malonda.  Thank you and we hope to see you again in the near future!

Summary: Great hotel, prompt shuttle service from the airport and the complimentary breakfast was amazing. Conveniently located near the airport but not noisy at all. Room was clean and the bed was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear billgS92611SF, thank you for sharing.  We appreciate the five star recommendation and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good location and close to various location in LA area
Summary: I stayed here for an extended period around 17 days. We were a family of 4 and the room size was not bad. There is a Starbucks in the lobby which the was nice. The lobby was nice and big with good breakfast, however, the breakfast can be improved.   Felt very secure when my kids wanted to go to the lobby for the afternoon snacks.   I think the hotel needs some upgrades and can improve a bit the cleaning service. Would recommend the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Amre, thank you for your recent extended stay and we're very happy to hear you always felt the family was safe which is of huge importance to the hotel.  We greatly appreciate your recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Located about 8 minutes by car from the airport is this Hotel. The rate includes breakfast witch is good, and also a snack from 5:30 till 7 pm witch is only ok. The things that were not good are the following: Phones didn’t work, so we couldn’t call front desk for someone to come and make the sofa into a bed. So we did it ourselves and it was not bad.  They charge for parking and the internet witch was not good either. Will definitely never stay back since there are many other options.
Manager Response: Dear Juan, I do hope you reported the phone so that our team had the opportunity to correct.  We're glad you felt the hotel offered great value and please note all Hilton Honors members booking direct with the hotel (Hilton reservations and website) receive free Wi-Fi.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We love the open beautiful ambience of the Embassy Suites brand.  We also love the over-the-top quality of the breakfast that is included in the stay.  We also love the usual nice pool and hot tub - indoors and nice.  This particular Embassy Suites has their pool and hot tub closed for renovation right now - not sure when it will be done.  But they are willing to shuttle you around the corner to the Wyndham hotel for their pool and hot tub (which is also indoors and very nice)  Very happy with our stay here, as always
Manager Response: Dear Happysheller, thank you for the awesome five star review and we're very happy to hear that our team offered the alternative pool accommodations.  The pool area is scheduled to be back before the end of this month with an incredible re-do including updated HVAC and ventilation.  We're looking forward to re-opening along with the Sol Terrace pool deck.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales .

Summary: We hosted a business meeting here and our attendees stayed at the hotel as well. The overall experience was great - from the booking to the execution of the event! All staff members we interacted with were helpful and pleasant. The staff went out of their way to please one of our vegan attendees and she was absolutely delighted.  Great job to Elizabeth and team!
Manager Response: Dear RaAnn, thank you so much for sharing and Elizabeth in our sales office will be so delighted to hear that the group enjoyed accommodations and our spacious two-room suites.  We definitely hope you have some more business returning to our area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great hotel to reach various locations in all of LA
Summary: I love the Embassy Suites hotels with their covered courtyard. This hotel had a great breakfast omelet service and decent other amenities. The free drinks in the afternoon were a nice touch. The rooms were clean and setup nicely. We had a great stay altogether.
Manager Response: Dear DutchPlatypus, we're so happy to hear you loved our atrium AKA, the largest living room in Irvine.  We are centrally located to everything in Orange County and just an hour from Los Angeles and other Southern California attractions.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay. Love the staff and it is always clean. Top rated breakfast and it’s included with your stay.
Summary: We love it here we come to California to see our grandson at least 4 times a year or more and we feel so welcomed and safe staying here. The staff is excellent and it is so clean. Nice evening reception and a great compliment hot or cold breakfast is a 10..
Manager Response: Dear Froggy8083, thank you so much for your continued loyalty and we're so glad to be your home-away-from-home when visiting your grandson.  Our hours for the best free breakfast in town are 6am - 9am Monday through Friday and 7am - 10:30am weekends.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed one night in December before going back to France. We were given a warm welcome at checkin: we did appreciate.  The hotel has recently been upgraded: I have to say it's a success. Our room was BEAUTIFULL! Loved the bedroom and the bathroom.  Evening social is nice and not overcrowed. They offer free cocktails/softs, snacks, vegetables...  You can park at an extra cost (18$ if I remember well).  In my opinion, the pool should be a little larger considering the size of the hotel but that's no big deal.  Loved this place. We'll come back again
Manager Response: Dear Gaelle_60, we're so glad you had the opportunity to discovery our hotel before heading home.  We appreciate the strong five star recommendation and detailed experience.  Hope you had the opportunity to also join us for Irvine's best complimentary breakfast.  We hope to see you on your next trip to the USA and thanks for telling your friends.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Consistent and friendly. Great value, staff and suite. Shuttle ,  gym, breakfast, meeting areas and plenty of room. If they improve the breakfast and happy hour they could be perfect depending on the nature of tour visit.
Manager Response: Dear FamilyTraveler62, thank you for the five star recommendation and we're excited to say that there will be enhancements to our complimentary breakfast and evening reception rolled out this year across the Embassy Suites brand.  We hope you will come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed at the Irvine Embassy Suites right after Christmas for one night as a quick getaway. There are two ES properties in Irvine but we chose this one as the location is a little better and hotel is newer. However, it’s in a largely commercial part of the city so there is no street parking. ES knows this so they charge $18/night for parking. I expected a charge but thought that was a little steep personally. And of course you don’t learn about the fee until you check in. We may have chosen the other ES if we had known.   The only other negative is that our room had a definite smell when we arrived - almost like someone had left some food in the fridge. I checked, but it was empty. I wanted to open the window to air things out, but the window didn’t open. We left for a few
Manager Response: Dear Natalie, thank you for taking the time to post about your experience.  Please know that the hotel does not own the parking structure thus the charge which in on the lower end for Irvine and posted on our website.  We're glad you enjoyed breakfast and we also love our new Starbucks in the lobby.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is huge, the lines for breakfast and happy hour are long but the housekeeping staff are amazing! Parking is strange but it works. Convenient location in business area. Starbucks in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Lynda, thank you for sharing and we're really appreciate your "beautiful, busy and bright" depiction of the hotel.  We appreciate your business and hope you'll come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Centrally located hotel, staff not so friendly
Summary: Hotel has been remodeled. Stayed with my family. Disappointed that pool wasn’t open-their website did not state this.  Breakfast was included which is nice but the items are just ok. Coffee not great. We got Starbucks instead. Nice that they have a full service Starbucks in the lobby. Breakfast and evening reception staff are not friendly.
Manager Response: Dear bokhari331, thank you for sharing and we are very sorry that the pool had to be closed for mandatory repairs.  It should be back very soon and better than ever.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Convenient freeway location, nice rooms, great for business. Food is good and fresh. Nice to have Starbucks there too. Staff is very efficient and friends. Will definitely stay here again. Great value for the money.
Manager Response: We're so glad the meeting was a success and appreciate the five star recommendation.  We're looking forward to your next event.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Good location for airport or corporate stays.  From my experience what makes this hotel stand out was the clean, quiet room (quiet on a weekend even), and the courtesy of the front desk staff.  As an HHonors gold member I can say that this property is a cut above most Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: Dear Npztravl, thank you for your Honors loyalty and the awesome five star recommendation.  We appreciate your sharing and the staff looks forward to welcoming you back.  Great new things coming this year on the food and beverage side of the suite life.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Front desk was great. Dorothy & John we’re very patient, helpful, resourceful & friendly. Breakfast and cocktail hour were both good & free. Shuttle took us to multiple places throughout our 6 day stay. El Torito Grill is a very good Mexican restaurant within walking distance from hotel.
Manager Response: Thanks for joining us over NYE with the rest of the band family.  We're so glad you enjoyed your time in Southern CA and come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very poor service, bad food for breakfast, no idea the pool was closed and was not informed prior or during the stay. Was only aware of pool closure when I came to swim. Poor general manager management
Manager Response: Mourisg, we are very sorry your stay was not satisfactory due to our pool closure.  We had the closure posted since early December and did try to bring back to service prior New Year, however, defaults to the construction forced us to close the pool again.  We do apologize for any inconvenience and are working to bring the pool back online with an enhanced guest experience.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary Heading: The best hotel for your money
Summary: Beautiful hotel. Close to Disney Land and the Airport. Super clean. Complimentary breakfast, and evening reception. Friendly, courteous, and helpful staff.  One day we were late for breakfast one day and the food was already picked up. They took our order and had the food cooked in the kitchen and brought it to us. WE GIVE FIVE STARS.
Manager Response: Niki, we love hearing your story and how the F&B team came through for a late breakfast.  We're so happy you enjoyed your time at the hotel and greatly appreciate the five star recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Used to be a great chain, stay at Hilton and embassy suite a lot, however lately think that service got horrible
Summary: This trip stay both at embassy suite at Irvine and Hilton at topanga.  Embassy suite become motel type of service while Hilton become robotic service, a smile would be nice.  Did not offer any information or assistance through out the entire check in, I suggested to use robotic, that properly will save you tons of hourly rate salary
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa, you're experience is definitely not our level of service.  We will review your comments at our January team meeting to emphasis what we expect form all associates and to deliver only great guest service experience.  Thank you for sharing.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here on December 13-15 everything was amazing! People at the From Desk,always greeted us. Your names and smiles. Complimentary breakfast and evening reception was sopoooo nice! We will be back!!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your amazing experience.  We always love hearing about great service from our associates.  If you can think of anything or anyone specifically we always celebrate with our employees.  Looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Although the hotel was PACKED they managed to provide the same high level of service and facilities as we’ve come to expect  Lobby staff were attentive and fast, the rooms were clean and odorless (important to us).  Parking was more limited than usual and that was a problem....it often is and that was the reason they didn’t get five stars
Manager Response: Dave, thank you for spending the Holidays with us.  We appreciate your recommendation and we did have a lot of family leisure staying at the hotel which will impact the parking structure at times.  We hope to see you back at the hotel soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stay was ok. This location is smaller than most Embassy Suites. The staff were a bit nonchalant and I might say rude, including the evening supervisor. I was locked out of my room due to a billing issue without so much as a call. It’s just ok. Nothing horrible about it but it’s below Embassy standards IMHO.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and I'd be happy to further discuss your experience with our front desk.  Our #1 priority is the guest experience and if our team could have managed the situation for a better outcome I'd appreciate your time.  Please email me at John.Pease@Hilton.com or call the hotel directly at 949-553-8332 and I look forward to the opportunity of speaking with you.  Sincerely, John Pease Front Office Manager

Summary: Great location, easy on and off the 405. Just a mile from Walmart, Target and other shopping.  Free breakfast is popular so allow plenty of time to get through the made to order omelet line! Happy hour, don’t bother! Chips and cheese with animal crackers, really? I would expect a more “adult” food choice being in a very business themed neighborhood.  Housekeeping is excellent, very helpful! Rooms need updating, carpet and furniture show wear and tear but it is priced for that!
Manager Response: Dear Lucy, thank you for your comments and will certainly share with our team.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and our location worked so well.  Our complimentary evening reception does include items other than chips and cookies with items rotating nightly.  We also have a full menu of small and share plates available at Vibrante that pair wonderfully with the free drinks during the evening reception.  We do hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Clean rooms, has bedroom and living room. (pull out sofa bed) Complimentary breakfast - the omelets are made to your requests. Complimentary bar for 2 hours with food. The staff is very attentive. Parking is secure and guranteed a space.  I was there during 2 holidays Thanksgiving and Christams, therefore a lot of families were there, I was on business. I would stay there again!
Manager Response: Thank you for the back-to-back stays and hope next time it might be for family vacation and not work.  We're glad to hear both stays were excellence and do hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is a great hotel, I've stayed here a few times.  Friendly staff, comfortable beds, and reasonable rates.  My wife and I visited some family for the holidays and we stayed here.  The front desk staff were great and very friendly.
Manager Response: Adam, thanks for the great comments and your continued loyalty.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Close to freeway and close to airport
Summary: My first impression was not the best.  I called for an airport shuttle that never showed up, even after a second call. After 45 minutes, I was told to take a taxi that they would pay for.  I arrived and checked in. Stranding guests at the airport must be an every day occurrence as they neither apologized, nor compensated me for my long wait.   The hotel itself was a standard Embassy Suites. The room was as expected - a living room area and a separate bedroom. The furnishings were updated and the rooms were clean. I ordered room service, which was prompt and the meal delicious. The breakfast buffet in the morning was as expected, except it was a bit difficult to find a place to sit down to eat.    There is also a Starbucks in the lobby area which is a plus - Starbucks on site and
Manager Response: Susanne, we're so sorry to hear about the shuttle service and this is certainly not up to our standard.  Please know that your comments have been shared and discussed with our front office team.  I am glad that the service back to the airport went as it should.  We do appeal to both families and corporate travel and during the holidays our guest count does get a little higher than average as it's almost exclusively families.  We do hope you will stay with us again should travel bring you back to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The staff is very polite and the rooms were nice and clean. Great breakfast and evening managers reception as well. Would recommend this hotel to others.. when in the area I would stay again. Great job Embassy staff!!!
Manager Response: Nicholas, thank you for taking the time to share your experience with fellow travelers.  We're glad to hear your stay was excellent and appreciate the strong recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The room was ok, carpet was dirty.  coffee machine did not work.  breakfast was great.  The main concern of mine was that there was a fire alarm that I did not hear in my room, at all.   I know there was a evacuation as my friends on the 2nd floor had to leave the building.  I was on the 5th floor in the corner room and heard nothing and talking to others on my floor they did not hear the alarms either!  And kids running between rooms slamming doors all night. Not a good thing.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing and I do hope you reported the room deficiencies to our front desk so that they could be remedied.  Please note that our fire safety system is continuously monitored and tested on a quarterly basis.  Fire code for high rise buildings has alarms sound on the floor with the activity and one floor immediately above and below.  Our team is trained to quickly trouble shoot the system giving further communication to guests.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: On a recent family trip to Disneyland, we opted to stay away from the Disney resort area and found this hotel. By  far, this is my new favorite Embassy Suites hotel. It's been recently updated so everything was clean and new. The breakfast was plentiful and everything was well stocked. We didn't use the pool or any other facilities since we were there only one night. Just so you know, there is a parking fee. All in all, we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear weluvtrvln, we're so glad you found us and we're just 12 miles from Disneyland and central to all Orange County attractions.  We're happy the family enjoyed the best free breakfast in town and hope you will come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: What a delight!  She has been so so very helpful in organizing our BIG family gathering.  She has been able to get us everything we needed!  And all with a HUGE smile and a warm personality to go with it!  Thanks for an awesome stay!!!  Couldn’t have done it better myself!
Manager Response: Dear Scramos, this is just awesome!  Thank you for sharing and I cant wait to hear more details from Dorothy on your big family gathering.  Thank you for giving our Embassy Suites the opportunity to host your family and the shout out to Dorothy.  She knows just about everything you could think of about Irvine and the Orange County destination.  Come back and see us again next year.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great hotel. The reception was fabulous and the breakfast was excellent. Rooms are large and comfortable. Staff was friendly and helpful. I experienced no problems or issues.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Lesley, thank you for sharing and it's so great to read your comments and the generous 5 star recommendation.  We're looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Outstanding! The Embassy Suites by Hilton is very clean, quiet, friendly, beautiful and great location to Newport Beach without the crowd but close enough to reach within minutes.  Lovely area within the business community and very close to the airport.  So happy I chose this hotel.
Manager Response: Debrav735, thank you so much for sharing your 5 star experience.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and we're so happy you choice our hotel as well.  Come back and see us again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good Irvine option, not much nearby
Summary: This is a good choice when in Orange County, and is very convenient to the airport. It is a typical Embassy Suites (recently renovated, but not brand new), with the cocktail reception at night and breakfast in the morning. I skipped the breakfast, but the cocktail reception had some unique items (nachos, taquitos) that made it a little better than the usual vegetables, chips, and kibble.   Rooms were clean and recently renovated, and Internet was reasonably fast. Although I did not park a car, I believe the parking fee here is fairly steep (like $20…check the hotel web site) so be aware of that. Also, there are not a lot of dining options nearby. I wound up walking to an “El Torito Grill” a couple of blocks away, and it was one of only a few restaurants around.   I’d stay here
Manager Response: Dear Squirrelpaws, thank you for sharing such a detailed experience.  We're glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and besides the restaurants within walking distance our van drivers are happy to take guests within 2 mile opening a huge array or dinner options.  We have some favorites at the District and Diamond Jamboree so please feel free to ask for recommendations and a free ride at the front desk.  We love the HGI as well and hope that our more spacious suites and complimentary amenities would put us over the top for overall value and experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Excellent home away from home experience!
Summary: Excellent home away from home experience.  Experience starts at hotel pick up at airport and continue throughout the stay.    Only negative is lack of walkway to the corner. Walking through the bushes and down the grass is fine.....until the sprinklers come on.  LOL
Manager Response: Thank you for the five star recommendation and we're so happy to hear about a home away from home experience.  The landscaping out front is maintained by the association so we do apologize if the sprinklers tried to get you.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Was at this hotel for a few days on business. Got booked into a corner “studio” room. A tiny angular room that is really undesirable. Would have happily paid more for the standard suite room (hence the name - Embassy Suites). Asked at check-in and again after 1 night to be moved to a suite. At check-in I actually got some attitude when requesting a suite instead. Basically the message was “you’re one person, why do you need the bigger room?”  Not a big deal but this place is expensive and the room I got was not worth almost $300/night. Just make sure they are specific when you make your reservation. They were supposedly full so was unable to move me to another room. On prior stays in a suite this has been a good choice for business. For vacation I’d recommend something closer to
Manager Response: Brad, thank you for the honest feedback.  The hotel design does include 18 studio rooms that do not have the extra living room and feature one queen size bed.  The room description is carefully listed to show the difference between our studio rooms and the other 275 suites.  The room is comfortable for a max of 2 people and includes all our Embassy Suites benefits like free breakfast and the evening reception.  We have been sold out this week so do apologize there were no suites available for upgrade.  We do look forward to seeing you again and for booking the suite room type you prefer.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great place to stay in OC
Summary: I was working late and did not want to drive all the way home.  I checked in around 9:30.  Everything was great.  I enjoyed a glass of wine in the bar.  Checkout the next morning was super easy.  Accommodations were excellent!
Manager Response: Dear jdebree11,  great idea so relax and enjoy over the long, late drive home.  We're glad you made Embassy Suites Irvine your place to escape this week.  We hope you had time to grab some of the best free breakfast in town before you hit the road.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nice place to stay in Irvine
Summary: Nice spacious big rooms with sitting room, lovely atrium good vibe.  Loved the happy hour at the bar, and the free nibblies. would have liked a bit more choice on the hot buffet.  Staff gave good service, happy to stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Romatraveller2015, thank you for your recent visit and for taking the time to share.  We're so happy to hear the staff delivered great service and you enjoyed our guest suites.  The evening reception is a full bar with lite snacks but no hot food.  We have a full menu of great small and share plates at our restaurant, Vibrante So Cal Kitchen.  We look forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Everything was great. Our only issues we're not being able to adjust the cooling in our room so it was a bit warm, room service closing too early, and our room card not working twice for the parking garage.
Manager Response: Dear ShareAloha77, we're so sorry to hear about these inconveniences when it sounds like you had an overall pleasant stay at the hotel.  We do hope you shared the AC issue with our team to ensure the unit is fully inspected.  We will certainly make sure your next stay is spot on.  Thanks for sharing.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We found ourselves traveling for a wedding the week of Thanksgiving.  We decided to go for the week.  We were offered the wedding rate for the full week.  The staff was very hospitable and took care of our every need.  The shuttle service took us to the local shopping district and the airport.  Could not ask for a better experiance.
Manager Response: We're so glad you choice to stretch out the wedding for a full week staying with us!  We appreciate to kind comments and staff recognition.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great for families, convenient area, nice property with friendly staff
Summary: Most Embassy suites are pretty similar, but what stood out here was the front desk staff.  They helped with a movie billing error, and were consistently pleasant throughout our stay, especially Daniel.  I will say that their movie ordering system can be difficult to work, and the a/c in the rooms take a while to cool the room.  Overall it is a very good place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Rachel, thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  We love great stories of associates going above and beyond and our front desk is packed with star players.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had a terrific stay at this hotel. The rates wer fabulous and the staff very attentive. Dorothy at the front dedt was always very gracious. She share places to visit, where to shop, where to eat! Everyone made us feel welcomed. We came from Hawaii to visit family and we now have a nee family here!
Manager Response: Dear Teresa, thank you for sharing and it's so great to hear about Dorothy and her awesome concierge skills.  We hope your next visit won't be to fair off in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: She deserves a promotion very helpful she should be the face of this branch also the hotel is very clean the service is awesome the food is delightful the hotel has everything you can ask for thank you very much
Manager Response: Dear CN, thanks for such an outstanding mention of Gladys at the front desk.  She will so much appreciate your comments.  We do hope you will come back and see us again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Spent 4 days/nights here at this hotel for a work conference earlier this month.  Hotel is very nice with large suites and great customer service.  Their morning breakfast is awesome, with lots of variety to chose from.  Their evening reception from 5:30-7:30 is also fantastic, with snacks and beer/cocktails, although their liquor is definitely not top shelf.  Overall a very enjoyable week and would definitely consider staying here again if my travels take me to Irvine.
Manager Response: We appreciate your generous comments and it's so great to hear how the hotel was able to deliver a home away from home experience while you were working in Irvine.  We do hope your travel brings you back this way.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My family & I had a wonderful time and stay. Everything was perfect from the moment we arrived until the moment we left. Guest Service really goes above and beyond the call of duty.  We will definitely be back again!
Manager Response: Thank You for taking the time to let us know about your stay. I am very pleased to see that we were able to meet and exceed your expectation with our rooms, and amenities.   All of here take pride in delivering exceptional service, and creating fun and memorable experiences.  We know that you have many choices when selecting a hotel, and we hope that you will continue to make our hotel your first your choice whenever you’re in the Irvine area.    Please feel free to contact me with any comments, or suggestions you may have in the future.   Warmest Regards,  John Pease  Front Office Manager Embassy Suites

Summary: A big group of us were in town for a family wedding and we stayed here.  The proximity to the airport was convenient. The evening reception was great for the meet and greet of family members.  The breakfast was yummy too!  The two room suite was really convenient because our grandson could be put to bed and the rest of us could stay up and visit in the living room.  The hotel was helpful with a couple of glitches on our trip.  We got a great price with the wedding block.  Thanks Embassy Suites!
Manager Response: Dear MSU Mom, we are glad you and the entire wedding party had a fantastic stay with us over the Holiday.  Our spacious suites, best free breakfast in town and complimentary evening reception are ideal for both business and leisure travel.  We hope you come back and explore the rest of what Orange County has to offer.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I had a great stay and the breakfast cook was great. The only disturbance is having a room across from the elevator is very noisy and you hear all day and night. Next time I will recommend to have my room further away from the elevator
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and we are so glad you had an enjoyable stay.  Here's a great trip for travelers.  Book direct using the Hilton Honors App for the best member pricing and you will be able to select your room prior to arrival.  Our guests that utilize this feature love it!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great location, clean modern suites, staff was great, the food was excellent, and airport shuttle service was fast and in-time; without a doubt, I'll definitely stay here the next time I'm in Irvine!!
Manager Response: Greg, thanks for spending the weekend with us.  We are looking forward to your next visit and appreciate the five star recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We love this hotel even more now!!  We love staying at this hotel! It's a business hotel. It caters to business people during the week--but you can secure an awesome rate on the weekends and save some money!!! It's next door to Laguna Beach and Costa Mesa. The airport is 2 minutes away--and they even have a nice shuttle that will take you there and/or pick you up! The shuttle also offers service to The South Coast Plaza--all for free!! Parking is available for $18 per night....I think it should be included in the nightly rate...but it is what it is. The suites are the size of an apartment. Most are two rooms with a small dining/work area. They remind me of high end corporate apartments. Lot's of room, closet space, a nice living area and bedroom with two huge TV's--but awful
Manager Response: Dear Tansz, welcome back!  We're so glad you liked our upgrades throughout the hotel. We greatly appreciate your five star recommendation and hope you will be coming back soon.  We also hope you liked our new Starbucks in the lobby.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Did the job: Efficient and Comfortable
Summary: We stayed at the Embassy Suites for a family event in Irvine, as the rooms were blocked in advance. It's not in the most picturesque setting. One side of the hotel faces a parking garage and 2 sides a very busy road. Aesthetics aside, the hotel was conveniently located for us, clean and though it was extremely bustling and lively that weekend, having a door between the bedroom and the living area made for a very quiet sleep. The room was clean and the gym small but well-equipped. Free breakfast was a nice perk, was ample with a lot of choices for everyone.  I'm curious why double bed rooms are only on one side, the parking garage side, and on lower floors. Maybe the hotel attracts more business clientele who need a single bed? In any case, when I inquired about moving to a room
Manager Response: Dear Melissa, thank you for your recent stay and we're glad to hear the family enjoyed our location.  The construction of the hotel only allows for floors two through five on one wing to accommodate two queen beds in the bedroom.  Our other suites and studio rooms will not accommodate two beds in the bedroom.  We actually wish we had more available.  All suites to have an additional queen-size sofa sleeper in the living room.  Come back and see us soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is my third year returning to Embassy Irvine for an annual event!  Have not been disappointed!  I believe year it actually gets better and with more ease.  The location is great!  Access to freeways, very easy!   Give them a try!  You won't be disappointed!  (Jasmine is the best!)
Manager Response: Dear Carmen, we appreciate your continued loyalty and always look forward to the event.  I'll make sure to pass along your kudos to Jasmine and please feel free to tell all your colleagues how easy it is to work with the team at Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: From the minute I walked into the door for check-in, until the minute I checked out, every thing was perfect.  First, I found parking.  I thought that would be a hassle, but it wasn't.  Second, check in was quick and easy.  I was off to the room that I selected online within five minutes.  Once inside the room, is was very quiet.  With the exception of the A/C unit, I heard no outside noise, or any noise from inside the hotel.  That made for a very restful nights sleep.  I went for the manager's reception shortly after check in.  It was a very pleasant experience.  That and the breakfast is one of the reasons I choose to stay at the Embassy Suites whenever I travel.  The snacks were OK, nachos, potato chips, chex mix and cheese and crackers were on the menu.  The bar drinks were
Manager Response: Thank you so much for talking the time to share your experience and all the detailed comments.  It sounds like the Hilton Honors app to pre-select your room worked as planned.  Come back and see us again next time you are in town.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Large suite with fridge AND microwave; great breakfast, incl made to order omelets.  Nice evening happy hour, incl free mixed cocktails.  Pleasant surroundings with nice restaurants within walking distance or a free shuttle for trips within 3 miles. Really enjoyed my stay.  The bad part- way too short
Manager Response: Dear Sandy, we appreciate your five star recommendation and also wish your stay could have been a little longer.  We just want to point out that we are the Embassy Suites Irvine near Orange County airport.  There's also an Embassy Suites in Santa Ana a couple miles from us.  Come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director

Summary: Cannot beat Embassy Suites rooms and complimentary cooked breakfast, afternoon drinks. Nice remodeled rooms, Friendly and polite staff, Great lobby and bar lounge,best deals is during weekends, weekdays mostly business
Manager Response: Thank you for the great comments and recommendation.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed at this place recently. Generally it was ok breakfast was an absolute scrum for food. Also required a glass of milk from room service, they could not provide. My biggest gripe is that they charged me $36 parking which is amazing since I didn’t have a car
Manager Response: Dear Andy, please contact me at the front desk.  I would be more than happy to review your bill.  Please call 949-553-8332.  We'd really like the opportunity to have your next stay better than your first one.  Sincerely, John Pease Front Office Manager

Summary: This hotel is located close to the business area in Newport Beach and is close to the airport.  The complimentary breakfast and cocktail hour is very nice and well stocked.  The staff were excellent at all times.
Manager Response: Gordon,  we greatly appreciate the five star recommendation.  We're glad you had a great stay with us and hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have stayed at this trip hotel on this trip for 6 weeks and it has been perfect, room always clean food always great and staff amazing. I would like to say a special thanks the Amanda Gould super helpful and a really caring person about the hotel and the customers, I  recommend staying here. Very close to the airport and beaches.  Thanks,  John Pryor
Manager Response: Mr. Pryor, we appreciate the opportunity of having to host you at the hotel.  We're so glad you had a great experience and got to meet so many of our associates.  Amanda will be thrilled to see your comments and we appreciate any future referrals.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Booked 1 KING BED CORNER STE N/S -SUITE WHEELS SEDAN (which includes a rental car) two months in advance (conf. # 92929205.) Verified car can be picked up at the airport (SNA) through hotel 1 949-553-8332 two days before arrival. Get to the airport - no car. Call hotel, and they send a shuttle to pick us up and take us to hotel. Check into our room and wait 3 hours, 20 minutes for the manger Mark to arrange car rental. Car arrives at the hotel, which we jump into and race at 80 MPH to our first appointment of the night 50 minutes late !!!
Manager Response: We are sincerely apologetic for the inconvenience created by the rental car not going as planned.  The car rental package is very popular and a smooth transition with the hotel and Enterprise.  We have reviewed our procedures with each of our team members at the front desk to ensure this does not happen in the future.  Please reach out to my office at any time if you would like to have additional conversation.  You can reach me at 949-553-8332 or email at john.pease@hilton.com  Warm regards, John Pease Front Office Manager

Summary: My wife and I  stayed for a 3 day weekend. I have a few complaints. First complain, I called if they could check me in earlier than 3pm.  Called twice the front desk said they couldn't accommodate my request. Had the nerve to ask if I was a gold member. I'm currently at Silver Status. So what does that have to do with the service being offered. When I arrived at 2:30pm, I noticed that a lot of the guest where being checked in even earlier. So such nonsense.  Complain number 2. The managers special that offered complementary drinks and snack was not as expected. My past stay in numerous other Embassy Suites had better snacks with vegetables i.e. celery sticks, broccoli and cheese. Of the three nights that I stayed that weekend they just had chips. Ask the waiter why? He said we
Manager Response: I was so sorry to hear about your recent experience which does not represent our guest service promise.  I will personally meet with our managers and discuss your comments to ensure we are delivering excellent hospitality.  Thank you for taking the time to share and please contact my office directly if I can offer any re-assurance for future stays at the hotel.  Please contact the hotel at 949-553-8332 and ask for the General Manager.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: The embassy suites is a beautiful hotel.  Love the atrium and glass elevators.  The beds are very comfortable,  the rooms are very clean and the shower is amazing.  I feel safe traveling especially when I am alone in this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Holly, thank you for taking the time to share your recent stay with us.  We're very happy for the great nights sleep.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Called them while I was walking out to the shuttle area, the shuttle was at the stop by the time we got there. Very close to the airport. Check in was fast, we got there in the morning so there was no room available, left our suitcases and went out and came back by 3 PM our room was ready. The room was very spacious one had the beds, and the other one was a living area. The bathroom was spacious as well and well lit. There was a daily breakfast with made to order omelet, scrambled eggs, potatoes, bacon, oatmeal, fruit, yogurt, bagels and bread with cream cheese and croissants. Enough to satisfy anyone's taste along with coffee, tea,hot chocolate and a variety of juices. Around the evening they served chips and dip and salsa along with olives, cold salad with drinks. There is
Manager Response: Dear Dalia, thank you so much for sharing.  Sounds like an awesome trip from start to finish and we're so happy you chose to stay with us.  We appreciate the five star recommendation and please come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is literally a 3 minute taxi ride from the airport. Check in was smooth and real quick. Its a very nice and spacious hotel. Rooms are the standard Embassy type which is great - with mini fridge, microwave, sink, work / dining table, living room separate from bedroom. Very comfortable arrangement and gives you lot of space instead of feeling constricted.   Lots of plug points which is critical for charging all devices while working in the room. Good room service as well. The break fast has a lot of variety and they have a wonderful manager's reception at night.  Totally worth it when in the area for business.
Manager Response: Dear Shanker, thank you for the awesome five star review.  We're so glad you had the opportunity to join us for breakfast and the evening reception.  We hope to see you back again at the hotel and thank you for recommending to your business associates traveling to Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: For the amount of money water should be put in the room every night/day.  the over price of the room is a bit over priced for other hotels in your area.  It's a good thing the bedroom was in way from the door in that the door sounded as if it was opening each time someone walked by or the wind blew.
Manager Response: Thank you for the feedback.  Honors members receive complimentary waters on arrival day and the hotel does have free beverages in the atrium at breakfast and the evening reception every day.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I am a Hilton Diamond Member and I stay at this hotel quite often but I will never stay again. My wife accidentally booked two reservations at two separate hotels for a two night stay. Even though I gave a 24 hour notice they charged me for the first night. BS.
Manager Response: Randy, we appreciate your loyalty and I would be happy to further discuss your details.  Please contact me at anytime.  The main hotel number is 949-553-8332 or you can email me at john.pease@hilton.com.  Sincerely, John Front Office Manager

Summary: The hotel is newly remodeled so the rooms and decor are modern and comfortable.  There is a Starbucks right in the lobby which is a nice amenity. The customer service of the banquet's team is exceptional and it is an easy commute to John Wayne's airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us to host your event and we appreciate that shout out to our banquet team.  We hope to have the opportunity of seeing your group again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Want to be near the UCI campus or area shopping and restaurants, then this is a good choice. This hotel offers the typical good Embassy experience one would expect with good service, breakfast, happy hour, and decent rooms..at a great price. The only issue was the parking. The garage is small, hard to navigate with a large vehicle, not well lit, and doesn't seem safe. At night finding a spot was terrible and impossible on one occasion.
Manager Response: Dear KimberlycW5994FK; We are so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your kind words! Regarding parking question, we do have a designated parking spots for large vehicles. We will be happy to assist you on your next visit to our hotel. We look forward to seeing again! Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill  General Manager

Summary Heading: I stay regularly at this hotel.  One person who stands out regularly is Dorothy Oreyzi at the Front Desk.
Summary: Dorothy is professional yet friendly and helpful.  After only a couple of stays at this hotel, Dorothy remembered my name and seems to go out of her way to make me (and every other guest) feel welcome at this property.  In addition to Dorothy, there are other helpful and friendly Embassy Suite Employees at The Embassy Suites, Irvine, CA.  I never stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Dear sheilascarter11; Thank you for your kind words about Dorothy! She is our Guest Services Ambassador, and we are so very proud of her! We will be sharing your comments with Dorothy, and celebrate her amazing acheivments!  We look forward to seeing you again in the very near future!  Thank you!  Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel and very friendly staff
Summary: Checked in Friday and was greeted by Super friendly staff and couldn’t believe how many items they had for the breakfast. The room was very clean and A/C worked very well, and the food and drinks were pretty good during the happy hour!! Beds were comfortable and would definitely be back at this hotel next time.
Manager Response: Dear Wballz; Thank you for your kind words about our Team and your experience! We take a pride in our property. Our Goal is to make sure every guests have a memorable stay! We are looking forward to welcome and your family again to our hotel in the near future! If I can be of any assistance, please do not hesitate to contact one of our Team Member! Thank you!  Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill

Summary: Rooms were nice, big, clean, and perfect for 4 of us...... Staff was wonderful.  We had a pretty large group and the staff was very accommodating to all of our needs.  Had one problem with the air conditioner, and called.  Things happen, but was surprised and how fast they got up to our room.  only about 30 seconds.  Had to replace a part, but it was done in no time.   Breakfast was great, location was perfect for all of the different places we had to go for our sporting events.  Highly recommend this place.  Was very pleased with these accommodations.
Manager Response: Dear Brenda B; We are so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed your stay with us. I am thrilled to hear that our Staff was wonderful, and we were able to respond to your request quickly. Our Team takes pride in everything they do, and I am going to share your comments with them as well.  Thank you and we look forward to your visit! Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: The suite was bigger than I thought.  Breakfast was great, lots of selection.  Hotel appears to be recently renovated.  I would have been great if the fitness center had more weights.  Wished I could've stayed for more than 1 night.
Manager Response: Dear baronf849, We are so happy to hear you have enjoyed your breakfast selections, and the suite exceeded your expectations! We have a partnership with 24Hour Fitness near by the hotel. We would love to be able to accommodate your request on your next trip to Irvine, please stop by Front Desk to inquire. We also provide our guests with a running map, for some guests that might enjoy an outdoor exercising.  Thank you again for your feedback! We look forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: So our house was being fumigated for the weekend and we need to go away for a few days, since we love embassy suites we decided to go with them. Let me tell you about Dorthy in the front desk she was amazing and very helpful and made our stay here awesome thank you so much for everything.
Manager Response: Dear epedraza1109;  Thank you for your wonderful comments. I am not surprise to see Dorothy's name on your feedback. She is our Ambassador, and she takes a pride in her role. We are so very fortunate to have Dorothy on our Team! I am so happy to hear that we were able to exceed your expectations! I am going to share your comments with Dorothy as well. Thank you and please come back to see us again!  Sicnerely,  Swietlana Cahill

Summary: If you find yourself headed to John Wayne/ Orange County airport the Embassy Suites in Irvine is very close to the airport.  The facility has recently been through a major renovation and the staff are very helpful and friendly.  Although the price may seem a little high, if you eat breakfast and enjoy a free evening drink, you will be well ahead.
Manager Response: Dear  714lang;  We are so happy to hear that your visit with us was enjoyable. We take a pride in our Team and our property. Thank you for letting us know that our cook to order omelet, hot breakfast buffet selections, and our evening managers reception exceeded your expectations.  Thank you so much for your comments! We look forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill

Summary Heading: Great value for money and nicely renovated
Summary: Overall we really liked the hotel as it was nicely remodel and refurbished as well the overall value for money with evening drinks and breakfast. The location was perfect and very convenient for our schedule and various meetings across OC and L.A.   Not considering that our room wasn't serviced the 2nd day, the only downside was the initial check-in experience with an extremely unfriendly and rude lady who obviously didn't care at all about the wellbeing of arriving guests. She shouldn't work at a customer facing department. Not only did she ignore our pre arrival submitted booking requests, nor did she honor our HH membership and even refused to offer my wife the requested bottle of water.  After checking our room we went back to her colleague at check-in who was eager to help
Manager Response: Dear Matthias Z;  Thank you so much for your feedback about your visit. I am so happy to hear you enjoyed our suites, complimentary breakfast, and our evening reception. We appreciate all your comments and will look into anything we can do to improve.  We look forward to your return! Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill

Summary: The setup of the rooms and the architecture of the building provides natural sunlight since it has a glass ceiling. People are amazing, staff service was top of the line, food was super delicious, we had 2 amazing days.
Manager Response: Dear Carloseorellana;  We love that you love our hotel!Thank you for talking time to share your experience and we are always so happy to hear guest stories about great service. We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill

Summary: Centrally located near the John Wayne airport and close to freeways, still very quiet and relaxing. Great place to stay where it’s not real busy but close to the beach and shopping as well as Disney. Only complaint is bar closes earlier than it should. 11pm on a Friday is early. Breakfast was good and drinks were strong otherwise
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and sharing the experience.  We're glad our location and amenities was favorable.  We're actually 10-15 minutes from almost everywhere you;d want to visit in Orange County.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel decor and service was very charming and elegant.  The service was top notch.  My family stayed for a mini overnight vacation. My daughter loved it so much she asked to stay an additional night.  The pool area was very clean... to add a special touch,  Blue and white towels were laying on the back of the chairs waiting for you. Jazzy nice back ground music playing while you mingled around the hotel Food and Drinks added bonus!
Manager Response: We so happy to hear you had a fantastic mini-vacation with us and even opted to stay an extra night!  We appreciate the five star recommendation and do hope to see you back again soon.  We'll start decorating for the Holiday's after Thanksgiving which really makes the atrium come to life.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Nice stay We booked this location to be close to family for a get together We really enjoyed our stay The bar staff were great We didn’t use the complimentary bar  The manager John Pease was fantastic We would definitely stay again
Manager Response: We're so glad to hear from you and that he hotel was close by your family.  We'll certainly pass along your comments to John and we greatly appreciate the recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great place, newly renovated, great rooms, breakfast and drinks! Worth the $$ spent. I would suggest to any straying in the area, for leisure or business. Location is convenient to so much. Thanks for the great experience!!
Manager Response: Kimberly, thank for the awesome 5 star review.  We're so glad you enjoyed your time with us and had the opportunity to join us for complimentary breakfast and the evening reception.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I've been in the area quite a bit for business and after having the not-so-greatest service at the Wyndham down the street, I am pleased I came here. It tends to be just a little more expensive, but you get a nicer room, paid breakfast, free drinks in happy hour. Also the staff is much friendlier here.   My only wishes are there were vending machines that accepted credit cards, recycling was a little easier, and that housekeeping followed the "green" rules with reducing the amount of washing with towels/sheets.
Manager Response: Welcome to Embassy Suites and we're glad you made the switch.  We appreciate all your comments and will look into anything we can do to improve our commitment to being part of the California Green Lodging program.  We're looking forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Breakfast was fantastic. Fresh prepared fruits, made to order omelets, Rooms were clean; quality bedsheets.  Shuttle service is excellent. Our family alsways come back to stay. Room service and housekeeping are amazing!
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing the family back and we're so glad you all enjoyed the breakfast.  We're trying out some new specials to keep it fresh.  We appreciate the awesome comments and look forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Dinner at Vibrante Restaruant at the Embassy Suites by Hilton, Irvine, CA
Summary: Celebrated my husband's birthday with a surprise dinner for him at the Vibrante Restaurant at the Embassy Suites in Irvine, CA.  The staff was absolutely amazing and the Surf & Turf menu prepared by Chef Brenden Stone was delicious and much better than we have ever had at the any of the best steak restaurants in the OC!  I'm a very hard person to please when it comes to steak because I like it well done but not charred, and kudos to him - it was absolutely perfect and still juicy!    A special thank you to our server Patty, Amanda Gould, Swietlana Cahill and Andrea Romo for coordinating the event for me.  They took care of every detail from the table décor, ambiance, private menu just for us, reserved sign with our name on it, wine glasses with our initials on them, which we got
Manager Response: This was so fantastic to see today and thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience.  We will certainly share this with the team and we greatly appreciate the awesome 10-star review.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I love this hotel. The front desk staff were friendly and professional. She saw I walked with a cane and explained about handicapped parking at the hotel. It's free with a placard. The staff all over the hotel was friendly and outgoing. Location is right near the airport but the rooms are pretty much soundproof making for a restful night of sleep.
Manager Response: We love that you love our hotel.  Thank you for talking time to share your experience and we are always so happy to hear guest stories about great service.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: A hotel with great, unfulfilled potential
Summary: This hotel has the potential to become an extraordinary hotel, although it falls short in many respects now. It has a great location, great breakfast and morning chef, great shuttle service, and some great hotel staff (AM staff).  But the hotel needs to improve in many aspects as well. Training needed to improve service by some staff; evening reception needs to improve quite a bit; refrigerator and microwave need to checked and should be in excellent condition before guest arrival; guest should be given the room they chose before, with digital key without fail; sofa bed, sheet, and extra blanket should be checked and cleaned before guest arrival.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share and we will take all parts of your experience as opportunity to shine.  We appreciate your business an hope to see you back again for an extraordinary experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: High school XC team in Cali
Summary: Our HS XC team traveled from Mesa, Az to attend the Woodbridge Classic in Norco. It was nice being close enough to the beach to practice prior to running the following day at the actual event. Arrival and check in for all 28 students went without issue. It was nice that we were able to walk to a local restaurant for dinner and have the complimentary breakfast. My only complaint would be  not realizing in advance that we would need to pay for Wi-Fi.  All of the athletes brought their school laptops with them so that they could work on homework between events and unfortunately no one was able to access the Wi-Fi.
Manager Response: Thank you for allowing us the opportunity to host the team during the Woodbridge Classic.  We are glad to hear the location worked so well.  We will have Jasmine Stewart in our sales department reach out regarding Wi-Fi and what we can arrange for the team to come back next year.  We appreciate your business!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The staff was very friendly. The room was very big and clean. Breakfast buffet was nice. good quality service at the restaurant. the fitness room was the only thing a little disappointing very small and not much equipment. overall would definitely recommend and stay here again
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing about our friendly staff and we're so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We appreciate the recommendation and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: HOW CAN A HILTON GO DOWN HILL THIS MUCH IN A MONTH
Summary: I am a frequent traveler and always try to stay at a Hilton if possible. I am quickly starting to very much dislike Hilton due to the "little things" they seem to screw up. A Lot of little things add up to BIG THINGS. For example. I am in Irvine Ca. for business which our function is actually at the Marriott down the road. I decided to stay at this particular Embassy Suites because a little over a month ago I stayed here and had a pretty decent experience besides the small spider I found in my towel after getting out of the shower, regardless I decided to give them another shot. Booked room on booking.com arrive at hotel after getting email several days earlier asking if I would like to upgrade my room for $15.00 I confirmed I most certainly did want to upgrade but after
Manager Response: Dear Todd.  I am sorry to read about your second stay with us and hope you will give me the opportunity to speak direct with you.  Please reach out to me at 949-705-5151 or email at Swietlana.Cahill2@Hilton.com.  I look forward to the opportunity of connecting with you.  Sincerely, Swietlana General Manager

Summary: This is the worst hotel in Irvine.  Firstly, the bar staff are the rudest people I have ever had to deal with. Customers are an inconvenience and push tip jars in your face.  The Bar closes at 11pm. No room service is available after 11pm.  Breakfast is average.   Rooms are OK, tired and basic.  Staff are generally rude and do not really give good or even exceptional service.  I would avoid this hotel.  Stay at the Hotel Irvine, or Marriott rather than this low service hotel.
Manager Response: Service to our guest is our top priority and I was very concerned to read about your experience.  I would very much appreciate the opportunity to speak with you directly.  Please reach out to me at 949-705-5151 or email at Swietlana.Cahill2@Hilton.com.    Sincerely, Swietlana General Manager

Summary: This hotel is new, super modern, clean and has spacious rooms.  It is in a nice, quiet location.  They serve a wonderful made to order breakfast with healthy, fresh, whole food options.  The full Starbucks in the lobby is a new touch this year that I really appreciate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad you were able to start your day out with the best free breakfast in Irvine.
