Our new Starbucks is open daily at 6:30 AM and the team is always working on something new to experience.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Recently went for a week-long training trip. Glad I was a Hilton Honors member already because wi-fi is NOT free unless you are... Parking is a little crazy and not attached to the main building. But the breakfast and reception in the evening are nice perks. I was overall happy with the room. It was quiet and clean. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us during your training.  We're very happy to hear the suite accommodations provided a quiet and clean week away from home and glad to hear you had time to join us for breakfast.    PS - If you're not Hilton Honors, make sure to enroll at check-in for free Wi-Fi and other member perks.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Excellent hotel with easy access to airport, shopping and restaurants. Short drive to the beach. Was here for a short business trip and was able to relax after work but still able to get the worked I needed to do done.
Manager Response: Hello Gregory and thank you for posting a review of your recent stay.  We're glad the location was excellent and that you also had time to relax.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: One of the worst Embassy Suites
Summary: Usually, I search out an Embassy Suites property. But this one was horrific. The room I am in is not a suite....it is a regular hotel room, and small at that. I assumed that the entire chain had suites but I am not in one. The shuttle told me they would pick me up and never showed up, so I had to pay for taxis. When I landed at the airport, I was told the wait time for the shuttle was 2 hours....another taxi trip I had to fund myself. The cocktail reception included animal crackers and cheezits. Yum.
Manager Response: I was very sorry to read about your experience with us and would look forward to the opportunity of speaking with you directly.  The hotel does have a very limited number of guest studios which are not suites and labeled as such on our website and reservation center.  We are located one mile from the airport so would never expect our team to quote such a time delay and would really like any additional detail.  Please reach out to me at 949-705-5151 or email at Swietlana.Cahill2@Hilton.com.  Sincerely, Swietlana General Manager

Summary Heading: Probably one of the least likable Embassy Suites I stayed at.
Summary: I normally look forward to the buffet breakfast that Embassy Suites offer.  I was down there at 9:15 and I was told the omelet station was over at 9.  I had to eat left over pancakes which were hard and inedible.  The coffee and tea station was closed and I had to ask for hot water from the wait staff.  Everything there was just left overs that were  not fresh.  It was the worst experience ever at an Embassy Suite.  Other than that, the bed was very comfy and didn't want to get out.  I clearly thought it was overpriced for what I received.  Not coming back.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and sorry to hear you came down after breakfast hours.  The complimentary breakfast hours are 6am - 9am Monday through Friday and 7am - 10:30am on weekends.  The hours are posted throughout the hotel, our website and explained at check-in.  As a courtesy we do not close down the buffet or beverage station immediately at 9am so our guests have additional opportunity to eat.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Big fan of Embassy Suites.  When staying away from home for an extended period, it's nice to rely on the comfort and experience provided by Embassy Suites.  John the Manager was a great face of the company, and truly represented the brand well with his positive demeanor.  Amanda the Business Mgr was a delight to work with.  Front Desk Staff was very helpful and accommodating. Jibek, Daniel, Gabriel, Chris, and Joshua all provided great service throughout my stay.  Nice place to come home to ...
Manager Response: We love being your Home away from Home and thank you for recognizing so many of our team members.  We'll make sure to post your comments for everyone to see and we greatly appreciate the generous five star recommendation.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is nice, clean, and has a great  friendly staff.  Really comfortable  rooms and the lobby is great. Especially enjoyed  having a Starbucks in the lobby.  Great location.  Free breakfast was also good and lots of choices.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay with us and we so glad you enjoyed your visit and a little Starbucks to go.  Come back and see us again for the best free happy hour each night from 5:30pm - 7:30pm.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was our second stay at this hotel, and the customer service was extremely disappointing.  Online Reservations - When I booked via Hilton's website, I was unable to enter a promo code. I filled out Hilton (Corporate)'s contact form, and was informed that my question was forwarded to the actual hotel for a response. **Note that any 'special requests' entered during reservation is never read or passed on to the actual hotel.** Check-in - Upon check-in, the front desk agent mentioned they never received the e-mail. I showed her the response I received from Hilton (Corporate), and she took my phone to the office in the back. About 5 minutes later, she returned and stated that she is unaware of this promo code, and will not be honored.  Parking - The main garage height clearance
Manager Response: I was very concerned reading your comments and would greatly appreciate the opportunity to speak with you directly to better understand what occurred and how to make this right.  Please reach out to me directly at Swietlana.Cahill2@Hilton.com or you can contact my office directly at 949-705-5151.    Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Second time staying here. Perfect for my needs. Breakfast a definite plus. Also, location to airport and office made things easier. Staff was outstanding. My only complaint is the parking is confusing.
Manager Response: We appreciate the return visit and glad our hotel location to SNA airport and your office were convenient.  We apologize for any parking confusion and I know that the association had some sections closed off for power washing.  Everything is back to normal now.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: 16-hour long flight...jet lagged...and we come into this wonderful hotel! What a place! The ambience from lobby to room is so relaxing that the unwinding process starts immediately! Clean, maintained rooms and sumptuous breakfast especially the omelette with veggies! This place promises a memorable stay indeed!
Manager Response: 16 hours is a really long flight so we're glad to hear upon your arrival everything was set and ready to go.  Glad you also had the opportunity to enjoy our awesome and free breakfast.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great place to stay on a trip or to relax
Summary: Embassy suites is always easy, clean and in a good location, but this one fit like a glove.  My parents were in town and decided to stay close to the airport for convenience.  This hotel was perfect.  Had a shuttle, small restaurant was excellent when happy hour or morning breakfast was done, and was close to everything they needed or wanted to see.  The room was great and the help was even better.  My parents are 87 and 92.  The professionalism the staff showed to them was astounding.  I've even stayed here myself the night before a trip to avoid dealing with traffic.  I suggest it to any and everyone.
Manager Response: Curt, thank you for the awesome recommendation.  We're so happy your parents enjoyed their stay and the staff was accommodating.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for Business and Family Travel
Summary: The Embassy Suites Irvine OC is at the top of my list for business travel as it continues to deliver, both in terms of customer service/experience (Dorothy is excellent) and convenience (room service is super fast and food is great; Starbucks on site; close to freeways & SNA).  Have also stayed here with my family during a move transition, and my experience was the same - fantastic.  Staff (specifically, Dorothy) was extremely helpful in getting us the room that we needed & making our experience enjoyable & seamless.
Manager Response: Welcome back!  Thank you for the awesome five star review and the shout out to Dorothy.  We will be sure to share this with her today.  We hope to see you back again soon for either business or pleasure.  New Starbucks specials rolled out this week.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a short visit to friends. We hoped to spend first day sitting around the pool,outside. To our disappointment the pool was inside only.  Restaurant fair. Rooms fine and spacious since thy are suites. Location good if you  need to be close to LA or towns near Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Donna, thank you for sharing your comments and we're glad that our location was favorable for your stay.  We've updated our pool deck, the Sol Terrace, which is located adjacent to the pool in a nice and sunny outdoor location.  If you are every in town again we hope to see you back at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My family of four had an amazing stay at this hotel!! The room was exceptional, it was comfortable and the perfect size.  The hotel is close to the beach, my family enjoyed going to the Balboa beach fun zone (6 miles from the hotel).  The staff was super friendly and accommodating.  Luis Perez arranged a special anniversary surprise for my husband and myself.  We also enjoyed a complimentary cooked to order breakfast in the morning.  The omelets were delicious.  I would definitely recommend this hotel!!!
Manager Response: Happy anniversary and we're glad to have accommodate the family.  We appreciate the awesome recommendation and we'll share your comments with Luis and the rest of our housekeeping staff.  We hope to see you back for another memorable experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great location, not for Handicap though.  Parking would be too difficult.
Summary: Wonderful to stay at an Embassy Suites!  The happy hour and breakfasts are such a treat.  The issue is parking.  It's not bad because weather is not bad too often in Southern California.  But you do have a separate building to park in and you have to walk along the hotel to get into the building.  It is up a flight of stairs or a fairly steep slope... not something I believe would be easy for someone in a wheelchair.  If you aren't in one, then this is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and we're glad to hear you had a wonderful experience.  The hotel shares the five story parking structure located behind the hotel which is about 50 yards from the side door.  We do have accessible parking along the front of the hotel and are certainly happy to help all our guests with their parking needs.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Another great visit with my family. Daniel at the front desk is always welcoming and engages you with that smile! Extra pillows arrived within minutes once we called to request it.  The morning breakfast staff was on top of everything, clearing tables and helping to see if you needed anything. Room service were walking the hallways bright and early at 10:00am ready to service your room, if needed! You guys rock! We will see you next time!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing your experience and we appreciate your continued loyalty.  Daniel will be so pleased to see your recognition and it sincerely means a lot to our associates.  We will be rolling our new menus in Vibrante very soon and we're looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We arrived on time to check in to our hotel at the end of our fa,ily vacation and ended up waiting nearly four hours to get our room because it was not ready. the swimming pool was green on the bottom and not even our kids would swim in it. Very disappointed in our experience, it was a negative end to a relaxing vacation.
Manager Response: Check-in time is 3pm and we should have been ready to accommodate nearly all arrivals.  Our housekeeping staff does a great job and this is not a comment we hear very often so we sincerely apologize for the delayed check-in.  We will certainly share your comments with our front desk team and do hope to have the opportunity to host you on future stays in Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My experience at the Embassy Suites in Irvine was outstanding. From the moment I got there until I checked out, the professionalism of the staff and cleanliness of the facilities and rooms were consistently great. The breakfast (made to order) was excellent quality and included a variety of choices for the healthy and not so healthy eater. If you are ever in the area and need a great place to stay, the Embassy Suites in Irvine would be the place I recommend. It's where I'll be!
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie, thank you for the excellent recommendation.  We're so happy to hear you had an outstanding experience.  We're looking forward to your next business trip.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed at the Embassy Suites in August for my son's college orientation weekend. I didn't regret a thing! It's a very nice hotel, nice staff, with great service and great location.  It's close to everything! We will definitely return!
Manager Response: Thanks for choosing the Embassy Suites for your son's college orientation.  We hope to see you back anytime for vacation or spending time with your son while he's attending the university.  Guessing it might be U.C. Irvine, less than 3 miles from the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The Embassy Suites at Irvine, CA has always provided consistent quality care and reliability to its guests.  We know when we book our stay here, that we will be given good and professional service, and that we can expect a pleasant room, environment, and good food.  It's clean and fairly quiet.  Many business meetings go on in the open dining area, as this is located in a business area of town.  We will be sure to come back here again and again.  Also, if you have a child who is a student at UC Irvine, check with the university for a corporate rate and a code to give, to get a good price.
Manager Response: Dear Lucy, thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate all your comments.  Best of luck to your young UCI student.  It's an awesome university.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The rooms are very elegant, spacious, and well-maintained, and staff is excellent and responsive to any concerns. Luis Perez, executive housekeeping manager, answered all of our questions and helped accommodate our needs. The hotel itself is beautiful and there are many comfortable spaces in the center court area to relax and enjoy yourself. Restaurant has excellent food and drinks, and great service as well! The hotel staff all works hard to ensure you'll have a great stay here and that you'll have what you need.
Manager Response: Sounds like you had a very memorable stay with us and we're so happy you had an opportunity to dine with us at Vibrante SoCal Kitchen & Bar.  We will make sure to pass on your very kind comments to Luis and hope to see you back at the hotel again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had a great stay here! The staff was very friendly & helpful! The hotel has been updated and looks great! We stayed in a king bed suite and it was very nice! I would definitely recommend this hotel. P.S. Breakfast was included and it was delicious (& they had healthy options too).
Manager Response: Evelyn, thanks for staying with us last week and it's so great to hear the king bed suite was very accommodating.  We appreciate the recommendation and come back and see us again to enjoy the best free breakfast in town.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Do not stay there if you don,t prefer Mexican food
Summary: Very poor menu selection and high prices for lunch and dinner.  breakfast was excellent and the staff was very attentive.  Good way to start the day. The hotel has been remodeled and it is beautiful.  I was especially happy to have a large shower.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and we are happy that you enjoyed the suite accommodations and our wonderful breakfast.  Our in-house restaurant, Vibrante SoCal Kitchen & Bar does follow Mexican traditions with a local flavor along with a full menu offering regionally inspired variety and daily specials.  This menu is always changing.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here for a weekend when my daughter had a soccer tournament. The hotel itself is nice, the check in was fast, the employees are all very nice. And all of the wait staff is excellent as well as the house keeping. The breakfast that is included is very good! Great variety, all tasty and the omelette bar was very good! Also, the evening reception is a nice touch... The rooms are roomy, clean, and the bed was super comfortable! We would stay here again in a heartbeat!   Cons: It's $18/night to park and it really inconvenient parking   No fault of the hotels at all but the kids (mainly soccer team kids) were really obnoxious, loud, messy and running amuck it is no fault of Embassy Suites but their parents really need to get it together   Thanks Embassy Suites!!
Manager Response: Dear Darby, we appreciate all your comments and we're so glad you enjoyed your stay and the best free breakfast in Irvine.  We hope to see you back again whether for sports or just vacation.  There's always so much to do in Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel is newish, very clean, and has excellent service staff. Room was very quiet. Best part of the hotel is the presence of a full Starbucks (as in a store) in the lobby check-in area. Within reasonable driving distance of Newport and Balboa (about 20 minutes), and very close to UC Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Jean, we appreciate the staff recognition and excellent comments.  We added Starbucks last year along with Vibrante, located just off the atrium.  They are equally wonderful so we hope you will comeback and experience both.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Such a beautiful hotel. Loved the view from my room. The view to the outside andand to the inside of the hotel. The lounge was open late allowing me to stay up and people watch while waiting for my friend to arrive. The breakfast buffet was as any hotels. But they did have a cook to make omelettes to order.
Manager Response: Dear Amy, thank you for the wonderful comment.  We are glad the lounge was accommodating until your friend arrived.  In addition to cooked-to-order omelettes the chef's always have a daily special.  Next time you are with us be sure to check this out.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Another great stay at an Embassy Suites
Summary: Great rooms, friendly people, good breakfast and happy hour. We stay at Embassy Suites as often as we can while traveling. Rooms are clean and the step-in shower was better for older people than a tub/shower. Be sure to request one.
Manager Response: Dear Tom and Lynne.  We appreciate the Embassy Suites loyalty and we're so happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  Our King City View Suites are on the 9th and 10th floor and feature the upgraded standing showers.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel, staff, breakfast, location, everything is perfect. The full buffet breakfast was complimentary for me and it was one of the best for now. They also have a great parking, internal restaurant, 24hours service, the room was always clean, etc.
Manager Response: Thank you for your kind comments and we're so happy that you've enjoyed your stay with us and had the opportunity to experience our breakfast.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  PS - Room service hours are 11am - 11pm.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My granddaughter is leaving for Marine boot camp in a couple of weeks.  Her mom, aunt and I wanted to take her for a little R & R before she leaves.  Amanda Gould was wonderful in taking care of our reservation. The room was so warm and inviting and the beds were very comfortable.  We enjoyed the Manager's Cocktail Hour that evening and I can't say enough about Patty and Luis in the bar area. They treated us so well. The next day we Ubered to Rockin Baja and enjoyed a wonderful seafood lunch..   We enjoyed the wonderful cook to order breakfast buffet.  They have a wonderful selection of breakfast food.  Almost anything you could imagine including cook to order eggs and omelets.  We had a very enjoyable stay and gave our granddaughter yet another memory to take with her as she
Manager Response: Dear Cecilia.  Thank you so much for the positive and personal feedback.  We were so happy to have you all here and Amanda loves the opportunity to make special occasions one for your memory book.  We hope you all come back and see us again, maybe when your granddaughter is on leave from serving our country.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Went the extra mile with the event/banquet
Summary: Malonda was tremendous to work with. Very responsive and accommodating. In the end we were missing a piece of equipment that we had not booked for the event. The team looked to see if they had one and let us use it at no extra cost. I am really impressed!
Manager Response: Dear Kim.  Thank you for bringing your meeting to our hotel.  Malonda does an awesome job coordinating events in all four of our meeting rooms and we hope you have the opportunity to come back and meet with us again.  Please tell your your friends and co-workers.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Friendly staff, good food, comfortable rooms, very clean.  Didn't like you have to pay for parking.  Convenient location to John Wayne Airport.  Very good complimentary breakfast and complimentary happy hour !
Manager Response: Dear Susan.  Thank you for your recent stay with us and glad to hear the family enjoyed your vacation.  We also think a great free breakfast is the way to start out the day and glad you also had the opportunity to join us at the evening reception.  PS - We now have some fun family games available in the atrium, AKA the Living Room.  Just ask one of our servers.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I loved the room, the bed was so comfortable, the linens, pillows, towels.  Excellent location. Quiet!  The staff could not be more helpful - especially Dorothy at the front desk. The Starbucks in the lobby was an added plus. Only thing missing: more vegetarian entrees. but that was minor. What i ate from room service was delicious.
Manager Response: We're happy to hear about your wonderful stay!  Thank you for recognizing Dorothy and we agree that adding Starbucks to the lobby has been a huge success.  We are always working on our menu options and appreciate the suggestion.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My mom, sister, daughter, and I wanted to do a mini girls' trip because my daughter is leaving to boot camp in two weeks. We booked this hotel because my sister has used it for business and we loved the location. We arrived early and found that there was a Starbucks in the lobby. We were able to grab a drink, and sit in the lobby to wait for our room to be ready. I loved the lobby. The views looking up were really nice, the furniture was comfortable and the whole area was really clean.  When we checked into the room I was happy to see that the living area was away from the room rather than one big room. The room was clean and well decorated. The sofa was very comfortable.   After we checked in there was a knock on our door. Amanda Gould, the lady who assisted my sister when
Manager Response: Dear Donna.  This was such a fantastic story and I cant wait to share with Amanda and Patty.  Thank you for giving us the opportunity to host your girls trip and we're so happy everyone had such  a great time.  We're especially happy you got to experience everything from Starbucks to Vibrante, breakfast and the evening reception.   Come back and see us again soon for girls trip #2 and try our room service!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hi, I wanted to express my gratitude for such a great stay. There are a couple people I want to commend directly as well as some specialty teams. I have had the opportunity to stay 3 times since May 2017 at this hotel. I have enjoyed my stay every time. I want to start with the breakfast team who first have done a great job on keeping order and cleanliness in the breakfast buffet area. The buffet is fabulous and the team who works the area has diligently worked hard to keep it sanitary and top notch as I have watched them in their work to make it the best  for all the guests eating so thank you to all of them! I want to also commend 2 front desk employees, I have had a great experience with a lady named Dorothy who took my phone call before my first hotel booking. Her phone
Manager Response: We were so thrilled to read about your recent three stays with us and especially the great recognition of both Dorothy and Gabriel.  We will certainly celebrate this with all the team members and cant thank you enough for the awesome five star recommendation.  We hope to see you back really soon!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed with my family for 4 nights. Room is standard suites but the room we're facing parking lot of some corporate and it crowed that means you can't keep you curtains open all the time. Room were bit gloomier.  Happy hour is standard Embassy Suite and full breakfast make sure to be there before 8 AM as after that time they will not refill those sausages and eggs lol Hotel was crowed and I could hear loud noise of people laughing and chatting at 2 AM in the morning. Swimming pool is very small.  Hotel is not a great value for the money spent, I would rather do Marriott Newport Beach instead.
Manager Response: Dear Sean.  Thank you for your recent visit and we do appreciate your business.  Our suites do benefit travelers on both short and long term stays and we take great pride in delivering the best free breakfast in town.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Excellent location and very nice rooms, but avoid the corner suite of the 3rd floor as there is no windows in the leaving room. The bedroom is Quiet, spacious and clean, very good bed and linens. The breakfast is simple, far way to be consider as a nice one. As it is included in the price you have no option to pay for something better. If you arrive between 8.30 and 9am, when it ends, be prepared for long lines and lack of food options. The snacks in the afternoon is out of comment, after staying in more than 100 Hilton hotels in over 35 countries I rank this one as the worse of all.
Manager Response: Dear Marcello, thank you for your recent visit and we are glad the hotel location and suites were very favorable to you.  We welcome any suggestions for breakfast and overall have excellent customer comments for our extensive breakfast buffet and cooked-to-order kitchen.  Embassy Suites provides a wonderful evening reception nightly including two hours of host bar and lite snacks.  During this time we also have a full menu of small and share plates available for purchase at Vibrante for guests looking to make more or a meal.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My husband and I drove down on Friday to attend Rams training camp over the weekend at UC Irvine.  I thought we had a reservation, but there was a glitch when we arrived and it showed the reservation had been cancelled.  After driving 7+ hours and arriving @ almost 10pm, needless to say, I was stressed.  The front desk crew was awesome, in particular, Swietlana.  They helped secure us a room on a sold out weekend at an even better price that I had originally booked.  The entire weekend was perfect.  Our room (#102) we could see the eating area and restaurant.  The complimentary breakfast was superb and had EVERYTHING you could want, including cooked to order omelets.  The room was big, clean and we could not hear any noise for being so close to the main area (atrium), which
Manager Response: Dear Tina,  thank you so much for sharing your experience this past weekend and fantastic to hear that Swietlana, our General Manager, was able to make it happen.  We definitely hope you enjoyed your time in Orange County and the Rams training camp.  We hope to see you back again really soon.  PS - for all you football fans out there.  Both the LA Chargers and the LA Rams are holding training camp less than 3 miles from the hotel.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My family has been making reservations at this hotel for many years. It is so nice to walk in the front door and see familiar faces like Dorothy's. She greeted us with a big smile and hug. It was like seeing a family member. She made us feel welcomed and made our visit enjoyable. All the staff at the hotel are very nice and make you feel very welcomed.  Thank you Dorothy and the rest of the staff of Embassy Suites for making our visit so enjoyable. Looking forward to seeing all of you next year!
Manager Response: We so much appreciate your continued loyalty and we're glad you had the opportunity to experience our new suites, the atrium and our food and beverage outlets.  We'll add your comments to Dorothy's wall of accolades.  She definitely appreciates your enthusiasm.  We're looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Swietlana went above and beyond in helping me secure a room during a sold out weekend. She saved me after a 7 hour drive from Northern CA. Always a pleasure to stay here twice a year for business. Thank you Swietlana & Embassy Suites Irvine
Manager Response: That's awesome news.  Swietlana, our trusted General Manager is always looking out to exceed guest expectations.  We're glad to have you and looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Embassy Suites in Irvine. Everyone was so nice! Breakfast and  omelets were absolutely the best!  They have this jumbo playing cards and Jenna during their evening reception that you ask your sever about it, our kids had a blast! We will be back for sure!
Manager Response: We're glad to hear the family had a fantastic experience.  Those new giant cards, Jenga and there's tic-tac-toe  are all part of transforming our atrium into Irvine's largest living room.  Look for more to come this year.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I like the design of the Embassy in that if you're going to have an atrium, the bedrooms of the suite need to be on the outer perimeter, which is the case. This appears to be an older hotel with some updates and improvements. There was a puddle of water in the floor near the in-room fridge from the fridge defrosting. Staff was called for clean up though I still had to place a towel on the floor beneath the fridge as it continued to defrost. Staff was friendly and check-in and check-out were a breeze. Be prepared to pay for parking at $18 per day which seems to be the norm when staying in California prime locations. Location was quiet and convenient. Though it was close to the airport (KSNA John Wayne - Orange County), I never noticed any aircraft noise. There is a full service
Manager Response: Dear Michael, thank you for sharing and we're sorry to hear about the fridge.    We're looking into your stay history to make sure that unit is properly serviced.   The staff appreciates your kind comments and we hope to see you back again soon.  PS - we do offer complimentary shuttle service to Orange County Airport.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My husband and I stayed for 2 consecutive nights for a conference.  I was pleasantly surprised with our overall experience.   Check in was easy, the middle of the Inn was absolutely gorgeous, open and clean.  The room was built for comfort.  The front room and bedroom had a door which allowed me to wake up early, drink my coffee and watch the news (there are 2 Tv's) without waking up my husband.   There is a microwave and refrigerator in the room.   My husband has a bad back and really enjoyed the comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Dear Kristi, it's always great to hear comments like yours and we're so glad the suite design was a big plus for both you and your husband.  There's always lots to do in Orange County so if business doesn't bring you back come for the fun.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Big place with a lot of staff who showed no interest in anyone other than themselves. The room was fine and the breakfast was standard - certainly nothing unusual. Parking was a real problem. We paid $18 for the night and because we returned at 11:00p.m. we had to park in an overflow lot. Given the alternatives in the area I only would stay there if you need the room with a family
Manager Response: Dear Cubsfan,  We are sorry to hear about your less than perfect stay.  Our #1 goal is guest satisfaction and we will definitely use you review for department meetings to emphasis the impact of a smile and genuine hospitality.  We do hope you will consider us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I appreciate the two room suites.  I'm a lite sleeper, and here I slept very soundly.   The breakfast was tasty and had plenty to choose from, although at times a bit crowded.  This is my go to place to stay when in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Brian, we always love hearing from new guest and becoming your go to hotel.  We're glad the suite arrangement with the bedroom two doors removed from the atrium hallway provided for a restful sleep.  We're looking forward to your next visit.  PS - Use your Hilton Honors app to search for and book your perfect room location through Digital Key.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is in a perfect location for doing business in Orange County. Close to the freeways and central to many businesses. The staff is polite and friendly all treated me like a welcome guest. The room was clean and bathroom spotless. Great bed with fresh smelling sheets and very nice pillows. Very restfull. Breakfast was simply excellent with a helpful wait / clearing staff. Parking is behind the hotel which is a bit inconvienient , but in this town space is limited so they get a pass.   A very helpful front desk staff that remembered me from a previous visit and made me feel like they genuinely cared. Convieient to McCormick and Schmick's which I have reviewed in the past.
Manager Response: We love the description "perfect location for doing business in Orange County."  We are so happy to hear about your experience and the staff interaction.  there's always something new in Irvine/Orange County so look forward to your next visit.  PS - Did you have the chance to try out our new Starbucks?  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Management feels a sense of entitlement to disrespect Guest...
Summary: Management was extremely rude speaking about guest in Spanish, unaware that the guest understood every word. Threatened to cancel reservation to give to another guest if not checked in before 9pm. Harassed at checkout every 10 mins after being denied a late checkout, regardless of Memembership statis
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback and I'm very concerned about your comments.  I would be delighted to speak with you directly about this experience so we can work with our associates and our high standard of service expected for all guests.  Please reach out to me directly at the hotel at any time.  949-553-8332.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Always liked the open atrium structure.  suite set up is very comfortable, roomier and more quiet.  Interior design is modern and elegant.  Pool is a bit small.  Fitness center is also small.  Location is good, close to my destination.  Parking is extra $18.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy, we're glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and liked our new modern decor and location.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Nice, clean, spacious hotel with buffet breakfast/ happy hour included. Starbucks in lobby and great staff. Good value for the $$. Popular for groups and families. Indoor pool/ jacuzzi with small outdoor patio. Downside is $18 parking in adjacent garage
Manager Response: Thank you for the generous comments and we're very happy that you enjoyed your stay and our new Starbucks store.  We hope you will come visit us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We enjoyed the clean rooms . We enjoyed the lobby area.The complimentary breakfast had a lot of choices.The omelets were awesome.We also enjoyed the complimentary drinks between 530 and 730.One thing I didn't expect was we had to pay for parking 18$ a day.I didn't expect that. she gave it to me for 10$. The people that work there were all very nice and helpful.  i
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing.  We love our free breakfast as much as our guests and glad you had the opportunity to join us for the evening reception.  Our team hopes to see you back again in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great hotel and excellent location for attending the UCI orientation.  Recently updated and it shows.  It looks brand new.  Unfortunately, I experienced a medical emergency while there and was met with a caring, helpful staff throughout.  Thanks to all and we'll definitely be back.
Manager Response: Steve, we're sorry the medical emergency shortened your stay but glad to have the opportunity for our staff to help out.  We're a corporate partner with UC Irvine and always glad to have some Anteaters in-house.  We'll see you soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Overall great experience for business bookings
Summary: We booked approximately 20 rooms this past week for our company. Everyone enjoyed their stay and our staff were happy with the hotel. Amanda was great and made the booking process very easy, even with multiple changes!
Manager Response: Dear Katyo, thank you for bringing the group last week and we're thrilled that all attendees enjoyed their stay.  We'll pass along your comments to Amanda in the sales office and hope to see you all back again very soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We have stayed at this Irvine Embassy Suites several times and it never disappoints.  Whenever my daughter has a softball tournament in Irvine we always reserve a room here.  The breakfast is fabulous.  The service is wonderful.  Centrally located, it is easy to hop on the freeway and get where we need to go.
Manager Response: We love say welcome back and thank you or your continued loyalty.  We hope you enjoyed all the new changes as we completed an extensive upgrade in 2016 including Vibrante and Starbucks.  Until next time, safe travels.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Dorothy made my week long stay great. She is a key team player.
Summary: I recently stayed here after having major surgery in the area. I had arrived the night prior to my surgery and was greeted with great enthusiasm by Dorothy. She casually asked my if I was here on business or vacation so I decided to disclose the details of my visit and that I would be returning after my procedure. Dorothy jumped right into action letting me know that she could arrange for a wheelchair and anything else I might need to make my stay pleasant. She also assigned a room for me in a location where I would have the most peaceful and restful experience. She made sure I knew where everything was if I had a need. It was as if I had  someone from my family looking in on me which was nice since I was alone. I want to thank her because I'm sure her personal touched aided in
Manager Response: What a great story.  We're glad the procedure went well and thank you for letting us accommodate you during the recovery.  Our service promise is based on family values and your experience sounds like classic Dorothy.  We'll be sure to share this with all the team members and hope you might come back and see us again for vacation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Totally enjoyed hotel and staff. Complimentary breakfast and happy hour was absolutely fantastic. The staff at breakfast went out of their way to please us. They made my Dad biscuits and gravy one morning when it was not even on the menu.  Our last evening after wedding the bar stayed open late so that the wedding party could have a night cap.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments and really like to hear how the staff went above and beyond for breakfast and at the bar.  We hope the wedding was great and please do come back and see us again maybe next year.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very good experience.  Clean, comfortable room.  Friendly and helpful staff.  Excellent food.  I would recommend this hotel.  It's also a great location for travel and business and it is close to the airport and serves a wonderful free breakfast.
Manager Response: We are glad to hear about your experience and our friendly staff.  Thank you for the recommendation for both business and pleasure.  PS - the hotel has courtesy shuttle to Orange County Airport just 5 minutes away.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is one of the best stays I've had in awhile. Everything about the hotel was nice: courteous staff, newly renovated large rooms, comfortable beds, excellent breakfast, nice lobby to include a Starbucks, and convenient to airport and other sites. I totally enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: It doesn't get much better than hearing this was one of your best stays.  Thank you for the awesome staff comments and we're so glad to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We hope to see you back again soon and please tell a friend.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Two nice stays in a week
Summary: We stayed here twice because a family member flew out of John Wayne Airport, which is an outstanding facility, BTW.  This hotel met our expectations with few exceptions.  It has a shuttle that will take guests to restaurants that are in close proximity to the hotel.  The shuttle driver was prompt, courteous, and professional.  We had to wait only about ten-minutes on our return trip.  I was pleased the the manager's reception.  The bartender was skilled and courteous.  We also liked the variety of snacks.  There were nachos with available jalapenos, popcorn, Cheese-It crackers, and a few other things.  The staff was a little slow cleaning up tables, but that wasn't a major concern.  The bed in our room was comfortable and the room was quiet.  The climate system worked well.  One
Manager Response: Dear James, we appreciate the back-to-back stays and were very happy to hear you had such a good experience and a great nights sleep.  Thank you for all your feedback which is shared weekly with our staff meeting.  Please know that parking is not charged to cover any breakfast or reception charges.  We do not own the garage and it's shared between the other two office buildings.   We will look forward to seeing you again the next time you are flying out of SNA airport.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at this property, we were treated well by everyone at the property, from the front desk to the restaurant. The morning breakfast was nice and tasty. Now the manager's reception was weak. Not much of a selection as other Ebassy Suits we have stayed at had a larger selection. In in all we enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad you enjoyed the property.  The evening staff rotates snacks for the evening reception to keep variety for our guests on longer stays.  We are very happy to hear you enjoyed our free breakfast and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: An Excellent Choice of Hotel for Business and Conference Purposes
Summary: An absolutely GREAT place to stay, whether just traveling or for business meetings and conferences .  The rooms are exceptionally clean and well-facilitated and the food is excellent and abundant, particularly the complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear John, we're so happy to hear about your GREAT experience.  Did you also have a chance to dine with us at Vibrante or Starbucks.  We hope to see you back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was by far the worst experience I've ever had in Irvine. I booked at the Embassy Suites because I was traveling with my family. The minute I go inside my room I find there is semen on the couch. I called the front desk and to let them know the guy answering the phone said I can't confirm whether it is or isn't isn't semen. Then in the bathroom there's a ton of hair on the bathroom floor and in the shower. This place is absolutely disgusting I should have realized it when I saw security guards standing around in the lobby. If you enjoy having your room smell like urine then you'll love this place. For breakfast there weren't enough tables for my family to sit down and have breakfast.   I have made several attempts since I can't get through to the hotel manager I will
Manager Response: Dear Douglas.  We are sorry to hear this was your worst experience ever.  We take all comments very serious and have never had a guest complaint similar to yours.  I had not heard of any situation as you describe and please contact me directly if you would like to further discuss the matter.  Please call the hotel at 949-553-8332 and ask for my office.  I look forward to better understanding your experience.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary Heading: Great for Newport Beach vacation stay
Summary: Very clean hotel with wonderful staff. The morning breakfast is terrific with many options that include hot buffet items, made to order omelets, and plenty of other choices for children. The dining area is clean and the morning staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Jim, thanks for staying with us on your recent vacation.  We're so happy to hear our location and facilities were enjoyable.  We also appreciate the comments regarding our team members.  They are working hard every day to make each guests stay the best they can be.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We chose the Embassy Suites Irvine as it would be a convenient location for our far-flung family to gather for a long-delayed reunion.  The staff (particularly Jasmine Stewart) were exceptional in working with us to plan all of our details, including two group dinners.  The hotel, although not new, had been recently renovated and the rooms and public spaces were great.  All were very impressed with the rooms, food and service.  Would choose the Embassy Suites Irvine again, without hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear Ricci family.  We were thrilled to host your extended family last weekend and are so pleased you enjoyed the dinner events and had the opportunity to reconnect.  We'll be sure to share your comments with Jasmine and will hope to welcome back the entire family in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This Embassy is clean, modern, and pretty well managed.  We've stayed there 2 times in the past 45 days for 2-3 nights each time.  Breakfast is very good.  One thing they could do more strategically is only allow 1 omelette per person in line, so that each person behind them can judge how much time they will be standing there.  For example, there was a big group of softball and baseball families in...so the lines were long at the buffet.  We were in the omelette line for 22 minutes as we watched people order 3 & 4 omelettes at a time, which made the length of the line more deceptive.  The manager came over to close the omelette line on us at 9:00 a.m. (after standing in the line for 22 minutes) & I mentioned to her the strategy that would help.  She was very kind and allowed the
Manager Response: Dear Danny, thank you for both of your recent stays and we're very happy to hear about you stays.  We also appreciate the breakfast feedback and please know that all guest commentary is reviewed weekly and discussed for opportunities to improve the guest experience.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: July 1st Wedding Needed Block of Rooms
Summary: I worked with Jasmine Stewart from the group sales department at the Irvine Embassy Suites Hotel to get a block of rooms for my son's wedding.  Her and her staff Michelle Beristain went above and beyond to assist in making this happen.  I highly recommend using Embassy Suites Irvine!!   The hotel staff was amazing even though it was a busy weekend and they were sold out they had plenty of staff to assist in getting us checked in.  They have an evening reception with free snacks and alcoholic beverages as well as a made to order breakfast each morning.  Very fresh and lots to choose from.  Exceptional service all around.
Manager Response: Thank You for taking the time to let us know about your stay and for your kind words about our staff. I am very pleased to see that we were able to meet and exceed your expectation with our rooms, and amenities. I will make sure to share your comments with Jasmine, and Michelle as well.  We take pride in delivering exceptional service, and creating fun and memorable experiences.  We know that you have many choices when selecting a hotel, and we hope that you will continue to make our hotel your first your choice whenever you’re in the Irvine area.    Please feel free to contact me with any comments, or suggestions you may have in the future.   Warmest Regards,  John Pease  Front Office Manager Embassy Suites

Summary: This is exactly what you expect with ES.  There were a couple of issues:  Our room had a very loud air conditioning system, broken loud, not just annoying loud. The hot tub was gross.  The water is green or covered in foam, but not the normal bubbles you often see. Breakfast was overrun every day.  The hotel know how many people are checked in.  It should be able to manage the load.  Probably this is an unusual week due to July 4th, but there were just about zero business travelers.  I travel for business and this place would have made me anxious.  Staff was nice.  Starbucks was great.  If your kids want a pool to swim in, this is probably not your hotel.....however, go to the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Dave, thank you for your recent visit and taking the time to share comments.  We were very busy over the Holiday week with leisure travel.  Our typical midweek is nearly 100% corporate travel with leisure on the weekends.  Glad you enjoyed the new Starbucks and hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Excellent location, price and accomadations. Breakfast and evening receptions were excellent and was surprisingly good choices of beverages and food. Only issue, lack of parking spaces and parking lot is way too small for vehicles.
Manager Response: Thank You for taking the time to let us know about your stay. I am very pleased to see that we were able to meet and exceed your expectation with our rooms, and amenities. We are working on some new parking alternatives, to help improve our parking situation for our guest in the very near future.  We take pride in delivering exceptional service, and creating fun and memorable experiences.   We know that you have many choices when selecting a hotel, and we hope that you will continue to make our hotel your first your choice whenever you’re in the Irvine area.    Please feel free to contact me with any comments, or suggestions you may have in the future.   Warmest Regards,  John Pease  Front Office Manager Embassy Suites

Summary: Hotel was clean, a couple of not so nice people, had to call maintenance 3 times and I was there 3 nights. Breakfast was good. Location is good. A lot of really good restaurants around. Spoke to one of sales people there. Her name is Elizabeth. She is a very nice person.
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and do apologize for the maintenance issues.  It's great you also had the opportunity to meet Elizabeth from our sales office and we'll be sure to share your comments with her.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Quiet Oasis Amid Orange County's Hustle and Bustle
Summary: We enjoyed our 4th of July weekend in the O.C. Traffic was terrible. Restaurants were crammed with people. Supermarkets lines were like Disneyland rides. But, we checked into the Embassy Suites at Irvine and found peace and quiet. Both the bedroom and living room were used for sleeping and were very quiet. Breakfast with made to order omelets are always delicious. Even though the parking lot was full, so the hotel was full, the managers and staff worked hard to make everyone at breakfast feel at home. I saw the hotel manager actually serving people on the buffet line. Adviso: Coffee is super hot! They have happy hour with drinks and snacks in the evening so you can relax and unwind. Front desk staff was very helpful, but you can also check out on the TV in your room if you want
Manager Response: It was so great to read about your Holiday experience at the hotel.  We're glad to have had you and very happy to share with the rest of our team.  Please come back and see us again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I travel into and out of SNA several times a month over the past two years.  I've stayed at most of the Marriotts and several of the Hilton properties in the area.  This was my first, and probably last, stay at this Hilton property.  Honestly, had I read the reviews prior to booking, I might have still booked here; I would've thought that the good reviews outweighed the bad. However,I didn't read the reviews until after I had already checked into my room and had already sensed things were not quite up to the  Hilton standard I have come to know and expect as a Diamond member.  First of all, believe what people have said about the parking lot - it is jacked up!  The majority of the non-garage spots are designated as handicapped or Starbucks only.  There were a few 20 minute spots
Manager Response: Dear sea12hawks.  We certainly appreciate your business and sincerely apologize  for missing the mark in several areas that lead to your disappointing experience.  Our service culture is built around servicing our guest like they were family.  I will be reaching out to you directly to further discuss on how we can make this right and win your business back.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Pros:  - Suites were big and spacious.  - Good value for money  - Good shuttle service.  - Nice breakfast.  - Good hospitality, they told me about the free shuttle service when I checked in.  - Very nice location.  Cons:  - Old and not so clean bathroom tubs.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and we are glad to hear you enjoyed our spacious suites and location.  We will share your comments with the housekeeping team as the hotel recently spent millions in upgrades including bathrooms.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Hidden Charges and poor room quality
Summary: Staff was condescending and was unable to address concerns. They kept repeating how the room rate was discounted. They charged a hefty fee for parking. Everything else including internet was additional money that was not  disclosed.  Bathroom ceiling had patches, and broken toilet roll fixture. Furniture was dirty and worn.   AC was not working.
Manager Response: We appreciate your feedback and would like to speak with you directly to better understand your experience.  Our parking and Wi-Fi charges are clearly posted on all websites and Wi-Fi is free for all Hilton Honors members booking directly with the hotel.  We would definitely appreciate the opportunity to know which room you were in to have the opportunity to fix any issues.  I hope to hear from you and please contact me directly at any time.  Sincerely, John Pease Front Office Manager 949-553-8332

Summary: Easy Check In and Friendly Staff. Enjoyed the evening drinks and snacks, along with a terrific full breakfast. All Complimentary. Great Rooms. Free Shuttle to take you within a 3 mile radius. What is not to like?
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate the great comments.  We're glad you enjoyed your visit and hope to see you back again soon.  Did you have the chance to try our new Starbucks located in the hotel lobby?  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Broken Toliet Seat and poor room service
Summary: Very nice looking hotel but they could not even repair a broken toilet seat nor could they stock the room with basic items such as towels, washcloths or toilet paper with calling the front desk daily or multiple times to get what was needed.
Manager Response: Dear Mike, thank you for taking the time to share your comments and we do apologize for the short comings.  I believe I've identified your suite number and have discussed with our operations team for follow-up and our standards.  We do hope that this experience will not affect your decision to try us again on any future stay in Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel was clean, quiet and comfortable. Price is good for all you get. Happy Hour, complementary breakfast and evening snacks. Starbucks located inside hotel. Rooms were large and beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we're so happy you had the opportunity to enjoy all our fantastic and free amenities.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall experience was excellent!   We were very pleased with the staff- from the front desk to the restaurant/bar personnel.  From check-in the check-out we were treated extremely courtesy and professionalism.
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear you really enjoyed your stay and congratulations to your daughter on her graduation.  We hope you have the opportunity to come back and stay with us again in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel could use some refreshment. Nice atrium, interesting architecture, but it looks and smells heavily used. The air in my room was too stuffy and totally lacked oxygen.  Breakfast is okay and free drinks in the evening are a pleasant detail. But all in all I would want to stay elsewhere next time until this hotel undergoes some modern renovation.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments and we are a little surprised considering nearly all guest response have praised the $12 million renovation we completed mid-last year including all of the guest suites.  If there's any detail we can improve in the suite you occupied we'd certainly love the opportunity to make sure it's completely up to standard.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our favorite chain of hotels!  A hidden gem, a beautiful hotel chain in the middle of a business district.  Again, embassy suites did not disappoint. Beautiful rooms awesome room service.  Would definitely stay at this hotel again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Theresa, thank you so much for this awesome review.  We're glad to be your favorite brand and that the hotel was able to deliver such a memorable experience.  Please tell all your friends and we hope to see you back again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Good complimentary breakfast!! Omelette bar and fresh fruit. Extremely courteous service from wait help during breakfast. Parking reasonable. Good customer service, even recommendations for eating outside of the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Craig, thanks for sharing and we're very happy to hear you had a good experience and especially the best free breakfast in town.  We appreciate the referral and come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The only thing I found was that I checked in at 3:30pm and there was a dirty plate left outside the door left from the previous guest.  That night the dirty plate was still outside the door.  The next morning when I checked out the dirty plate was still outside the door.  The staff needs to know that a dirty plate left outside the door is not someone else's problem.  It's good service for anyone in the staff to take proper steps to get rid of the plate.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we're happy to hear it was an overall good experience.  Our staff should have picked up that plate on any of the scheduled floor runs and we will review with the team and the importance of cleanliness as a hotel standard.  Thank you for sharing this with us and we hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My husband and I had to make a quick trip overnight for a funeral. There are so many wonderful things to mention about this hotel. We had a relaxing time enjoying happy hour, then invited our daughter and friend to join us for dinner there. Ascension was our amazing waiter who went above and beyond to make sure we were happy with everything.  The room was lovely, the bed wonderfully comfortable and all so clean. We enjoyed a lovely made to order omelette with everything you could possibly want for breakfast. Check in and out was a breeze. Stay here. You won't be disappointed that you did!
Manager Response: We're glad to have been there for your recent stay and very much appreciate the staff recognition.  We will certainly share this with the F&B team.  We hope you might have the opportunity to come back and visit us again on vacation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I had great difficulty parking. I am handicapped. No handicap parking or other parking spaces available around the hotel. I attempted to park in the parking structure, drove around many times, could not find a space. Difficulty using the machine to enter and leave the parking structure.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear that you had some challenges with parking.  We do have accessible only parking at the front of the hotel and our team members are available to help secure a space in the event that all are occupied.  Please do not hesitate to ask our team for assistance the next time you are visiting with us.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel exceeded our expectations.  We stayed here the past weekend with a softball team.  The hotel staff were gracious, patient, and extremely helpful.  I would especially like to thank Jibek for helping with check-in, and Dorothy and the fourth floor housekeeping staff for returning my bag and jacket which I had left in my room after checkout.  Thank you to everyone for being kind to all of us there with small children.  You all are appreciated and I look forward to staying here again next time.
Manager Response: We're so glad to hear about your experience and very happy to share your comments with Jibek and Dorothy.  We hope to see you back again either with the team or a well deserved vacation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My first trip to California was an amazing one! Everyone at this establishment was great! Dorothy made our trip stress free after my mistake of not booking this hotel for an extra day. She gave me a book that showed us a bit of everything to do in California, which helped a lot by the way! Thanks to Dorothy, we will be coming back, I felt like I was welcomed by everyone, specially Dorothy, she is like family now!
Manager Response: Wow!  Best vacation ever is so great to hear.  We sincerely appreciate the shout out to Dorothy at the front desk and very happy she made it happen for you.  Thank you for the awesome recommendation and we hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed here for business travel. The hotel staff was very friendly, the check-in and out process was quick. Breakfast was included and was EXCELLENT. Internet was fast. Overall, it was a great experience. I'll  be staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites on your recent business trip and we're glad to hear you loved the free breakfast.  We put a lot of capital into Wi-Fi upgrades to make sure our guests can always connect and get their job done.  Thank you for the recommendation and please recommend us to your co-workers.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall, I would say that the hotel is absolutely wonderful. I really had a fun time and this was such an awesome experience for me personally. I would say one of the best things about this trip was trying out there omelets. Erick, is such a wonderful cook and man his omelets tasted so good. Honestly, best omelet I've ever had.
Manager Response: Erick will so much appreciate the "best omelet" compliment.  He takes great pride every morning dishing out hundreds of personalized breakfast experiences.  Thank you for the recommendation and we hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: I love Embassy Suites but NOT this one folks...
Summary: The food was very nasty,cold and happy hour selection needs improving!The security guard was a joke!Entire soccer team arrived on friday,OUT of control,no supervision. Ghetto!Children holding up the elevator,so other guest couldn't come and go on the premise,knocking from door to door disturbing guest who weren't with their group. Urinating in the jacuzzi and pool,due to no staff on duty!!! Illegal parking of other guest who cared less about hotel policy of 18.00 a day fee and that's wrong!  I was offered one day sales tax credit for our bad experience,NOT!I love Embassy Suites and I always book no matter where I visit but this one "NO MAAM NO SIR!" The staff was very kind and courteous but one must also know how to make sure all guest are NOT affected by another guest demeanor
Manager Response: Dear praisesgoup,  We never look forward to hearing about a bad experience and sincerely apologize that you were not able to enjoy the weekend.  Our team and security work very hard to ensure that every guest has a great stay even over challenging situations.  Please know that we do see increased occupancy over summer weekends as do all the hotels in the area but that's not always the case.  We do hope you will consider another opportunity to have a great experience with us in the future should travel have you returning to Orange County.

Summary: I stay at a lot of Hilton properties all over the US while on business.  This location is one of my favorites thanks to great service.  As a recent example, Jibek, in guest services, took her own time (and postage) and kindly mailed a letter home for me.  Thanks!
Manager Response: Russ, thanks for sharing and we appreciate you recognizing Jibek at the front desk.  We're glad to be one of your favorites and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: From outside it really does no justice to the inside. The lobby is so fresh and feels like you stepped into a garden. I was so impressed with the staff and how they work so hard to make it look so clean. I definitely will stay here again. My trip was for a sports event and really not expecting what I got. The room was so big and the sleeping quarters is  separate with a door that closes so you can have some quiet as your family is watching T.V. or talking. Real nice!!
Manager Response: Dear Marci, that's an awesome visual of our redefined atrium and the guest experience as you walk through the hotel.  Our goal was to transform the space into Irvine largest living room and a place guests would enjoy complimentary breakfast, the evening social and a place to relax.  We're also happy to hear the spacious suites exceeded your expectations and hope this makes a great reason to come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great service and staff! Highly recommend this hotel! From check in to check out the staff made sure we were well taken care of. All of our pre-check in requests were accommodated. The room was clean and comfortable.
Manager Response: We appreciate the staff recognition and allowing the team to setup your pre-arrival requests.  Thank you for the awesome recommendation and we look forward to seeing you again.  PS - send us your pre-arrival requests so we can have this waiting for in advance.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Best hotel!! I recommend it!!!Cleaning staff, kitchen staff and everyone else are amazing and friendly!! The rooms are very clean, breakfast is delicious and happy hour is the best! This is my second time staying in this amazing hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Maria, we so glad you had your second amazing experience with us at the hotel.  We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to seeing you again.  Thanks and please tell all your friends.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Excellent and clean room! The staff was really friendly as well every time we asked for help! I believe her name was Dorothy, she was very helpful with the problem I had with the room. Excellent service and staff, good job Embassy suites
Manager Response: Dear Emad, we're so happy to hear about your excellent room and the complimentary breakfast buffet.  We'll be sure to pass along your comments to Dorothy at the front desk and hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: You know what you're getting with Embassy Suites:  1. open tall atrium ringed with 2 room suites (a large sitting/living/office room that can be a second BR, a micro "kitchen", and a relatively large bath and nice sized BR. 2. An included standard breakfast bar (pre made buffet of pancakes, scrambled eggs, oatmeal, bacon, sausages, cereal, yoghurt, fruit, juices, coffee, custom omelette station run by a live cook. 3. Evening included cocktail hour.  The difference with this ES:  1. Top notch service from chauffeur to reception. 2. A better than average business center with no extra charges, online, printing, etc. (again, excellent service: I asked what was the procedure to print. They didn't just tell me, but a person walked me to it and through it. No frustration). Unlike I.e.
Manager Response: We appreciate all our guests taking the time to send us their comments and have to say your in depth review has to be one of our favorites.   Thank you so much for the staff recognition and detailed experience.  The team worked very hard to bring about this transformation and for creating the go-to hotel experience in Irvine.  We hope to see you back soon and hope you will tell all your friends.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel was very well rounded, staff was really welcoming, breakfast was by far the best I have ever had. Evening reception could have been a little better, same food all the time. Front desk was very helpful
Manager Response: We appreciate your very kind comments about the staff and the hotel experience.  We do hope to see you back at the hotel on any future travel plans to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Spent 3 nights here during the memorial day weekend and enjoyed it immensely. Bed was very comfortable, beddings were soft and pleasantly smelling, and the room was huge. I loved the bathroom modern design - grayish white color, very clean lines, walk in shower. Their made to order breakfast and evening snack were definite bonuses. Sadly, didn't try the indoor pool but used the fitness room once. The overall experience was very satisfactory however it gets a little noisy during the weekend by the atrium.
Manager Response: We are so happy to have had the opportunity to host your Staycation and that you really enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and the evening reception.  We also hope you liked our new Starbucks located in the main lobby.  Come back and see us again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Had a pleasant stay with our entire team in this hotel. Love the free breakfast and the free happy hour of drinks was amazing. Hotel offers a lot. We where there for a soccer tournament and we all enjoyed it.
Manager Response: Dear Fernando.  We're glad you and the team had such a great stay with us.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Over Memorial Day weekend my extended family stayed in several rooms at Embassy Suites. I can't say enough about the level of customer care: from the greeter at breakfast to the barista to the manager, we felt welcome. For example, I checked out of my room and had extra time before my flight. I took Lyft to the mall and became stranded when my phone (or the app) froze. The hotel manager came to pick me up, brought my suitcase and I made my flight! The rooms were very clean, updated and spacious. The food in the restaurant onsite was delicious. Great stay all around!
Manager Response: Dear Marlene, we're so happy you brought the entire family to stay with us this past weekend and so glad to hear about your wonderful experience.  We appreciate your five star feedback and recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We've come to the Embassy Suites Irvine many times and we keep coming back.  This year upon arriving we noticed all the changes in the hotel since the previous year.  From the Starbucks in the lobby to great upgrades in the room its a great hotel.  If you're considering booking here as a group I would recommend it.  Jasmine does an amazing job taking care of your group and making everything is set when you arrive.
Manager Response: Thank you again for coming back yet another year and with a new class of students.  We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed all the new amenities we added during the big renovation.  We're looking forward to the next opportunity to have you back at the hotel and will certainly share your message with Jasmine in the sales department.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: To Amanda, the consummate, courteous great corporate relations mgr, Efficient and great deals for long term. To Dorothy, always available, professional, always accommodating and caring. To Eric, the breakfast is amazing and beautifully cooked. And Theresa, her maid service is simply lovely, never misses anything. For all the professionals who have to call the hotel home, theres simply no other place that comes close to this property. All my thanks and gratitude guys!
Manager Response: We couldn't ask for a better letter of recommendation and thank you so much for acknowledging our hard working staff.  We're so happy you enjoyed your stay and had such a wonderful experience.  We hope to see you back again at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Awful check in and check out!!!!!
Summary: The guy who checked us in last night on may 25th 2017. So rude!! Absolutely will never stay here again. I went to front desk in the morning and I thought it would get better did not! The girl did not even say sorry. Worse front desk staff Iv ever seen.
Manager Response: Erica, we do apologize if you felt any of our associates were less than professional in their interactions.  The comments are not specific to allow for any associate coaching and if you like please feel comfortable in reaching out to me directly if you would like to further discuss your experience.  Sincerely, John Pease Front Office Manager

Summary: The front desk hotel receptionist, a Hispanic female, was very rude and obnoxious. I had requested an early check-in and she did not call me when she said she would call. I had to walk back up to the front desk and reminder that I was waiting, which was about an hour after she had promised to call me. She then checked me into the worst, smallest room they had available  that had very little to no Wifi connectivity.
Manager Response: Kevin, we do apologize if rooms were not immediately available for an early check-in request as the hotel was at very high occupancy last week and check out time is 12 noon.  We will certainly review your comments with the front desk team to ensure we are communicating via text or phone to keep guests well informed.  Thank you for your comments.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: For in and out business people
Summary: Got early check in. Registration staff nice/assisted my husband with getting new key card as it didn't work. On arrival, noted stained drapes and TV wasn't working well. Housekeeping changed out drapes quickly and maintenance came and worked on tv. Room service trays left outside doors whole day...nauseating. Bright spot was the nice staff and the chefs at the grill were quick and handled the breakfast omelet crowd easily.
Manager Response: Dear Roxanne, thank you for your comments and we're very happy to hear about an overall nice experience.  We will share your comments regarding the room service trays and thank you for recognizing the chefs.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: LETICIA IS THE FREAKIN BEST BARISTA IN THE WORLD
Summary: I just got some of the best service I've ever had in my entire life from Leticia at the Starbucks!! She was so nice and so fast and made the best coffee I've ever had. Normally I wouldn't go to a hotel Starbucks but Leticia makes it completely worth it. Because of this exceptional person, i will go out of my way just to go to this Starbucks. Thanks Leticia!!!!!
Manager Response: Eli, thank you for the awesome team member recognition.  We appreciate your patronage of our Starbucks location and please tell your friends and co-workers we're looking forward to seeing you all.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: One of the better Embassy Suites.  The number of rooms is smaller so the attention to detail is a little better than usual (which is good anyway).  The happy hour goodies were extra nice.  Good selection of cold cuts and cheese.  Staff was great. They just have to upgrade some of their older room air conditioners - too noisy.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and sharing the experience.  We're so glad you enjoyed the complimentary evening reception and we love hearing great stories about the staff.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I was here recently on business and my experience was amazing thanks to such an amazing staff!
