A woman by the name of Leticia was incredibly sweet, charming, and SO helpful and made my stay all the better. I'm definitely going to come back in the future with friends and family because of the experience with this employee (as well as the rest of the staff). Also, I loved the amenities and location. Thank you!!
Manager Response: Dear Kasey, thank you for sharing this awesome five star review and specifically for pointing out great service from Leticia.  We're all very happy you had such a great experience and do appreciate the friends and family recommendation.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is very clean, employees are great and the Starbucks staff themselves are very friendly and great, especially Leticia! She made my experience very enjoyable! The buffet is good and the happy hour is amazing.
Manager Response: Dear Raquel, we're so happy to hear about your great experience and glad you enjoyed our breakfast buffet.  We'll be sure to let the Starbucks crew and Leticia know how much you appreciated their service.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great hotel to stay for it's location
Summary: Hotel is good for its price.  Breakfast is great except for a long line at omelet section . Overall stay is okay .  Hotel is clean .  Amenities such as ironing board was not available in the room - had to request
Manager Response: Rafael, thank you for your recent visit and we're happy to hear you had a good experience and enjoyed the breakfast.  We do have ironing boards in all rooms and glad you reported this so it could be quickly rectified.  We do hope to see you back on any future trip to Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The Embassy Suites, Irvine was always pleasant but now it has a fresh and contemporary vibe that is both comforting and exhilarating. It is well located in the Irvine business core and minutes from the airport. But its real value is the quality of the experience, staff and rooms.
Manager Response: Dear Linda, thank you on this recent visit and we're so happy to hear your comments about the extensive upgrades put in place the last 12 months.  We are very glad our central Irvine location was valuable for your trip and very much appreciate your comments about staff and service.  We hope to see you back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed at this Embassy Suites on our multi-day trip to Disneyland (we also had previously stayed at this hotel).  The check in process was a breeze and Meghan at front desk was very friendly and helpful.  The rooms seem to have been remodeled recently as it was very clean and new.  The only two improvement areas are to improve the quality of the sleeper bed in the couch (mattress/bed was not as comfortable) and to offer an early breakfast option on weekend (we had to leave before breakfast to get to Disneyland).  Otherwise, another very good stay at an Embassy!
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing the family on your Disneyland adventure.  We're glad you enjoyed the new upgrades and will share your comments with the front desk team.  Breakfast hours on weekends are 7 AM to 10:30 AM to better accommodate our leisure guests.  Often times we do have the beverage station and parts of the continental breakfast available 30 minutes early and our Starbucks does open daily at 5:30 AM for those very early risers.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: amazing staying delicious food wonderful employees what else can you ask for? the breakfast food was superb and fresh very tasty, Erick the cook in the omelet station was very helpful great asset to your hotel
Manager Response: Marcos, thank you for sharing and letting us know about your great breakfast experience with Erick.  We will certainly pass on your comments to the F&B team and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great Stay! Very nice staff and loved the huge room!
Summary: Check in staff were so kind, went above & beyond. I loved being able to pick my own room!  Restaurant staff very helpful. Nice to have a fridge and a microwave in room. I Will stay here again! The carpet in the room needs updating.
Manager Response: Julie, thank you for your recent visit and we're glad to hear the digital key option of choosing your room location worked out so well.  We also appreciate your kind words regarding the front desk team and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed in a room that offered a sofa bed as we were traveling with our teenager. The breakfast is fantastic and that alone made it worth the stay! Having our own room so our son had some privacy and so did my husband and I was definitely an added bonus. Overall it is a very clean facility, close to many places to eat, and offers free breakfast and free beer during cocktail hour so all in all it was a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Autumn, thank you for your recent stay and bringing the whole family.  Our two room suites are great for family travel so everyone can enjoy their own time schedule.  We're glad you had the opportunity to experience most of our food and beverage offerings ad hope that travel will bring you back to Orange County in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The rooms here are awesome it's newly renovated & it came out really nice there's also a Starbucks in the lobby now really convenient. The breakfast buffet in the weekend mornings is also a plus & parking is easy! The service is astounding by the way
Manager Response: Thank you for the great five star review and we're so happy that you enjoyed all our recent upgrades including Starbucks in the lobby!  Our complimentary breakfast buffet is available 7 days a week and if you missed it we also have a two hour evening reception with full host bar.  Come join us next time you are in town.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Door to room did not work. They did not move us nor fixed it. Check out was not good, they did not give me my 5th night free as a silver Hilton honors member. Food was nothing special the same free breakfast as any other discount hotel also was luke warm. Should of went to the Marriott the breakfast is hot and tasty.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear your experience was less than five stars and please do reach out to me directly at the hotel if you would like to further discuss.  Silver Honors members do not receive a 5th night free unless this was a special promotion you booked.  Nearly all guest comments give our very extensive free breakfast top marks and it's much more than most paid breakfast options one would find at other hotel locations.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Friendly staff! Clean rooms and nice breakfast and evening reception. Always enjoy the Embassy suites. Newly renovated  and Starbucks conveniently located in lobby.  Nearby restaurants and shuttle offered
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome five star review and recommendation.  We appreciate your Embassy Suites loyalty and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: By design, when the outside air  temperature is between 60°F & 70°.F no heat AND no air conditioning is available in any guest room and I believe in the common areas as well. If you want a space heater try to call and reserve one in advance.  Everything else about the hotel was pleasing.  Great staff! Full cook to order breakfast Elevators in good working order and come promptly when summoned. Whole Foods market and other shopping within 2 miles.
Manager Response: Dear Amy, we appreciate your recent stay with us and do apologize if there were any AC issues with your suite.  Each room can be controlled individually for heat and cold so there's a chance we needed to have maintenance look at that unit.  We're glad you enjoyed our breakfast, service and location.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Excellent breakfast; lots of choices including make-to-order omelettes.  Room maid very efficient & friendly.  Very convenient to all attractions including Disneyland.   Walking distance to SNA airport.  Good value for money.
Manager Response: Charles, were so glad to hear you had an enjoyable stay and time to visit Disneyland.  We hope you will come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: ABSOLUTELY BEST BANG FOR YOUR BUCK!
Summary: Huge clean rooms, free happy hour, free made to order breakfast and beautiful surroundings!  True escape!!!  Can always see our kids as it's in the round and has glass elevators.  We always try to stay at Embassy!
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued support of Embassy Suites and we're so glad you brought the family to our hotel for a little time away from home.  We hope you have another opportunity to come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My housekeeper Aurelia is a very hard worker, she deserves a positive review. She works hard and very respectful. I spoke with the Housekeeping Manager; sorry didn't get his name but he was very surprised that I had positive things to say. I didn't want it to go unnoticed and he suggested I leave my feedback.
Manager Response: Thank you for your great associate comments and we are very happy to have the review posted in the department.  We're very appreciative that you took the time to share this story about Aurelia and I know she will be so happy to see this and the recognition of her hard work.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Exactly what you expect from embassy suites
Summary: Excellent stay.   Prices very reasonable on the weekends.   Beds were comfortable.   The rooms were very quiet - they are all two room suites.     Note that parking is waived if you are diamond member.  Remind them when you check in.     Breakfast is free and great as always.     I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Jim,   We appreciate your Hilton loyalty as a Diamond member and we're very happy to hear about your recent stay.  Thank you for the recommendation and we hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The building is nice.  However they are using very old towels and sheets.  All towels and sheets are in dark color and NOT WHITE.  I was reluctant to use towels and slept on the bed there.   Paid for high price.  But the cleanliness and room are very poor.  I hope they change new towels and sheets.
Manager Response: Thank you for your comments.  Our linen inventory is continually updated and kept as new so we're disappointed to hear you felt the suite had older items.  We will share this with our housekeeping team to make sure reinforce our high quality standard.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very pleased for a last minute choice. Booked a room here at 11 pm just wanting to get some quick shut eye. To my surprise, this place was very clean and very very nice especially for the price range. Staff was awesome and the rooms where great! Highly suggested for any type of visit.
Manager Response: It's always a great compliment to hear from our guests about a great night's sleep.  We only wish you had a few more days with us and hope you were able to take advantage of our awesome complimentary breakfast.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel. Newly remodeled. Buffet was outstanding. Addition of Starbucks to Lobby a major hit.
Summary: Will absolutely consider this hotel my first choice when staying in Orange County. Great rooms. Great service. Great buffet. Great gym. Great location. Lots of really good restaurants nearby. Close to Newport Beach and Irvine Spectrum. AND Starbucks in the lobby!!
Manager Response: Dear Roger,  Thank you for the five star review and recommendation.  We're so glad to hear you had a memorable stay and that our location was central to your needs.  Starbucks is definitely on our list of favorites added during our recent renovation.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had a lovely stay here.  I loved the courtyard area - very relaxing.  Parking so convenient.  Our suite was immaculate - very comfortable sleep those 2 nights.  Also loved the complimentary breakfast and happy hour... couldnt ask for better quality service.
Manager Response: Dear Audrey, thank you for your recent visit and we're very pleased to hear about your experience with breakfast and the evening reception.  We hope to see you back again on your next adventure in the O.C.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Beautiful renovation, friendly staff, tiny pool.
Summary: We chose this hotel due to the proximity to Newport and Huntington Beaches, and because we always stay in the Embassy Suites chain when traveling with our children. We were very pleased with our room, the immaculate lobby, and the cleanliness of the grounds, as well as surrounding area. Every staff member we encountered was friendly and helpful. We had no issue with the room, it was clean, and had really cool nightstands on both sides of the bed which have plugs, and USB ports for electronic charging. Very modern. The lobby has a Starbucks, which was nice.   The hotel is located right off the 405 in the heart of Irvine's business district, and is surrounded by large corporate buildings, and the minute we pulled up I realized this was a hotel for business people, which is fine,
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing the family and the very detailed commentary.  We're so happy you enjoyed your stay, breakfast and the accommodations.  We especially like you like the new layout of our 1st floor atrium which we commonly refer to as the "largest living room" in Irvine.  Orange County does have so many family attractions that we do hope you'll come back and see us on a much brighter and sunny SoCal day.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very good place to stay! Great location for business or vacation good breakfast, easy access to airport. Nice hotel, good clean room, near or within driving distance to many locations i.e Disney Land, Hollywood,
Manager Response: We are very happy to hear our location was ideal for your recent visit and appreciate your comments about our facilities.  We hope you have another opportunity to come back and see us as there's always plenty to do in the O.C.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stay at hundreds of hotels for my job. This hotel has been by far the nicest, cleanest, and friendliest hotel I've stayed in. The rooms were fantastic and clean. The hotel staff was AMAZING! Definitely will stay again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and we love hearing comments from road warriors such as yourself on how we're doing.  We do hope you'll be coming back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I had to be in OC for business.  This hotel was in a great location and allowed me to be rested and relaxed for the work at hand! I was able to have a nutritious breakfast and a relaxing morning before I had to head out for a very taxing day!
Manager Response: We love our business travelers and we're glad to hear our complimentary breakfast was  great way to start the day.  Hopefully you also had the opportunity to join us at the evening reception.  We hope to see you back again and tell a friend.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Hilton trip 2017 was a nice get away for the family. Breakfast was cool and the server were great.
Summary: Hilton trip 2017 was a nice get away for the family. Breakfast was cool and the server were great. Left early Sunday morning to beat traffic for church service. Thank God He kept was safe on our mini getaway
Manager Response: We're so glad to have been able to host your Hilton 2017 getaway.  What was your favorite part of our complimentary breakfast?  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I've never had a more better experience than the professional approach I received from the staffs, most especially from Dorothy Oreyzy at the front registration. She's very courteous and friendly. Lots of hotels in Irvine, but I will never go anywhere else except here at embassy and Hilton hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the great associate mention.  Dorothy has great passion for working with our guests and will be thrilled to see your comments.  We appreciate your loyalty and will look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located next to John Wayne Orange County Airport and is 6 miles from the ocean.  The hotel is kept nicely and is very clean and warm.  The staff was not overly accommodating but the overall experience was excellent.  This hotel was a great bargain for Southern California.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay and we're glad our location and amenities earned us your five star recommendation.  We share ALL reviews with our management team and to all associates so appreciate your candid review.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is centrally located to the airport.  I utilize the airport shuttle and am always greeted with a smile.  The hotel itself is clean and the staff is great to work with.  I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Lucy, thank you for your recent stay and the awesome recommendation.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Food EVERYWHERE on the floors AND walls. Elevator window was disgustingly covered in food and slime. Breakfast we didn't eat needed management to corral the people from blocking every walk way so we could leave.  Just awful experience.
Manager Response: We are sorry to hear about your experience.  I cannot imagine at any time what you are describing as our associates are very conscientious and hard working to keep up the hotel extremely clean.  If you would like to further discuss your experience please feel free to contact me directly anytime.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: During my recent stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine I enjoyed my evenings and meals at the restaurant in the hotel.  The food is excellent.  Every choice I had was great.  The atmosphere is so enjoyable but the stars are the staff in particular Patty.  Everyone is so friendly, engaging and attentive.  Patty is beyond exception.  Patty is very hard working, customer focused and definitely goes beyond the extra mile.  A true gem amongst the golden staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate the awesome feedback about Patty's work in Vibrante.  We'll be certain to share with the entire F&B team and look forward to your next trip to Irvine.  Thanks for letting your co-workers know about our hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Flawless stay for my visiting Board Members!
Summary: Embassy Suites hosted about of my 40 executives and VIP's for our quarterly board meetings, and I can honestly say everything was flawless from start to finish. I worked with Ken and Malonda on the guest rooms, and they were on top of every detail, making my hosting job much easier.   The rooms are clean and modern, and have practically every comfort of home. They are spacious and well appointed, complete with a fridge, microwave and coffee/tea maker- It feels like you have your own little apartment! The staff is also gracious, welcoming, and happy to help with anything you might need. Speaking of needs, there is a Starbucks in the lobby!   The morning breakfast, evening reception and airport shuttle are just bonuses on top of the amazing service. I'd highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: Thanks for sharing Kym.  We appreciate the opportunity to host your top management this week and the awesome referral.  We're glad you love the new Starbucks too!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Super clean and up to date furniture in the room! One of the front desk guy to us out in the shuttle bus to pick up food from in and out burgers, A really nice gentleman ( I forgot your name)  the only problem I saw was the happy hour food, you guys could do better than just nachos and cheese!   perhaps pigs in a blanket, mozzarella sticks, chicken fingers,  olives, and some diced up salami, ham, mortadella..also I had to pay for parking! I figured you would comp me on that since I do work for  a Hilton hotel in New York City.  all in all lovely hotel and well mannered Staff.
Manager Response: We're glad you enjoyed your time in Orange County and appreciate the positive feedback.  We do rotate snacks at the evening reception; however, the complimentary reception with free drinks does not include hot appetizers.  If you can think of the associates name at the front desk please let us know so they can be recognized.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I can't say enough good things about Embassy Suites Irvine!! This was our second visit to the hotel. We came last year and I must say that the new decor is amazing, they really did a fantastic job remodeling the hotel!! The addition of Starbucks was my daughters favorite :). The rooms were so spacious and comfortable- we were very pleased with the room and the surrounding areas!  The food was delicious and we looked forward to the breakfast and happy hour every day!!  The service of the staff was just as fabulous as the new decor. I want to give a special thanks to Dorothy who works at the front desk. She was such a help and truly a nice person who always greeted us with a smile. She helped us with everything and gave us tips about places to visit and was hands-down one of the
Manager Response: We're so glad you came back to spend some time with us and thank you for such great comments on the big re-do.  We love having Starbucks on property and I'll make sure to pass on your comments to Dorothy.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My family and I stayed at this hotel which is conveniently located across from the Orange County Airport.  We couldn't hear the planes at all.  The hotel is extremely clean and well tended to.  We were greeted with a smile at the front desk.  The staff at the Starbucks located in the lobby are awesome.  We asked the front desk that our room be made up early so we could change for a wedding.  The front desk and maid service came thru without a hitch!  Thanks everyone for a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear Gerry, thank you for your recent visit and we very much appreciate your kind words regarding our team members.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I recently brought my large choir group to stay for a week.  The hotel was great and the staff was really helpful, especially Jasmine Stewart.  My students loved staying there and we will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Jim, thank you for believing in the hotel and giving us this awesome opportunity to host your group last week.  We're so glad all the students and parents enjoyed the stay and had a great time performing and exploring in Orange County.  We are very much looking forward to your return and appreciate the recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The room was clean, bed was great. Was glad that I had the Hilton rewards, so that the internet was free. Complimentary breakfast is one of the best. Easy access to the interstate 405 and Orange County Airport.
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome review.  We're so glad you enjoyed your stay and yes, all Hilton Honors members received complimentary Wi-Fi.  Another great loyalty perk.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed for one night on business travel.  I had a comfortable accessible room wtih a long entranceway on the 9th floor in a corner so the room was reasonably quiet.  I did hear some elevator noise in the common room but not the bedroom.  The hotel has a large atrium that funnels noise upwards so I could hear people in the hotel in my common room but the bedroom was pretty removed from that.  Room had a microwave and a small fridge.  The furniture and bed were all quite comfortable.  The lighting was excellent - one of the best hotel rooms I have been in for lighting.  The staff is also excellent. They are right on top of things.  I had room service which was fine but nothing special.  It took about 30 minutes for lunch.  Lobby staff are the most attentive they helped me with my
Manager Response: Andrea, thank you for sharing and we greatly appreciate your kind words for the staff.  We very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay in one of our accessible suites and had the opportunity for lunch at Vibrante.  we hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: always a good place to stay.  breakfast is awesome.  wish i can do the happy hour more.  room was fit for a one person but i am used to have a bigger room than the studio.  embassy is always my go to place to stay.
Manager Response: We're glad to be your go-to-hotel.  Sounds like you booked one of our limited number of guest studios which are great for the single traveler but not spread out like our guest suites.  Next time make sure you are booking a king or two-queen bed suite as studios are not subject to free upgrades.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Double charge, noisy and lack of response
Summary: Spend two nights here, one business, one with family. Check in was slow, couldn't figure out when family arrived. Asked for service on a malfunction in the room which never came. Room was not clean on arrival. Was charged double for the room. Don't go on weekends unless you are ok with bunch of kids running around
Manager Response: First let me start by apologizing for the challenges you experienced with your during your stay. I have shared your comments with all of my Department Managers, expressing your concern and dissatisfaction with the service you received. I can assure you that your concerns have been addressed and corrected, and we have also added additional training for our staff to ensure that the errors you mentioned are not repeated in the future.   I would like to thank you for taking the time to give us your feed back, and I can assure you that all us here will be working extremely hard to win you back, as a fan, and a loyal guest of our property.  Please feel free to contact me directly with any additional comments or suggestions you may have and it will be my pleasure to assist you.   Warmest Regards, John Pease Front Office Manager Embassy Suites

Summary: Nice place, amenities, great bed/pillows but every day housekeeping missed something, coffee cups, wash cloths, coffee, etc.  just annoying. Nice, helpful staff just little stuff.  They always jumped to replace when I called, but rediculous was of manpower.
Manager Response: We'r glad the location worked well for you and sincerely apologies for the housekeeping shortfalls.  We've brought this to the department to review and hope to have you back for a future five star experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: THIS particular hotel is always where I choose to stay.   The convenience, location, extraordinary service, the superb breakfast, and the overwhelming kindness and pleasantness of all the staff is like no where else.   We love this place.  I almost never write one of these reviews, but for this hotel -- it's a no-brainer!!   THANK YOU EMBASSY SUITES, IRVINE!!!!  Ken Rawdon
Manager Response: Dear Ken, thank you for your continued loyalty and there's nothing better than receiving feedback like yours.  We hope you enjoyed the new Starbucks or maybe Vibrante for dinner.  We'll see you soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The suite is specious and great for family of 4.  They also offer complimentary hot breakfast with chef specials daily and also make eggs to your order.  The complimentary happy hour is also very nice.  The location is  great right in the center of Irvine and close enough to Anaheim.
Manager Response: We're so glad you brought the family to stay with us.  Two-room suites let everyone spread out and not to mention having to flat screen HDTV's.  We're glad you enjoyed breakfast and Anaheim/Disneyland is just a quick drive from the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Love that Embassy has a Starbucks! Everyone is so friendly and fast! Will be visiting very soon for my coffee fix. Love the waterfall and the smell of roses when I walk in it reminds me of my garden and I feel at home.
Manager Response: We love having Starbucks inside the hotel lobby too!  Thanks for stopping bye and please take a walk around our central atrium to take in the scents.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Fantastic breakfast and reception! Large comfortable room! Very satisfied with my stay here! Large suite!
Summary: Really enjoyed my stay here! Loved the breakfast and evening reception! Great service from the staff. Pool had a strong chlorine smell so avoided that. Definitely would come back again as I felt it was a good value.
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear you had a lovely stay and enjoyed the best free breakfast in town.  We have a salt water pool so will forward your comments to our engineering department to follow-up on this.  We hope to see you back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Had a great stay.  The hotel was comfortable.  Breakfast was good for the most part.  Staff were super helpful.  Also, there is a starbucks in the lobby (big win).  Very close to the John Wayne airport but could not hear any noise.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and we're happy to hear everything was comfortable and convenient.  We love our new Starbucks too which is open daily from 5:30am.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great place to stay and relax, rooms were clean and neat, the gym was well equipped and the breakfast was wonderful. The parking was covered and easy to exit. The only negative thing was there were no restaurants near by.
Manager Response: We appreciate your business and very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us.  McCormick's and El Torito Grill are both within walking distance of the hotel and please know we're happy to shuttle our guests within two miles of the hotel opening up hundreds of great local dinning, entertainment and shopping opportunities.  Please feel free to ask for recommendations at the front desk.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We enjoyed our stay.  The staff was helpful, the facility was clean and welcoming.  We would definitely recommend and stay again.  We especially enjoyed the breakfast buffet.  The room was lovely and the bed was very comfortable.
Manager Response: Hello Maggi.  We're glad to hear you had a five star experience with us and loved the breakfast buffet.  We appreciate the recommendation and hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Renovations are nice!  I always enjoy staying at embassy because they are all set up the same so I know what to expect.  I have stayed at this location a couple times prior to the renovations and I will say that the upgrades are nice.  I love that they brightened the bathrooms with light colors and made some modern upgrades.  The face lift makes it feel new & clean.  Always love the made to order breakfast but surprising that this location lacks a bit in the breakfast department.  No French toast or hash brown provided and the mini pancakes were chewy and cold.  Instead of the hash brown they provide little fried potatoes squares that were cold as well.  These items are so much better when served in the made to order section.  Omelets are fresh so you can’t go wrong with that.
Manager Response: Thank you for your continued loyalty and we're very pleased you are enjoying our $12 million makeover.  I hope you also liked the new restaurant, Vibrante SoCal Kitchen & Bar and Starbucks in the lobby.  We'll share your breakfast comments with the team as we're always looking to better our operation.  See you back soon we hope.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: One of the easiest hotels I've worked with
Summary: I book a lot of rooms for colleagues who come into town and have used a variety of hotels.  Gott'a say Amanda Gould has made me a solid customer for Embassy Suites here in Irvine.  When I mention the made-to-order omelets for breakfast and the happy hour every day, my colleagues are more than happy to spend a night or two away from home!
Manager Response: I cant wait to share this with Amanda today.  She'll be so happy to see your recommendation for corporate travel to the hotel and your experience in working with such a dedicated sales associate.  We appreciate your business!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great Hotel if you have tix to Segerstrom
Summary: This hotel is comfortable and clean, just 10" away from South Coast Plaza and the Segerstrom Performance complex.  The hotel is just E of John Wayne Airport over the I-405, but there is no airport or freeway noise (we were on top floor too).  It's a little over an hour away from San Diego.  The bathroom and rooms have been updated, much nicer than the two Embassy Suites in Tucson.   There's a Full-menu Starbucks in the lobby, for those inclined.  Made a trip to the Nixon Library, only 20 minutes away, which surprisingly gives an honest review of Watergate, worth visiting.  Several restaurants are within walking distance, which is nice.  We came back late from the theater, and there was no hotel parking; we had to park in an adjacent garage.  The front desk gave of complimentary
Manager Response: Thank you so much or the very informative review.  We're glad that the hotel was so close to all the attractions and events you were attending in Orange County.  There's so much more in the area that we hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel was fantastic except for one thing.  If you like a firm pillow, bring your own.  They were the absolute worst I've ever slept on.  I used two of them and folded both over to have at least a semi firm pillow.  The hotel itself was very clean and neat.  The food was delicious.  If you are expecting real food at Happy Hour, forget it.  Chips and nacho cheese, Chex mix and homemade potato chips.  Checking in and out was fast and painless.  I'd recommend staying there to anyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and we greatly appreciate your feedback.  We do have both feather and foam pillows at the hotel so on your next visit please be sure to ask and we'll definitely look for the pillow that works best for your sleep.  Our complimentary evening reception is free drinks and snacks for two hours each night.  Free hot food is not part of the reception, however, Vibrante has great shared plate options for purchase and is open daily from 11am - 11pm.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very good service, accommodations and all around great experience. Close to airport and you feel like you are at a 5star hotel. Hotel has a nice bar onsite with a happy hour that was yummy and offers good choices. My room was really cool too with the most comfortable bed!
Manager Response: Thank you for the great feedback.  We're thrilled to hear you enjoyed your visit with us and very much appreciate the good service comments.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great giant teenage playground!....Unfortunately, I'm not a teenager.......
Summary: First time staying at this hotel, but have stayed at other Embassy Suites.  This location is definitely in better shape than other Embassy suites locations.  The location is freeway close and very close to the airport.   Day before check in, received a text message from Megan inquiring about any needs I had before checking in, and received another text message after checking out.  Nice Touch!  The rooms all surround a beautiful atrium which is typical of the architecture of Embassy Suite Hotels.  There is an evening reception with free drinks and snacks (animal crackers for the kids, Cheez-It crackers and nachos)  The rooms are nicely appointed with modern looking furniture and definitely has a homey feel to it.  I stayed here with my two boys and they enjoyed being able to
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and we appreciate your feedback.  We're glad you enjoyed the spacious suite accommodations and while we do have increased youth groups more towards weekends our mid-week tends to be corporate focused for meetings and business travelers.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites Irvine Airport Comes Through Again!
Summary: I had a two-week stint in Irvine for work and while being away from my home and family is always tough the friendly staff and great accommodations at the Embassy Suites in Irvine (near the airport) made it much more enjoyable. They have an unbeatable complimentary breakfast and evening services delivered by a tremendous staff. Very impressed.
Manager Response: Michael, thank you for sharing this two week experience.  We're glad you enjoyed our breakfast and evening reception and appreciate your kind comments about the staff.  We hope your business will bring you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very nice hotel with a Starbucks in the lobby! Parking garage next to hotel. Hot breakfast, complete with an omelette station, was set up in the nicely decorated courtyard. Happy hour every evening serving complimentary drinks. I never made it but it's a very unique service! Suite had a small kitchenette and a separate bedroom. Bed was very comfy. We would stay here again!
Manager Response: Kelly, we're so happy to hear about your first time experience with us was wonderful.  we appreciate your business and thank you for taking time to share with fellow travelers.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Not a place to take a travel team
Summary: Several teams stayed at this hotel as guests for local competition yet they did not start breakfast early to accommodate their departure schedules. This is a first for me to experience this level of inconsideration.   Every other time we have traveled with a team the local hotels act as gracious hosts and start breakfast early to make sure the kids get fed. Breakfast  starts an hour earlier during the week so it's not too hard to adjust and start an hour earlier on weekend occasions when many guests need this accommodation. I would recommend staying at another location if you are booking a stay for your travel team.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feed back.  Our complimentary breakfast hours are 6:00 AM to 9:00 AM Monday through Friday and 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM Saturday and Sunday to better accommodate our leisure guests.  We work with traveling teams year-around and are very empathetic to scheduling needs and as we did this past weekend will open everything except our omelet kitchen by 6:30 AM.  We also have Starbucks open daily at 5:30 AM as a pay alternative for those very early risers.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The purpose of our stay was leisure for family, as we live locally. Unfortunately, this plan was quickly overtaken by the number of groups of teenagers which were booked at this hotel  simultaneously, unbeknownst to us. Prior to my booking a stay at this hotel, I inquired about the pool facilities as this was the primary reason why I chose this property and I was informed that there was an indoor pool.  However, when we arrived, the pool was overtaken  by numerous teens who were roughhousing and yelling, making it impossible for my daughters and I to swim.   In addition, I booked my reservation based on the pictures displayed on your website. The reception gravely contrasted the picture up on the site.  Yet another disappointment. In our room that night, the water pressure was
Manager Response: Dear May,  I am sorry to hear about your experience and would be very happy to speak with you directly.  Please contact me at anytime at 949-553-8332.  Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: If you are looking for a family friendly hotel close to everything, look no further. Friendly staff, clean hotel rooms, and awesome hot breakfast. Staff Amanda Gould really took care of me. She is the sweetest! I Highly recommend her and I definitely will be coming back!
Manager Response: Hello Michelle and thank you for sharing this great experience.  So happy to share with Amanda in our sales office and we very much appreciate the recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here for a family wedding. Booked five rooms, all were fabulous. The hotel was clean quiet even though it was busy. The breakfast buffet and the free happy hour were a wonderful bonus as was the shuttle service within 3 miles of the hotel. Definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for the excellent review and recommendation.  We're glad you enjoyed your time in Orange County and Disneyland.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I was asked to plan a business retreat for the executives of my company. I immediately thought of the Embassy Suites because I have always been so happy with my stays there while on vacation with my family. I called and spoke with Elizabeth, the sales manager. She went above and beyond helping me plan the 3 days with the room accommodations, conference room, food and snacks being served, additional items they would need. The feedback I got when the executives returned was that they had a wonderful experience there, everything went smoothly and that the accommodations and service were 5 star. Highly reccomend Embassy Suites for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear Kim, thank you for sharing your five star meeting experience.  We will be certain to share this with Elizabeth and hope to have the opportunity of hosting another event with your company.  We greatly appreciate the recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The Embassy Suites Irvine is made for today's traveler, who expects a hotel where modernity meet convenience and guests are like family. The hotel family promises an unparalleled experience. They make you feel at home with their thoughtful, caring, and genuine hospitality.  Their premiere suite accommodations are celebrating 30 Years of Hospitality with a $12 million makeover - completed in 2016. They offer a comfortable and stylish base just one mile from John Wayne/Orange County Airport. The hotel is also near Disneyland Resort®, University of California-Irvine and the Anaheim Convention Center.  Enjoy a complimentary made-to-order breakfast each morning. In the evening, unwind in hotel atrium with a full bar and snacks at the Evening Reception*.  *Service of alcohol subject
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and I noticed you are with one of our valued corporate accounts.  We appreciate your business and look forward to your future stays.  We do hope you will share your experience with fellow travelers.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I'll start with the cliche " I generally do not write reviews..." but its true, I don't. However, my stay was too excellent to not review. I was there on business for two weeks, and even though I used the new "digital key" to check into my room, I was still greeted with a warm reception from the front desk.  My room was set up early and was nice and clean and immediately gave the feeling of a "home away from home". Breakfast is usually packed but the staff ensures the food is always plentiful and I always had somewhere to be sit. The General Manager even took time to walk the floor and ask about my stay.  The recent addition of a Starbucks within the hotel was a major plus as well. At this point, I really had no reason to leave the hotel unless I just wanted fresh air.   It was
Manager Response: Andrew, wow!  Thank you for the awesome review and recommendation.  It's always great to hear guest feedback about a great experience, accommodations and our staff.  We hope to see you back again soon and we'll still be out there walking the floors and greeting our guests.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very clean and quiet rooms.  Probably better suited for business, but we ate at local restaurants, went to beach (15 minute drive) and attended an event at the OC fairgrounds.  I wished we would have had more time to use some more of the Hotels amenities, they usually have great pools and other facilities.
Manager Response: Thomas, thank you for your recent visit and we're glad that our location was central to your planned activities.  We hope to see you back next year!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This comfortable hotel is perfectly located for those flying into John Wayne Airport or even LAX. Located on Main Street in Irvine, they offer onsite parking, a comprehensive breakfast (including made-to-order omelettes) and happy hour every night.   The full-height interior atrium with mature trees and lots of light makes for a guest filled lobby day and night. There's even a Starbucks onsite.  I was given a roomy king suite. The lounge had a large table/desk, TV, sofas and chairs. There was a wet-bar with a fridge, microwave and Keurig beverage machine.   However, to make my five-night stay truly comfortable management kindly provided me with an electric kettle so that I could make tea, which is vital to my survival. Anyone from Australia or England, knows what I'm talking
Manager Response: I'm excited to share your experience with our hotel team.  We greatly appreciate your time and the very generous comments.  I'm also glad you thought to reach out in advance of your stay regarding the tea kettle.  I encourage all of our guest to please let us know how we can make each stay comfortable and an enjoyable home away from home.  We hope you will make it back again or another Orange County Stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Power outage - housekeeping didn't clean my room  the first night - no compensation !! I have stayed at many embassy suites and probably will never stay at this one again- they could have handled my issues a lot better !
Manager Response: We are sorry for any inconvenience during the short power outage and your comments have been shared with our housekeeping team.  We do hope you will considering a future stay with us and we very much appreciate your business.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Excellent Customer Service, great facility, delicious breakfast
Summary: This is not my first time in this hotel, but it continues to be predictably good. I think the service during our most recent stay was the best ever. I was personally contacted before and after our stay, to see if there was any way they could be of service to me. Will definitely be my hotel of choice in the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Kevin, thanks so much for your comments.  Will certainly share with the team and look forward to your next visit.  We appreciate the recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stay here twice a year for work event and it's always very comfortable. The rooms are clean and huge, with a separate bedroom. There is a fridge, microwave and coffee maker in the room.  The staff is always very gracious and looking to help.  The only down side is the air conditioning system is a bit loud and sounds like dripping water or something. Every room I've stayed in is the same thing.
Manager Response: We appreciate your continued loyalty and thank you for your very generous comments about our staff.  We're looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Always clean, room service is very prompt, quiet rooms.  This is my go-to hotel when I travel to Irvine.  Very centrally located and easy to get to from John Wayne airport.  The staff is very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Thanks Franka225.  We're happy to be your go-to hotel in Irvine.  I hope you also are enjoying our new Starbucks outlet in the lobby.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The Embassy Suites in Irvine, was a well appointed hotel. The desk staff were always friendly and happy to assist you with any questions. The rooms were very large, and looked as though they may have been recently remodeled. The bed was very comfortable and there were plenty of towels. They offer free cocktails and snacks in the early evening, and their breakfast selections were wonderful There is even a made to order omelet station.The only down side was that you had to pay for parking, which I understand is normal in California. I would highly recommend this hotel to anyone needing accomodations in or near Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy, we appreciate your recommendation and so glad to hear about your experience.  We hope you have another opportunity to stay with us in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: One of the nicer Embassy Suites
Summary: I was passing through and booked a night.  The hotel is very convenient to the highway and easy to find.  The decor is very modern and has a complete Starbucks in the lobby.  There is a large public garage that is very convenient and the check-in was fast and courteous.  My favorite aspect was that the small restaurant will serve you at the outer tables during the manager's reception.  The food was good and I didn't have to leave the hotel for dinner.
Manager Response: Dear Geomom01, thanks for stopping by and we're so happy you decided to stay the night and dinner at Vibrante.  We hope you have the opportunity to stay with us again in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Here for the week on business. Spacious and comfortable. Staff friendly and helpful. Facilities just what I needed.   Will be staying here again for sure as it is perfectly located for the places I visit and only minutes from the airport.
Manager Response: Jon, we glad to hear our location, amenities and staff made for a great experience.  We're looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great place to stay quite close to Disneyland Anaheim. Big suites (2 rooms) was perfect for our family (2adults, 2kids). Free breakfast was also good value. Small problem was parking BUT there is a public parking house next to hotel which as plenty of room - so no problem with that. Also free wifi (for HHonors).
Manager Response: Tomi, so happy that the family enjoyed your Disneyland holiday.  We were happy to have you at the the hotel and hope to see you back on future Orange County trips.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here one night over the weekend. The room was very clean and recently updated. The towels were really nice as they were soft and plush.  The bed was very comfy; I just wanted to stay there all morning.   We arrived just after 3pm. Check-in went very smoothly. Overall service was great with one exception. The room temp was set to 76 and although we turned down the temp the room was not cooling.  My wife stopped at the front desk but no one came as promised.  I called as we were driving to dinner 3 hours later and spoke with Daniel. Kudos to Daniel as the air was working great when we returned. Also thank you to John Peace. He was very nice in tracking down and retrieving a luggage cart for us.   Happy hour was fantastic as usual. How can free drinks and snacks be
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your experience and we've happily posted your comments in the back office for all the front desk to see.  We're glad to hear about everything from the suites to the room and the staff.  We hope to se you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have spent the last month getting the run around from this location concerning miscommunications from their staff and my stay one month ago. With no resolution I finally called Hilton corporate.   Hilton corporate told me that the check (I have not received yet) was sent to me three weeks ago. Unfortunately Hilton employees also have poor spelling skills.  My next trip in a month will not be at a Hilton Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie,  I'm not sure of the circumstances here but please contact me directly.  I am happy to check with both our team and Hilton to make this right.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales ken.beck@hilton.com 949-705-5143

Summary: Happy hour, full complentary breakfast and very friendly staff. Very pleased and exceeded my expectations. Great precheck in options and communication. Also received text after my stay thanking me for my stay.
Manager Response: We're so happy to hear that your experience exceeded expectations.  We love the new opportunity for Honors members to pre-select their room location and use Digital Check-in.  We hope to see you soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Always stay at the Embassy. Great value, parking, complementary breakfast, large rooms, very little noise. Convenient to airport. Staff very accommodating and helpful. For extended stays, cannot be beat.
Manager Response: Lauren, we greatly appreciate your continued loyalty and recommendation.  The team hopes you are enjoying all our recent upgrades.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Loud music and loud drunk people in the bar area.  Our room was right above the bar.  Indoor pool, TOO MUCH CHLORINE.   Internet was NOT free. We could not use unless we paid for the use of the b Internet.
Manager Response: Alfonso, we are sorry to hear about your experience.  We will certainly look into any noise issue but the hotel does not play any music at the bar.  We have a salt water pool so have also shared your comments with our engineering department and please know if you are a Hilton Honors member (which is free to sign up) our Wi-Fi is complimentary.  The hotel has 10 floors of guest suites so we do hope you will consider coming back and staying on an upper floor.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very clean hotel and friendly staff, would definitely stay here again. Staff was friendly from check in, to shuttle, to check out.  Managers reception and breakfast options were very good.  Highly recommend this hotel
Manager Response: We very happy to hear about your great experience and we also appreciate your kind comments about about our team members.  They strive daily to deliver great service.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great site very well kept, good breakfast, conveniently located near the airport.  The room itself was very nice and had a comfortable bed with a good temperature control system.  Also the staff members i encountered were friendly and helpful.  I would staff at the location again.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay with us and the very kind comments.  We hope you have reason to come visit us again in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall good experience. My biggest complaint was the carpet was sticky and extremely stained. Virtually no room service (about 2 hour wait) Also disappointed in access from second floor to main floor. Had to wait on the elevator every time because no convenient stairs.  Loved the breakfast with cooked to order omelet station. We had several families staying there for a wedding in the area. The Atrium was a great place for the whole group to socialize.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent stay and value your feedback.  We will share your experience with the room service team as this is not our service standard.  Regarding stairs, there are accessible in both corners of the building from the 10th floor to the ground level.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Staying here again......decision was location based
Summary: We stay here several times a year.   We have endured their renovations and changes.  The new rooms are quite nice.  The staff is usually quite helpful.  You would think that makes it great.  There are several negatives....  Parking is abysmal, the spaces are too narrow, the available spots are usually few....the addition of a full service Starbucks in the lobby was a nice addition but it also took a lot of "up front outside" parking away and eliminated the little marketplace/sundry store for snacks..  The new pay as you go themed restaurant has very few choices and are not "typical" fare suitable for the traveling family or even just the average traveler.    The complementary breakfast includes some made to order items....and I'd suggest you stand in that line as that food can
Manager Response: Dear Dave, we appreciate your loyalty and the comments.  We review all guest responses and will certainly take this into consideration on how we can improve the overall guest experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Wonderful hotel.. Food at Vibrante restaurant was amazing...  The wait staff and restaurant manager were very attentive!!  The rooms are spacious and clean.. Overall a great hotel... we are definitely coming back.. Excellent experience!
Manager Response: We're very happy to hear about your experience at our restaurant, Vibrante.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Clean, bright updated hotel in a great location for business in Irvine and sorounding area. Great Breakfast and Starbucks located in the hotel. Maybe 5 minutes from airport and staff was super helpful. This will be my new go to hotel in Irvine!
Manager Response: It's always great to hear from our newest guests and especially when it's about your Go To hotel.  We hope business brings you back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Worst Embassy Suites:  AVOID & STAY ELSEWHERE
Summary: I am Hilton Honors Elite & have stayed at least 50 times at Embassy Suites & this is the absolutely the worst.  Everything about this hotel is CHEAP & CHINZY.  In addition, multiple staff members were rude & argumentative.      For example, every other Embassy Suites' breakfasts have all the food laid out buffet style plus a special line for made to order eggs & omelets.  This Irvine/OC Airport Hotel is so CHEAP & CHINZY that they purposely regulate, prohibit & control the dispensing of meat (bacon & sausage) from being available in a chafing dish, even though they have huge open counter space.    Instead, you must stand in the long line for made to order omelets (was 20 people deep at 1 point) & ask the cook for a piece of bacon every time you want some.    They have no trays
Manager Response: Dear Christy,  I just saw your comments and would hope to have the opportunity to speak with you directly.  I am out of the office until next Monday and please let me know if we can connect and talk about your recent experience.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager swietlana.cahill2@hilton.com

Summary: There are two embassy suites near john Wayne airport. This one is on main st in irvine, the other I think is dyer road. Very nice free breakfast (food is better than most). Friendly staff, noisy on weekends since a lot of kids and high school teams stay there.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and glad to hear you enjoyed our upper floors.  The King City View suites are a favorite with the upgraded standing showers and Keurig coffee brewers.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We came down for a Water Polo tournament. The hotel gave us a great rate and all the extras, like free breakfast and internet, really made the trip affordable.The location is great, right by Orange County airport and a few malls with great resturants.  Staff was great!
Manager Response: Thank you for joining us over Water Polo weekend.  We're glad to hear our Embassy Suites amenities and location made for a great experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here for company business event.  VERY clean an nicely decorated suites, lobby etc.  Complimentary Happy Hour was great, complimentary breakfast was good also.  My suite was quiet, even though I was right across from the elevators.  I didn't hear street noise or hallway noise.  Ordered room service my first night in and the flautas were excellent, wanted to skip dinner with the group the next night and order them again!  We usually have this event at a hotel at LAX, flying into Orange County airport and staying here was a welcome change!
Manager Response: We're glad the company decided to give Orange County the meeting opportunity and we also love flying in and out of SNA and not LAX.  Thank you for the recommendation and hope to see you back again for business or pleasure.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Irvine John Wayne Airport Embassy Suites
Summary: Very nice and also typical of Embassy Suites that I have stayed in at other cities. Includes free under-ground parking lot  which is beneath the hotel. The morning breakfast is pretty good and had a decent variety.
Manager Response: Jim, we appreciate your recent visit and thank you for the great comments.  We hope to see you back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I was on a business trip and stayed at this hotel on two different days.  The hotel is located about 5 minutes from the John Wayne Airport (Santa Ana).  The hotel was clean and nicely kept.    The room was large and has been updated.  The bathroom has a large lighted mirror that almost spans the width of the counter.  So there is more than enough room to set your belongings.  The wall switches contained lights in them which were on all the time.  They are motion activated, so they would get brighter if you got up in the middle of the night.  This was a plus as you don't have to turn on the bright lights.  The hotel offers a daily happy hour as well as a wonderful continental breakfast.   The breakfast offers a wide range of foods and beverages (including juices, coffee and
Manager Response: Dear Jill.  We're so glad to hear you found our hotel and had such a wonderful experience.  We appreciate the recommendation and please let us know how we can improve your next stay to five stars.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Located close to the airport; without the sound of planes. Also located near great places to eat & shop.    The abundance of breakfast options, and the Manager's Reception of  complementary cocktails, beverages and snacks hold you over until your next meal.   The suites with living and sleeping areas are perfect for the couples that want to watch sports on one tv, and the cooking  Channel on the other. ( speaking from experience ) LOL  The bed was beyond comfortable.   It's places like this that make it easier when you have to live out of a  suitcase.   I will be back.
Manager Response: Jacqueline, we're glad to hear that the hotel made your travels a little bit more enjoyable and we hope to see you back real soon.  Hope you also had a chance to visit our new Starbucks.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had a last minute stopover in OC, so booked at the Embassy. Service and accommodations were great, as usual. they had a very good selection of snacks in the evening reception and the usual full made to order breakfast. The room was spacious and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thanks for making us your last minute stop over and hope to see you back perhaps for a weekend escape.  There's always so much going on in Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Every single staff member from the front desk, housekeeping and food service said hello or have a good day, etc... Very friendly.   The hotel itself is in excellent shape. The grounds are well maintained.   Breakfast is excellent with lots of choices including an omelet station and hot oatmeal.   Parking is a bit goofy. You park in a garage and have to walk outside to get into the hotel. There should be a canopy or something.   Stayed 4 nights and was pleased.
Manager Response: Dear Jeffery, thank you for your recent stay with us and we're happy to hear the hotel exceeded expectations.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: The stay is always pleasant .. my  fiancé and I love it ! The staff is very helpful and always nice , always clean .
Summary: I will always always tell my family and friends to stay at Embassy suites . It's nice to get drinks and food for free and breakfast as well . We talk to staff and they always as if we need anything . I stay at different ones , but one stands out that I really like. We stay at the Irvine one . The staff is very friendly . We love it . I will continue to stay at Embassy suites ... thanks you guys for all that you do .
Manager Response: We're so happy that you and your fiance  love the hotel and we appreciate the awesome recommendation.  Are staff hopes to see you again soon.  Best regards, ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was my second stay at this particular Embassy Suites.  Since my last stay the hotel has undergone a remodel.  The new decor is very nice, the rooms have a very homey feel.  The staff was very friendly and courteous.  As always the complimentary breakfast was great.  I didn't get a chance to enjoy the managers reception on this stay.  The proximity to John Wayne Airport makes it a great location for travelers coming or going. Its a short ride on the shuttle.  It is far enough away to avoid much of the typical flyover noise.
Manager Response: James welcome back and we're so happy that you enjoyed the remodel.  Next time make sure to join us at the evening reception with some great new options rolling out this month.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The breakfast is excellent with fresh food. Staff is excellent in breakast area. Hotel was very clean and modern.Great location in Irvine Main Street. Have a Starbucks inside for good coffee. Only five minutes from the Airport ( Santa Ana)
Manager Response: Jerry we're so glad to hear you loved breakfast.  Hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Need to fix the flush toilets in the suites.  I had to call a tech twice to unplug toilets.  Please, get us some good toilets that work...and forget about the greenies who want to control how we flush.   Please provide toilets that work!!   I'm repeating myself because this fricking website makes ne do this.
Manager Response: Robert thanks for the feedback and we'll double check that suite to make sure it's not a mechanical issue that can be correctly.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: It was a great place to relax after a day of bad weather and diverted flights~  Modern hotel with an accomodating and welcoming staff!  Luis and staff at the bar/restaurant were great!  Food was delicious and very well presented.  Finished the night with a wonderful chocolate martini~
Manager Response: We're glad you found us to escape the bad weather and great to hear you enjoyed Vibrante.  We hope to see you back again on a sunny day.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great place to stay with the team.  Easy freeway access, great breakfast and cool area for teams.  Only issue was that all three of the elevators were not working correctly so getting to room and leaving were a bit challenging.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing the team and we're glad that our open atrium made for a great area for the team to gather and relax.  We were able to have the elevators repaired quickly and do apologize for any inconvenience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Everything I was hoping for. Quiet and great experience. Internet was good, food was good, bathroom was great, beds and rooms were great, TV was excellent. I am typing more because they have a minimum of 200 words.
Manager Response: Mark thank you for your recent visit and we'r so glad to hear everything was excellent.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The usual Embassy Suites formula in a very nicely remodeled hotel which has brought a modern look yet still feels very comfortable.  Excellent location near John Wayne airport in Orange County.  Highly recommend, thought value was excellent!
Manager Response: Jerry, thank you for the awesome recommendation and hope to see you back again soon.  We hope you also enjoyed our new Starbucks in the lobby.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: All you need for a productive business stay.  Well located and exellent service.  Strong internet with Ccoked to order breakfast that was excellent.  I plan to stay again on my next business trip to the Irvine area.
Manager Response: James, thanks for your great comments and we are happy to say we are making our fast Wi-Fi even better this year with another bandwidth upgrade.  We're looking forward to your return.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stay at this hotel every few years when I come to Orange County.  I have always liked it as it was, and now it appears to have been refurbished.  There's a Starbucks right in the lobby and there's a nice restaurant in the bar area that I don't remember being there before.  Very friendly staff.  Very close to SNA airport, but noise was not a problem and the suites are quiet.  The breakfasts and happy hours are very nice and they are better than at some other Embassy Suites.  The location is great ... very close to the 405.  When I'm in Southern Cali I can stay here and easily commute to day trips as far as San Diego or the San Fernando Valley without the hassle of packing and switching to another hotel in those areas.  It always irks me to be charged extra for parking at a
Manager Response: We appreciate your continued loyalty and we're very happy to hear you enjoyed our recent upgrades including Starbucks.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: A friend and I stayed here after the Cavalia show in Irvine.  It was just 8 miles away and saved us a trip home in the dark and traffic.  The hotel was easy to find, easy to check in, clean and organized.  However, the manager's reception was cramped (and very crowded), and not a very good choice of food (potato chips, nachos, Chex mix, and some raw vegetables - which disappeared in a hurry).  Children in pajamas prowled the dining area, the lines were incredibly long, and it was difficult to find a peaceful place to sit.    We chose our room on the 7th floor and utilized the digital key to access it.  The suite was clean, comfortable and well stocked with the essentials.  Surprisingly, the room was quiet even with the busy triangular atrium below.  Staff was friendly and
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we hope you really enjoyed the Cavalia show.  We're glad to hear t was a good experience and that you enjoyed our new Starbucks.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The Hotel is newly renovated. So looks good but they missed the bathtubs and it sticks out like a sore thumb.  They offer the digital key, but watch out Hilton Honors members they do not deliver water bottles (as others do). So you have to stay in line at the front desk to get your water bottles and respond to the security questions and the clerk will look to see if you already got the water bottles ... what a mess. Front office staff more like the security office of a border crossing.  Also the hotel, preassigned my room. I don't think that was a favor. Pick your own using the Hilton app.  F&B is great. good menu and the staff is very friendly.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we'll review your comments with our front office team.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed our food and beverage options and hope to see you back at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Same good service, clean rooms and hot breakfast (made to order omelette station)  Staff was friendly. Wifi is free for HH members as always. The Manager's HH on the weekend was nice too - chips/salsa/beer/wine. Relaxing. Parking is expensive (18$) but pretty much all hotels around there charge for parking Recommend !!
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing and we're vary happy to hear about a wonderful experience.  We hope to see you back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had a great stay and a great experience!  The rooms were clean and all of the hotel staff was very nice and helpful.  It was also a very convenient location to be in for all of our activities and needs.
Manager Response: Thank you for bringing the team and we're so happy to hear you had a great experience.  We appreciate the kind words for our team members and hope to see you back again.  Please tell your friends and other sports teams.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here for one night between Christmas and New Years (before heading out for a cruise) and have mixed feelings about the place.  On the one hand, the rooms are comfortable and nice and the staff were very helpful and knowledgeable.  On the other hand, this hotel is very understaffed!  Breakfast was chaotic, with too many people for the area and long lines at all the breakfast stations.  Who wants to wait a half hour for an omelet? Even less popular items like oatmeal were hard to get to. The way it was set up, everyone waited while a single person served themselves oatmeal and spooned various toppings on one by one before the next person could serve themselves.  Couldn't this be arranged so that the line moved faster?  There are too few elevators for the number of guests
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us before your cruise and the hotel was running very high occupancy through the Holidays.  We are reviewing our complimentary breakfast setup and appreciate your insight.  Our 3rd elevator was unfortunately down for modernization and will be back shortly.  We hope to see see you back at the hotel in 2017.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: A little rough around the edges but has the potential to become great!
Summary: There are a few (important, in our opinion) things that the hotel can still improve on and some that they have hit the mark on!  A nice check-in and atrium welcomes you to this hotel.  Decor is fresh and modern.    We arrived a little earlier than 3pm on the day of check-in.  We are aware that early check-in is subject to availability though most hotels are able to accommodate an arrival of less than 1 hour from 3pm, this was not the case at this Embassy Suites.  Whilst the check-in agent was quite friendly, she seem to struggle to find a room that was already cleaned and ready for us.  We waited for about 30 minutes but to no avail.  Finally, we had to leave for our appointment and then return later to check in.  Upon our return, the check-in went rather smoothly.  For the 3
Manager Response: Dear Theresa.  Thank you for your continued loyalty as a Diamond member.  I appreciate your candid feedback and I will be meeting with our management team to review.  Overall I'm very glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and I look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to Orange County.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: I am inside the hotel right now. Air conditioning system is not working. i have called reception twice, no ones showed up to check the air condition and it is so cold. This experience is enough for me not to come here anymore, moreover i will share it with my friends and collegues.
Manager Response: Dear Afshin.  We are sorry to hear about your stay and the AC.  All calls are logged and if the unit was turned off the room should not be cold.  We can not match a guest name to your dates to contact you directly.  Please feel free to contact me directly at the hotel if we can further discuss.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: we got it for a very good price, Pros: - Breakfast included, - Covered Parking was very close  - Happy Hour Free Drink and Snacks - Spacious Rooms  Cons: -no bellman service for your luggage -no Resturant but they will get your order in the lobby
Manager Response: Hello Pooya and thank you for you recent stay.  We are glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and evening social.  We do have a full service restaurant on property and room service available from 11AM - 11PM daily.  Vibrante So Cal Kitchen & Bar is located just off our atrium for lunch and dinner and Starbucks in our lobby has food available for purchase every day.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is not worth your time visiting.  The housekeeping alone is enough to keep you away.  They are just going thru the motions just to earn a paycheck.  The staff was not helpful at all when asked for assistance with the computer system.  The so called Chef cooking the breakfast had nothing but an attitude each day as if he did not want to even be there.
Manager Response: Dear Thomas.  I am very sorry to hear about your experience and will be meeting with the department heads to discuss.  I am very happy to discuss this with you directly and please reach out to me at the hotel or by email.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager swietlana.cahill2@hilton.com

Summary: Returning to Embassy Suites, we again had a very nice, spacious room suite. The breakfast was terrific, with a skillful omelet-maker.Housekeeping staff was excellent, and the room always seemed clean. There is now a Starbucks in the lobby...a great convenience. The parking lot seemed to be getting some renovation and some spaces were unavailable, but the hotel has an overflow lot that can accommodate lots of cars. As with many modern hotels, the digital room thermostat seemed to not function properly. A call to the front desk and the thermostat was fixed. A frustration was that one of the three elevators seems to be out of service, creating long backups waiting for an elevator. The other elevators had the strange quirk of cancelling floor requests when too many floor buttons
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we're very happy to hear it was a comfortable and enjoyable stay.  Glad that you found our new Starbucks and please know that our third elevator will be back shortly.  Hope to see you soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our family dropped off our son at UCI. The hotel was very busy. It was also loud, but I knew this going it. If you are looking for a very quite peaceful hotel, then this is not for you. If you are expecting an Embassy Suites and everything that goes with it, then you will be fine. I picked this hotel because I had points that I wanted to use.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and we're glad to be so convenient to UC Irivne.  We do have a lot of families over the Holidays and do hope you will consider coming back during one of our more quiet times.  We promise all the great amenities are here all the time.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Generally good, but need improvements.  First, the elevator situation is really bad.  Only 2 are working and they are not working very well.
