Everything cancels out if more than 3 floors are selected.  It took about 15 minutes to get an elevator going down and another  20 minutes to get up to the room during breakfast time.  Breakfast time was chaotic.  The hotel needs to provide trays to carry stuff!  The lines were very long so if you had somewhere you needed to be, don't bother to eat here.  I noticed that the hotel doesn't provide tissue papers.  There was an empty cover when we checked in, we asked the cleaning staff for a box and when that ran out they did not replace. Is this part of a cost saving measure? Wifi works well.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and we appreciate your comments.  We are pleased to share that our 3rd and final elevator will complete the modernization process very soon which will greatly improve the overall efficiency.  We are reviewing your comments with all department heads for improvement.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We booked this trip over New Years from a Groupon. It took us 4 times to get our reservation correct, I kept calling back, and our reservation was not there each time I called. Very frustrating. Once we got there the reservation was not kept and they tried to split our rooms apart. I was not happy about that. The breakfast buffet was nice, but so crowded and disorganized. It was crazy getting food and running into people. Also, there was only one working elevator, and so we waited a very long time to get up and down. Especially when we checked out, we had our luggage on a cart and it took us over half an hour to get down to check out. I never saw anyone working on the other elevators.  We will not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Misty.  We are sorry you experienced these problems during your stay.  Although the hotel was sold out we still expect to deliver on our service promise and we sincerely apologize that we missed the mark.  We hope you will reconsider booking directly with the hotel and my office is very happy to ensure your smooth stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Clean, friendly staff, nice fitness center.  Rooms were very nice and comfortable bed.  Airport shuttle every 30 minutes.  Evening social with wine and beer at no charge was very nice.  Thought the hotel staff was very accomdating.  Only drawback was that the room only had one towel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed yourself.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here for a Holiday Trip as it was in close proximity to Disneyland and my family was meeting up with other family members for a New Year's Eve Disneyland excursion.  I'm a Hilton Honors member and we received a good rate for a two room suite with a king bed.  The property itself looks updated with contemporary furnishings.  Our room was the same although there were some areas that were not quite clean, like hair in a few areas in the bathtub and dust in the sides of the bed.  The decor was nice but the doors to the bathroom and bed both had pain chipping off.  I liked the toiletries.  The complimentary breakfast was adequate and the omelette station was especially good.  The lines can get long.  The Manager's afternoon reception could use a reworking on their snacks.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent visit and for sharing.  We are glad that our location was convenient and that you had an enjoyable stay.  Please know that all guest comments are reviewed and will be shared with our associated for training.  We do hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel has a good location and decent rooms for the price. Only 2 of the 3 elevators work so be prepared to spend lots of unnecessary time waiting for the elevator. One would think after 6 months they would get it working. Upon arrival room had no towels and the sink was plugged so I had to waste time waiting for them. Rooms were good size and comfortable. Cleanliness was so so but not great. Breakfast was sub par but I guess I cant complain about free food.
Manager Response: Hello Henry and thank you for sharing your experience.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the size and comfort of the suite and will share your comments with our department heads for training.  We are expecting our 3rd elevator back soon and it's the last part of our current modernization.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We are hhonor gold members and have stayed with Hilton brands including Embassy Suites all over the US.  One of the reason we picked this Embassy suites was because it was close to where we needed to be just for one night on our way home.  Although the hotel was completely renovated as some of the review has mentioned as of April of 2016, the carpets in hallways were already seem worn out.  Our room have updated furniture and fixtures but the carpets were dirty.  The hotels seem really noisy and one of the elevator was broken.  The parking situation was awful as my daughter just had surgery and was on crutches.  Although we had a handicap sign but there was no handicap parking left when we return.  I had to drop her off at the front door and try to find parking.    Another
Manager Response: Dear T L,  I am very sorry to hear about your experience and I would be very happy to discuss this with your directly.  Please reach out to me at 949-705-5151 on how we can make this right.  We do value your business and hope to bring you back to the hotel.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: The suite is very good size and comfortable. I have a two queen beds suite and it comes with a refrigerator and microwave and two flat screen TV.  However, the housekeeping was horrible during my stay. I have to call for extra bath towels every night and toiletry and Kleenex. The bath room floor was not mopped. There is not enough parking space. The hotel looks cleaner and fresher then 3 years ago.
Manager Response: Dear Patrick, thank you for your recent stay and we do apologize for the housekeeping issues.  We have shared this with the department head for training and we're happy to hear overall you enjoyed your stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Extremely clean room and friendly staff. The breakfast had a wide selection but seating was an issue.  Even though close to the airport, there were no problems with sound.  Using the elevator during breakfast was slow.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and congrats on your anniversary.  We are so glad to hear that you had a great time and hope to see you back in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here five years in a row for traditional after Christmas getaway and didn't give us a king size bed unless we paid for an upgrade?!  To charge for a larger bed in a room we have enjoyed the past five years seems petty and not business wise.
Manager Response: Hello Todd.  We appreciate your continued loyalty and sorry to hear we did not have a king suite available for your most recent stay.  We we're fully committed during your stay and could not change from the two-queen bed suite that was booked without displacing another guest.  Please know we do our best for every guest to change rooms and meet expectation when available.  We do hope you will consider coming back and booking a king suite or city view in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel appears to be newly remodeled. The room interior is clean and well decorated. The A/C and lighting are excellent. Bedding is very good with a couple selection of pillows. Breakfast was good; the omelette station was rather crowded, however. Overall, our four-night stay was pleasant and comfortable.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience.  We're happy to hear you enjoyed our recent multi-million remodel and our awesome breakfast.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: A great place to stay when in Orange Co.
Summary: We travel to Orange several times a year both for business and family. We find the quality excellent and the service great. We did have one issue with a strange Odor coming through the air vent at around 11:00 pm.
Manager Response: Hello Janet and thank you for your recent visit.  We appreciate your continued loyalty and look forward to your next visit.  Until then have a happy New Years.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites, Irvine, CA near Airport - All Stars
Summary: I stay at this hotel every time I am in Irvine for business or pleasure, which is often, and they never disappoint. I strongly recommend this hotel if you have need of one in the Irvine, CA area. The entire staff is friendly and professional and work hard to make my stays pleasant. It is hard to say too many good things about this hotel.  They have invested a fortune in the past year to upgrade the facility and it shows. The food is great; the lobby is great; the breakfast is great as is the evening reception.  I really like this hotel! If you find yourself there, be sure to say hi to Mike the driver, Dorothy, Daniel, Lawrence and the crew at the front desk, Eric the breakfast cook extraordinaire and Art, Ascension, Jose and Patty at the restaurant/bar. Tell them you heard good
Manager Response: Dear Michael, thanks for being such a great and loyal supporter.  We truly appreciate your business and the strong recommendation.  We most appreciate you taking the time to recognize some of our associates for the hard work they put in daily.  From our hotel family to yours have a wonderful New Years and we hope to see you soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Beware: Not all rooms are suits
Summary: Upon check in and seeing our very small room we were told that some rooms are actually STUDIOS and not suits. These are corner rooms and definitely not made clear on the website when booking. Very disappointing. I thought the whole point of being called Embassy Suits is that they are all suits?!
Manager Response: Hello Katherine,  We're sorry to hear your experience was less than perfect.  The hotel does have a very limited number of guest studios which are well defined on our webpage to avoid confusion.  We do hope you will consider coming back and staying with us in a regular suite.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This year for the holidays we decided to come down south from Sacramento, Caliifornia and it was the best decision we made. This hotel has made us feel super comfortable and the really happy during our vacation. The rooms are extremely clean, the breakfast is good and the employers are extremely welcoming. We will be staying here again when we come back down to visit, for sure!
Manager Response: Nothing better to hear than "Best family trip ever!"  We're glad to have been part of the experience and appreciate your kind words and the recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The remodel is great   Clean and updated rooms  Efficient work space with reliable wifi  Central to the airport  Extending breakfast would be great but no big deal since Starbucks is in the lobby.  Digital check-in a plus as well.
Manager Response: Thanks for your continued support and glad you liked the remodel.  Starbucks has been a great addition.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Will come again. Great experience and very clean and beautiful. Went to Disneyland. A couple of miles away from Disneyland but it was worth it. Price was good and the hotel looks luxury. Very beautiful. Would recommend to everyone.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing and sounds like you had a great Disneyland experience.  We're glad to have been your hotel and we appreciate your great recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Fabulous place.  Easy access to get to Disneyland.  A lot of amenities some just couldn't take advantage of due to being new and so many to choose from.  Very clean and quiet.  All staff were very courteous and made sure we were comfortable.
Manager Response: We were glad to have been your home away from home for Disneyland.  It's always great to hear stories about our convenient location and fabulous amenities.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall satisfied with my stay . Good food and ambience.  Convenient location as well. Close to the airport and good restaurants . Average service by the staff. The reception can have better trained staff.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing and we're glad to hear you enjoyed your stay and the hotel ambiance.  We'll definitely share your comments with our team as service is our top priority.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Spacious suites, truly provides a great option and experience to host family members from out of town. Enjoy the convenience and cleanness of the property. Very classy and love the overall experience.
Manager Response: Andrew thank you for sharing and allowing us to host your out of town family members.  We're glad to hear they all had a wonderful experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Place was nice and clean.  Complimentary breakfast had a good selection.  Staff service was excellent, always someone around when needed.  We enjoyed our stay.  The hotel was near to all of the places we had planned to attend.
Manager Response: We're happy to hear the hotel was convenient to everywhere in Orange County you were visiting.  We also appreciate your kind words about our staff and the accommodations.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Average hotel. The breakfast was great for the soccer team. The evening reception needs better snacks for adults but the complimentary beer and wine was nice. The hotel was extremely noisy due to the soccer tournament and I had to call the front desk at 11:45 to ask them to patrol the floor.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate your feedback.  We're sorry to hear of any disturbances and glad to hear that our staff was able to respond.  We do hope you will consider coming back on an alternative weekend.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: It's always pleasant to stay here. One of my favorite hotels especially complimentary breakfast is exceptional the staff is always friendly. Cleaning crew is very efficient and rooms are always very clean. Will always recommend family and friend.
Manager Response: Dear Yuri,  Thank you so much for the great five star review and recommendation.  We are very happy to be one of your favorite hotels and look forward to your next visit.  Hopefully you had the opportunity to check out our new Starbucks coffee shop in the lobby.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We are hilton time share owners and I have to say our points were well spent here.  Firstly, the suites are spacious and beautiful; Second, breakfast is awesome because of the spacious dining area; and  Third, great location, lots of restaurants, try SAAGAR indian food right down the street.   The only drawback is parking, its 18bucks ,but you have to walk around the lot to get to the lobby. There is no entrance through the parking lot.   Very clean hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for your Hilton loyalty and we're very happy to hear you enjoyed your stay.  We do hope to see you back again should travel return you to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Have stayed at many Embassy Suites and always enjoy them.  Flew to Orange County for some holiday family time and chose the Main St. Location based on reviews and proximity to the airport.  Booked a king room for us and an accessible room for Mom.  We wanted to stay a week!  The layout and modern flair of the rooms was refreshing.  Much roomier than the other ones we have stayed at and the hotel was not overrun with Disney bound munchkins on holiday! The staff was excellent all the way around, friendly and helpful.  All of us LOVED the beds.  Did not make it to happy hour but we enjoyed a wonderful breakfast before heading home. We will return!
Manager Response: Thank you for the awesome five star review and glad that both you and mom had a fantastic stay with us.  We're glad you were able to take advantage of our complimentary breakfast and hopefully next time your schedule will have the time to join us at the evening reception.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Overrun with kids and teams on weekends..
Summary: If you want a quiet, nice hotel do not book on the weekend. It is overrun with kids teams and parents have no oversight. Let kids run wild on the halls, stairs and elevators. Enjoyable during the week. Charges $18 a day to park and it is full on weekends.
Manager Response: Dear Faye,  We appreciate your recent visit and do apologize for any disturbances during your stay.  Only one weekend this month had local youth sports tournaments with all other weekends  having just family leisure travel.  We do hope you will consider coming back for a more relaxing stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great staff, clean well appointed rooms, complimentary happy hour and breakfast, perfect location.. Best value in my opinion in the Orange county airport area.My go to hotel in the area and I am here frequently..
Manager Response: Jeff we're so happy you enjoyed your time with us and appreciate the awesome five star review.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Not treated as a HHonors member and carpet dirty.
Summary: Not satisfied, will not stay here again. Not treated as a special HHonors member, was not shown the benefits, perks and promotions of being a HHonors member. Dirty carpet, staff does not vacuum the carpet each day when housekeeping.
Manager Response: John, we greatly value our Honors guests and are very sorry to hear about your stay.  Our promise is to always do what we can to Make it Right and we will reach out to you directly.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I always experience the best customer service when I book my out of town events here at this hotel. Mercedes is very humble and always tries to figure out any problems I might have. Not that i've had any in the past, but is always answering any questions I have. Martha, the cleaning lady always leaves the room beautiful and services me with with the freshest towels this hotel has. I will always be staying at this hotel when I am in orange county. The staff is excellent. Highly recommend coming here.
Manager Response: Victor thank you for the great review and we will share your comments with the entire housekeeping team.  We appreciate your continued loyalty and the recommendation.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Staff, Manager's reception, hotel restaurant, starbucks in the lobby and room all EXCEEDED my expectations.  This hotel was recommended to me and I am glad it was.  This is one of the BEST Embassy Suites I have every stayed at.  Will highly recommend and will stay when in the area, again.
Manager Response: Wow!  Thank you so much for the awesome five star review and thank you to the guests that referred you to our hotel.  We're so pleased that everything exceeded your expectations and appreciate the additional referrals.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: i like this hotel, especially online checked in which alloweded me to pick the floor and the room that i like (that is far away from the elevator and ice machine) staffs are friendly and helpful shuttle service to the airport also very puncture
Manager Response: Thank you or sharing your stay and we're very happy to hear Digital Check-in was a big hit.  The Hilton Honors App allows our guests to personally choose their room location, check-in online and with Digital Key your smart phone becomes your room key.  We're very pleased to be one of the first Hilton hotels in market to have this technology available for our guests.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was the second year for our marching band from Arizona to stay at this hotel with a group of 70+ students and chaperones.  Jasmine Stewart in group sales was great to work with in the planning of our stay. The front desk team was so friendly and our check-in was seamless.  This hotel is beautiful and laid out perfectly for groups traveling with students.  They provide a great hot breakfast and the kids were excited to have a Starbucks in the lobby. Numerous employees inquired if we had experienced a pleasant stay the morning we checked out.  We would highly recommend this hotel and hope to return in the future.
Manager Response: There's nothing better than "Welcome Back."  We're grateful for your continued support and thank you for acknowledging Jasmine in our sales department.  She's been working tireless for 10+ years making sure our groups have an outstanding experience.  We look forward to your next visit to Orange County and appreciate your confidence and recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Friendly checkin.  Very nice practical suite furnished well with cool wallpaper.  Amazing happy hour with nachos, cocktails, etc.  Relaxing indoor hot tub open late.  Comfy bed, sofa bed for the kids. Delicious full breakfast.  Best value in the area.  This is our new favorite place to stay in OC.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for sharing and we're very excited to hear that we are your new favorite place to stay in OC.  We hope to see you back again soon and also hope you liked our new Starbucks store in the main lobby.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Was wowed by the in-house Starbucks, complimentary happy hour reception and hot breakfast!! These features were an added touch of convenience.  I wish there were bottles of water complimentary as I had to leave the hotel to get some, the only downfall.  Fitness center was very basic as well (treadmill and free weights) only. I had to go to LA Fitness to get a bit more variety.
Manager Response: Thank you or the awesome five star review and we're so pleased that you loved our new Starbucks store.  We hope to see you back again soon and please note that Honors guests do receive complimentary bottled water upon arrival.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I had a great time staying at this hotel. The suites were well decorated, with a door separating the bedroom from the living area. The hotel had been recently renovated and looked like the property had been taken care of pretty well. Staff at the front desk were courteous and friendly. Parking was additional $18/night depending on where/how you booked, but the manager was nice enough to give us a discount on parking (we only ended up paying for half of the parking fees). The only reason why I didn't give this trip 5 stars is because only 1 out of the 3 elevators were working during the first few days of my trip, for a 10 story hotel it meant the waiting times were much longer than usual.
Manager Response: Dear Nusser,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're very happy to hear you enjoyed the suites and the staff was hospitable.  We expect to finish the 2nd elevator this week as we complete a modernization of the system which will greatly improve the overall experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I sat in the lobby watching what was going on for a week in the AM while waiting for my ride.  I watched how Terry routinely did tasks outside his job description in order to improve the guest experience.  Terry kept busy and ensured the best possible experience for guests. TERRY is the kind of hospitality professional who we all want to meet when travelling. Thank you Embassy Suites, and Hilton for recognizing TERRY.
Manager Response: Hello Paul and thank you so much for the great comments and for sharing your experience with Terry.  We will definitely celebrate this with the front desk and hope that travel brings you back to the Embassy Suites Irvine in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Overall a good place to stay
Summary: Restaurant is nice, rooms are decent and very spacious.  Noise above and random smokers caused some issues during my stay but staff was very helpful to try and make my stay better.  Didn't exceed expectations but met them.  Not close to very many restaurants but there are some nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Charles,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're happy to hear you had an opportunity to dine with us at Vibrante.  I'm sorry to hear that there may have been someone smoking and please note that we are a 100% smoke free hotel which is strictly enforced.  We do have several restaurants nearby and for a more extensive selection please ask at our front desk  about the hundreds of great options within 5 - 10 minutes of the hotel.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: great trip to disneyland for thanksgiving
Summary: Hotel is very nice and we really enjoyed our stay. The hotel has just recently been remodeled and the rooms are really nice. I just really hope they will change a few more suites with two queen beds especially for large families like mine. The breakfast was amazing as usual for embassy suites and a real plus for us. The hotel is only about a 15min drive to Disneyland, but to get away from all the craziness was worth it. Really liked the free happy hour 5:30-7:30 too. I also received a really good price from groupon so it was a win win for us. Thanks Embassy suites for another great stay.
Manager Response: Hello Gabriel.  Thank you for the awesome five star review and that's a great tip that our hotel is so close to Disneyland but without all the Anaheim congestion.  So glad you made both the complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  Twenty percent of our suites do have the two-queen bedrooms and please note that ALL suites have the additional queen size sleep sofa in the living room.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The bed felt wonderful, the shower was very clean and the room walls kept out sound. The morning breakfast was very delicious. The hallways were clean, the elevator was clean. The only complaint I have is, the pool had so much chlorine in it, my eyes were burning as I was sitting poolside.
Manager Response: Our service culture is treating all guests like family so we love hearing "it felt like home."  We're glad you enjoyed our suites and the awesome breakfast.  Our pool is salt water so shouldn't have had this issue but please note we have shared with our engineering department for follow-up.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We visited the hotel for a family Huntington Beach get together over the Thanksgiving holiday. Our stay was very comfortable and pleasant! We could not have asked for a better hotel! If we have the opportunity again, we will surely stay at this Embassy Suites again!
Manager Response: Don, we're so glad you brought the family and enjoyed the Holiday with us.  Huntington is one of our great Orange County beach towns and just a short drive from the hotel.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We booked 14 rooms and were pleased with the accommodations.  The way the hotel is built blocks inside and outside noise when you are in your room.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The swimming pool is tiny.  The breakfast buffet is the best we have ever had at a hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Kenttarr,  We're so glad you brought your group to the hotel and guests enjoyed our accommodations and the best free breakfast in town.  We hope you have the opportunity to stay with us again in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed one night before Thanksgiving. This hotel seems to be a business hotel so during holidays the deals are great. Great if you have layover at SNA. Very nice rooms that look to have been renovated recently. USB charge ports all over the room! No fighting or crawling under desks for an outlet. Basic free breakfast items.
Manager Response: We appreciate your recent visit and glad to hear it was very convenient to Orange County Airport.  The USB connections were just one of our most recent upgrades completed with our $12 million makeover.  We look forward to seeing you again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is common hotel in a business district.  There was nothing outstanding about the hotel, but there was little to praise or to complain about.  The room was nice, the happy-hour was good, the breakfast buffet food was alright (although the lack of seating was an issue).  Parking was a bit odd because there was no direct access to the hotel.  It made it a bit uncomfortable when walking in the rain to get to the structure.  Staff was friendly.  I would stay here again if the price was right.  But I am starting to look for other properties than Embassy Suites.  I have had 2 bad experiences and 1 mediocre one in the past year or two.   This hotel was good enough.
Manager Response: Dear Laura,  Thank you for your recent stay and we are happy to hear our Embassy Suites was a good experience compared to others.  We're glad you had the opportunity to join us for complimentary breakfast and the evening reception and hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our school group stayed at the Embassy Suites in Irvine.  When I arrived after a very difficult day I almost cried the rooms were so nice and clean.  Just what I needed.  The breakfast was great.  They arranged for an early breakfast for our group one day.  The staff was amazing.  I very highly recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Vince,  We're so pleased you gave us the opportunity to host your school band and that our location, suites and the best free breakfast helped create an awesome experience.  We hope to see your group back again and very much appreciate the referrals.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Tagged along on a business trip with my husband. Hotel room was clean and recently updated. Rooms are spacious. Convenient location to John Wayne Airport. 20 minute drive to the coast. Restaurant selection nearby was good and varied.
Manager Response: Hello Beth and thanks for tagging along on this recent business trip.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and that you had an opportunity to visit our wonderful beaches.  Come back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is a good hotel and I enjoyed staying here. Rooms are big and nice. WiFi was very fast. Fitness center is decent but crowded during the morning rush. This hotel does not receive 5 points because the breakfast only had the basic requisite options and the elevators are slow and dated - though at least it seems the hotel is improving the elevators. I would consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate the recommendation.  We are glad our spacious suites and Wi-Fi worked well for you and we are currently more than half way through our elevator modernization.  We will have two elevators completely modernized by the end of this month with just one remaining.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My husband and I took a mini getaway and had a overnight stay planned for Irvine Embassy Suites. Up on arrival the concierge, I think his name was Chris, was very helpful and full of laughter with smiles. The other concierge were helpful and full of smiles as well. Our room was great nice upgrades to the hotel. Breakfast was amazing and the layout was greatly spread out. I love the omelettes! I used to stay at embassy Orange with my family whenever in town however, now I have found a new fave. I will definitely be back. Didn't get to use the pool or gym but I did view them all. Great job Embassy Irvine!
Manager Response: Dear ReshaRee,  Thank you so much for the awesome 5 star review and we're so pleased to hear you enjoyed your mini-vacation.  We'll share your comments with the front desk and hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have stayed at many Embassy suites and Hilton properties over the years and I must say I was quite disappointed with this hotel. I have stayed here in the past and was completely satisfied but during this stay with my family there were several things that were unsatisfactory. To start off the parking is a disaster. Only the bottom floor of the parking structure is open while  the rest is barricaded off. There was trash, wood pallets, back room supplies, etc. placed throughout the parking structure. The parking is so limited that I saw one person get out of his car and physically move Wood pallets so that he could park his car in a very small spot. I mentioned this to the hotel and they gave me a pass that allowed me to get into it a second parking structure next-door. This was
Manager Response: Dear John,  We are sorry to hear about the less than perfect experience and please note that we have scheduled garage cleanup to remove all leftover post-renovation material.  We are in the process of a complete elevator modernization and please to share that the second of three cars is nearly complete.  This upgrades will provide a significant improvement in the overall service.  We hope you will considering visiting with us again to enjoy the more than $12 million in upgrades we've done at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our visit to southern California was brief - only two nights.  We stayed at Embassy Suites which was located near the airport, however, it was not like a typical airport hotel.  The interior space was clean and nicely furnished.  The staff were friendly and welcoming upon check in.  The made-to-order breakfast was amazing!   Staff were responsive and helpful when questions arose - providing directions and recommendations for local attractions.
Manager Response: Hello Trynak and thank you for making us your Southern California stay over spot.  We're glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and it's always great to hear helpful feedback about the team.  We're glad you enjoyed your stay and look forward to seeing you again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: All rooms we saw were renovated. New bathrooms and appliances. No new beds or mattresses. Rooms are all suites have a ante room to the bedroom with a dining table, bed couch and a kitchenette. Bedroom in our case had 2 Double beds. We had 6 people in the room worked out well for one night. Liked the breakfast. Good choice and quality. Was nice and quiet because bedroom has separate door. The checkout time was convenient 1200 hours. Parking has to be paid seperatly as does WIFI (except if you are a HHonors member). Will come again.
Manager Response: Hello World Travelers.  We're so happy you had the opportunity to visit with us and enjoyed your stay.  Our suites do feature a king bedroom or two queen beds depending on our guests needs and we're glad to hear you had the opportunity to join us for the best free breakfast in town.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Held our annual career fair at Embassy Irvine again this year, and AGAIN Jasmine and team knocked it out of the park!  The remodel looks great!  It was such a pleasant experience, we stayed an extra day on personal time to enjoy the hotel and area!
Manager Response: Hello Carmen.  We were so glad to see your group back to the hotel and to experience our post-renovated modern vibe.  We'r so lucky to have Jasmine on our team and look forward to your return and any other group referrals.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I love this place!  The hotel provided my husband and I desert, a bottle of win and a card for our 21at anniversary. Thank you Embassy Suites.  I will return as soon as possible. Great service there, I enjoyed my weekend there
Manager Response: Dear Marisola,  We're so happy you celebrated your anniversary with us and appreciate the very kind review.  We hope to see you back soon for another getaway!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Not the embassy suites I used to love
Summary: This property is a pig with lipstick and should be avoided.  There was a half eaten slice of pizza in the hall past our room for almost 24 hours.  The maids just walk past it over and over.  You would think management would walk around the hotel with their eyes open and see the problems but that might take effort.  The rooms smell. the bathroom shower curtain is  so gross you don't want to take a shower with it.  there was yellow pee stains around the bottom of the toilet.  Come on Embassy Suites what has happened to your brand.
Manager Response: Dear Trav W.  I hope you had an opportunity to speak with our team during your visit.  Cleanliness is a top priority for our hotel and the hotel is consistently ranked very high with the brand.  We have discussed your comments and would be happy to talk with you in person.  Please reach out to me directly if you have the opportunity.  Luis Perez Director of Housekeeping 949-553-8332

Summary Heading: Nice hotel for one night stay
Summary: Hotel looks modern and clean. We gt the roon on the first floor near the breakfast area. I was afraid it would be noisy at the morning, but surprisingly it was very quite. For some reasons they stop serving breakfast very early , around 9:30 or so. The good thing about it- they take the food away very slow and you still have a chance to catch some food and coffe.  we didnt find the outdoor pool, only small indoor one.
Manager Response: Hello Mary Traveller.  Thank you for staying with us and we're glad you found the hotel to have that modern vibe.  Our complimentary breakfast hours are Monday through Friday 6am - 9am and 7am to 10:30am on the weekends.  Come back and see us soon with Starbucks just days away from opening.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: The only place to stay in Orange County!
Summary: My wife and I have been "in-between" homes for the last 4-months.  We found the Embassy Suites here in Irvine on Main to be one of the finest hotels in town.  Starting at check-in we found Dorothy to be unbelievable in her duties to make sure that everything is perfect for our stay.  Usually a follow-up phone call is made by her to make sure everything is perfect.  John, the front desk manager is also A+ on our list.  He takes the time to talk and make sure that we are happy and if there is anything that we need to let him know.  These are only two of the outstanding people in this fine hotel and I could list many, many more if space allowed.  The restaurant staff is unbelievable along with housekeeping.  From the management on down the people make you feel like family!!!  Tom
Manager Response: Dear Tom and Diana,  What a great comment about our associates and thank you for recognizing Dorothy and John.  We're glad to have been your home away from home and hope that you will continue finding us a great place for a staycation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: noisy room with internet surcharge and free breakfast ends at 9 am
Summary: The room we stayed is very noisy. Lots of clunking sound coming from inside of the wall. Our 2-year-old got scared and woke up at 3am wanting to go home.  Complimentary breakfast ends at 9 am which basically saying tourists you can't sleep longer otherwise you won't get your breakfast. Internet service surcharge. Can't believe they still change guests for it. Bathroom basin is clogged!
Manager Response: Hello Hung-Jen H,  We appreciate your recent stay and do apologize that there was some kind of noise.  Our hours for complimentary breakfast are 6am - 9am Monday through Friday and are extended over the weekends 7am - 10:30am to better accommodate our leisure guests.  Please note that Wi-Fi is complimentary for Hilton Honors guests booking direct with the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We love the embassy and associated Hilton hotels.  The family was originally on the floor then somehow the rooms weren’t.  They did what they could and fixed it so that we were still in the same hotel.  You cant go wrong staying at the Embassy even when things go wrong.  Place was remodeled and looked amazing.  Rooms were clean and cant beat the complimentary breakfast.  Even with the misunderstanding, I will always try and book Embassy when available!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for your Embassy Suites Hotel support and we're so glad to hear you enjoyed our renovated suites.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Quick check in with convenient under ground parking.  Room was quiet, clean and restful.   The breakfast was great, but just a little busy.  Had to navigate the herd, but eventually got a hearty breakfast.  We chose this facility due to its proximity to the KSNA airport.
Manager Response: Hi Brian and thank you for sharing your experience.  We're happy our location close to Orange County Airport was convenient and vary glad you had the opportunity to enjoy our complimentary breakfast.  We do feature a park and fly package if that's something that works for you in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: When I arrived I explained to the staff that I had just left a bad experience at another hotel & requested to see the room before I booked. They kindly took me to several options to make sure I would be comfortable. They also informed me of the free happy hour at the bar for their guests.
Manager Response: Hello and thank you for recognizing our team members.  From the content of your message it seems the staff went above an beyond and you had a great stay.  If the one star ranking was submitted in error we hope you will consider revising to a positive score.  One is bad and five is good.  Thanks.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The shuttle was a blessed bonus at this hotel. Each day a friendly driver transported me to and from the business I was visiting during my stay in Irvine. This greatly reduced my stress of securing a cab twice daily. The drivers were incredible and very engaging in conversation. They were very knowledgeable about the local area and offered many suggestions for places to visit. The hotel was exceptional and I have no complaints regarding the facility or staff. Food wad great at the complimentary breakfast. I ordered each evening from room service and each meal was great. The room was very comfortable and spacious. I plan to stay here anytime I am required to work in Irvine in the future.
Manager Response: Hello Tammy and thank you for the awesome five star review.  I'm excited to share your great comments with the driver and F&B team for doing such a great job during your stay.  We hope your business brings you back to Irvine soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good but service can use some work.
Summary: Had some noisy neighbors that were blasting the music until midnight. I had to call 4 times to get this fixed. Otherwise, we had pretty good service and enjoyed the size of the suite. They definitely had a lot of unsupervised young sports teams that were pretty loud.
Manager Response: Hi Wendy.  We're glad you enjoyed the suite and do apologize for the noisy neighbors.  We will certainly review this with our front desk.  We hope to see you back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is beautiful is been completely remodeled my one-bedroom suites look like a upscale one bedroom apartment the service was excellent they provide a beautiful buffet every morning shuttle service to and from the airport I would highly recommend it and it's a great deal
Manager Response: Hi there Peggy and thanks for the great 5 star review.  We're glad you had the opportunity to experience our complimentary breakfast and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My parents stayed here and loved it, for the most part so did we.  Friendly staff, nice lobby, etc.    We had a problem our AC. The room never quite cooled down. We were warm most of our stay. At first we thought that we weren't working it correctly but finally called the front desk to have it fixed. The employee who tried to fix it was very friendly but it never did quite work correctly. We were given a fan to help. Something as basic as a working AC should be a higher priority.
Manager Response: Hello Matthew.  We're glad to hear you enjoyed your visit and do apologize for any AC issues.  Our engineering department maintains a work log and will certainly make sure that suite is up and running at 100%.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Absolutely loved our stay.  Staff was courteous and helpful.  Loved that their was a full breakfast available and cocktails for us in the evening.  Will definitely stay again and look for other Embassy Suites on our next trip. The only draw back was one of the elevators was broken.  It took quite awhile to get around.
Manager Response: Hello Rose.  We appreciate the great review and so glad to hear you loved your stay.  Please know that we are working through an elevator upgrade and there is just one car down.  When the project is complete the experience will be much improved.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was by far the best hotel we have stayed at. The service was great, the room was beautiful, the amenities that are offered are above and beyond what you will get with any other hotel. They even upgraded our room to a king suite (which was amazing)! We will definitely never stay at a different hotel again!
Manager Response: Hi Amber and thanks for the awesome 5 star review.  We're so happy to hear about your great experience and look forward to seeing you again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great location but many limitations on comfort. Bed - old, hard, uncomfortable. Parking - rotten situation.  Parking garage situation is not good.  It is not directly attached to the hotel and there are literally 50 spots for a large hotel.  Then you get into "overflow" parking.  If you don't remember to get the extra parking slip from the front desk you will pay for that parking, on top of the $18 per day they're charging you already. Coffee maker in the room - doesn't work. Speaker in the room for fire alarm - if they're doing a fire test will go off several times for 10-15 mins; no warning given by staff to be out or what the heck was going on.  Fitness center - worst than most, better than nothing. Pool - pretty nice indoor pool.
Manager Response: We are happy our location was great and are sorry to hear you felt we had some limitations.  We do have 180 spaces excluding our exterior spaces in the parking structure behind the hotel.  We hope you reported the coffee maker so we can be certain that it's been replaced and do apologize for any inconvenience that fire safety testing caused during your stay.  We do schedule all testing mid-day for the least amount of disruption and the safety and security of our guests is a top priority.  We do hope you will considering staying with us again on any future travel to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed there one night.  Dorothy was our receptionist and she was very welcoming.  Answered all our questions and made great dinner recommendations.  We enjoyed the evening reception and the breakfast options are good.    There was a water polo tournament nearby so lots of families and kids everywhere. It looked like a packed hotel.  Due to the tournament and lots of kids it was loud, elevators packed, and at breakfast the omlette line was long.   The staff (specifically Dorothy) made up for any inconvenience.   I will be staying here gain.
Manager Response: Hi Beatrice,  We appreciate you recognizing Dorothy and will certainly share your comments with the front desk team.  We hope to see you back soon and hopefully for dinner in Vibrante SoCal Kitchen & Bar.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Best Place to stay in Orange County Area
Summary: Open Breakfast in the morning; from fresh fruits to bacon, eggs, omelets and juices; and suites which is good for a family with separate bed and living area; also there is a sofa bed in living room; Location is close to many of the attractions and do not have to pay for the resort fee in Anaheim
Manager Response: Hello Grant,  Thank you for sharing the great breakfast experience and we're very happy to hear the location was convenient for everything.  Come back and see us again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Checked in for a one night stay with 4 adults and 1 child. Our room was perfect. The parking lot was being re paved the morning of our departure. Due to the inconvenience parking was free. The breakfast is worth the stay. Made to order omelettes, fresh fruit, and a variety of other breakfast options led to a great start of a long day ahead! Front desk was nice and the security guard in the garage was there to help and give directions on how to enter the hotel (it's not as obvious as it seems..lol)
Manager Response: We so happy to hear you had a great stay and enjoyed breakfast.  Come back and see us again with Starbucks opening in November.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Good for group business. For past three years, we have stayed in this hotels about 10 times for my son's water polo tournaments at Irvine. Really like it. Suites are big enough to put 4 high schools kids in. Convenient breakfast and evening receptions.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for bringing the team and we greatly appreciate the recommendation and five star review.  We hope to see you back for future tournaments in the area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Beautiful property and better customer service!
Summary: After a number of extended stays, I want to share that this property is newly updated and very comfortable, but what makes it great is the care that the staff take.  Amanda helps me to find the best rooms at the best rates; Lawrence, Titus and Terry at the front desk make me feel special, take care of my business needs and track my mail; Patty and Ascension greet me with smiles and ensure that my meals are just right; Marbella and others help me keep my room tidy and write wonderful notes.  There are so many at the hotel who take great care of me so I can focus on work and care for my family!  I hope you meet them all!
Manager Response: Dear mbsinger821,  Thank you so much for recognizing so many of our team members.  We're so glad to hear that the hotel provides a great experience for you to get your work done and take care of your family.  Our team is looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great hotel professional staff. The hotel was clean and it's close to the business district. The restaurant has a small menu, the taste and quality of the food makes up for the small menu. I would recommend this hotel for the business traveler as well as the family that is visiting Disney Land.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and we appreciate the recommendation for business or leisure travel to the area.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The staff has no sense of urgency to help  the guests, and acts annoyed that they have to greet me, or help me.  It appears they prefer to talk and gossip with each other, than help the guests.  I have had to stay there for business a few times, and my experience has been the same each time.  Very disappointing.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  We are very sorry to hear you experienced service issues and please note that this is a top priority.  Your comments have been shared with our department heads to bring back for training opportunities.  We value your business and please reach out directly to our sales department if we can assist you on any future business travel to the area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Embassy Suites is our first choice.  They are always clean, friendly, accommodating, good sleep, great breakfast.  My husband first stayed in San Diego for soccer game.  We also stay for our reunions.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you so much for the awesome five star review.  We're always happy to hear that Embassy Suites is a first choice and we love Family reunions.  We hope to see you back again if travel brings you to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Have stayed at many of the hotels around SNA and this is by far the best one that I have stayed in yet.  Clean, fresh and updated.  Staff was very nice as well.  I will for sure be back.  The breakfast was great plenty of seating.
Manager Response: Dear Rodjan5,  We greatly appreciate the recommendation and "Best" Orange County Airport hotel comment.  We hope to see you back soon for another great breakfast.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Everything at this hotel is great!  From check in to the daily cook-to-order complimentary breakfast to the evening reception to the wonderful suites.  The staff is always helpful and friendly.  This property has easy access to John Wayne Airport, shopping, beaches, etc.  No freeway required from the airport to the hotel!!!
Manager Response: Dear Leslie,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and we appreciate your recommendation.  Our staff is looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Enjoyed our stay the staff was lovely and the facilities great! Breakfast was fantastic and I looked forward to it daily.  I would definitely stay here anytime. If needing to travel to amusement parks recommend Uber.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon,  We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with.  We hope to see you back again on your next trip to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have been here three times now and each time has been great. Awesome staff and a perfect hotel near the airport, anaheim and L.A. so you have great options for a nice weekend. Also this place is near Laguna beach and Newport beach.
Manager Response: Dear Eduardo,  Thank you so much for your continued loyalty and we appreciate your very kind words about the staff and our accommodations.  Safe travels and we hope you'll be back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I ended up staying here a couple nights for work.  Awesome place!  All of the staff were super nice!  The room was plenty big for me.  The room was very clean, everything worked right, and it was overall above average.  The location is ok.  Not many restaurants within walking distance, but still enough to have some choices.  The food at the hotel restaurant was good too.  I'm pretty burned out on hotel breakfasts in general, but I did actually like theirs!  Huge selection and tasted good.  The managers reception food was ok, and free, so nothing to complain about there!  The area of the city that the hotel is located is filled with office buildings.  On the plus side, very safe around there.  On the minus side, not much fun to see within walking distance.  Overall though, a very
Manager Response: Dear Andrew,  We're glad you came to stay with us on your recent business trip.  Thank you for sharing your experience and the recommendation.  We're especially happy to hear that breakfast was great and hope to see you back at the hotel on your next visit to the area.  PS - The District is just two miles from the hotel with great shopping, entertainment and dinning.  Better yet, our shuttle drivers are happy to get you there and back.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We have stayed in a great deal of various Embassy Suites. This one, by far, is the nicest one to date. The furnishings and decor are contemporary and pleasing to the eye. The bed was very comfortable and loved the space that a suite allows. To those people who have had bad experiences due to children run rampantly wild, I suggest that you inquire before booking your room if they expect a sports group at the time of your stay. Also, if you prefer high end alcohol, be sure to bring your own! The bar does not stock high end!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for the very generous review and we're so happy to hear you really enjoyed all our recent upgrades.  Our bar inside Vibrante restaurant does stock all levels of beverage so please let us know if here is something you feel we are missing so we can review.  We hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The best check-in experience I've had ever. The reception lady, Dorothy, was really kind and welcoming. She helped us to have an enjoyable stay. Please do not skip the really delicious cooked to order breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Masoud,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  It's so great to hear about the excellent service and we greatly appreciate your recognizing Dorothy at the front desk.  We hope to see you back soon for another great breakfast.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I was in OC, California the week of September 11. The check in experience was great. I had the ability to choose my room a day prior to my departure for California from MD.  The front desk office manager, John Pease,  was very friendly and courteous. Would definitely stay at this Embassy Suites again.
Manager Response: Dear Twila,  Thank you for staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine and we're so happy to hear that  the new Honors App worked so well to assign your own suite.  We'll pass along your kind comments and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here about one week ago.  We stay here three to four times a year.  It is always clean, and comfortable.  A convenient place near the John Wayne Airport and plenty of places to eat close by. There are many shops within a few minutes drive for spending your money at too. Always a good breakfast in the AM.
Manager Response: Dear Satellite20,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and we hope that on this most recent visit you enjoyed the new refreshed look around the hotel.  We're looking forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Best Embassy Suites I have stayed at!
Summary: Have stayed at several Embassy Suites and this one is number 1! Great staff although the bar staff could use a bit of an attitude adjustment. Room was clean, well decorated and had charging ports and outlets everywhere I turned. Bathroom was impeccable. Shuttle service was fast, friendly and even took me to my meeting mile down the road. Not sure what else I could have asked for! OK, a nicer bar staff.
Manager Response: Dear FamilyTraveler62,  Thank you so much for sharing and we appreciate your recent stay and vote of confidence.  We'll make sure to share your comments with our management team and hope that you'll be coming back to see us next time you are in Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great place for the cost. Very quiet neighborhood on the weekends. Breakfast area was big and held lots of people. Omelet line was long but otherwise not too bad for a heavy weekend crowd. Still some construction/renovations being done but not too intrusive.
Manager Response: Dear susyb88,  Thank you for staying with us this past weekend and we're glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast.  We are getting very close to having Starbucks open and hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is my second trip to Irvine. I arrived on Sunday and the area around the hotel is a business district where all business and most restaurants are closed on Sunday.   I reviewed the room service menu and for my app I ordered Vibrant Spiced Pepitas which I ate separatist and also loaded onto my salad. For my main, I enjoyed the poached Pear Salad w/chicken and for desert, ice cream. The meal was fabulous! Will order again tonight.   Overall, the hotel is nice and less expensive than other chain hotels in the area. If you are not staying here, stop by and eat at the Restaurant. The food is great.
Manager Response: Dear Dave,  We're glad to have you with us and thank you so much for the awesome Vibrante SoCal Kitchen & Bar review.  We're very proud of our new restaurant concept and looking to make this a dining destination for the area - room service included!  We hope you enjoy the rest of your week and please let us know if there's anything we can do for you.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Wonderfully Nice staff with nice amenities and a great manager reception with free drinks from 530-7.  Uber is always close by if shuttle not available.  Spacious rooms with large flat screens and desk area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate the shout out to staff and our evening manager’s reception.  We also hope you had the opportunity to enjoy the best free breakfast in town with our amazing omelet station.  We hope to see you back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very pleasant and comfortable stay. The bed was one of the most comfortable I've ever slept in. Nice quiet area.  I wish they had a small market inside the hotel with munchies, waters, toiletries,  etc.
Manager Response: Dear mjg559,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're so happy to hear that you had a great experience and loved the bed.  Please know that we do have sundries available at the front desk.  We temporarily shut down our gift shop as we get ready to open Starbucks in the former location.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have stayed in many Hiltons and this has been, by far, my favorite hotel experience . The ambience is beautiful and peaceful. The staff is friendly and the rooms are beautiful and spaceous. I worked with Dorothy who accommodated the needs I had to stay in this hotel longer than expected and even upgraded my room when nothing was available online. Terry, went above and beyond to assist in what I needed to make my trip easy and hassel free. I couldn't have asked for a better experience or staff to have worked with me. I would stay here every time and will recommend it to my friends and family.
Manager Response: Dear Nicole,  We're so happy to hear about your experience and how Dorothy and Terry went above and beyond.  We greatly appreciate the five star review and recommendation and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: My go to hotel in Irvine
Summary: I don't often stay at an Embassy Suites...many reasons which I won't get into. This location is the exception. It's amazing, they've been recently remodeled and it shows. Lots of amenities, despite the courtyard style of all of these type of locations, it was quite in my room, which was clean, stylish and comfortable.   Breakfast was wonderful with many options.   Awesome wifi!! First time ever where I didn't have to log back in every five minutes!  Lots of amenities for the business traveler!   No mandatory valet, which I love, love, love...did I mention that I love that they don't valet here!  I guess I could on on and on but those are highlights of the best! Down sides? Not many, should l quibble about the cost of parking no! But it's not free and I'd take that over valet any
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We're so happy that you enjoyed our multi-million remodel and that our complimentary breakfast had all the options you we're looking for.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is an awesome hotel. Everything you need is right here. Close to John Wayne airport. Close to the freeway. We've stayed here several times and I won't stay anywhere else. The staff is amazing and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Edwin,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and we're glad to be your go-to hotel.  We appreciate the recommendation and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed two nights and no problem. Clean and friendliness. Such a comfortable stay. Recommend this hotel. Front desk was very welcoming. Excellent rate when booking early. Will diffenately come back.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy,  Thank you for the great review and recommendation.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you back soon with our new Starbucks opening.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This place is transforming nicely.   Lobby looking good and remodeled room quite nice.   Bathroom fixtures upgraded, bright lighting, well set up for getting work done after a day on the road.   Wifi reliable.  Comfy bed.   Great spot for business travel.   5 minutes from SNA airport so easy in and out as well.   Digital key access is really convenient - you really don't ever need to go to the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear TFamLLL,  Thank you so much for the awesome five star review.  It's great to hear that all the hard work that went into this last remodel is really paying off for our guest satisfaction.  We hope to see you back again soon with Starbucks opening up.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Booked room #229 on the 2nd floor for our anniversary, one -1/2 months in advance. Check in is at 3, we arrived at 4:15. Our room was not ready yet. Were told it would be another 1/2 hour. Asked if we could maybe get another room. We were tired & wanted to rest before Happy Hour. They informed us there were no rooms left. They were full. Never had this issue before at any Embassy. Waited almost 45 minutes & went up. When we got inside the room smelled of smoke. The maids came rushing in & scared us. Asked if they could put they duvet on the bed. We hated that the room smelled of smoke (non-smokers) but were already told there were no more rooms. Didn't want to ruin our anniversary so we tried to make the best of it. Thought I would take a quick bath to relax & de-stress a
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,   First, I would like to thank you for taking the time to rate our services. We realize that your time is very valuable, and we appreciate you giving us your feedback. I was sorry to hear that we were not able to meet all of your expectation with your check in experience, and for  the miscommunication with smoking charge placed  on your room. I have also taken note of the other areas you pointed out such as: and I can assure you that we will be working extremely hard to make sure that they  do not reoccur in the future.    Once again, I like to thank you for your feedback, and should you have any additional comments, or suggestions, please feel free to contact me directly.   Warmest Regards,  John Pease  Front Office Manager Embassy Suites

Summary Heading: Love the design of this hotel.
Summary: The atrium design is beautiful! It reminds me of the Hyatt Regency in San Francisco. The room was very clean and comfortable. Parking was an additional charge, but that is not unusual. Even though it was a Saturday night in a business park area, there were a few very good restaurant choices close by. The complimentary happy hour was a pleasant surprise. The "munchies" were minimal but good. Overall, it was a really nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie,  We're so glad you liked our new Atrium design and had an enjoyable stay.  We appreciate the great review and look forward to seeing you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, terrible stay, call before you book!
Summary: Stayed one night this Saturday, easy check in, no problems. First surprise,parking structure is not connected to hotel. You have to carry your bags out of the parking structure, up a flight of stairs and around the corner to the hotel! Next we unfortunately came in the middle of a soccer tournament. Kids were running everywhere, security tried to control the situation but were totally overwhelmed. Kids throwing mulch down from top stories on to restaurant patrons trying to enjoy the lobby seating. Wet kids from the pool leaving puddles on the tile floor making it very slippery. Kids pushing every floor in the elevator making it almost impossible to get anywhere in a timely manner. Then after returning to our parking garage we were told it was full, and directed to another area.
Manager Response: Dear Victoria,  I was very sorry to hear about your experience.  Please note we have mostly relaxing weekends for our leisure guests and I really do apologize for any behavior that took away from your visit.  If you have any questions please contact me at the hotel any time and we do greatly appreciate our Honors members.  Warm regards,  Swieltana Cahill General Manager

Summary: When we got to our room, there was still food in the fridge from the previous guests. Also, it took us 15 minutes to get to our room (while we had a crying baby who needed to eat) because there were a bunch of young kids running around and pressing all of the buttons on the elevators which made it take an extremely long time to get on one of the two working elevators. When we finally arrived at our room, our key would not work (we had just used the same key to get into the room a few hours before), so I had to go downstairs to the front desk to get that problem sorted out. This took me another 15 minutes to get down and to get back up to my room. Also, there were kids running up and down the hallway in front of our room and banging on our door at all hours of the night, and
Manager Response: Dear Geoff,  We sincerely apologize for the housekeeping mishap and that is certainly not our standard and will be shared with the department.  We will have some very busy weekends throughout summer but please note that most weekends throughout the year are very relaxed.  We value your business and hope that you will reconsider staying with Embassy Suites again for future travel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Wish We Would Have Had More Time!
Summary: We booked a night at this property due to the close location to the airport and an early morning flight. We ended up arriving late in the evening and pretty much falling into bed right away. Our flight left very early the next morning so we never really got to explore or enjoy the amenities such as the pool and free breakfast. Our room was a suite with 2 beds and a sofa bed. I was pleasantly surprised to find the 2 beds in a room separate from the sofa bed. The bedding was clean and comfortable and the mattress was comfy also. The girl at the front desk was helpful the following morning when we needed to get out of the parking garage but had left our room keys for our family members that didn't have to check out as early as we did. Without a key we could not exit the garage and
Manager Response: Dear Ross,  Thank you for staying with us and glad to hear our proximity to Orange County Airport worked out well.  Come back and see us again for the complimentary evening reception and Starbucks will be open soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: happy with stay. I guess because I've been through many Embassy Suites was more hospitable and friendly and very attentive for customers. The front desk was great and parking security lady. I guest it was mostly the morning breakfast employees.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  We are very glad to hear you were happy with your stay and thank you so much for acknowledging the team.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The staff is awesome and makes you feel very welcome. The complete renovation of the interior decor of the public space and guestrooms are very refreshing and delightful. The complimentary breakfast and evening appetizers are very tasty and well appointed. Very close to the John Wayne Airport with complimentary shuttle service. The atrium is very refreshing and open and great place for informal meeting with clients or colleges.
Manager Response: Dear Ken Y,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience and we greatly appreciate your very generous comments.  Join us again with Starbucks opening in less than a month.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: clean  and  smooth  newly  renovated,  all  new  amenities  friendly   staff, very   helpful    boring  breakfast-  but at least you have one ;-)   small  parking  lot, but  usely  enough  space close to the SNA airport and to Irvine neighborhoods, UCI
Manager Response: Dear Frqflyer,  We appreciate your recent stay and comments.  Thank you for acknowledging the team and we hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Just a one night stay, but wished it could have been longer. We hadn't stayed at an Embassy Suites for several years, and were impressed with the renovations here.  Our 2 room suite was very nicely decorated, with a comfortable bed and pillows. The breakfast was plentiful with a great omelet station. There was ample parking which was close by, and we walked to a local restaurant for dinner.
Manager Response: Dear jeanr,  Thank you for thinking of us for your return trip to Orange County.  We're so glad to hear the renovations were impressive and happy that you had the opportunity to join us for complimentary breakfast.  Our Starbucks coffee shop will be open soon for your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We used the hotel for a family reunion for about 8 families.  They all loved the staff and the amenities especially the breakfast.  Jasmine Stewart handled setting up the details for using the hotel for the reunion.  She could not have been more helpful.  She was very professional and made it very easy to get the family members registered.
Manager Response: Dear jgustafson66,  Thank you so much for allowing us to host your family reunion.  We appreciate your awesome review and especially for recognizing Jasmine in our sales department.  We hope we might be able to bring you back again next year!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This property is completely renovated and is a joy to stay in. The restaurant bar area is equipped with a computer and areas to use a laptop if you BYOD. Breakfast of course is terrific. The staff is awesome. I never sleep well on first nights but here I slept eight hours straight!
Manager Response: Dear PauljTom,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and we're trilled to hear that you had a great nights sleep.  The banquettes in Vibrante are designed for business meetings or even a study session with USB plugs.  We hope to see you back again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is my third stay at the Embassy Suites in Irvine (Airport location). Since my last stay the bathrooms have been updated as well as the lobby.  Staff is still very friendly.  Can't beat the location. Quick drive (less than 30 mins) depending on traffic of course to Laguna Beach, Newport, Balboa.  Breakfast (with their omelet station) can't be beat. Still offer a Happy Hour and again staff all around the building is friendly/helpful.  Within walking distance to several restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Steph W,  We're so happy you came back for your third visit just in time to experience our extensive renovation of the hotel.  We appreciate your kind comments and hope to see you back for #4 when Starbucks is open.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Although the Embassy Suites in Irvine is just minutes from John Wayne Airport it doesn't have that airport hotel feel. This property could be plunked down almost anywhere but near an airport and it makes for either a good business or leisure hotel.   The Good: Friendly, helpful staff Well located  Excellent, free breakfast Large, comfortable suite rooms  The bad: Hallway carpet is either dated or whoever chose it has bad taste I'm a huge critic of hotel fitness centers and this was one of the worst. By my standards it was unusable  Our room never got cool.  We ran the air all night and the room never cooked off.  We checked in too late and were too tired to wait for maintenance to remedy for our one night stay  Overall, when back in the area, I'll stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear HospitalDude,  Thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and we do look forward to seeing you back in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for families.
Summary: We went to the Orange County fair in Costa Mesa and we're happy to know an Embassy Suites was not to far from the fair. The hotel was clean and the service was excellent. We will definitely return if we come back to Costa Mesa.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Sounds like you made the last week of the OC Fair and hope you had a great time.  Thank you for staying with us on this fun trip and we do hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites.  There's always so much going on in the area!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Wonderful hotel that's just been redone to make it even better. Great location that is walking distance to lots of great restaurants and coffee shops and cafes. Awesome shuttle service not only got me from airport but also brought me to nearby shopping. This is our go to place when visiting the area.
Manager Response: Dear Nicole,  We were so happy to have you back and to experience the "new" hotel.  we're glad you got some shopping and and greatly appreciate the very kind recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We have visited the hotel frequently in the past.  The remodel continues with the focus on the lobby now.    The food area is nice although the line created as people wait for bagels to cook extends across the area where everyone transitions from getting their food to the tables to eat the food.  We enjoyed ourselves except for all the kids and teens running all over the hotel and up and down the elevators.  Attempting to use an elevator required patience and working to remain calm.  My wife became quite upset with the repeated delays with the elevators as kids and teen pushed all the floor buttons or ran floor to floor repeatedly push both the up and down buttons.  Spending $250 a night to relax is not supported by this situation where so many traveling sports teams are staying
Manager Response: Dear J S,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and we hope to see you back with our Starbucks opening in September.  We're also looking forward to launching the first elevator upgrade in a week or two which is part of our modernization to improve the system.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales
