Summary: I just needed an overnight stay for a workshop I was attending in Orange County. This was PERFECT!!! It had EVERYTHING I needed and more! Staff was super helpful and the evening reception and breakfast were fabulous!
Manager Response: Dear Bridget,  We're glad to be your perfect stay for the workshop.  Please come back and visit us any time.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed with family for a couple of days while touring area.  Very impressed with property, room, and staff.  Included breakfast was excellent, with a lot of variety and an open and pleasant dining area.   Would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear guests,  Thank you so much for bringing the family and we're glad to hear you had a great experience.  We hope to see you back again soon and appreciate the recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: A very good business travel or family vacation hotel. It's very convenient for flying in/out of John Wayne Airport. They offer complementary shuttle service to/from SNA. Shuttle runs every 30 minutes during peak hours and on demand at other times.   Check-in went smooth, there were three people working front desk when I checked in at 4pm.   2 Room Suite was spacious and well appointed. No problems with cleanliness or linens. Hotel recently finished a multi million dollar refresh and it shows.   Only one power outlet and one USB port on desk. Slightly annoying since I had three devices that needed charging. No convenient outlets near bed.   Bathroom was decent sized. No problems with cleanliness or amenities. Three sets of towels.   Small refrigerator, microwave and coffee maker
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We're happy to hear you enjoyed your time with us and please know that there are additional USB ports on the side tables adjacent to the bed for charging.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I had a wonderful stay at the Embassy Suites. I was in attendance for my niece's wedding, as this was her choice for to stay. She did a great job in choosing Embassy Suites. Embassy Suites truly made this a memorable event that the family and friends will cherish for a life time. Everyone I spoke with that was in attendance for the wedding, who  stayed at the Embassy Suites only had wonderful things to say. I an very pleased with my stay ay the Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for the great review and we're so happy to hear you enjoyed your time in Orange County.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Accommodations were excellent. Staff was helpful, friendly, and patient (esp. Amanda G and Svetlana). Our team especially appreciated the manager's reception and complimentary breakfast. Rooms were clean, with good sound isolation between rooms.
Manager Response: Dear xiduke,  Thank you for taking time to share this great review.  We're always glad to hear that our guests enjoy the breakfast and evening reception.  I've already shared your message to both Amanda and Swietlana and we hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I come to Irvine often and the Embassy Suites in Irvine off of Main Street is very consistent in the quality of their accommodations and service. I strongly recommend this hotel to anyone in need of one in this area.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  We greatly appreciate your continued loyalty and thank you so much for the awesome recommendation.  We're looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Beds are great.  Breakfast wonderful.  Loading and unloading was difficult due to limited and hard to navigate entrance area.  Overall great place to stay for families!  Stairwells need to be cleaned.  We stayed on second floor and used the stairs instead of elevator.
Manager Response: Dear Linda,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad to hear you found us to be a great location.  We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nicely remodeled, but a new coat of paint doesn't cover up everything
Summary: My family and I travelled to the LA area for a vacation.  We stayed at another Embassy Suites near LAX for the first few days, then drove further south to spend a few days at the beaches.  We love Embassy for our family, so I saw that this one had spent $12M on a remodel, so we decided to stay here.  As far as hotels go, it's not bad.  You can tell it's been around for a while, and when comparing to a standard hotel with just rooms and hallways, this one would be a huge upgrade. However, comparing it to other semi-luxury hotels within it's class, it falls short on the little things.  For example, instead of replacing the 20 year old suite doors/bathroom doors, they painted over them.  Also, while the breakfast was good, we had the exact same food every morning.  I'd like to see
Manager Response: Dear Troy,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate your feedback and are glad to hear our spacious suites were great.  We share all feedback with our entire management team to celebrate the staff and for areas of improvement.  Please note that we are upgrading the complete elevator system with the first upgraded cab coming back any day now.  This project will greatly improve the overall performance and speed.  We do hope you will consider returning to the hotel on any future trips to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Used this hotel for a one night visit.  My wife booked the room and requested a king bed.    When we checked in the person who checked us in took an extremely long time and did not communicate that we were not going to get a king rather a queen.  The hotel made up for the issue however please check when checking in to make sure everything is correct.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you for staying with us and we do apologize about the timeliness of the check-in process.  We appreciate your feedback and have shared this with our front desk team for training opportunity.  We appreciate your business and hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Good: Updated rooms, nice white clean look as of 7/16.  TV selection is good. Location is in a nice area. Don't play PokieMan Go at night around there or the Irvine Police will find you.    Bad:  Parking is BAD! Lot is always full. Tall vehicles may not fit. Hotel is always full of kids. Worse than Disney Land. Kids sports team LOVE this hotel. Elevators are always broke, 1 is usually dead.
Manager Response: Dear Mr-Meow,  Thank you for your stay with us in July and we appreciate the nice review of our newly renovated suites.  Please know that we have overflow into the upper level of our shared parking structure.  We have nearly completed the first cab in our elevator modernization which will dramatically increase response time.  We hope to see you back again soon.  PS - I hear there's Pokemon hanging out in the fountains in both the adjacent office tower and across the street at McCormick's.  Best regards, Ken

Summary: The room I had was extremely clean and looked brand new. The king bed was very comfortable and the hotel overall was very quiet despite being full. Tne breakfast buffet was always stocked, warm and delicious. There is chef on hand eager to whip up a fresh omellette. The manager's reception party was a very nice added touch. A great way to unwind from the day. My only negative comment is the wifi in the room was not strong enough for me to connect to my company VPN. Extremely frustrating that I kept getting kocked off. Parking in front of the hotel is limited but there are 2 parking decks directly behind the hotel with plenty of room. Emily at the front desk was a huge help during precheck in communications and a pleasure to deal with. The best way to describe the hotel is clean,
Manager Response: Dear CottonMalone1106,  Thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate your kind comments.  We're so glad to hear that your accommodation and breakfast were wonderful and we will certainly share your guest service comments regarding Emily to our front desk team.  We are currently upgrading our elevator system which will have some delay but at the end of the project will greatly improve the overall service.  We hope to see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good place to stay in Irvine, CA
Summary: Always a good place to stay when in the Irvine area of Orange County California. Great rooms and great service. Cook to Order Breakfast and Manager Reception in the evenings includes Alchol, Soda and snacks.
Manager Response: Dear Rod,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and we greatly appreciate the five star recommendation.  We look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had such an amazing experience at the hotel, i really loved it, we were on the 10th floor with great views, decent price, very clean, spacious and really nice staff, especially Dorothy and the young girl with short blonde hair (i dont know her name but she was there at night times).. I'd definitely recommend it!  Plus there's a guest laundry room where u can use the washing machine and dryer (very useful)  Free snacks and drinks were offered at the managers reception, great times!
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your great experience.  We always appreciate hearing great stories about the staff going above an beyond and will certainly share with Dorothy and the front desk team.  We hope to see you back again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel just underwent a $12 million dollar renovation and it shows.  The suite was spacious, clean, modern and it had a door to the bedroom!  Had I been traveling with my family, that would be an awesome addition!    I loved the HUGE bathroom mirror and it was very well lit.  Even the free shampoo and conditioner were good quality.    Room had 2 TVs and free internet.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  At check in, she took extra time to show me how to get to the beach and where to go sight seeing.  Breakfast was tasty (and free!).  The manager's reception had some snacks that were ok, but hey, drinks were included, so not going to complain too much about the snacks.  Overall, gorgeous hotel that I would stay at again.
Manager Response: Dear D5071,  Thank you so much for the wonderful review.  We're very happy to hear that you had a great stay and our recent renovation added to the experience.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We arrived here only to go to the desk and have to deal with someone name Terry to check us in. I am not sure he ever looked up at my wife but just asked some short questions and handed her our keys. Very rude and very unlike most of our Hilton experiences. We are Honors members, not elite any more because we try not to travel as often on overnight trips. We were not offered any water, which we usually receive. We got a room facing a beautiful parking garage. We got two double beds when we always request King. He did not seem to be the slightest bit interested in helping us.   Later, I when I was coming back to the hotel, I asked if we could get our water and the lady was very pleasant and did ask who had checked us in. I explained and she was very apologetic and took care of
Manager Response: Dear TheGatorman,  We appreciate your business and sincerely apologize for any service shortcomings during your stay.  We are passionate about delivering the best guest experience and I'm glad we had the opportunity to connect during your visit.  Please know that we discuss all guest feedback and bring back to the team for training.  We hope that you will continue to consider staying with our Embassy Suites and please reach out to me directly at any time.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Staff was so friendly and helpful, hotel was very clean, rooms were very clean, breakfast buffet was delicious.  I would stay at this hotel again and highly recommend it for families.  Parking was very easy.
Manager Response: Dear Norine,  Thank you so much for the awesome comments.  We're so happy that you had an excellent stay with us and for the recommendation.  We're looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Clean Rooms, Friendly Staff & Great Breakfast
Summary: My wife and I stayed here for two nights in mid-July.  The hotel is close to John Wayne Airport and easy to find.  There are some renovations going on as the gift shop is being converted to a Starbucks Coffee shop.  The hotel shares a multi-level parking garage with some businesses next door.  Embassy Suites uses the basement level but it filled up so we had to park in the other portion of the parking garage on the second night of our stay. The hotel will charge you $18 per night, but if you park in the other portion of the garage you pay $15 per night. We were told to park in the other lot and Embassy Suites paid the fee.  We also asked for, and received the $15 rate for the first night. Hint: Ask for the $15 rate adjustment in parking, or just park in the other part of the
Manager Response: Dear Steven,  We're so glad you decided to stay with us and it's great to hear you had an enjoyable stay.  We appreciate the feedback and we're glad you had some time to explore South Coast Plaza.  We hope to see you back when we have Starbucks open.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We love this hotel!  It was very kid friendly and it was clean and beautiful.  The kids loved the pool, we loved the happy hour and the breakfast was amazing.  Thanks! We came here with our Judo Club and we all loved the location and the amenities.
Manager Response: Dear Jeanette,  We're so glad to her you had an awesome stay and thanks so much for taking the time to share.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The parking is very small so your lucky if you find parking.  You'll have to park in the commercial parking lot and pay a nightly fee.  They often over book and send guests to another hotel, (atrium).  I was sent and was in line with other upset guests.  If you have an option, stay somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear andrgtrr,  We are very sorry for your experience at our hotel and do appreciate that you were able to meet with me prior to your departure.  Please contact me directly if you would like to continue our conversation.    Sincerely, John Pease Front Office Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel close to John Wayne airport.
Summary: Selected this hotel since we were arriving later in the evening.  Shuttle driver was prompt and very friendly and informative to things in the area.  Hotel is a good representative for Embassy Suites brand.  As always the breakfast was very good.  Room was also very good.
Manager Response: Dear Gary,  We're glad our location near John Wayne Airport worked out so well and thank you for the great staff feedback.  We hope to see you back again a the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have a family of five and all of us were able to stay in one room. Every one slept comfortaby. The sofa bed was queen sized and had a premium memory foam mattress. The room was very spacious and very clean. The suite came with microwave and mini fridge. Separate tvs in the bedroom and living room. The breakfast is a bit early for me and my family but it was really good. Potatoes o'brian, scrambled eggs, pancackes, fruits, toast, bagels,cereal, and a made to order omelette staion. It was well worth it. Saved us money by eating breakfast at the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mwdrwilson,  Thank you for bringing the whole family and we're glad to hear our spacious suites comfortably accommodated everyone.  We're also happy to hear you enjoyed a great breakfast and we hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: I can see why this hotel was fully-booked
Summary: Overall, a very good hotel for families. A few things to keep in mind for your future stay: Parking - When the hotel's parking garage is full, the hotel will place signs to use the other (shared) parking garage. Many of us were driving around in circles until I called the hotel front desk and was informed that signs were just placed to direct us to the other parking garage. I hope hotel management will find a way to better communicate this in the future.   Breakfast - Better than expected! There is an express line for bacon and/or sausage, and there is a large variety of other breakfast goodies without long lines - scrambled eggs, pancakes, potatoes, cereal, fruit, yogurt, etc.  Room - Newly remodeled. The a/c vent in our room was extremely loud. The hotel was sold out, so we
Manager Response: Dear Lilian,  thank you for your recent stay and greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and for the recommendation.  We will review your comments with the department heads to improve our guest experience.  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: If you are in Irvine and need a place to stay, I would highly recommend this hotel!  The staff and accommodations are exceptionally good!  All of the amenities along with the excellent customer this hotel offers will provide you with a great stay and experience!
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and the awesome five star recommendation.  We look forward to seeing you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I like this hotel - I have stayed there numerous times.  The breakfast is good, the reception in the evening is also good.  But, as a woman traveling alone - I often order room service.  I used the menu in the hotel directory - only to find that it was no longer available.  I asked the lady to help me understand what changed - and, it was too difficult for her to explain . Thankfully, she brought up a new menu.  Guess what? Filled with carbs and sugar (I am pre-diabetic). There are no items that are healthy for me - so, I had to special order (and the special order was awful).  Now, many you may not care as you eat whatever you want - but, for those of us who care deeply about our health - this was too far.  The next morning - I brought the Room Service menus down to the Front
Manager Response: Dear Gordotl1,  We appreciate your loyalty and thank you for you kind comments regarding breakfast and the evening reception.  Delivering the best customer experience is our #1 priority and we apologize for the room service falling short.  Our F&B team can deliver anything with the understanding of dietary and medical needs.  We hope you will consider to continue your travel with our hotel and the review  will be thoroughly reviewed for service training so this doesn't happen again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Family members came to Irvine to attend a funeral the next day and the spacious suites gave us the opportunity to be together comfortable.  We enjoyed the complimentary wifi, happy hour and breakfast.  Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Diane,  We are sorry for your loss and glad to hear our guest suites provided a comfortable environment for the family to get together.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our expectations were met. The hotel location was ideal for shopping, beaches, whale watching, bicycling. Just as the website mentioned. The salt water pool was just fine and helped a lot after a long day of activities. We would recommend it. A small issue with the Wi-Fi but it got resolved.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph,  Thank you for your recent five night stay and sharing this awesome review.  We're so glad to hear the location was central to everything you were looking to do.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was an excellent hotel. Great value for the price. My kids loved it. We enjoyed complimentary wifi. The Lobby area was inviting. I would stay here again on a business or family trip. The staff was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Maureenb642,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're so glad to hear that your kids loved the hotel.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The new renovation of the lobby, atrium and all guestrooms are very well done and recommend this place for all business and leisure stay. The decor is very nicely done and refreshing. Hotel provide complimentary shuttle service to the airport and runs about every half hour.
Manager Response: Dear Ken,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad to hear such high marks for the new atrium area.  We hope to see you back again soon and looking forward to opening our Starbucks coffee shop in late August.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Unbeatable value for southern California stay
Summary: We come here each year for a huge baseball tournament and this hotel is perfectly located near most of the local high school fields. The morning breakfast is the best way to feed teenage baseball players efficiently and in a nutritious manner and the evening manager's reception is the perfect place for the parents to unwind after a long day at the field.
Manager Response: Dear Erin,  Welcome back and thank you for continuing to be one of our loyal guests.  We're so happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and the evening reception.  We're looking forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great hotel in great location.  Made 2 1-night reservations to get better rate for one of the nights.  Told desk and did not have to change rooms but room keys had to be reset after first night, so that part was not seamless but service to correct it was great.  Would definitely stay again.  Breakfast great too including custom omelettes!
Manager Response: Dear Fishbonz412,  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience and we're so glad to hear that you had a great stay and loved the omelettes.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Evening reception wasn't the best compared to other Embassy Suites
Summary: Beds are always great, housekeeping great. I like super clean rooms, there were stray hairs in bathroom and on hide-a-bed mattress. House keeping brought up clean sheets and extra blankets right away. The next day the place was spotless. Front desk staff is super nice. There is no Valet but you still pay the $18.00 for parking. The shuttle to the airport is free but you load your own bags which isn't a big deal. The evening cocktail hour wasn't much. It worked for us but it wasn't as good as other Embassy Suites. Head bar tender was cranky and spoke in Spanish thinking we wouldn't understand what she was saying about us.
Manager Response: Dear Kathren,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking time to share your experience.  We are very happy to hear that your suite and housekeeping were great and will share your full comments with the rest of our team.  Guest service is our top priority and we hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The Embassy Suites in Irvine off of Main Street has recently been renovated and the atmosphere is fantastic. Very open and comfortable lobby and bar area. Every room was redone with new just about everything from carpet to bathroom fixtures (the mirror lights up - cool). The lamps and bed stand have USB ports to charge stuff - nice touch!
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you so much for sharing and we're so glad to hear you really like all the hotel upgrades.  It was a long process and we're very happy about the results.  We hope to see you back again really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I felt like a queen in a castle. I was greeted by the front desk person Karla who kept a smile on her face. Dorothy gave me great locations to visit on my stay. We had so much fun. Clean, comfortable, and extremely worth the money. Will only be staying at this location.
Manager Response: Dear Resee,  What a great comment and thank you so much for recognizing Karla and Dorothy at the front desk.  We're so happy to hear you felt like the Queen of the Castle and hope to see you back again really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I've stayed here 10+ times on business trips.  The entire staff - from the front desk, the breakfast and complimentary happy hour crews, to house cleaning - has always been warm, gracious and responsive.  The rooms are clean and modern. The beds are comfortable and sleep well.  The gym is on the smaller side, but adequate for a good workout.  I like staying here and look forward to my next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Justin,  We appreciate your continued loyalty and thank you for taking the time to share your most recent experience.  We very excited to share your comments with the staff and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: 1st night was terrible, beds were very uncomfortable , A/C noise whined all night long, TV remotes did not function, int
Summary: Could not connect to Internet. Requested another room for remainder of stay. This room was far better, however. my car was vandalized in paid parking, breakfast chef should be fired. he doesn't like his job so he should get another. We experienced his rudeness on 2 previous visits, the guy needs to be replaced by someone more pleasant. Taking everything into consideration we may have to stay elsewhere after sta numerous times at this hotel.I am sure this falls on deaf ears.
Manager Response: Dear j1powell,  I am very sorry to hear about your recent experience and please know that we review and take action on all guest feedback.  I would be very happy to speak with you directly and please reach out to me at at Swietlana.Cahill2@hilton.com.  Thank you for letting us know and allowing us to follow-up.  I look forward to speaking with you and having you return as our guest.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Terrible stay this was the only embassy where I had this experience. Housekeeping didn't make the beds just threw away our food which we we didn't appreciate. Parking was very confusing and credit card hasn't been credited yet
Manager Response: Dear Patty,  We are very sorry to hear that you had a less than perfect family vacation.  Service and guest satisfaction are our #1 priorities.  Please contact me directly at the hotel if you would like to further discuss your experience.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Overnight stay for a softball tournament.  Great time for the kids; happy hour was a nice touch.  Comfy beds and hot continental breakfast. very nice area.  Going back again in two weeks for another softball event.
Manager Response: Dear Julie,  We were happy to have you and your family back last weekend and look forward to your next tournament stay.  Thank you for sharing and we'll see you soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hosted a small conference at the Embassy and was very impressed! The new remodel was/is gorgeous! We had 4 meals prepared by the Embassy chef and everything was amazing and healthy! The sales manager, Ken, was great to work with. The staff was friendly and attentive. The meeting room was perfect. The shuttle service was a great feature for our attendees and was one of the key reasons for choosing the hotel - close to the airport and convenient with shuttle, breakfast included, and managers reception with cocktails for our dinner.
Manager Response: Dear Christa,  Thank you so much for bringing your conference to the hotel and we're so happy that the group enjoyed their stay, conference rooms and the food.  We're looking forward to working with you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Beautifully renovated property. Very modern and clean. Suites are large, clean and modern. Underwhelmed by late night service in bar - there were servers roaming around but we had to flag them down. Food was Luke warm. Breakfast is crowded - everyone wants free eggs!  But overall very nice and great for families.
Manager Response: Dear Jessica,  Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate the awesome comments regarding our recent renovation.  We're glad that our hotel worked out very well for the family and we'll strive for 5 star service on your next visit.  Thanks for sharing!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nice clean, appearance seemed to be newly refurbished
Summary: We enjoyed the large room and the area where the complimentary reception and breakfast is served is very nice and larger than most Embassy Suites that we have stayed in in the past.  We like the Embassy Suites brand within the Hilton Honors program, because of the Suites and the complimentary evening reception and the complimentary cooked to order breakfasts.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled suites.  We appreciate your loyalty and happy that you had a great experience with our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great service, fair parking (for Irvine) recent remodel make this a great stay for all ages. very quiet streets on weekends and close to fwy  for fast escapes to sites in LA/OC. Staff was very friendly and accommodating during the stay
Manager Response: Dear 851brucer,  Thank you for your recent visit and the great comments.  It's so great to hear you enjoyed our recent renovations and we appreciate the kind words regarding our staff.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good - Good - Bad - Bad - Bad - Bad
Summary: This place didn't live up to our standards, but could a great stay for others.  We were looking for a nice and relaxing place that is family-friendly.    The Good - staff in general were friendly and helpful.  The room was decent.  We liked having a refrigerator and microwave.  That's important for a family with young kids.  The breakfast buffet had a nice a variety of selections and one of the reasons we booked here (much better cost-wise than going to Denny's with a family of four.)  The Bad - The handout upon check-in should of given us a clue of the challenges this hotel has to deal with in terms of guest.  The handout outlines many policies and rules.  It even notes a lobby curfew and they have the right to kick you out hotel if you break rules.  The handout didn't bother
Manager Response: Dear familywithtwins2015,  We appreciate your recent stay and it does sound like you were with us over one of the busy weekends.  We also have many off-peak weekends where the family can spread out enjoy a little slower pace.  Thank you for your comments regarding the food allergies which we've already discussed with the F&B manager.  We hope that if you are traveling again to the area that you will consider staying with us again an always feel free to call us in advance if any concerns.  It's our goal to provide all our guests the best experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel was in a great location, not far from disneyland, universal studios, and near the beach.  It was recently remodeled and very tastefully done.  Extremely clean and the staff was very friendly.  Very comfortable and very quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Susan,  Thank you for your recent visit and staying with us to experience some of the great local attractions.  We're happy that our location was so central and that you found the staff and accommodations friendly, comfortable and quiet.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Parking, quality of room, front desk unfriendliness, and missing amenities are my complaints from my last stay at this hotel.  Parking lot was full and my complaint to the front desk received snide comments and a bizarre response about using private connecting lots that there is no way anyone would know of.  No coffee in the lobby at night!  No skin lotion in the bathroom!  No salt and pepper shakers on the table during breakfast.  Long lines at breakfast. Terrible lay out where morning coffee is served.  Just not what you would expect at an Embassy.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff,  We are very sorry that your guest experience was not what it should have been.  We appreciate your comments and please know that they have been reviewed by our management team and shared with our team members.  This is not our standard of service and hope that this will not prevent you from returning on any future travel to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Over all my husband & I enjoyed our stay. We loved the decor, style and such.  There were two bummers for us, but not deal breakers.  The parking was a hassle so we went to the over flow parking and the table seating for breakfast was hard. BOTH not too bad for us, but we enjoyed our stay.   The beds were comfy, shower pressure was nice, lighting was great in the bathroom and best of all our rooms fell clean and didn't feel "icky" like some hotels.  Definitely will stay here again :)
Manager Response: Dear Edimimi,  Thank you so much for sharing your most recent stay.  We're so please to hear that you loved the refresh and the cleanliness of our guest suites.  We hope to see you back again for another getaway.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was a very good experience after the remodel with everything fresh. The breakfast was outstanding. We had two rooms which they arranged beside each other as requested. Thanks for being professional at the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear guest,  Thank you so much for the outstanding five star review.  We're so glad to hear about your experience and very happy that you enjoyed our refreshed suites.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed for a week to visit our son who leaves in Irvine and we enjoyed every moment we spent in the hotel. Great breakfast and very good service.  Beautiful decorations and the rooms are very spacious.
Manager Response: Dear Jutta,  Thank you so much for staying with us while visiting your son in Irvine.  We're thrilled to hear you had such a great experience and look forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Intoxicated Cocktail Hour Guests Commandeer Bus
Summary: Poor management of the cocktail hour and overindulgence by a group of 6 or 7 guests resulted in the shuttle bus driver being bullied into taking this group to a local restaurant, while leaving me to wait until the bus returned for my SCHEDULED return to Santa Anna Airport.
Manager Response: Dear PauldZ8909VU,  We were sorry to hear about this incident and do carefully manage the evening social.  If for any reason your shuttle was delayed by other guests we should have paid for a quick taxi ride to the airport.  We will share this with our front desk team to ensure our priority for the airport is maintained.  We do appreaciate your business and taking time to share your comments.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The suites are nice and spacious. It's a nice comfortable place to stay at. The happy hour where they serve free snacks and beverages is also a plus. The breakfast was also quite tasty. Most importantly the staff was really helpful and friendly. Dorothy was particularly helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Nadine,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and the outstanding five star review.  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed the complimnetary evening reception and breakfast.  We especially appreciate your recognition of Dorothy at the front desk.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall nice hotel but management of the facility is a disaster.  Two nights in a row there were at least 100 people in the lobby drinking, yelling, kids running up and down hallways. I've never experienced this at an Embassy Suites. My advice...stop giving people free beer and wine for two hours and the majority of your guests will have a nice stay!
Manager Response: Dear Jeff,  We appreciate your recent visit to our hotel and do apologize that your stay was less than perfect.  Our evening reception is nightly and generally a very enjoyable social setting for our guests.  We do hope that you will consider giving the hotel another opportunity for your business.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel itself is decent. Definitely more of a commercial hotel rather than for-leisure. Rooms are much smaller compared to other Embassy suites, poor guest service (they do not acknowledge/greet you), parking sucks (the garage fills up at night, and you have to use some other business parking lot- but they don't tell you that until it is too late and there's no parking in the garage and you have to ask them what to do), employees are rude and not nice at all. I came down here for vacation in Disneyland, but should have stayed at one of the Embassy Suites in Anaheim instead.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie,  Thank you for your recent stay and aplogize for your parking issues.  Our team should have directed you to the overflow levels which are in the same garage behind the hotel.  We will share your comments with our staff and hope that you will consider a future return.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall a fantastic weekend getaway experience.  Hotel staff's attention to detail was impeccable, and courtesy off the chart.  adda babba shoe fits wear it.  when ya come to a fork in the road, take it  cba cba cba
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  Thank you for the recent weekend stay and it's great to hear the staff was on it.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Used Embassy Suites as a home base while we explored Catalina Island and Orange County destinations with my sister, visiting from St Louis.  We loved the new updated decor.  The rooms were very comfortable and live up to the suite name.  The bathrooms are very bright and also generously sized for a several day to extended stays.  Beach towels were available at the salt water pool and spa area. Railing for pool was a tad wobbly but that probably has a work order in to fix, knowing how well this hotel attends the details.  Also, there is a lovely outdoor room adjacent to the pool area that my sister enjoyed reading in.  She also used and enjoyed the gym which appeared to be a favorite of the business travelers.  There were also large kids soccer teams that came in Friday night
Manager Response: Dear Karen,  We're so glad you chose Embassy Suites Irvine as your home base to explore Orange County.  We appreciate your wonderful comments and hope to see you back again for another OC adventure.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: the sauce was sublime, the meat was spicy and perfectly cooked. These taquitos were not you usual hotel fare.  I would go there when in the area for these taquitos. They were that good. The waiter made a point of saying that everything including sauces were fresh and made at the facility.
Manager Response: Dear dwnyc2013,  Thank you so much for coming to dine with us at Vibrante.  Everything is made fresh daily and please come back as we will continue to introduce new menu items.  I'm looking forward to sharing your comments with the Food & Beverage team.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Always a great experience at Embassy Suites
Summary: Embassy Suites never disappoints.  This time, they went above and beyond their usual great service.  We got a shuttle quickly coming from and going to the airport.  They accommodated our very early check in since they were able to find a room.  They even provided us breakfast on both days.  The complimentary breakfast is a delight.
Manager Response: Dear Vangie,  We appreciate your continued loyalty and it's so great to hear about a wonderful stay.  We strive to deliver the best and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Book a room for friends and myself and they were impress by the size of the room and cleanliness. Ambient surrounding and all looks new and up keep. Comfortable bed , hot tub, and indoor pool. Evening complimentary beer and snack, great place for a eveni g conversation . Not the typical hotel. Friendly staffs too.no regrets, will leave  satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear YewTan,  Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate the friendly staff comments.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Everyone that works there is wonderful! There is easy access to the freeway from the hotel. The room has recently been remodeled and was great. Parking was close by and there was ample parking. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear 971gingerl,  Thank you for the awesome review.  We're glad to hear you enjoyed the remodel and hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken

Summary: Great location.  Close to my office and not far from Costa Mesa and Newport Beach.  Rooms were remodeled and comfortable.  Liked the complimentary breakfast and the coffee was good.  Friendly staff.  Did not use the pool facilities but used the gym.  Gym was small but had the basics to get a workout in while traveling.  Gets crowded there on the weekends so allow time for standing in lines to get breakfast and/or finding a table to sit if you don't want to take food back to your room.
Manager Response: Dear Azbeschgirl,  Thank you for your recent stay and it's great to hear that our hotel location was so convenient to your work.  We're glad that you enjoyed our refreshed suites and had the opportunity to experience our complimentary breakfast.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Check in was not normal ES.  Agent couldn't get the remote key to work, had to switch my room after I had already checked in online.  No regular coffee in my room, bugs flying around in the room, didn't refresh bathroom amenities each night.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff,  We appreciate your recent stay and take your comments very seriously.  Digital Key check-in is the newest technology and we have this as a top priority for delivering the best guest experience.  We've sat with our front desk and housekeeping to discuss your feedback.  We hope that you will keep us in mind for any future travel and let us turn this around.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: If you are looking for a big room, it's great. This Emabasy Suites recently renovated so it's actually nice. You have a separate room for a twin double beds.  Pillows and Beds are comfy.  Has microwave and good coffee supply inside the room.  Breakfast is good enough.  Gym is quite small and no view.  Strategically located in OC.
Manager Response: Dear rzi0426,  Thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate the great comments for the renovated suites.  We're glad that our central Orange County location worked well and we hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is a good example of the updated Embassy Suites franchise. Gone is the tired hacienda-style decor, replaced by sleek contemporary furnishings.  Helpful desk staff, nice rooms with a real door separating the living area from the bedroom.  This was my first try if the 'digital key' feature, and it certainly seems to make it slower to open your door.  Maybe with more experience this will become more convenient, but for now it seems like a solution in search of a problem. Vibrante, the restaurant, is something special.  It almost gets buried under the "manager's reception" freebies, but this place is worth a visit even for folks not staying at the hotel.  Fresh Mexican and standard dishes, beautifully presented, and served by a friendly and attentive staff.  Go!
Manager Response: Dear Joe,  Thank you so much for this outstanding five star review.  It's so great to hear such positive feedback on the significant time and capital that went into our recent transformation.  We're glad you enjoyed Vibrante and coming soon we'll have a full service Starbucks off the lobby.  We hope to see you again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel near Orange County Airport
Summary: My family and I stayed at the Embassy Suites in Irvine for one night in order to minimize our travel to the Orange County Airport the next morning. We did not get to enjoy the free breakfast, as our flight was too early. The gym appeared decent to good, though I didn't get to use that, either. The room was very modern, very nice and very clean. There was a living room area near the door, with a pull-out bed/sofa. The internet was slow and spotty. That would be the only thing preventing me from staying in this hotel in the future, should I be in the area again.
Manager Response: Dear viralboy34,  Thank you for bringing the family for your pre-flight evening out of SNA.  We're glad to hear that you felt the room was very modern and spacious.  Hopefully next time you;re in town you will have more liesure time to enjoy our complimentary breakfast.  We're having AT&T take a look at the Wi-Fi as we just went through a major upgrade adding 150 access points and should be working seamlessly.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I was able to check in just before 11am which was really nice and convenient. Me and my friend were there for a concert at the Verizon Wireless Amphitheater which was about a 15minute drive away. We stayed in a room that was not a suite which was fine. It had one double bed but it was a weird room configuration. We had the couch in the corner the bed on the other side. It was room 205. It was just a really weird configuration. I'd probably try and get a suite next time. The pool looks like it needs a little TLC. But there was a little veranda by the pool area which was really quite adorable. The breakfast was carb city pretty much. But good stuff. The line for the omelette bar was out the door pretty much it was so long. Kind of disappointing that you had to be in that line to
Manager Response: Dear J_Ne8989,  Thank you for making us your hotel choice for the concert.  Hope it was a great show.  We appreciate your feedback and we definitely recommend booking a suite over a guest studio if you are looking for more space to spread out.  We have some updated coming to the pool area and very happy to hear you liked our patio area.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Poor parking terrible staff and our room had gnats! The staff could care less about our parking problems. Overnight parking - not enough parking close by. Plenty of parking for registration with 20 minute limit but it is all used by hotel guest that have finished registering. We had to park far away to register.
Manager Response: Dear Tom,  We appreciate your feedback and take very seriously.  We did have some limitations to our parking up until or renovation was complete.  We now have our full parking area back and in the case our lot is full we always have unlimited overflow into the upper floors of the garage.  We have reviewed your comments with the team too ensure that we are properly communicating parking at the hotel.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity on a future stay to show you why so many of our guests return year after year.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: My girlfriend and I recently came in to try out the new restaurant. I ordered the flautas and taquitos, she ordered the burger. Everything was delicious! We've eaten here in the past and wanted to see what was new. The food is fresher and you can definitely taste the difference. They're taking the farm to table approach that a lot of California restaurants are doing.  They've got a great beer selection on tap too. But really, what keeps us coming back is the service. Luis, Elvis and Jeremy take such good care of us whiles we're there. Even if the food was so-so, which is common with hotel restaurants and NOT the case here, we would still come back. The personalized service is something that is rare anymore in the service industry. They always remember my love for IPAs and my
Manager Response: Dear Brandon,  This is so awesome!  We've just launched Vibrante and we're so please to hear it was a great experience from the food to the service.  We are committed to this new concept featuring regionally inspired small and shared plates modernizing the Mexican tradition.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My family and I visited the hotel in April for a family trip.  We experienced a few issues during our stay.  The first is was there was a large amount of high schools kids running around everywhere making a lot of noise as well as playing in the elevators and selecting all the floors, there appeared to be one security officer on duty, who was clearly overwhelmed.  Second issue was at 2am we woke up to it being extremely hot in our room as if the A/C was not working.  My husband called the front desk and they apologized, did not offer to send Engineering to the room to try to investigate the problem, but did offer a fan, which we accepted.  We waited over 45 minutes for the fan to be delivered, I can't imagine the houseman was that busy at 2am. The next morning we checked out and
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany,  We appreciate your business and I've left you a message to further discuss your experience.  Our records show points posted and I'm looking forward to connecting with you on the phone so we can Make this Right.  Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Dorothy at the front desk was extremely helpful and pleasant.  She gave us good recommendations and coupons for nearby restaurants which we sure appreciated!  Thanks, Dorothy!  The omletes at breakfast were delicious each morning.  And although we weren't always able to enjoy it, the daily happy hour was nice too.
Manager Response: Dear Shannon,  Thank you for sharing your stay and it's so great to hear the awesome comments for Dorothy.  We'e glad you enjoyed breakfast and hope on your next visit that you'll have more time to relax at the evening reception.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great hotel to work out of.  Not a resort property.  Rooms are great for holding meetings.  Location makes it easy to arrive on late night flights.  Like the atrium layout and proximity to freeway as well.
Manager Response: Dear R6111,  We appreciate you taking the time to post about your stay.  We're glad to hear the suite worked great for business and that our location was beneficial.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: From arrival to departure, the staff went out of their way to accommodate our every request with the utmost graciousness! The hotel was very well maintained and the cook to order breakfast was beyond compare!  I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Janette,  Thank you so much for the awesome five star review.  It's always great to hear that customer service was #1 and you had a fantastic breakfast experience.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Everything was great minus the construction they were doing when we first arrived. The breakfast and evening reception definitely were great things that sets embassy suites apart from other hotels. Didn't like the fact parking isn't included and no free internet :/
Manager Response: Dear Ronald,  We're glad to hear you had a great stay and our extensive renovation is complete.  We appreciate your kind comments about our complimentary breakfast and evening reception and look forward to your next stay.  PS - Hilton Honors members get free Wi-Fi at all Hilton's when booking direct.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The room was wonderful and the staff inviting.  I have yet to be disappointed during my stay at the Embassy Suites. This is my second stay at an ES hotel and both stays have been very special.  I will definitely be booking future stays based on my past experience.
Manager Response: Dear Virginia,  We're glad to hear that your second Embassy Suites experience was special.  Thank you so much for the fantastic five star review and we will be looking forward to your return.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Would definitely stay here again everybody was very nice the food was good during breakfast front desk was very helpful and accommodating the rooms were very clean. Would definitely stay here again did not get to enjoy the pool but will probably do it on our next event
Manager Response: Dear 362selmac,  It's great to hear the staff was so engaging and that you very much enjoyed our complimentary breakfast.  We hope to see you back again soon and also, when you're at the pool check out the patio area.  It's a great place to relax.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: this is an outstanding hotel.  the rooms are expansive, comfortable, a real value.  parking, which can always be a problem at hotels, was very convenient.  the breakfasts were all excellent.  I wouldn't stay anywhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Bruce,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome five star review.  We hope to see you back again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed at this amazing newly renovated hotel for one night prior to our departure from the John Wayne Airport.  We had a suite that was so large and remarkably clean! We were greeted by a lovely receptionist (Dorothy) who gave us all of the information regarding our stay and welcomed us to the manager's reception.  This was a lovely reception with a variety of salsa and chips as well as complementary drinks.  We then went for a swim in their salt-water pool and hot tub.  At the time there were no other guests in this area so we had the pool to ourselves.  The area was clean and well-supplied with pool towels.  We did have a quick dinner at the hotel which was a bit pricey, but convenient and delicious.     The beds were so comfortable!!!  I was only disappointed knowing we
Manager Response: Dear Specedtcher,  Thank you so much for this amazing five star review and we wish you could have stayed longer as well.  We're glad to hear that you still got to experience so much of the hotel on your one evening and we're happy to hear that the renovated suites made for a good nights sleep.  We will be sure to share your thanks to Dorothy at the front desk.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Once again the staff at this Embassy exceeded all the chaperones and students expectations. Check in was a breeze with 21 rooms all ready to go with students names preprinted on door key packets and all in line as requested.  Breakfast was a challenge the first day as the lobby is finishing up on renovations but staff handled the crowds perfectly.  The front desk staff were extremely friendly and offered help as needed without rolling their eyes to 72 loud students asking the same questions.  Parking for three buses out front makes access easy.
Manager Response: Dear Rim2RimFlagstaff,  We were so glad to have your group back and we appreciate the awesome guess service comments.  We hope that the group enjoyed the new facilities and look forward to your return.  We're very happy to have the entire breakfast area back now!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The property has been recently renovated and the decor is quite pleasing. Located in a commercial district and very close to John Wayne Airport with a shuttle service available. Front desk staff efficient and helpful. Typical breakfast with the normal Embassy Suites options. However the Evening Drinks was well off standard. On a Saturday night only 1 person was serving Cocktails while the other was effectively useless serving beer which hardly anybody was drinking. It took 26 minutes to obtain my first beverage and many patrons were very frustrated. I hope this is not a management directive to only allow 1 server of cocktails, if so pathetic ! Otherwise a satisfactory stay.
Manager Response: Dear Bruno035,  Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate your kind comments about our recent renovation.  Your comments regarding our evening reception have been shared with the F&B team to ensure that we have a little backup during the busy time.  this is certainly not our standard and we want all our guests to be enjoying their stay and no standing in lines.  We hope to you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is great.  At times there are a lot of school groups or weddings but they got it together.  They're groups.  Roll with it.  I've used this hotel every year for the past five years for a one night stay for a night before a charity walk.  We check in a Friday afternoon then check out early Saturday morning.  Early Saturday morning is a mad dash to the breakfast buffet.  The biggest rush is to the custom omelet station.  I just want some basic scrambled eggs. I'll grab a banana and go. I can also get a few extra coffee sacthes at the front desks super early and be set for the 2 mile walk.  GO WALK MS!
Manager Response: Dear Lisa6of6,  Thanks for your continued loyalty and so glad to hear this was year number five.  We hope you enjoyed the new suites and breakfast area and look forward to your return.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We were two colleagues on a business trip. We booked two rooms at the Embassy Suites well in advance. When I checked in, I was pleasantly surprised by the very large, beautifully appointed and spotlessly clean suite. The staff were also very friendly and attentive. However, when my colleague came to pick me up from my room for one of our meetings, he walked into my room and was completely taken by surprise - He said that his room was nothing like mine and that it wasn't a suite at all but a simple hotel bedroom....!!! I decided to check it out. It appears that on each one of the hotel floors, there are two rooms (those that end with "05" or with "20" - be warned!!) that are not suites. This is especially noteworthy since we paid the same amount for both rooms!!!!! The second
Manager Response: Dear Shaked,  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed one of our spacious suites.  The hotel does have a limited number of studio only rooms which are clearly defined on our website and all booking channels.  Our renovation is complete so that may have been isolated work; however, we sincerely apologize that it affected your stay.  We hope to see you again back at the Embassy Suites Irvine as we launch our new restaurant this month.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We visited immediately after the renovation...what a lovely property. Probably one of the nicest Embassy Suites we've stayed in! Beautiful decor. My only gripe was at breakfast on Sunday am...some slob made a huge mess around the coffee/juice station & it wasn't cleaned up in a timely fashion...otherwise, five stars! The mattresses...beyond comfortable! ☺️🤗
Manager Response: Dear FitTravellerLasVegas,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your recent experience.  We greatly appreciate your kind comments and sorry to hear about the mess at breakfast.  We cant wait to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here on a recent business trip. Room was very clean and everything worked as was fairly modern. I liked the fact I had a sitting room and small kitchenette a lot of space for the money. It's my first time in an Embassy Suite but would use again.  Pickles the Cat
Manager Response: Dear Pickles,  We're so glad to hear that we were your very first Embassy Suites and hope to see you back again soon.  We pride ourselves on being the premiere hotel for business travelers in the Irvine/SNA Airport area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Typically really enjoy Embassy Suites, however this hotel chose to do a complete renovation during our stay, including jack-hammers all frigging day, no lobby, dust everywhere, horrible breakfasts in a converted closet, had to walk around the outside of the hotel to get to the workout room (not fun or safe!)   I intentionally chose Embassy as the lobby usually is a good place to do business and have the occasional meeting. The entire lobby was completely boarded off with hideous temp walls (though you could see a completely torn up construction site from any upper level), you could not even pass another person in the tiny space you had to walk through to get out the back door which was the only way in or out.  Beyond the fact that the hotel should have been closed to  do this
Manager Response: Dear Isaac,  I am sorry to hear about your experience which sound like it was at the height of our re-model and that our staff interaction at the time didn't make it right.  The temporary walls came down over a month ago and we're happy to share that all of our facilities and guest amenities are 100% open.  This was a very extensive project and hope that you will re-consider a future stay with us so we can win your business back.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel is under construction and breakfast is served late on weekends. If your staying there in hopes of eating early before a sporting event...find someplace else. Staff in dining are is disengaged. No coffee until after 7am on weekend. To bad if your an early riser.
Manager Response: Dear Larry,  We were sorry to hear that you had a less then acceptable stay.  Please know that our renovation has been complete and both the breakfast area and restaurant are open.  Our breakfast hours are 6AM - 9AM during the week and 7AM - 10:30AM on the weekends to accommodate our leisure guests who like more time in the morning.  We do open part of the buffet and beverage station closer to 6:30AM on most weeks for the sports teams with early games.  We hope that you will consider us again for a future stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Near airport & lots of restaurants. Many other retail areas within driving distance. Also near UC, Irvine. It was almost deserted on the weekend which was great!!! Imagine it's pretty busy during the week. It was being remodeled so there was lots of construction BUT hotel looked great. Would recommend & stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Susyb88,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad to her our location near shopping, dinning and the University CA at Irvine worked out so favorably.  We've completed our extensive $12 million project and hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My sister & I flew to CAL for a small wedding and just a fun wk together.  Flew into the John Wayne airport, very close to the Embassy Suites.  Their van came and picked us up. Lovely tri-level lobby and alcoves w/beautiful wall paintings and glass elevators. The staff was very friendly and advised us on where to site see.  Car rental co. was also right in the lobby so we were able to reserve our car for the next day.  Had a beautiful suite, newspaper in the morning, breakfast in the lobby and a happy hour every evening!  We were able to shuttle to the Irvine Art Museum free of charge and then called them to pk us up 3 hrs. later.  Had a work out room and a lovely indoor pool; beautiful mountain view at the end of our floors walkway and a quiet, private balcony off of our suite.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy,  Thank you for the very generous review and we're so glad to hear that you had an exceptional stay with Embassy Suites.  Hope to see you again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: no advisory that this property is under construction...whole lobby area is torn apart. parking is horrendous. no good walkway to lobby from adjacent garage. shower had no hot water for an hour in the morning, staff knew
Manager Response: Dear Eugene,  We just took down our advisory at the end of last week as our renovation is mostly complete.  Our lobby was finished some time ago and we're happy to be seeing the breakfast area ready to go back any day now.  We're sorry that your experience was less then perfect and hope you will give us another shot to win your business.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed at this Embassy for weekend and remodeling of the kitchen caused long  lines but the staff made it work well. Everything went very well, El Torito near the place was nice, good prices and very good service
Manager Response: Dear Joseb,  Thanks for spending the weekend with us.  We're expecting the new breakfast kitchen to be open any day now.  It's very exciting to see this huge project coming together.  Best regards, Ken

Summary: Located near the airport.  The hotel just spent millions updating it.  A lot of Embassy need a face lift.  This one has it and it is done.  Rooms, Lobby, etc... all updated.  Combine that with the things we all grew up liking ...spacious rooms, managers cocktail special, and a great breakfast and for the business traveler or family doing a couple nights you got yourself a deal.  Employees I found to be hit or miss but mostly very friendly.  I would come back.
Manager Response: Dear Coirie,  Thank you for your recent stay and it's great to hear that all this hard work has paid off.  We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you back really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Excellent staff, rooms were very nice, the beds were wonderful!! the entire experience was awesome! We wanted to change our stay in Atlanta to the Embassy Suites, unfortunately it didn't work out. This hotel is a great stay next to the airport!
Manager Response: Dear Jamie,  Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites and sorry to hear that Atlanta didn't work out.  We appreciate your awesome review and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Extremely great value and although construction is happening it is a beautiful and revamped facility. Just be aware of the $15 parking fee. The breakfast is insanely delicious and the omelette bar is delicious
Manager Response: Dear 120miltonr,  We're glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and felt it was a great value.  Please come see us again as the renovation is complete and the new restaurant is open.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: April 2016 – let me say right away - I saw from travel forums (and notes on the hotel’s website) that they are currently undergoing a refresh/remodel.  While I saw work being performed in some of the public spaces, I never heard anything!    Looks like they are doing a fantastic job updating this property – the lobby area is sleek and modern but still welcoming and inviting.  The guest suites are key – I love having the extra space in a ‘home away from home’, especially when I’m traveling for more than a day or two.  Lots of room to spread out so you don’t feel like you’re living in a bedroom.  Small fridge and microwave helped a lot too; nice to have these handy.  The bed was *very* comfortable and the linens were top-notch; this was an all-around relaxing experience.  I
Manager Response: Dear DeutschDiana,  We're so glad to hear you had a fantastic stay and greatly appreciate the shout out to Dorothy.  We are opening the new bar tonight and hope to see you again very soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Wait until the remodel is complete
Summary: My second time staying here and it's a decent location for attractions in the area but enough irritations to make me not want to come back, ever.  First the good things. Amazingly comfortable bed, clean room and front desk staff who are super helpful.  The not so good. They're in the middle of a remodel so there's some construction going on but with several large school groups here they decided to cordon off an area of seating on a Saturday morning making it really difficult to get a seat. The omelette chef decided to disappear for five minutes while people were waiting and there's a clean-up guy walking around with music blaring from his cell phone speaker. The evening food service is a little on the slow side but again friendly staff make up for it.  If you're with a group on
Manager Response: Dear Si405,  We sincerely apologize that your breakfast experience was hampered this past weekend.  We are happy to announce that the breakfast kitchen will be opening later this week which will have significantly improve our guest flow and open a lot more seating.  We appreciate your patience and thank you so much for the positive feedback on the new guest suite product.  We hope that you re-consider a future stay to see all our services in action.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Wonderful staff couldn't ask for better, they were on top of things and made our stay a pleasant one. Breakfast on the other hand was not...long lines and slow to replenish hot foods.Kitchen is under renovation so hopefully if we stay again it will be a better experience.
Manager Response: Dear Monique,  Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate your kind comments about the staff.  We also so glad to hear that the new suites were awesome.  We pride ourselves on delivering the best free breakfast in town and when the remodeled omelet kitchen re-opens the experience will improve ten fold.  We hope to see you back again a the Embassy Suites Irvine.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Excellent experience the hotel was under some repair.  However it was awesome. The renovation will make your experience even better. Make sure you take advantage of the evening reception.  The wines and mixed drinks are of great quality.  Please don't forget to tip the staff and worker make it worth your stay.
Manager Response: Dear Frank,  Thank you for the awesome five star review and we're so glad to hear that you had a great experience.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine when our new restaurant, Vibrante is open!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: While the staff at the reception desk were extremely helpful and professional, we were unaware that significant construction was underway at the hotel.  The dining experience was a fiasco, with people crowding around temporary breakfast buffet.  Limited food, 12 or more people in line for an omelette, and insufficient seating made it very difficult to enjoy the stay.
Manager Response: Dear Gary,  Thank you for your recent stay and we apologize that the breakfast experience was less then perfect.  Please know that our new complimentary breakfast kitchen is just about to open which will open up the atrium area for greater seating capacity.  We hope you enjoyed the new suites and thank you for recognizing the staff for their helpfulness.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Construction is now on main level, which is disruptive to the usually great breakfast and overall atmosphere of the main floor of the hotel. It was cramped, and the staff seemed flustered both days of our visit.
Manager Response: Dear 194natalien,  Thank you for your continued loyalty while we complete the current $12 million upgrade.  We had some delays but happy to report that the contractors are close to wrapping up the remaining public area work.  We hope that you enjoyed the new suite product and the new  overall look and feel of the atrium area.  Looking forward to your next stay when we will also be launching our new restaurant, Vibrante.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Remodeling started at 11:30pm in the rooms above mine
Summary: This was the most ridiculous thing I've ever encountered at any hotel.  The hotel was right across the street from where we we doing business so I reserved 7 rooms for myself and colleagues.  Everything seemed ok until I heard what sounded like a jack hammer in the room above.  Long story short after many calls to the front desk woman who was frazzled by the guest onslaught I went upstairs to to see what was going on and a couple of guys with heavy equipment tools were coming out of the room.  I asked what they were doing and they said they were following orders- I looked in the room and they were tearing out the bathroom fixtures and counters.  I said it was almost midnight and this is a hotel which you really only come for to sleep.  They again said they couldn't stop and were
Manager Response: Dear Tom,  I sincerely apologize for the significant inconvenience you and your colleagues experienced at our hotel four months ago.  This was a major project with upgrades to all facilities throughout the property and is currently in the final phase.  Please contact me directly at the hotel and I would be very happy to have further conversation with you.  We appreciate your business and hope that you will reconsider coming back to the Embassy Suites when our renovation is complete.  My direct line is 949-705-5151.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Our latest stay in Irvine, CA was a good experience.  Loved the free parking this time, free internet, the complimentary happy hour and hot breakfast. Was able to stay in one room with my husband in the private bedroom, and my brother-in-law in the front living area sofa bed. There were 2 tv's and everything was updated and very clean.
Manager Response: Dear J46MFdebbief,  Thank you for staying with us at the Embassy Suites on your most recent visit.  We're very happy to hear that the suite accommodations worked out very well and that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We hope to see you back soon!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: It's been since Christmas that we stayed here and it's STILL under renovation  Worst part is it's the dining areas that are still undone.   The rooms are very nice after their redo and hopefully the remainder is close to finished.   We will check before staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear davefoshee,  We appreciate your continued loyalty to the hotel and we did plan to have the full renovation complete in March.  Everything is currently wrapping and we're really excited to launch the new restaurant.  We hope that you will be back soon and so glad to hear that you really liked the updated suites.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great hotel, friendly and helpful staff. Clean rooms, great breakfast. Will definitely be back, large rooms, microwave. Couldn't have asked for a more comfortable stay. Great kid friendly place and walking distance to restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear lb-rsm,  Thanks for your recent stay and bringing the family.  We love to hear great stories and very much appreciate you taking the time to share.  We're excited to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine!  PS - our new restaurant, Vibrante is coming soon.  Amazing regional-SoCal with a Mexican flair.  Hope you enjoy it!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We initally were nervous about staying here because of other reviews about the renovations. But when we stayed (last week of March 2016), the renovations are nearly complete and were really not a problem for us at all! The atrium and front desk opened back up while we were there and the crews were working hard every day to get things back to "normal" (even on Easter!) The rooms are typical Embassy rooms, good size, clean, and the new lobby and atrium will be really modern when all is completed. Very nice, helpful, friendly staff. Great location in Irvine. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear TinaWitz,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and the awesome five star review.  We're glad to hear that our renovation work didn't interrupt your stay and we very much appreciate the staff comments.  We're also looking forward to opening our new restaurant in April and hope to see you back really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Excellent Family Hotel.   My kids (11 & 15) love the breakfast!!!   Love the extra space of the 2 room suite!!!   Love the sofa bed!!!   Overall, a great choice for families!!!   And an excellent price value for the accommodations - clean rooms, free wifi for Hilton Honors Members, and friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear Gregory,  We're so happy that you brought the family to our hotel.  It's a great review and we really appreciate your kind words and strong support about our value.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine to enjoy all the new features we're bringing with this complete make over.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We enjoyed our stay even though they were still under construction. It quit by 5:00pm and didn't start up until probably after 9:00 or after everyone had left. Good value, good food, comfortable rooms.
Manager Response: Dear 114judyf,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're very happy to hear that our current improvements didn't affect your stay.  We're excited to re-launch our modern new look and hope to see you soon back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We live in Las Vegas and always start here.   The hotel is currently under renovation, but still very clean.    The new rooms are beautiful!   LOVE all the extra USB ports for charging.   Especially when you have teenagers.    Breakfast is always very good too!!!
Manager Response: Dear Marie,  Welcome back and so glad to hear that you loved the new rooms!  We hope you will be back really soon to enjoy our new restaurant Vibrante which we will be opening in April.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good price and love the breakfast
Summary: Even thou the hotel was under renovations I didn't mind at all. The only problem I ran into was booking another night which you couldn't use 2 different credit cards to book. There was minors things but I didn't complain. Like the door to the restroom didn't lock and they forgot to refill the toilet tissue. Other then that it was nice and comfortable. The area wasn't busy at all. It was nice to not have to wait in line at a restaurant. Around the corner from the hotel there is a great mexican food place that we all loved.
