I would definitely go back again. The distance to the beach wasn't that far either. It took only 10-15 minutes on the freeway.
Manager Response: Dear Sheila,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're very happy to hear that you enjoyed the hotel.  We're at the end of this $12 million renovation so there's very minimal disruption and we're so excited to have this modern new property to share with our guests.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: New remodeling hotel, be careful with methanol!
Summary: I wasn't satisfied with this stay. I and my family didn't felt good next day after we spend the night over there. This hotel just finish remodel and the Methanol smells really strong which will harmful guest's health as bad. I felt  dizzy and nausea next day and my kids weren't feel well either. It has been one week already, but I still having headache since then. The coffee maker was broken and the clock didn't work either. I called in next couple of days, the representative told me the manager will contact me within 72 hours to resolve the problem,but I still didn't receive any reply since it almost has been 72 hours. I will call the HHonors member service again if  I still don't get any reply from them after 72 hours.
Manager Response: Dear Lili,  We were sorry to hear that our renovation affected your stay and want to guarantee you that there are no methanol products at all used at the hotel.  I would be very happy to speak with you regarding your stay and making this right.  Please contact me at any time on my office phone at 949-705-5151 or by email at Swietlana.Cahill@hilton.com  Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites - Irvine Orange County John Wayne Airport
Summary: Great Location, clean, parking is a little bit of a bother and hate that we have to pay for it, but nice hotel.   Would stay here again - problems with AC but GM took care of it Great Location! All well
Manager Response: Dear Moe,  Thank you for your recent stay and glad to hear we were able to make it right regarding the AC.  We appreciate your great comments and hope that you will be back again soon to see us with all the renovations complete.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The Irvine Embassy is under major renovation.  This has impacted everything, including rooms cleanliness.  My room had a dirty martini class in the front room by the phone, hair in the shower, and used note pad in the bedroom by the phone.... Hopefully things will get better after the remodel is complete.
Manager Response: Dear Richard,  We appreciate your Embassy Suites loyalty and do apologize for the renovation impacting your stay.  We are happy to report that the front desk and lobby will re-open this week along with most of the atrium.  We are certain that our fresh new modern look will deliver an extraordinary stay on any future travel you may have coming back to Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Unfortunately the hotel is under major renovation and therefore rather noisy and cramped, disorganized and cramped for check in not to mention access and egress, etc. Hotel nor TripAdvisor failed to inform our business group of the inconveniences due to the renovation, confussing access to check in and other locations.
Manager Response: Dear George,  We didn't see your review until this week and sincerely apologize that our renovations in March disrupted your stay.  We had renovation alerts posted on our website from November 2015 through last week.  We are completing this exciting project this week and hope that you will give us another opportunity to keep your business.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed at Embassy Suites in Irvine (on Main street) over Spring break with the family. We booked two rooms although we know the hotel was being renovated. The noise from renovation was not an issue because the work took place from 9 to 5, but it was inconvenient to not have a lobby. Rooms were newly renovated and looked nice.  The not so good: 1. Room keys didn't work well. Had to get the keys reprogrammed twice. 2. Garage didn't have enough spaces because renovation was taking up a bunch of spaces. They could have consolidated to free up spaces. 3. To make it worse, they charged $15 per day for parking and applied the $15 to both rooms although we had one car. They removed the parking charges for one of the rooms after requesting a refund. 4. Several members of front desk staff
Manager Response: Dear K M,  Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate your business.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the new suites and we are definitely looking forward to re-opening the lobby and atrium this week.  We're coming up on the end of this $12 million project and hoping that you and your family will be coming back to experience the full range of this transformation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great room.  Lobby looks like it will be nice (when they finish it). It's been a long time since I stayed at a hotel that didn't have umbrellas (yes it rains in California) or bathrobes (with the remodeling, you had to walk outside and around the hotel to get to the swimming pool and exercise room).
Manager Response: Dear John,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed the new suites.  We're just around the corner from opening the Atrium with it's new modern design which is also the direct path to the pool and fitness center.  We hope you to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine to experience the fully upgraded property and all our amenities.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Major renovation is under way.  They try to accommodate the breakfast and cocktail reception but all the construction does not give this hotel justice at this time.  I've stayed at this property before the renovation and I found it extremely clean and satisfying.  Hopefully things get completed soon.
Manager Response: Dear Giovanni,  We appreciate your continued loyalty and wanted to share that we are currently working on the 1st floor suites only and the Atrium will be fully open within the next 7 - 10 days.  This was an extensive project and we're certain you will enjoy all the upgrades.  We will also be launching a new restaurant concept in April and Starbucks is not that far behind.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Don't reserve a room right now, the hotel is under renovation.  I'm sure it'll be great in another year but avoid it right now.  The place is loud during the day, has no main floor restroom, the atrium is unlit, the dining area is small and adjacent to the renovation area.
Manager Response: Dear Aris,  We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced on this recent stay.  We are very happy to be nearing completion of all guest suites in the next week.  Our atrium area is also very close to a full re-opening.  We hope you will come visit us in the near future and experience our $12 million face lift at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel several times for business and there for the whole week. Every evening there is a reception where you can get a snack and drink. The lady, Patty, who works the reception is wonderful! When I showed up Monday evening, she remembered my drink of choice from several weeks prior! She is friendly, attentive and caring - all things SOOOOO appreciated by me (especially since living on the road a lot is hard). This one employee is the reason I would choose this hotel over the MANY other choices around Irvine. THANK YOU Patty for your superior performance!!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Krista,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and taking the time to recognize Patty at our complimentary evening reception.  We're thrilled to share this recognition with her and the F&B team!  We cant wait to roll out our new restaurant concept, Vibrante, in April and along with that some new twists for the evening reception.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have to say that staff is great at this place. The are undergoing a remodel of their atrium and even though it's tough for them, the optimism is high. We asked how far it was to a certain restaurant and Daniel said he would get the can and take us there. Felt like we were being well cared for.
Manager Response: Dear Kat,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking your time to share the experience.  We greatly appreciate the kind comments about our staff and it's great to hear the Daniel was able to take care of you.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I've stayed here several times because I travel frequently to Orange County.  Everyone has always been so nice.  The breakfast is terrific.  They are in the process of renovating their rooms and atrium area but that wasn't too much of a hassle.  The last time I was here the shuttle driver Daniel picked me up at the airport and took me to several places.  He was always prompt and courteous.  The second time I was left waiting at the airport for over 30 minutes (different driver).  I could have walked to the hotel in that amount of time.  The driver said "no one told me".   Later that evening I had reservations for 6pm.  I called for the driver at 5:40 and was told it would be 20 minutes.  At 6:15 I told the front desk never mind.
Manager Response: Dear CrewChief71,  Thank you for continuing to stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine and we're very glad to hear that the location and staff  are great.  I'm so sorry to hear that we missed your pickup at the airport and truly understand how that can be frustrating considering we are only five minutes away.  We have looked at our airport call log process and have revisited to the team on how critical it is to the guest experience for timely pickups.  We hope to see you back again at the hotel and very shortly will complete our $12 million transformation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The staff couldn't have been nicer or more efficient.  Have stayed there many times and always a great experience. The chef does a marvelous job.......the food is great quality and the prices are reasonable.   Very comfortable beds, and it is very quiet. Overall a great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Jeanne,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and we greatly appreciate the five star review.  We hope you enjoyed the recent upgrades to our suites and we are looking forward to re-opening the atrium next week.  We have an exciting new restaurant concept coming in April that your sure to enjoy.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We booked our conference a year ago and the hotel remodeling was to be completed , it wasn't . Despite the difficult situation the event staff did a fabulous job seeing our needs were met. Jasmine and Gabriel were especially helpful . The food was delicious meals were served on time . Room was set up properly despite the fact we had 3 different set ups . I would reomend working with this staff for your next event .They are a 5 plus .  The housekeeping staff was prompt and courteous .5 plus  The only negative I heard repeatedly was the 2 gentlemen at the front desk were "rude, snotty, condescending " not a good first impression .   I would recommend this hotel for your next business or family event.
Manager Response: Dear Libbie,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience and acknowledging our team.  We are very lucky to have Jasmine and Gabriel and we appreciate that the conference moved forward despite our public area delays.  We are very excited to be in the final stage of this incredible transformation and look forward to the opportunity to welcome back your group in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great hotel, but under construction for now
Summary: Great staff and hotel in Irvine.  Unfortunately, there is a large renovation underway and probably won't be done until April 2016, and during the day the noise level is high (don't try to hold meetings here).  Meals are inconvenient right now as well, but there are other areas nearby to eat.  The rooms are great (the newly renovated ones), plenty of outlets near the bed and desk, and the cleanliness is high.
Manager Response: Dear James,  Thank you for your recent stay and we are very happy to hear that our new suites were great!  We will be wrapping up our last floor over the next couple weeks and looking forward to re-opening our completely re-envisioned atrium and launching our new restaurant, Vibrante later this month.  We look forward to your return as we celebrate 30 years of hospitality in Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Beautiful rooms!  Great breakfast!  Quiet and private.  Loved it!  The service was outstanding!  We had to stay at the last minute and they gave us a toothbrush for each, toothpaste and deoderant.  The staff was so helpful even though they are in the middle of an upgrade, you would never know it.  Our room was gorgeous!
Manager Response: Dear Lisa,  Thank you for thinking of the Embassy Suites Irvine for your last minute stay,  Travel can be hectic and little things like toothbrushes can be a forgotten thought.  Never worry, we will always have these or any of our guests.  We're glad you love the new suites and hope you are coming back soon to experience our incredible new atrium and restaurant.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel is very nice and updated, complimentary breakfast and happy hour every day is great! Hotel was under construction which was bit of an inconvenience !  The hotel staff was very pleasant and willing to assist. The overall experience was a good one.
Manager Response: Dear John,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad to hear that you had a great stay.  We're happy to hear that you enjoyed our new suites, breakfast and the evening reception.  We especially like to hear about outstanding service and hope you will be back soon to experience our awesome new atrium design and forthcoming Vibrante restaurant.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This Embassy Suites is currently going through a refurbishment.  Two floors are currently not available, and the breakfast/happy hour area is shut down. (However they have made due with a nicely setup conference room to meet your happy hour and breakfast needs.) It is going to be one of the nicest Embassy Suites I have stayed at once the updates are completed. Great location to Irvine / OC / and not too far from Disneyland. Rooms that are completed, are very nice. Staff is friendly and helpful.  Recommend for business or family travelers.
Manager Response: Dear Larioja1994,  Thank you for your recent stay and recommendation.  It's so great to hear comments like nicest Embassy Suites and we're almost there.  We're down to two floors and our atrium area is getting closer to re-launching.  We have some exciting new additions coming this year that's sure to please.  We hope it's not too long before your next stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We felt very accommodated during our stay with great breakfast and happy hour.  The front desk, especially Daniel was very helpful and friendly.  We will definitely be looking into Embassy Suites next time we need a hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Sara,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're so glad to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We appreciate you recognizing Daniel and will certainly pass along the note.  We cant wait to open our new atrium and restaurant and hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This place is under way heave construction at the moment.  The parking garage is full of materials and the parking lot is full of containers.  Front desk area is all that is normal.  Ear plugs on your pillow because they work all night.  Just crazy, hope it is nice when finished.  I am diamond but they give me an older room as all the top floors have been redone and I was on 2.
Manager Response: Dear Tommy,  We appreciate you Honors loyalty as a Diamond member and greatly value your business.  Currently we have finish the majority of our guest suites and will be opening part of the atrium this week.  We are looking forward to completing this amazing reinvention of the hotel and very soon will be showcasing a new restaurant, Starbucks and so much more.  We hope that you will consider coming back to experience our new future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My family stayed here while they were visiting my boyfriend and I over New Years and we all had a great visit! The rooms were clean and cozy. Perfect for what we needed. The shining star of the visit was absolutely their bar. The food is fantastic and the service is impeccable. Jeremy our bartender was the best part about this hotel. He's really friendly and helpful. If you love spicy food, he will hook it up! I got the burger and he jazzed it up with spicy goodness. And you just can't beat the managers hour.   Being a local, we'll definitely be back to dine in the restaurant!
Manager Response: Dear Nondie,  Thank you for bringing the family and for recognizing Jeremy.  We're glad you all enjoyed our suite accommodations and being local hope that you may consider a weekend getaway.  We're getting very excited to re-launch our awesome new atrium and will have an incredible new restaurant very soon.  We're all looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The rooms have been remodeled and upgraded to 2016 standards and not the 1980's. The food in the restaurants is pretty good. Breakfast made to order is included in your room rate and plenty of choices to choose from. There is a free cocktail hour from 5:30pm-7:30pm included in your room rate for beer, wine and mixed drinks. Great staff and very attentive at the cocktail hour.
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're so happy you found the new suites to be 2016 modern and the staff accommodating.  We're also glad you had the opportunity to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We hope you will have the opportunity to visit us again soon as we launch our new atrium design and restaurant concept.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here on business. Very quiet hotel. Staff is very friendly. Loved the convenient shuttle from John Wayne airport - it comes every so often but I just went ahead and called to confirm how long I'd be waiting and it was right on time. The evening reception with complimentary light snacks and beverages is great. Good speed wifi in the rooms. Hotel is a bit outdated, but clean. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Megan,  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine for your business travel.  We're glad our shuttle service quickly transported you to the hotel and that you were able to enjoy our complimentary evening reception.  We are nearing completion of updating all our suites and hope that you will be coming back soon to experience for yourself.  Until then, safe travels!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel staff was knowledgeable and friendly. Hotel was being remodeled but I was not inconvenienced in any way. The managers reception at night was very good, although there was a bit of a language barrier.
Manager Response: Dear Alan,  Thank you for your recent stay and for acknowledging the staff.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine as we finish up our $12 million revitalization of the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here when coming in the area for a wedding. It was before the renovations. The room was modern, clean and quite. We are looking forward to staying again after the renovations are finished. We liked it a lot before. Can't wait to see it all done. Paying for parking is a dud.
Manager Response: Dear Spottedprincess,  Thank you for staying with us and hope the wedding was a blast!  We're very happy to be in the final stages of completing this $12 million re-investment to the hotel and hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I am a frequent visitor of this particular Embassy Suites because it is within walking distance of my branch office.  My stay last night was particularly disappointing.  Granted, the hotel is under renovation, but the closet doors were off the tracks, the bed was not properly made and both televisions were not working properly.  Since this was simply an overnight place to rest my head I didn't ask for another room, but I did make not of it with the front desk when I checked out. I am astonished that they have the audacity to charge $230 a night for a room with the hotel in this condition.
Manager Response: Dear jjnyc2012,  We greatly appreciate your continued loyalty and sincerely apologize that your most recent stay was disappointing.  Regardless of the renovation it is our obligation to deliver on guest service and standards.  Please note that your comments are taken very seriously and shared with our department leaders.  We are very happy to be closing in on the end of this incredible transformation and hope to keep your loyalty with the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: After the renovations, this place will be a gem!
Summary: I recommended this hotel and encouraged 7 other colleagues to book here.  However, we were notified AFTER arrival that we would be staying during full renovation and all amenities would be unavailable and only offered at the Wyndham as an alternative.  If we would have known this in advance at booking I would rate the overall experience higher.  I am disappointed we were notified after 2 days of arrival.  However, renovations happen and its a part of business and what is meaningful to me is how a hotel handles this going forward.  At booking, the rep  that checked me in accidentally charged my credit card $1500 even though my room was pre paid.  This was very frustrating as that was my only form of payment for the trip.  I applaud the manager Lawrence for "taking accountability"
Manager Response: Dear Krystel,  Thank you for choosing our hotel and for recommending to your colleagues.  We have continued to update our website and reservation center on the renovation schedule but understand that we will not catch every guest.  For that reason we have been contacting all arrivals for that one more opportunity.  Thank you for recognizing Carl and Lawrence for helping to overcome our associates error and your very kind comments on the new suites.  We're closing on the completion of this awesome transformation and look forward to seeing you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Yeah not so good right now
Summary: Unfortunately the WiFi was unstable, the garage gate didn't work, unable to adjust the clock time, and the made-to-order breakfast didn't open on time. The "request upon arrival" didn't happen either. However, i did receive a detailed email prior to arrival about the construction. And the noises were gone by the time i returned for bed.
Manager Response: Dear former_RX,  We appreciate your recent stay and are happy to report that we have completed upgrades to the Wi-Fi network including over 150 new access points.  We have completed nearly all upgrades to guest suites and very soon will re-launch our exciting new atrium and restaurant concept.  We appreciate your loyalty and hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Believe the reviews!  This hotel is completely under renovation.  I'm talking scaffolding all the way from the 2nd floor on up!  The hammering, drilling, scraping is over-the-top.  My husband is a Diamond member and requested an early check-in.  Since we were early we were offered an un-refurbed room on the 4th floor.  Thank goodness I had read earlier reviews that suggested only taking refurbed rooms.  Once requested, amazingly a refurbed room on a higher floor became available.  We walk thru the lobby atrium on the way to our room and notice the restaurant and bar are completely torn apart.  Zero dining options available in hotel.  We get to the room as my husband is rushing to get settled so that he can take a conference call.  The construction noise is so loud he couldn't
Manager Response: Dear Julia,  We completely understand your disappointment with this stay as we know renovation at certain times can make it difficult for guests.  Our goal is to delivery the best guest experience and hope that you will give us another opportunity if you are returning to the area.  We are certain that you will love our new suites and the atrium is going to be fantastic.  The new atrium design is awesome and we're looking forward to launching our new restaurant in early April.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good location and value for money but under renovation now
Summary: Too bad that the renovation part did not show up when I was making reservations.  I would have booked into other Embassy Suites close by.  The staff tried to make things work as much as possible.  Breakfast was served at one of the conference rooms; bad part was that there was no way to get there in a wheelchair. No swimming pool on premises but they had a shuttle to the hotel next door if you insisted on swimming.  The noise and the smell of paint is something that they could nothing about.  Nothing can beat the location.  Close to airport.  Easy to get to Santa Ana, Irvine, or Tustin without entering freeways.  This place should be good once they are done with the renovation.
Manager Response: Dear Sibix0,  Thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate your kind comments regarding our staff's commitment to service.  We hope that you will have the opportunity to come back and visit us soon to experience the new suites, atrium and restaurant.  We've also re-built the ramp which is just about finished.  Thank you for considering the Embassy Suites Irvine for your future business.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Should have shut it down....check renovation status before booking.
Summary: Nice older ES but the ongoing common area renovation turns the hotel into a war zone 6 days a week from about 7 AM on all day.  Only 1 of 3 elevators were operating.  I guess the bottom line was too important to lose some revenue but I would not stay here until the work is finished, if you are a family traveling or your work time schedule  is an issue.
Manager Response: Dear theWimp,  We appreciate that you choose to stay with us and sincerely apologize that our current renovation took away from the experience,  At this time we have nearly finished all of the suites and look forward to opening our new atrium and restaurant in the near future.  We hope that you will consider returning to the hotel and we are certain you will find the extensive upgrades rewarding.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We got in after dinner and left before breakfast, so we weren't inconvenienced by construction. The breakfast sounded fab, but our flight left early, so we didn't get to partake.  I wish they had a breakfast to go option for early flights.   The room was spacious and I loved the outlets on each nightstand and usb charging points!  Yeah!  We could not figure out how to set the clock time. :/.   Also love the Giovanni shampoo!
Manager Response: Dear Jbgrace,  Thank you for staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine and hope you have the opportunity to return and experience all our great amenities including complimentary breakfast and the evening reception.  We're glad you enjoyed the new suites and shampoo.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Traveling with my older parents and young children, I booked Embassy Suites Irvine specifically because it had a suite, indoor pool, and laundry on site.  The day we were to check in, someone called us at 12:45pm stating that they were undergoing renovations and the pool, laundry service, and atrium were closed. They offered to shuttle us to those facilities at a nearby hotel.  None of the staff we discussed this with were particularly helpful or apologetic.  This was a HUGE disappointment given that these were the very reason we chose this place and very frustrating that it was communicated so late, leaving us no time to arrange a stay at another hotel.  My son got sick on the trip, and we needed to do quite a bit of laundry.  Shuttling with a big bag of dirty clothes back and
Manager Response: Dear SeattleSara,  We're very sorry that your experience was significantly affected by the renovation.  We have been working hard to keep the project moving forward and balancing our guest's needs.  We are nearly done with all guest suites and will soon be re-opening our atrium and new restaurant.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity to show you an awesome experience at the Embassy Suites Irvine and very much appreciate your recognition of Carl at the front desk.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We recently booked the Embassy Suites by Hilton Irvine for our team stay. It is a very nice property, and I found their staff to be really responsive and always willing to assist. Our rooms were very spacious, comfortable, and clean. The property is currently undergoing renovations, but I'm sure the finished product will be amazing! The hotel is located minutes away from the John Wayne Airport, and several prime restaurant options.
Manager Response: Dear T R,  Thank you for bringing the team to our hotel.  We're very happy to hear that you had a very nice stay and we hope to see you back again soon.  We know that you will love our new suites and the atrium will be amazing.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: You don't have to worry about your room facing towards a noisy highway.  There are no noisy highways near this location.   I had a great nights sleep :)  And the suite is newly renovated.  It is gorgeous...
Manager Response: Dear Efthimios,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're glad to hear that you enjoyed one of our new suites.  We hope to see you again back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is a very good hotel close to John Wayne Airport. I like the greens inside the hotel. Also the foods at this place are very good. I personally liked the steak a lot. Overall I liked staying at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Mersedeh,  Thank you for staying with is at the Embassy Suites Irvine and we appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  We will be opening a new restaurant concept in the Spring that we're sure our guest will enjoy so hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We loved the location, the rooms, the staff and the breakfast and happy hour included.  It's a 10!  We look forward to returning.  As usual high standards for Embassy Suites!  There is currently some construction, however, it did not interfere with any part of our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Donna,  We're so glad to hear that you had a great stay and that our current remodeling didn't interfere.  We're getting closer to showing off our multi-million face lift just in time to celebrate our 30th year anniversary.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suite Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Outstanding value, always consistent and wonderful!  I would recommend Embassy Suites for business travel or for vacation. Beautiful amenities, nice staff, great breakfast...you can't beat Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: Dear Ronald,  Thank you for your recent stay and for sharing these great comments.  We greatly appreciate the recommendation and hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Not Embassy like I am used to
Summary: We stayed for 1 night prior to a fight. I'm an Embassy fan due to rooms, customer service, and breakfast. Sadly this location took it down a notch in my book. We overall had a decent stay but it was just average in comparison to other hotels and out of the 4 hotels we stayed at on this vaca it didn't get top pick by any of my family members.   The hotel is currently going though a major upgrade that is needed. Certain parts still look fine to me. Other areas are worn out. Example - our room wasn't bad except for the shower. Not sure they should be filling that room until it is renovated because the knob to make the shower part go is broke off and you have to stick your fingers in there to pull this little metal piece out. There is no way to release the water except for turning
Manager Response: Dear Dealmom83,  Thank you for staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine and we were very sorry to hear about your stay.  Our commitment to guest service and standards is our top priority and we failed to deliver on this during your visit.  We are happy to share that our suites are nearly complete with extensive work to all the bathrooms.  We will soon be re-opening our center atrium and after that an exciting new restaurant concept sure to please.  We hope that you will give us another opportunity to gain your loyalty.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My staff at the hotel was truly exceptional. I loved the fact that you were able to have made to order breakfast along with the buffet that was already there. The rooms were clean, quiet, and cozy.  The staff were very helpful.  The shuttle driver was helpful and provided me with a variety of eating options nearby.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone! Another reason I selected this hotel over others is because of the microwave and the refrigerator that's in the room.  They give you a welcome bag with 2 free water bottles. It was a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Matthew,  What an awesome story!  We certainly appreciate the staff recognition and it's always great to hear about fantastic service.  We happy that your enjoyed the accommodations and our made-to-order complimentary breakfast.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great location. Very helpful staff. Much better than average complimentary breakfast. They have a "Suite wheels " program that includes car rental.  The car rental agency is supposed to get the car to you at the hotel, but does not work if you arrive on Sundays.
Manager Response: Dear Pandurangal,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're very happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast.  Our Suites Wheels car package is very popular and is available 7 days a week.  I do understand that you were able to get the car but later Sunday night which was a concern.  I've arranged a meeting with Enterprise next week and we will be reviewing everything to ensure that our guest experience is flawless.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We loved our time at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  We were on the top floor with a beautiful room. I wish I could bring the bathroom back to my house.  The service was excellent, and we got all of this for such a good deal!  Our only complaint was the Wi-Fi.  We couldn't get it to connect and stay connected.
Manager Response: Dear Gregory,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome comment about our new City View Suites.  Our top floor suites added new upgrade amenities including glass enclosed showers.  We're so happy that you enjoyed the room and hope you will be back again soon.  I also wanted to share that we're completing our Wi-Fi upgrade this week which adds over 150 access points to ensure maximum connectivity to our new ultra-fast pipeline.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed at this hotel on Friday January 8. During the reservation process I requested a crib, extra down pillows and extra towels. The hotel was unaware of the request so we had to wait for the crib when we checked in late at night.   The room product is way overdue for a refurnish. The furniture is ugly, uncomfortable and the sofa has some very suspicious stains. The wall coverings, artwork and color scheme are very out of date. The bed was comfortable but the bedding was not. The comforter was polyester and very hot.   Breakfast was fair at best. The fruit was not fresh, the bacon was terribly greasy, the coffee was weak and they did not offer a milk alternative like soy or almond.  Housekeeping was pretty good, the room was nice and clean.  Front desk staff were very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Aron,  We appreciate your business and we're sorry to hear that we did not have your pre-arrival requests in the room.  We've shared this with our front desk team and will review the reports from your arrival day to understand what happened so that doesn't happen again.  We also wanted to note that the hotel is currently working on a multi-million face lift to all areas.  We've completed three floors of guest suites which are getting rave reviews.  We hope that you will consider us again in one of our new suites.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights. Staff was very nice, room and hotel was very clean. Absolutely nothing to complain about. Hot made to order and buffet style breakfast in the morning. Indoor pool and Jacuzzi was nice to relax in after a long day. They also provide a shuttle service to the airport. The hotel is about 10 minutes (no traffic) to the Honda Center, Angel Stadium, and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear travelminded14,  We so glad that your choose Embassy Suites Irvine for this recent trip and greatly appreciate the very kind comments.  We happy to hear that you enjoyed all our facilities and that the location to Disneyland was convenient.  We hope to see you back at the hotel very soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I would not have booked a room here if they had informed us we would be awoken by construction noise at 7:00 a.m. I could have stayed next to the airport for half the price if i wanted to get up early on Sunday morning to loud noise.
Manager Response: Dear freda276,  We sincerely apologize that your stay was disturbed by early morning noise.  We have a strict policy regarding work time as we go through our multi-million dollar upgrade.  Your comments are taken seriously and have been discussed with the project team.  Through this process the hotel continues to make guest satisfaction our top priority.  We do hope that if travel brings you back to Orange County that you will give us a future opportunity in one of our new suites.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Several families from our sports team stayed at this Embassy Suites as it was convenient to most of the fields we played on. It was fun to have a place for the boys to eat meals together (breakfast), and relax by swimming.   There is no outdoors place for kids to go since this is in a commercial center, but we were gone during the day for games.  Embassy Suites offer family stays to be more comfortable with separate bedroom. We also like their made to order omelets and variety of breakfast items. It made it easier to get ready for games, and more cost-effective for families.  Parking is in a covered structure and is a separate cost.  Elevators can be a little slow, but you can also take the stairs. They are currently upgrading two of their floors.
Manager Response: Dear Glenda,  Thank you so much for bringing the team to our Embassy Suites Irvine.  We very happy to hear that the stay was very comfortably and cost effective for the families.  We appreciate the nice comments about our complimentary breakfast and hope if the team is returning to Orange County that we will have you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Glad to come back to this hotel.  Our second stay was even better than before with beautifully remodeled rooms.  Love how close it is to the airport.  Staff is always friendly and efficient.  They have a great breakfast too.  We will be back again.
Manager Response: Dear Erin,  Thank you for posting a review of your recent stay and we're so happy to receive such a great report on the new suites.  We've completed three floors and the guest feedback has been so positive.  As we approach our 30th anniversary of the Hotel this year we can wait to finish our "face lift" and there's so much more coming.  We hope to see you back again really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I love the embassy suites usually.  This weekend stay was not what i thought it would be.  They elevators took forever it was horrible. The room was next to stairway and with the elevators not working properly all night i heard the door slamming. For the price you expect more. The furniture was dirty and dingy.  I asked for another room and was told they was over book
Manager Response: Dear Kandace,  We thank you for continuing to support Embassy Suites and we are sorry to hear that you had some issues this past weekend.  Our priority is to Make it Right for all guests and if we didn't take this opportunity during your stay please contact me directly.  You can reach me at 949-553-8332 #1107 or email at john.pease@hilton.com  Sincerely, John Pease Front Office Manager

Summary: Parking is a bit tiring as you need to drive to the parking structure next to the hotel. Narrow spaces.  Very noisy hotel in early morning. Very minimum noise insulation.  Cleaning staff are noisy and careless.  Breakfast is messy and very crowded. Coffee and "juices" are really bad.
Manager Response: Dear Adil,  Thank you for your recent stay and we are very sorry to hear that you experienced some noise disturbances.  We will certainly share your comments with our housekeeping and breakfast teams.  Please note that our parking garage temporarily has some space restrictions and we are overflowing to the upper floors.  We will continue to have ample guest parking throughout the entire structure with all of our lower level spaces returning in March.  We do apologize if you had any issues with parking during your stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We always have wonderful experience @ Embassy Suites; excellent service, friendly staff, family friendly & great value. Over last 25 years, we have stayed @ Embassy Suites while traveling throughout USA.
Manager Response: Dear SOUSAN1,  Thank you so much for the generous five star review.  We greatly appreciate your loyalty over the last 25 years and look forward to many more years of exceeding your expectations.  We hope to see you back soon to enjoy one of our newly renovated guest suites and the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Guests Kids Gone Wild, Made Us Miserable
Summary: Three friends and I were on our "Mom's" trip to California.  Our first stop was my recommendation because I trusted Embassy Suites to be a good time for us.  We ended up walking down the street to eat and then confined to our room. This was bad.....there appeared to be some kind of jr. sports event nearby and there were kids running the hallways on every floor (literally) and playing in the elevators.  Several times we got into the elevator and all of the buttons were pushed and the kids jumped out; the manager's reception was a horrible mess --  chips & salsa, pretzel mix, & cookies scattered all over the area (counters, tables, floor) and then some of the parents started a fight (security was called twice).  Kids kept knocking on our door throughout the night.  We never could
Manager Response: Dear LiLeeH,  I want to sincerely apologize that your "Mom's" stay was anything less then perfect.  We greatly appreciate  your recommendation to friends and sorry to hear that the experience was negatively affected by other guests.  Our #1 goal is to deliver the best hotel stay for all our guests and the staff goes out of their way to make this happen.  I am happy to talk with your further as we value your business and opinion.  Please feel free to reach out to me directly at 949-705-5151.  Best wishes,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary Heading: A Change Made Not A Good One
Summary: I have visited this hotel on business and pleasure about five times previously in 2015.  Each of those visits was enjoyable even when the hotel was crammed with traveling kids sports teams.    This two night stay was not as enjoyable.  We truly enjoy the breakfast time in the morning as the variety of food and peaceful start to the day is very nice. Unfortunately, a change made in the breakfast set up is terrible.   Most food items were in a single line (except made-to-order omelettes) rather than in a couple of different locations.  Clustering them into one line made it so everyone had to line up for cereal, eggs, sausage,  bacon, pancakes, yogurt,  etc.  In addition to the good placement issue,  there were long periods were did was not in the serving areas.  They ran out of
Manager Response: Dear J.S.,  Thank you for your recent stay and we're very sorry to hear about the poor breakfast experience since this is one of our key service standards.  We do experience a jump in physical occupancy over Holidays and some weekends with higher guests counts and increased family travel.    We did run a secondary buffet to help with flow but sounds like we still had room for improvement.  Please note that we have not made any changes to our operation or management and will take this opportunity to review with the breakfast team for solutions to have the best guest experience no matter how busy the Hotel is.  We hope that you will continue to stay with us noting all the past stays were enjoyable.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very Neat and Very clean property, Great Service , Great free breakfast buffet, from soup to nuts same buffet in Hyatt would cost $20 to $25 per person so good ,, recommend highly  Make your reservation early it is within 15 miles of Disney.The room I had had a King bed and a sofa bed ref micro and  one cup coffee maker. Can Sleep 4.
Manager Response: Dear Julie,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We love hearing stories about great service!  We're happy to hear that the king suite accommodations worked well for the family and that you found our complimentary breakfast to have everything one could ask for.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Room is great. Internet is a bit weak but hope it will be better next time soon. The service at the front desk is outstanding. Everyone is very friendly and informative especially Karla and the 2 black managers were very helpful when in need. Sorry I don't remember their names very well. One is tall, big and bald and the other has very nice clean cut hair style and shorter. Thank you all for a wonderful experience. We shall see you soon for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Renee,  Thank you for the awesome five star review.  We're so glad to hear you had a great stay and that Karla, John and Lawrence at the Front Desk went over above for service.  Please note that we are in the process of adding a significant upgrade for the Wi-Fi which will add over 150 new access points.  This should happen rather quickly.  We hope to see you again really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I've stayed here a couple of times as a getaway throughout the year and I'm never disappointed. The location of the hotel, cleanliness of the rooms, that Manager Happy Hour :), and of course the pleasant staff will keep me coming back for some more "me" time.
Manager Response: Dear djl,  We appreciate your continued loyalty and very kind comments.  It's great to hear that you enjoyed the evening reception and always like hearing about great service stories.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Our experience could not have been better
Summary: I cannot say enough positive things about our great experience here. Our room was immaculate, the service was amazing and the staff were so wonderfully kind to my wife and I. Luis Perez  the housekeeping manager truly made our visit here one we will never forget. We will be coming back again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Craig,  Thank you for this awesome five star review and the shout out to Luis, our HK Manager.  We're thrilled to hear about your fantastic experience and looking forward to your next visit.  We greatly appreciate the recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I took my family to stay at the Embassy Suites 12/26/15.  All I can say is that it was an OK hotel.  The plus is if you have a lot of kids, the free breakfast would help you save a lot of money.  The parking is a bit cumbersome to park and get to the lobby.  It is also in an enclosed structure but since it is in Irvine, any crime/issue might be super low.  Anyhow, the room was average.  My wife found a hair ball still in the tub so that did not go over well.  The couch in the suite area is a bit dirty.  I am not sure how they clean it but the couch did not look like it has been cleaned in a while.  Three stars is the right rating for this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear tt,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share the experience.  We sincerely apologize for the housekeeping concern.  Our standards are extremely high and we have shared this with the department to reinforce training and exceeding guest expectations.  The hotel is currently upgrading all guests suites and will see significant improvements to public areas in early 2016.  We hope that if travel brings you back to Orange County you will give us the opportunity to show you the new product.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here for four nights.  We arrived early so we were unable to get the City View Suite that we requested and ended up with one that overlooked the garage.  That was a disappointment. Check in was very quick and they were most helpful when the garage parking refused to accept our room key and my husband had to pay to get out of the garage. They had the $5 charge to get out of the garage to be our charge for the night's parking instead of the normal $15 fee!  The room was nice.  Breakfast was a mad house with tons of little kids running around.  I gather there was a soccer tournament going on locally so they all decided in this hotel!  it was nice on Monday when all the kids departed!  There is a pub within the hotel and the food is good but the price is very expensive.
Manager Response: Dear Smead1950,  Thank you so much for the kind words and we're so happy to hear you had an enjoyable experience.  We will be relaunching a new restaurant concept in 2016 along with our update guest suites so hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Not exactly what I was hoping...
Summary: This Embassy has been around a while, at least this building has. I hadn't stayed in one of these for a while, so it took some getting used to the layout.  The door to the rooms faces a huge atrium which gives it a "motel" feel (doors lead to the outside) and I hate the fact that unless you close your curtains, everyone who walks by can look directly into your room.  Kinda like you'd see at a Motel 6.  Maybe the fact that I was here right before Christmas is why the place was overrun by children...lots of running around, screaming babies and yelling toddlers.  Not what I would have wanted this week.  The workout room was very nicely appointed, with five cardio machines, some free weights and cold water and sanitizing wipes for the equipment.  Couldn't ask for better.  The "made
Manager Response: Dear littlemtn,  We appreciate your recent stay and glad to hear that the fitness room and breakfast were both a very positive experience for you.  Unlike Motel 6 our suites are accessed via interior corridors and do have large windows looking into the atrium.  Generally our guests comment that they like this design which really brightens the suite with natural light coming from both ends.  Embassy Suites in generally are a top choice for family travel over weekends and Holidays; however, our location is also the premiere business travel hotel midweek.  We do hope that you will consider staying again on future business trip and will enjoy the significant enhancements we are currently putting into the building.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed at this hotel during our family trip in November. Service was great, breakfast was delicious, all you can eat bacon!!! Rooms were clean, and we will be back in February again. We booked this hotel at a reasonable rate. It was total of 5 of us- 2 adults and 3 kids, and we had plenty of room for our family.
Manager Response: Dear MitterHK,  Thank you for your recent stay and glad to hear the whole family had a great trip.  We appreciate the kind comments and look forward to having you back in February.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stay as far away from this property as you can.  As a Diamond member, I was put into a room directly underneath construction activities.  Had a jack hammer going off directly above me for 3 hours.  Was then put into a room (#107) whose carpets were full of stains.  Reminded me of a Motel 6.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff,  We sincerely apologize for the noise during your recent stay.  Our top priority is managing the guest experience while the hotel is undergoing significant capital improvements to the suites.  We hope that you will reconsider staying with us again on any future trips to Orange County and I am personally happy to make sure you are upgraded to one of new suite products.  Please feel free to reach out to me at anytime at 949-705-5151.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Where to begin.....one night, we get a letter saying there will be no water until 5am the next day due to "emergency" repairs, yet the "emergency" was scheduled. Normally not an issue.....unless you have a 6:45am flight. This is a airport hotel, yet their airport shuttle doesn't start until 6:30am. Kind of defeats the purpose of staying in a airport hotel if you can't get to the airport before your flight boards. Woman at the front desk in the AM had no idea how to print room receipts and kept telling everyone, "you will get an email"....I never got the email, until I called the hotel the next day. Very unorganized and I have since switched to a brand new Hilton Garden Inn down the street for my 3 subsequent trips to LA. Will not go back to this hotel ever!
Manager Response: Dear Justin,  We are very sorry that your stay was interrupted by the emergency plumbing work in early November.  This critical work was completed 7 weeks ago providing for major improvements for all our guests.  As the hotel continues with suite renovations all bathrooms are being fitted with new valves, raised shower heads and most significantly new glass enclosed showers on the upper floors.  Our hotel shuttle operates from 5:30AM - 11:00PM daily except one hour later on Sunday to ensure that guests are able to make all flights out of John Wayne Airport.  We understand your frustration and hope that you may reconsider staying with us at the Embassy Suites on future trips to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: From vomit in the pool to a rude front desk I would never stay here at this location again. We were told we would be notified when our room was ready for check in as we waited in the lobby and NO ONE ever called us. The pool area was over capacity with small kids that one actually vomited inside the pool, and no one cleaned it up. The room had dirty housekeeping towel and dirt on the ceiling from the air vent built up.
Manager Response: Dear Eric,  I am so sorry to read about your experience which is not to our standards.  I have reviewed your comments with our department heads and would be more then happy to further discuss this with you offline and Make this Right.  Please feel free to reach out to me directly at any time by phone at 949-705-5151 or email at Swietlana.Cahill2@Hilton.com.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: I stayed at this hotel because I had an early flight the next morning; and it is just across the street from the airport. The hotel is old. The tv didn't work. I asked facilities to look at it. I was told the tv had loose connections. About an hour later, apparently the connections came loose again. We tightened everything but still the tv would skip. You could only hear every 2nd or 3rd word. The tv would either freeze or completely black out. If I were staying for an extended time, I would be upset.
Manager Response: Dear Tami,  I am sorry to hear that you had issues with the TV that impacted your stay.  Our suites feature flat screen TV’s in both the living room and the bedroom so hopefully this may have just pertained to one of the units.  I noticed that you stayed in a Hotel across the street from the Airport.  While we are located near Orange County Airport we are not across the street as is the Hilton.  We just want to make sure the correct hotel is being reference as our goal is for the best customer service for all guests.  Our standard for the engineering department should and always will be to fix a unit or if necessary to offer a room move.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stay at embassy suites often and really appreciate the size of the rooms the reasonable rates and the great breakfasts.  This was our second stay at this location and they are beginning a remodel project from the top floors down. We were in a second floor room, while it was clean it was really showing signs of age. There were holes in chairs, gouges in furniture, the shower fixture was coming apart from the wall for a few. We had a sconce from the mirror in the living room fall from the wall while we were sleeping (scared the h*ll out of us)  So for location and value it's still on our list but if you are looking for Hilton like luxury maybe wait till the remodel is done :-)
Manager Response: Dear Tbertsch,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and we are sorry to hear about a less than perfect stay on your recent trip.  We are very happy to announce that our 10th floor is back online after significant upgrades and the 9th floor is just days away.  While we continue to work down the building refreshing all our suites the Hotel maintains a year around preventive maintenance program to ensure that all our accommodations are kept in good order.  We do apologize for the deficiencies you’ve pointed out in your suite and have tagged this room for a comprehensive review to make sure everything is corrected.  We hope to see you back again at the soon-to-be completely reimaged Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Staff is extremely friendly.  Electronically checked into my room as a Hilton Honors member.  Arrived early and my room was not ready but they quickly provided me with another.  Food in the hotel bar was high quality and delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Lorraine,  Thank you so much for taking your time to post this awesome five star review.  We love hearing about great guest service and sharing with our associates.  We're also glad to see that the Hilton e-Check-in service was easy to navigate.  It's definitely a great advancement allowing guests to choice their own room.  Also, happy to pass along the nice food and beverage comments to our team.  We hope to see you back again really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel was really nice ... The room was beautiful with two queen beds and a deprecate sitting area. The hotel also had all the amenities with complimentary breakfast and first run movies available. Really happy with this hotel and the price was very reasonable ... Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Brian,  Thank you so much for choosing our Hotel and for the outstanding five star review.  We’re glad to hear that the two queen-bed suite worked out well and that having a separate sitting area made for a comfortable stay.  We greatly appreciate the recommendation and hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Dorothy at the front desk was definitely the best part of the entire hotel. She gave us SPOT ON recommendations of what my family and I could do while we were in town, and without her advice, we wouldn't have made the wonderful memories we did. The hotel itself wasn't fantastic, as I felt like the walls were paper thin. It's also under construction, but that's no one's fault. I can't thank Dorothy enough, and I hope she's recognized for everything she does. Thanks! :D
Manager Response: Dear Christie,  Thank you so much for recognizing Dorothy at our Front Desk.  We’re glad to hear your visit made for some wonderful memories and we hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Embassy Suites provided a very roomy and comfortable place to relax between all the activities we found in the area. Facilities were all in great condition. The complimentary breakfast was excellent. Parking was convenient. Being close to the airport is a real plus, and day trips are easy because of the hotel's central location. This was a real value and we will definitely use this hotel for future visits.
Manager Response: Dear605debrat,  Thank you so much for the awesome five star review.  We sincerely appreciate your recent stay and for taking time to share the experience.  It’s great to hear that the accommodations, service and location were perfect for your trip.  We appreciate the recommendation and hope to see you back again really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The rooms are a nice size with the separate bedroom, which worked great for us and our toddler.  The crib that the hotel gave us was very small, but worked, and the blackout curtains ensured that our toddler slept well.  But the showerhead didn't work (maintenance did come right away, though), the shower temperature knob was impossible to figure out, the room had no USB plugs, and the bedroom door didn't lock.  Breakfast was okay-- the omelette bar was good, but the rest of the offerings were pretty plain (and they only had the "light" yogurt, which is not tasty).
Manager Response: Dear Caribbeanluv15,  We appreciate you bringing the family and happy to hear the two-room suite accommodations worked well.  We’re sorry to hear about your shower head issues and glad that our engineering team was quick to respond.  We are currently revamping our entire plumbing system to all guest suites which will greatly enhance the guest experience.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here for thanksgiving weekend for 3 days.  I have admit that the complementary breakfast was the best I ever remember having at a hotel.  Got the room with 2 queen and pullout sofa.  The room was pretty clean and no foul odor.  The swimming pool was pretty small for a hotel that size.  Would have given a 4-5 but the structure parking was on the side, no direct entry from there, you'd have to park then walk out.  What would have been nicer is that they should have told us where to park.  The parking entrance was all the way around from the front so we ended up parking in the same structure but through a different entrance do had to pay just to get out.
Manager Response: Dear fwjthoj,  Thank you for your recent stay and we’re very happy to hear that breakfast was outstanding.  We hope you enjoyed the Holiday and will make sure our parking signage is posted where it should be directing guests through the correct entrance.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We check-in on Wednesday November 18, I used the Echeckin for the room. I thought it was fast and very convenient. Christ the front desk agent was extreme friendly and was knowable about the location. Every staff member was friendly.  We will be back soon. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Tyler,  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine on your most recent trip.  We appreciate your Hilton Honors loyalty and really like that the eCheck-in option made your arrival a breeze.  We really like hearing great team member stories so thank you so much for recognizing Chris at our front desk.  We hope to see you back really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was a second stay for our family group of 8.  From the greeting at the reception desk, to the various staff, we were treated exceptionally.  We were greeted, thanked, offered help.  The rooms are lovely and clean, bed big and comfy.  The breakfast hearty, and enough for everyone.  The happy hour was generous in what they offered.  The location is central, yet quiet.  The kids enjoyed the pool.  It is a hotel we will return to again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Flyaway SanDiego,  It’s always great to hear about a return trip being just as fantastic as the first trip!  We appreciate your continued loyalty and we’re very happy to heat that the entire family had a memorable experience.  We especially appreciate the staff recognition and we’re hoping to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nice rooms and easy to airport
Summary: Stayed there instead of staying at my usual (what was the Hyatt-now hotel Irvine) and glad I did.  Very nice entrance and rooms.  ES has great rooms if you are travelling with kids or two or more.  Staff was great.  Managers reception at 5pm had drinks and hummus and pita and some other finger foods.  Nice touch.
Manager Response: Dear Douger67,  We’re so glad to hear that you opted for a change and gave us the opportunity to be your hotel on this most recent business trip.  We appreciate the kind words towards the staff and hope that our accommodations and amenities have made you a fan for continued loyalty.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: ok hotel but shuttle service should be on time and shower should be check to make sure it runs
Summary: ok hotel but shuttle service should be on time and shower should be check to make sure it runs i was promised bonus points and did not received it and it was ok but shuttle was late and people at front desk is not always helpful when explaining shuttle schedule and say it only run 2 times and hour for when it is availiable to any person
Manager Response: Dear Allen,  We appreciate your business and are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience with our shuttle service and the shower.  Our staff directive is about delivering first class customer service and we will make sure that if our Front Office Manager has not already contacted you about points that this happens this week.  Thank you for allowing us to Make this Right and we hope that you will give us another opportunity when travel brings you back to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a soccer tournament in September.  The breakfast was incredible!  The evening drinks/food was above the top!  We also had a dinner catered for the team one night and the fee per boy was just right.  They were able to work with us with short notice due to us not having our soccer schedule available until a week before.  We did book a bit late so we were only able to get rooms with king size beds instead of double beds, but the team and their families didn't mind because they know the service and the items above were worth staying there in rooms that were not exactly what we wanted but were just as comfortable for the most part.  This hotel will always be our go to hotel when in the area.  As well as any other Embassy wherever we go.
Manager Response: Dear Juve,  Thank you for taking your time to share the group experience at the Hotel and it’s always great to hear that we are the “Go To Hotel.”  We’re so happy to hear that all the families enjoyed their stay and we thank you for allowing us to cater the dinner.  We certainly hope that if the team or any of the families are returning to Orange County that we will see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Friendly Staff, Good Value, Great Location
Summary: The staff at this hotel is very, friendly, accommodating and professional.  The hotel is close and convenient to local businesses and attractions.  The rooms are comfortable and relaxing, and the amenities plentiful.  This hotel works well for those on a business trip or for personal travel to the Orange County, Irvine area.  I would highly recommend a stay at this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Mark,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent business trip to Irvine.  We really appreciate the strong recommendation and hope that you will be coming back to the Embassy Suites Irvine for business or pleasure in the near future.  Take care and safe travels!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: University of the Pacific Career Fair
Summary: Jasmine and team helped in making Thomas J Long School of Pharmacy's annual career fair a success.  The professionalism and attentiveness of Jasmine and all the staff was above and beyond.  I would highly recommend the Irvine Embassy for your next event!
Manager Response: Dear Carmen,  Thank you for taking time to share your recent experience and for recognizing Jasmine Stewart in our Sales Department.  We’re always happy to welcome back the college and looking forward to your 2016 event.  Thank you again for your continued loyalty and we greatly appreciate to recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Van Ride Experience at Embassy Suites
Summary: When you check in you will receive an Embassy bag with two complimentary waters and Hersey candy  bar.  The reservationist informed me that their Embassy Suites Van is a complimentary ride from the Hotel to wherever you want to go and they drive you back safely to the hotel!  They even recommended an excellent restaurant as well.  He was pleasant and since it was Halloween and he dressed up as Steve ErKiel was so entertaining. Once you are on the elevator its glides you up to your floor and you can view the whole elegant restaurant dinning area and other floors so awed struck.  Their complimentary breakfast that was  delicious waffles pancakes eggs bacon sausage etc.... The room was extremely clean adjoining rooms and had a huge living room with a couch and two tvs PLUS Wii Fi
Manager Response: Dear Irene,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome five star review.  It’s great to hear that our accommodations and services made you feel like you were at the Ritz and we especially appreciate the staff comments.  We certainly hope that travel brings you back to Orange County and we will see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good value and quality for the money
Summary: I travel often for work and usually stay here.  The rooms are great-I love having the two room suite and the bedrooms are always quiet as they're set back from the main hallway.  It's great to have the hosted bar for a couple hours and the free buffett breakfast is a nice touch, although the food itself is not outstanding.  It is nice to be able to quickly grab something and then head into work.  The front desk staff is always incredibly kind.  The restaurant is just okay, but they're literally 200feet away from McCormick and Schmick's so this provides a really nice dinner option if you don't want to drive around town.    The beds are really comfortable, the wifi is great, parking is sometimes free(sometimes they ask/sometimes they don't and their garage arm has been broken so
Manager Response: Dear ajsbabe,  Thank you for being one of our loyal guests and taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate the kind words about the Front Desk team and that you consider us the top Hilton choice for the area.  We’ve just rolled out a new menu for our restaurant so hope you’ll find the new offerings to your liking.  We’re looking forward to your next visit with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I highly recommend this hotel.  Rooms are clean, the bed is comfortable, close to the airport, service is good, food is good, full service bar.  Great place to stay for business or personal travel.  Front desk crew is friendly, especially Daniel.
Manager Response: Dear Anita,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome recommendation.  We always love hearing great service stories about our team members and Daniel is very appreciate of your mention in this review.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Lots of room to work.  Great staff.
Summary: Very nice, spotless, two-room suite with refrigerator, microwave, bar sink, deluxe bathroom soaps, comfy bed, and two televisions.  Anjonela, Front Desk, is just the kindest, most pleasant, and polite person that you may encounter. Everyone at the front desk is professional and service-oriented.  Free snacks (cheese, crackers, chips, salsa, grapes) and open bar are available from 5:30-7:30 nightly.  Free daily breakfast was a feast!  Close to SNA airport.  Free shuttle.  Free Wifi for HHonors members.  This hotel does things right.  Looking forward to next month's renovation.
Manager Response: Dear NeilRocks,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and the shout out to one of our newest team members at the Front Desk.  We appreciate the awesome review and look forward to having all our guest experience the new suites as they come back on line one floor at a time.  Safe travels and we’re looking forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Very pleasant stay - close to business
Summary: I had an excellent stay, the staff was great and rooms very clean. Very close to my client's office and definitely recommend this place to all business and leisure travelers. The suites are nice and spacious to host informal meetings.
Manager Response: Dear Ken,  Thank you for your recent stay and recommendation.  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and so glad to hear that everything was pleasant and our location a plus.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This our home away from home. Stayed here for 1 night with my family to attend a wedding at the nearby hotel at Irvine.   We arrived earlier than the check in time...all rooms are sold the night before but Michele of Front Desk told us that she will call us as soon as they have an available clean room. She took my contact info. After an hour or so, received a call from Michelle that our room was ready.  The evening's Manager Reception was fair- as they ran out of finger/bar food (nachos and cheese) pretzel- refill was hardly done due to the load of guests being served at the bar. There was always a long line by the bar- inky one bartender was working. Would be more efficient from the start if there were a couple of servers assigned to ensure the smooth reception.  The all you
Manager Response: Dear Toni,  Thank you for bringing the family to stay with us for the wedding.  Thank you so much for mentioning Michelle’s great service at the front desk and we certainly will be sharing your story with the team.  We’re very glad to hear breakfast was a big hit and that the chef’s really took care of your experience.  We’ll take a good look at the reception comments with our F&B team and make sure we are delivering to our standard.  We’re looking forward to your next trip back to the Embassy Suites Irvine!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: GREAT PLACE TO STAY FOR FAMILIES!!
Summary: We had an amazing 5 night stay. It's big, beautiful and centrally located. The staff is awesome and very accommodating. We were in town for our son's baseball tournament. This hotel is ideal for families. For the money, you can't beat the breakfast and the managers reception.
Manager Response: Dear James,  We’re so glad you found us for you son’s baseball tournament.  It’s great to hear that the location was ideal and the family enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We hope that if the team is returning to Orange County or your just returning for vacation that we will see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: This is what an embassy suites hotel should be like!
Summary: I stay in Hilton properties about 60+nights per year and this is one of the nicest ES properties I have experienced. Very upscale lobby, and amenities. The suites are updated and clean with plenty of room in both the bedroom and living area.  The only negative comment is the noisy ac. Not noisy enough to detract the overall experience but needed ti be mentioned.  The breakfast selections are good and if u want a customized omelette, they can provide. There is a faux Irish Pub on site so that is a dining option for dinner.   The location is ideal as it is just 7 minutes from the airport and there are many local dining and shopping options.  Overall this property is a very good value.  It is now my go to hotel for my trips to the area.
Manager Response: Dear SammyMadison,  We love hearing that we are now your “go to” Hotel for Irvine.  We appreciate your Hilton loyalty and hope to see you back again really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  PS – we just rolled out our new menu at the restaurant this week and its generating great guest feedback.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here on Friday, September 25, 2015.  Our suite was comfortable, happy hour was nice and much appreciated as we had an early long flight and an exhausting day.  The breakfast was awesome.  I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Robin,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience.  We’re glad to hear that the suite was comfortable and quiet providing for a good night’s rest.  We appreciate the recommendation and hope to see you again back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This embassy suites is the best!  The front desk is always so friendly and helpful.  The breakfast buffet with a chef to make your omelet is the best!  Love happy hour!
