Close to airport and highway.  Walking distance to several restaurants (great Mexican and McCormicks and Schmidts) Friendly staff, clean rooms, great location will keep me coming back!
Manager Response: Dear Steph,  Thank you for sharing this awesome five star review.  We appreciate your loyalty and the shout out to our staff.  We’re looking forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: great room but wifi intermintent in bedroom and work well in living room really annoying and staff wasnt as nice to me after i complain about and was supposed to receive a call from supervisor at 9 am the next morning and did not receive a call and hotel people had no knowledge of call of internet problem noted in my stay which was not nice or helpful
Manager Response: Dear Allen,  We appreciate your business and sincerely apologize for the lack of attention to your Wi-Fi issue.  We have shared your comments with our front desk team as a reminder of what our service standard should be.  I also wanted to let you know that we are in the middle of an upgrade to the Wi-Fi system and by the end of the month will have installed an additional 140 access points.  This upgrade will significantly improve connectivity in all areas of the hotel.  We hope to have you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine to experience our much improved Wi-Fi network.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Four day business stay - Very nice accomodations
Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel during a four day stay to visit my corporate headquarters in Irvine.  I found suite I stayed in to be very well appointed and clean.  The best feature was the elaborate morning breakfast and evening reception (with beer/wine, etc.) to be particularly a value add.  Close to the airport, I would recommend for business travel particularly.
Manager Response: Dear Doug,  Thank you for staying with us on your most recent business trip and we greatly appreciate your five star review.  We’re so glad that our complimentary breakfast was such a big hit and great to hear that you also had the opportunity to make our evening manager reception.  Thanks for the recommendation and we hope you come back soon to see us again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is very good for breakfast and very close to airport. Ideal for Disneyland attraction and other activity in Orange county. They provide free shuttle to airport. Friendly staff. Highly recommend for its value.
Manager Response: Dear Mukul,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  We are happy to hear our location to Disneyland was a plus as well as Orange County Airport.  We’re so glad you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: beautiful in all aspects had amemorable experience would recommend to everyone  excellent value for the money excellent service good atmosphere clean and comfortable room - food was excellent specially liked the evening reception
Manager Response: Dear 522cherianp,  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine on your most recent business trip.  We greatly appreciate the five star review and so glad that you enjoyed the evening reception.  We hope that travel brings you back to Orange County and that we will be seeing you soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: For some bazzar reason Embassy Suite change the bedroom design so that the furnishings are set diagonally across corners rather than the conventional wall parallel arrangement.  Takes up too much space and the asymmetry is all wrong for the peripheral furnishings as a result.
Manager Response: Dear Darryl,  Thank you for your recent stay and we sincerely hope you were able to enjoy our hotel amenities and complimentary services.  Our king suite bedrooms were designed to sit on an angle which works well for the space.  All suites additionally feature spacious living rooms for an overall experience in twice the space generally associated with standard hotel rooms.  We do appreciate your feedback and hope you will consider the Embassy Suites Irvine if returning to the area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: It is an excellent hotel, rooms are great size, and very clean, breakfast made to order not just corn flakes, managers reception is great and friendly staff, even though the beer, wine, is free the staff is more than glad to serve you. will stay here again if i come alone or with family
Manager Response: Dear Jesus,  Thank you so much for sharing such a wonderful experience.  It’s great to hear that the room accommodations were excellent and we so glad to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: I will return, hope it gets better
Summary: The hotel is clean and very nice. Obviously it has been renovated in recent years. I did place a pre-arrival of dinner, and extra pillows and towels. I arrived and the gal at the front desk was perfect. Nice, accurate, engaging. I went up to my room and found my pre-arrival order delivered the wrong beverage. I called guest services, who were great. Thought I would wait an hour for my beverage, but it arrived in minutes. The room was very well appointed and spacious. But it looks like the Facilities Engineer(s) don't take their job very seriously. The room was missing an electrical outlet face plate, had a plugged sink, a very noisy forced air unit, and several broken tiles in the bathroom that were poorly repaired. And the layout of the room was a mess. The bathroom door opened
Manager Response: Dear 3Bagger,  Thank you for taking the time to share some great details about your stay.  We greatly appreciate the kind staff comments for our housekeeping department and do sincerely apologize for the facility issues.  That is definitely not our standard and should have been identified during room inspections.  We will be updating all guest rooms and suites starting this November and looking forward to unveiling the new product to all our loyal guests.  We hope to see you back soon.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good hotel, close to UCI and Disneyland.
Summary: If you're doing a mix of business and family vacationing to Disneyland, this is the hotel to be in.  The suites are clean, a restaurant/pub onsite if you're too tired to go out for drinks or get dinner.  Decent size pool and gym equipment.
Manager Response: Dear Annie,  Thank you for your recent stay and both family and business recommendations.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the spacious suite accommodations and sounds like you had a great experience at our Ha’Penny restaurant.  We hope travel brings you back to the Embassy Suites Irvine in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I travel to OC for business and usually stayed at the Holiday Inn Airport. But this is my new choice. The location is perfect and the breakfast was beyond great. The rooms were well kept and the hotel in general keeps the Embassy suite tradition. I stay at Embassy Suites when I travel to the east coast but this was a pleasant surprise.
Manager Response: Dear Carmen,  That’s fantastic to hear you’ve found a new home away from home in Orange County.  Thank you for the awesome review of the accommodations and our complimentary cooked-to-order breakfast.  We’re glad to have another loyal Embassy Suites guest returning to our Hotel in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Got cheapest room... paid the price
Summary: I found what I thought was a good deal. Not SIGNIFICATIVELY cheaper but cheaper than the other hotel I was eyeing (Irvine Hotel). Because it is a business trip, I thought why know, save some bucks, anyway I am traveling by myself.   Free breakfast, free parking. Clean room, except for the sticker under the above-the-bed frame that says " divine & cookie made <3 -> :)"   The person at the front desk that greet me the first time was nice enough, even though I was too early to get in and he told me I had to come back later. The next person was very cold and impersonal. I got a room on the 10th floor. A room that evidently was built in a corner that was not meant to be a room, but a late add on. A cheap add on. Right by the vending machine, actually behind (like hidden behind) the
Manager Response: Dear Lauralety,  We appreciate your business and I am very sorry to hear about the quality of your stay.  The service you received is not to our standard and will be discussed with our department heads.  Our Hotel features 275 suites and 18 studios and we would like to welcome you back to a full suite on any future travel to Irvine.  Please reach out to me directly and I would be very happy to help make any arrangements so we can make this right.  Warmest regards,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Thank you to the front desk staff for making our stay extra special! Nice clean room with comfy bed. Beautiful atrium. Evening manager reception has great beer on tap. Dorothy was friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Lilly,  We are so happy to hear that the family had such an enjoyable stay and we really appreciate the recognition for Dorothy at our front desk.  It’s always great to hear our guests enjoying the evening reception and hopefully you also had the opportunity to join us for breakfast.  If travel brings you back to Orange County we hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good Business Hotel Close to Airport
Summary: Clean, quite rooms with superior extras including made to order breakfast, WSJ, free parking, good fitness center, reasonable price.  Location is very close to John Wayne airport and Irvine businesses.  About 20 minutes to Newport Beach depending on traffic.  I’ll stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear MalcolmandSirius,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent business trip to Orange County.  It’s great to hear our location, suites, breakfast and other hotel amenities will be bringing you back.  We’ll be looking forward to seeing you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very convenient to Orange County Airport, though the shuttle was a much longer wait than they said.  The hotel is up to what you expect from this chain which is very comfortable almost everywhere.  The only negative was a wi-fi charge of $7.95 which most hotels provide for free these days.  They should post the price before you sign on so that you know what to expect.  The night reception is always welcome and relaxing.
Manager Response: Dear rc49456,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to post your review.  We appreciate the kind words and we do apologize the shuttle wasn’t as quick as it should have been.  Our normal transfer time from the airport is less than 15 minutes.  I also wanted to share that all Hilton Honors guests booking direct with the Hotel receive complimentary Wi-Fi.  We hope that if you are returning to Orange County that you will be staying with us again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall good hotel but if not a Hilton honors member, be prepared to pay for parking and wifi. morning breakfast buffet good.  Cook to order breakfast also good.  evening manager's happy hour included beer on tap.  Also, good.
Manager Response: Dear Beverly,  We appreciate your recent stay and thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We are glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  All Hilton Honors guests booking direct with the Hotel (all Hilton Hotels) do receive complimentary Wi-Fi; however, parking is $15 per day for all guests including Honors.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine should travel have you returning to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I rented 3 rooms for a men's conference in the local area. 12 men accompanied me on this trip and every one of them was thrilled with the hotel's cleanliness, friendliness, spaciousness and the amazing complimentary breakfast. I highly recommend Embassy Suites but this particular location is superior to others I've stayed at.
Manager Response: Dear Gabriel,  Thank you for sharing such a great experience.  It’s awesome to hear that the whole group had such an enjoyable stay and we really appreciate the staff recognition.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for one night for a business trip and was pleased at the ease of check-in and check-out process.  Staff were friendly, helpful, and attentive.  The breakfast was good (and free!) and the evenign reception was a nice way to unwind after a long day of meetings.  The fitness room was small got the job done.  Overall was very satisfied and would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Heather,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent business trip to Orange County.  We are delighted to hear that the staff and check-in process was very pleasing.  We’re glad that you were able to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and the evening reception.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine and please tell a friend.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Exceptional staff treats you like family
Summary: I visit Irvine monthly, and this is like visiting family, but without all the drama.  From the shuttle driver to and from the airport, to the restaurant staff, to everyone you meet, they all make you feel welcome.
Manager Response: Dear David,  We appreciate your continued loyalty and thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  We can’t ask for a better comment then “treats you like family.”  It’s so great to hear such positive comments about our team members and we’re looking forward to you next stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: As is typical with this brand, complimentary breakfast and cocktail hour.  Very conveniently located to John Wayne airport and Costa Mesa mall.  It was less than a half mile to my office in Irvine.  Across the street from McCormick & Schmick's for a fancier dinner.
Manager Response: Dear Nick,  Thank you for staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  It’s great to hear that the Hotel was convenient to your office and the airport.  We hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Went to this hotel on a weekend outing with my spouse.  We expected a smooth, quiet weekend.  It turned out to be anything but that.  First, there is no valet parking and no bell service, so even though I suffer from spinal stenosis and walk with pain and difficulty, I had to make several trips from a far off parking space and our car to move the luggage (or force my wife to haul all of it, which of course I would never do.)  Then the place was FULL of families of what seemed like 100 kids, all there for some sporting tournament.  Ages ranged from about 2 to 15.  Constant yelling, kids running down the halls, screaming, it was a madhouse.  Of course all of the parents were either not watching or not acting as I guess they perceive that type behavior as "normal." The "free"
Manager Response: Dear John,  We a very sorry to hear that your experience at our hotel was anything less than special.  We are very busy over Labor Day with youth sports groups and hire on additional security.  This is not the case on most weekends and we would really like to bring you back for a nice relaxing stay.  I will send you a personal message to see how we can make this right.  Warmest Regards, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary Heading: I enjoined stay in this hotel.
Summary: I arrived in the evening and the front desk was very efficient and provided the luggage cart.  We had the happy hour food.  The suite is very big and quite.  The breakfast was delicious.  Over all, it's a very good hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Yee-Ping,  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine for your recent trip to Orange County.  We appreciate the nice staff comments and that you really enjoyed our complimentary evening reception and breakfast.  We hope to see you back again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I was there for business. Nice Airport shuttle, great location. Breakfast was excellent, and evening reception is terrific. Staff very friendly and helpful. I didn't have a suite--I had a small regular room, however, it was well appointed, very comfortable and quiet.
Manager Response: Dear Teresa,  We appreciate your stay with us on your recent business trip and it’s great to hear that the location was so convenient and you found our Hotel to be such a great value.  We love hearing positive comments about the staff and so glad you were able to enjoy the complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine and please tell your business partners.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here for a location close to UCI, the 405, Irvine, Newport Beach, and it does have any easy shuttle ride to the airport.  The breakfast buffet, and omelette bar was competent, and convenient for us, but we just never had a chance to try the evening reception. This hotel seems pretty busy.  No complaints about easy in and out at this location, except that the hotel garage filled up at night requiring parking nearby.  The suites on the corners are of a fun design, and feel extra roomy.  No chance to check out the pool as it was closed for maintenance.
Manager Response: Dear Roger,  Thank you for bringing the family and staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine just three miles from the UC Irvine campus.  We’re glad that you found the location convenient for all your local activity and happy to hear you were able to join us for breakfast.  We hope to welcome you back on any future travel to Orange County for an opportunity to experience our evening reception.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: No WIFI / internet and no one really cares
Summary: As a Hilton Honors member, I was given "free wifi".  I went to my room and the best I could get was 1 bar if I stood by the hallway, but neither my ipad, iphone nor macbook could find the wireless network at all most of the time and from any other location.  I called the front desk and they said it's very inconsistent and i could get help from IT so they transferred me to AT&T help desk.  For me to fix their internet????  I had no wifi.  I told them the next day what a problem it was and they said they had lots of issues/complaints and they are sorry.  That was it.  The room was loud -- from cooling system -- and everything else minimally acceptable.  But, with no wifi and not being able to work while I was there, it didn't matter what else happened.
Manager Response: Dear Suzanne,  We appreciate your Hilton Honors loyalty and are very sorry that your Wi-Fi experience was a letdown.  We are currently working with AT&T for a major system upgrade including over 100 additional access points so that guests no matter where you are within the Hotel can easily connect to our 100MG network.  We do expect this project to be complete by the end of October and hope you will consider us again on any future travel to the area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Very comfortable and relaxing place to stay
Summary: I almost always enjoy staying at Embassy Suites, and this one has all the things that I like best. The room was clean and spacious; in fact one of the largest Embassy Suites standard rooms I've stayed in. The furnishing are modern and pretty new, although a bit of wear was already showing in my room. The complimentary breakfast was great -- love the made-to-order omelet and very good variety of higher-quality breakfast items that are available. The shower head in my room was hard to adjust and I couldn't keep it from spraying water on the floor. The faucet for the bath/shower wasn't updated when the room was remodeled last, so it looks old and shabby. And the vent in the bathroom is way underpowered, unable to remove even the slightest bit of steam. Overall, though, these were
Manager Response: Dear ColeQ,  Thank you for your recent stay and it’s great to hear we measure very well with your other Embassy Suites experiences.  Later this year we will start with a refresh of all suites including new bathrooms with raised shower heads.  It’s great to hear a successful use of eCheck-in and we’re very excited to have this new technology.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I recently stayed at the Embassy Suites on a business trip.  The location is conveniently located near the airport and several excellent restaurants.  The hotel was incredibly busy (clearly families also love this location due to it's proximity to Disneyland), but the rooms remained quiet and were very well appointed.  I will definitely stay here next time I'm in OC for work or leisure.
Manager Response: Dear CP,  We’re glad to hear that our location was very convenient for your recent business trip and appreciate your time in posting the experience.  We appreciate the quiet and clean accommodations commentary which speaks well to our housekeeping department.  We’re glad to hear that you will be returning to the Embassy Suites Irvine the next time travel brings you to the area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: the staff of this hotel went out of their way to make our stay there perfect
Summary: I was in California on a business trip and my family came along with me to go to Disneyland. My daughter months old and has to be in a car seat, which we didn't have, and I mentioned that in a conversation with a shuttle driver one morning. When I came back that evening I found that the hotel staff found a car seat for us! I will stay at this hotel every time I go to Orange County.
Manager Response: Dear Ann,  Wow Ann!  What a great story and thank you so much for sharing.  We appreciate that you stayed with us on the business trip and brought the family.  It’s always great to hear such uplifting comments about the staff and have shared your review with our department heads.  We’re glad to hear that we are your Hotel and look forward to your next visit at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites - best hotel choice in Irvine
Summary: The Embassy Suites in Irvine is an excellent choice for business or family travel. They have good food including free made-to-order omelets and other items, a great (also free) managers happy hour (actually 2 hours) and the quietest rooms. I stay here often  and would strongly recommend to anyone needing a hotel in the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  We appreciate your continued loyalty and thank you for taking the time to share your experience.  It’s great to be your #1 Hotel in Irvine and we’re looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I had high expectations when booking this hotel. My boyfriend and I have stayed at numerous Embassy Suites and this one has to be the worst one we have ever stayed in. The pictures on their website clearly does not match what you expect upon arrival. We checked in our first room and it had a strange smell, as if someone had just smoked in the room even if it was a nonsmoking room. Staff was nice about putting us in a different room. The room gave it a motel atmosphere. The furniture is extremely outdated, worn out, and dirty. The TV was slow. The mini fridge had hair in it and the shower head was so small, the water pressure was weak. There was stains on the wall, carpet, and even the pillowcases. I didn't realize it until late at night and just placed a tshirt over the pillow.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  We are sorry to hear that your recent stay was below expectations.  There’s no excuse for poor cleanliness and your comments do not live up to our standards.  We will be upgrading all suites starting later this year and hope that you may reconsider coming back and giving us another opportunity.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Love this hotel! Will stay here again!
Summary: I booked this hotel based on other people's Trip Advisor reviews, and I cannot be more pleased with my visit. The hotel is hip with a great ambiance and a pub! I will post some pics of the interior. I love the design. I am also a bit of a breakfast fiend while on vacation, so I wanted a place with a stellar breakfast within walking distance of my bed. While there was a bit of a wait, I was pleased with my giant omelet and the other breakfast offerings. I would definitely stay here again, because both the bedroom and bathroom were spacious. Everything was very clean, too - which is always important when one travels.
Manager Response: Dear TLBPsyD,  It’s awesome to hear that you booked our Hotel based on TripAdvisor reviews and that we’re getting your feedback as well.  We appreciate the comments and especially the stellar breakfast within walking distance.  We can’t ask for more and definitely looking forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Lovely Hotel and great location. Full hot breakfast is an added bonus. Rooms and clean and spacious. Great rates available on line and special discounts given for AAA. If you are staying for several days beware of the $15 a day for parking on top of the room rate.
Manager Response: Dear Kristina,  Thank you for your recent stay and greatly appreciate the lovely hotel and great location comments.  We’re glad to hear that you enjoyed our suites and complimentary breakfast.  Being in the city center everything is pay parking and we continue to keep our rates on the lower end for Hotels in Irvine.  We hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nice rooms, breakfast OK for a buffet
Summary: Stayed 3 nights on 3rd floor above bar. Atrium design leads to unavoidable noise, but my suite had the living room to the front so it only bothered me a bit when working at the desk, bedroom was quiet. Service was really good, sorry I forgot the woman's name in the mean time but she left a very good impression.
Manager Response: Dear PRW67,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent business trip and taking the time to share your experience.  We’re glad to hear that the suite design worked well for you and really appreciate the staff comments.  It’s always great to hear one of our team members making a great impression.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Lots of noise, lacking customer service
Summary: We stayed at this hotel this past weekend.  It is the typical Embassy configuration with a large atrium that holds the restaurant & bar.  The hotel was very busy with soccer and baseball teams.  When we returned from dinner at 9:00pm. It was amazing how the noise from the restaurant carried all the way up to the 8th floor and into our living room.  We had to put the kids down so we did in the bedroom.  They kept the restaurant open until 11:00 and it didn't get quite until after 11:30.  My wife and I then had to sleep on the sofa pull-out with that wonderful crossbar in my back all night.  In the morning, we went for the included breakfast.  There were no tables and people waiting with their filled trays all over the place.  I asked a worker if we could sit in the bar area as
Manager Response: Dear Isabigworld321,  We appreciate your recent stay and sincerely apologize that we did not exceed your expectations.   We are here to accommodate our guest needs and I will be discussing your breakfast experience with our team.  I would be happy to continue this conversation and how we can make it right.  Please contact me directly at 949-705-5151 or by email at Swietlana.cahill2@hilton.com whenever it’s convenient for you.  We truly value your business and hope you will consider a future stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.   Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Embassy suite is a big name hotel, but I find it not so. The reservation has a lot of problem. I am not sure if it is because it was overbooked or the staff needs more training, it was a lot different than what was promised to me over the phone
Manager Response: Dear Hsiang,  Thank you for your recent stay and we are sorry to hear you had some challenges with your reservation.  I would be more than happy to talk with you anytime to better understand your concerns and how we can make it better.  Please reach out to me directly at the hotel.  Our phone number is 949-553-8332.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel location is so handy, just off the 405, close enough to Orange Co Airport, South Coast Plaza, the Discovery Zone, etc...   We traveled a 3 adults and 2 small children.  The evening reception was great, and the menu offered by the Pub was quite good.  We did not need to leave the hotel to find dinner.  The quality of the meal was as good as anything we could have wanted, and a varied menu and prices.  The room was up to the standards offered by the brand.  Perfect for family.  The breakfast the next morning had something for everyone, plentiful.  The pool was indoor, great for the kids and a quiet little outdoor patio with lovely seating areas, plants, shaded areas- lovely.  I think we shall return just for a getaway with more family in the fall.
Manager Response: Dear FlyawaySanDiego,  It’s always great to see a wonderful family experience being shared on TripAdvisor.  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We are glad that the location, accommodations and dinning exceeded expectations.  We hope to see you and the rest of the family back for that weekend getaway.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was our third time here, it is very convenient to where we needed to be.  Each time we've felt it was just, eh so-so.  This time, however, we were definitely left with a bad taste....  We were a party of 4 adult (2 couples) and had reserved a king suite. At checkin we were told that "someone" had screwed up the reservation (we were told they would be reprimanded) so we were put into a suite with 2 double beds.  Not ideal but it was very late so we took it.  While getting up and ready in the morning, the shower just stopped working, no water, no nothing. It took 2 calls and 30 minutes to get maintenance to the room, then took them about 45 minutes to repair.  By then we were over it and had made our way down to the free breakfast.  The omelets were delicious, made to order.
Manager Response: Dear Juju90704,  We appreciate your loyalty and we sincerely apologize for the disruption at breakfast and the shower failure.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your omelet and have used your comments in our morning huddle on how each department can improve the guest experience.  We do apologize for the delay in fixing the shower and we will be replacing the mixing valves and raising the shower heads this year when the hotel begins renovation.  Our goal is to get you back to First Choice and we certainly hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nice and consistent with other Embassy Suites
Summary: Stayed for one night for a work trip.  Everyone I came into contact with was friendly and competent. Bed comfy, room spotless.  The breakfast was good as usual.  I ate a cooked to order omelet.  Great hotel as the Embassy brand always offers.  The picture is of the view from my room window.
Manager Response: Dear Acharbonnet,  Thank you so much for sharing this great review and really appreciate the team member comment.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed breakfast and our specialty omelets.  If work send you back our way we hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine or we always make for a great weekend getaway.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Designed similar to other Embassy Suites and the room was as expected and clean. The breakfast is good and has a lot of options but we noticed it can get very crowded. You have to pay for parking which is frustrating as there is no where else to park.
Manager Response: Dear KCH143,  Thank you for staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine and we greatly appreciate the positive feedback.  It’s great to hear your family enjoyed our breakfast and we do hope to see you back soon!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We were placed in a room with a view of the parking garage.  They placed us in a handicap room, which we agreed to, however, my husband and two boys were not pleased with the shower.  The room was very spacious and nicely decorated.  A few stains on the carpet.  The beds were good.  The breakfast made the stay.  Wonderful buffet and omelettes made to order...my kids and husband LOVED it.  They also have a happy hour, however, we were always out and missed it.  You have to pay $15/day for parking (parking garage).  The staff was very friendly.  Good location, near airport and right off the hwy.     The pool was not very nice, indoor and very small for such a big hotel.  There is a nice outside sitting area off of the pool.
Manager Response: Dear Gilly12333345,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share.  We’re glad to hear that the accommodations worked out for the family and it’s so great to hear that Breakfast made the stay.  Hopefully we will see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine and that next time you will be able to enjoy the evening reception.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: First time at this hotel and just ok
Summary: When we arrived we were greeted by what we were told was an "ozone filter"...(AKA large machine to clean the air for a smoker or unknown ?? )...nice welcome !   As a Hilton Honours member, I have to say, I have never received this welcome !  My husband opted to sleep on the pull out to give the kids and I the king ..poor guy had to sleep on a gross mattress that was very uncomfortable  and the mattress cover on this was not very clean.   The shower curtain didn't fit properly and water was shooting all over the floor !  It seemed that the suite may have been updated in the past, but obviously not the shower..it seemed like a shower from the 70's.   The breakfast was decent. The hotel was large and busy and we felt like a number.   There was a parking fee and we had to park in a
Manager Response: Dear Pam,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We are sorry to hear that you had some housekeeping issues and this is not our standard.  Your comments are helpful for training and have been discussed with the department.  We are glad that you were able to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and do hope that you will consider the hotel on any future travel to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Will never stay again No working shower Locked in parking garage because gate would not open I should have been refunded one nights stay as I could not take a shower and had a very important business meeting. I felt unprepared and unwashed which reflected upon my performance
Manager Response: Dear Darryl,  I am sorry to hear about these incidents during your stay.  Providing a home away from home is our standard and I would greatly appreciate the opportunity to speak with you directly.  Please contact me at any time via phone or email.  My direct line is 949-705-5151 and my email is Swietlana.cahill2@hilton.com  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: We have stayed in other Embassy Suites all over but this one wasn't so good. First of all when we first walked into the room we all noticed a weird smell. At first we thought it was smoke then we realized it was a musty smell, like that particular room hadn't been used in a while, yuck. The shower head was too low and when the water came out it wasn't powerful at all. It wasn't a trickle but it was not nice either. The faucets seemed all old and yucky. On the pull out bed, there was a bottom sheet but  no top sheet.  All our boys had to cover up with were the  blankets we got from the closet. All in all I would not stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 1Cowgirl66,  We are sorry to hear your experience was less than perfect and we discussed your review at our housekeeping meeting this morning.  We will be renovating all guest suites this year and part of that project includes raising shower heads and replacing the mixing valves.  We do hope that you will reconsider staying with us in the future and appreciate your comments.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: First time at this Embassy Suites and left happy
Summary: Our family was on our college road trip.  We stayed at this Embassy Suites because of the proximity to UC Irvine.  Everything about the hotel is fantastic. Nice, clean, fresh, spacious, friendly and helpful staff, but the best thing was the FREE morning breakfast. There is a chef ready to make your custom omelette, there are eggs, bacon, sausages, cereal, oatmeal, bagels, fruits and much more. This place is a definite must.
Manager Response: Dear Janice,  Thank you for bringing the family on your UC Irvine road trip.  We are huge partners with the University and look forward to seeing the Anteater on stage with our “Destination Irvine” float at the next Rose Parade.  We appreciate your kind comments and the great staff interaction.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We've stayed in Embassy Suites all across the US and this one was the very best. The only bad experience we had was room service added another tip on top of the one we gave them. Sorta sad that they did that, but still a great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear itlbgr8,  Wow!  Best Embassy Suites Ever!  Thank you so much for your recent stay and these great comments.  We hope that you have the opportunity to travel back to Orange County so we can see you back at the hotel really soon.  Until then, safe travels.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I would give this hotel five stars if it was t for the following. 1 Coffee needs a huge improvement. 2 $15 for parking isn't cool.   The good:  Managers reception offers a nice variety of drinks margaritas, cosmopolitans, Long Islands beer n wine. Breakfast was delicious especially the cooked to order omelette station. Lines were not long. Pool and hot tub was nice but smaller than normal embassies I've been to. Would definitely stay agin.
Manager Response: Dear Donte,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share your experience.  We are glad to hear you enjoyed the evening reception and breakfast and certainly appreciate the positive referral.  Parking like similar cities is limited and mostly in parking structures.  Our parking fees are among the lowest in Irvine and are primarily to support the operation of the garage itself.  We do hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed for 4 days recently and had a wonderful stay. The hospitallity of the hotel employees was perfect. During our stay the staff was expetionally helpful and pleasant. I would like to specifically thank Michelle and Luis for their prompt service returning my laptop that was left in the room. I live 9 hours from Irvine and dealt with these two employees to have my laptop shipped back to Reno. The even called to confirm the laptop had been shipped. i would recomend this hotel for their customer service alone. The free breakfast and hppy hour is just a bonus.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for bringing the family down from Reno.  We love the great staff comments and really appreciate that you have mentioned Michelle and Luis.  I’m glad to hear that we were able to get your laptop returned in a quick manner and hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is excellent, rooms are really nice, staff was great, and the location worked well. Stayed in a King Suite on the ground floor and thought it might be noisy, but it was perfect. Room had everything needed and was very quite.
Manager Response: Dear Bruce,  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine on your most recent business trip.  We appreciate the great review and are so glad the hotel had everything you were looking for.  We hope to see you back again really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Found management and staff impolite and unhelpful. Lost my ID on way to hotel. Showed up to check-in without and photo ID. Staff and Manager on duty at the time were not the least bit concerned with providing quality service. Very disappointed. I've stayed at this hotel in the past but never had to interact with staff.
Manager Response: Dear Edward,  I was sorry to see that you lost your ID on the way to the hotel and would very much like to speak with you offline.  Guest safety and security is of the most utmost importance to the hotel and I do apologize if hotel policy caused any inconvenience.  Although Lawrence from our Front Desk team has already reached out to you please feel free to contact me via phone or email at any time.  I have included my direct contact information below.   Sincerely,   Swietlana Cahill General Manager 949-705-5151 Swietlana.Cahill2@Hilton.com

Summary: Great hotel, good location. great food and atmosphere. Night receptopn was very nice, hotel staff very friendly. The evening reception food could be improved upon as it was limited to nachos and cookies. Maybe adding in some fresh veggies and dip or fruit. This would be a nice addition to what you are offering. The beer and winc eselection was just adequate but admittedly we are wine sobs from wine country. We will be happy to come back to this location for personal use and I would conisder using it as a work hotel as well as it is not far from the airport.
Manager Response: Dear Felishia,  Thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  We appreciate the great comments about location, food and atmosphere and glad you were able to take advantage of the host bar at the evening reception.  We look forward to your next stay whether it business or pleasure.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: came for a 3 day weekend soccer tournament with the team,, had an amazing time ! really cool hotel, awesome elevators and lobby area to hang out. there is also free (and yummy) breakfast and (also free) happy hour for the parents.. would definitely come here again !
Manager Response: Dear Elena,  Thank you for the great review and sounds like the entire soccer team had a blast.  We appreciate the kind words and glad to hear you were able to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and the evening reception.  We hope it won’t be too long until your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed here because it was close to the airport and because of the overall rating here on Trip Advisor. I have to agree with the most recent reviews....it's not as nice as the star rating would indicate.  PROS:  Close to the airport Free shuttle Typical Embassy Suites 'suite style' hotel with separate living room area (with sofa sleeper) and bedroom separated by a door Free breakfast and Happy Hour Small sundry store  on site Fitness center/pool, etc. Decent water pressure Plenty of hot water In room fridge, microwave and coffee maker Two flat screen televisions; one in bedroom, ,one in living room space Decent channel line up Room service available  CONS  Cheap towels Cheap linens Not the most comfortable bed Not the best pillows Noisy - lots of kids sports teams there
Manager Response: Dear TravelMommy1,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share your experience.  We appreciate the pros and cons conversation and we do listen to all guest feedback to continually improve the hotel experience.  The hotel will be going through full property enhancement starting with guest suits in October.  It is our commitment to keep the product fresh with great service and value to keep our loyal guest returning.  We do hope you will consider the Embassy Suites Irvine for future stays in the Orange County area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed here for five days in July 2015 for the Water Polo Junior Olympics with my daughter and mother. We did not specifically choose this hotel - they were pre-reserved rooms in blocks through the water polo club. However, we were very satisfied with our stay! The breakfast was amazing. Pool and hot tub was great. I wish there was a bathroom fan. Also, there wasn't much for kids to do - so there ended up being lots, like dozens and dozens - of 8-12 yo kids wandering around the hotel in small groups, going up and down the elevator. This didn't bother me, but it might be helpful to have more stuff for kids to do. Unfortunately, hotel isn't near walking distance of anything except businesses (like office parks), so we had to drive to get food, etc.
Manager Response: Dear Kilianne,  Thank you for joining us at the Embassy Suites Irvine for the Water Polo Junior Olympics.  We had a great time accommodating all the athletes, coaches and family.  We are glad to hear that breakfast was amazing and that you enjoyed the pool.  We do hope to see you back again at the hotel if travel brings you back our way.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: A non-functional dripping down the wall only shower in a "non-suite" closet of a room in a "embassy suites hotel". Lousy customer service and misrepresentation of facts. Told to go to another hotel if a non-working shower was an issue as no other rooms available. After 1 hour and multiple calls, finally got another "non-suite" room. I will never stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  First of all I’d like to apologize for your recent experience and I would very much like to the opportunity to further discuss the situation and Make this Right.  The hotel does have a limited number of guest studios which are not full suites; however, there is no reason for any of our accommodations not to be in working order.  I am including my direct line and email below.  Please contact me at any time.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager Swietlana.Cahill2@Hilton.com 949-705-5151

Summary: I was so disappointed with this facility.  Indifferent staff at front desk during all of my interactions with them.  Shower was only luke warm on both days of my stay.  Highly unlikely that I would ever stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Mary,  Thank you for your recent stay and we are so very sorry that we did not meet your expectations.  I’m concerned with the staff comments as it is our mission to have friendly and helpful associates delivering a great hotel experience.  I certainly hope you will consider us for a future stay and please feel free to contact me directly if we can further discuss your experience.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager 949-705-5151

Summary: Have stayed at this Embassy Suites many times.  It is very conveniently located and has a great staff.  But this trip, it appeared that management was skimping on many things.  The toilet paper was thinner that tissue paper....so much for saving money--you have to use three or more times as much.  The towels were not matched and a few were stained. There was only one cook at breakfast in spite of appearance of a full house.  Some days the eggs were good, others they were underdone.  The goodies at happy hour were CHEAP.  Hope they get back their mojo.
Manager Response: Dear Templetongirl,  Thank you for continuing to come back to the hotel and we are sorry to hear that we missed the mark on this recent stay.  First I wanted to let you know that we have changed suppliers for the toilet tissue as a result of guest feedback.  During summer we do staff two breakfast cooks over peak times to help with the flow and will certainly share your comments with our F&B team.  We do hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine if travel brings you back to the Orange County area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: As a Hilton Diamond member on previous visits I rated this this Embassy Suites a 5 star.  The staff, location, room decor and cleanliness are still 5 star.  HOWEVER it appears cost cutting efforts have gone a step to far.  The toilet tissue is thin and rough, obviously never used by the person who purchased it.  The breakfast selection is less attractive than in the past and a shortage of staff left guests waiting for clean tables and only one chef making eggs led to long wait lines. I wIll give it another try hoping things improve
Manager Response: Dear Marshall,  We greatly appreciate your loyalty to the hotel and as a Hilton Diamond member.  Thank you for continuing to rate the accommodations, staff and location with five stars and I can report that we’ve already changed toilet tissue.  We’ve not made any changes to breakfast so will discuss this with the F&B team.  We will be looking forward to your next stay and the opportunity to exceed all expectations.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Well exceeded our expectations!!! Great food. Room was beautiful and clean! Staff were friendly and hard working! Location was perfect and our entire family had a blast! We will be back again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Carissa,  Thank you for the awesome five star review and it’s always great to hear about exceeding our guest’s expectations.  We appreciate the positive review and definitely would love to see the family back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have stayed at this location many times and the location, the condition of the hotel, and the amenities are always top notch.  The cooked-to-order breakfast is always delicious and of high quality as is the manager's special in the evening.  I really appreciate coming back to the manager's special after a full day of touring or doing whatever.  Don't hesitate to stay here as you will be undoubtedly pleased.
Manager Response: Dear Denimc,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and for taking the time to share your most recent experience.  We really appreciate you mentioning the quality of our complimentary breakfast and the evening reception and thank you so much for the confident referral.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Loved this hotel and will go back there in the future! It felt so homey and comfortable! The air conditioner is a bit noisy but I guess there is not much they can do to improve it. we had a great time!
Manager Response: Dear Masumeh,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share the experience.  We’re thrilled to know you loved the hotel and looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: When traveling to the OC, I always try and stay here. The staff is friendly and the hotel is clean. We love the breakfast in the am. We have even booked blocks of rooms for my sons baseball team several times with Jasmine in the Sales Dept. She is awesome and always a pleasure. Look forward to our next team stay.
Manager Response: Dear Doug,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and the great shout out to Jasmine in our Sales Department.  We appreciate the great review and also look forward to your next stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Very central to the Southern Coast
Summary: Loved this hotel.  It was great for kids, rooms were clean and updated.   Restaurant food, bar service was EXCELLENT.  You can tell employees are happy to work there.  Like other Embassy Suites.  My only complaint was  breakfast ends to early and should be extended to 10 during the week in summer months.   It was very full and I felt rushed.
Manager Response: Dear Natalie,  Thank you for the awesome five star review and taking the time to share with everyone about our location and hotel amenities.  It’s always great to hear such positive comments about the hotel staff.  Our breakfast hours are 6am – 9am Monday through Friday and 7am – 10:30am on weekends to ensure we are able to meet all our guest’s needs.  We are sorry to hear your family felt rushed as we certainly understand that our leisure travelers may need a little extra time in the morning and our team members are here to be accommodating to all guests.  We hope to see you back at the hotel really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We unfortunately had a young girls softball teams booked there.  There were kids everywhere and that was fine.  We were a family of 5 also.  The parents were the most obnoxious so loud and inconsiderate down in the atrium and the noise kept us up!!  I complained to the front desk and said isn't there any curfew?!!  I was told it was 10:00 pm but the noise continued until past midnight!!!   The room was great but I would find out if there are any groups scheduled there before I book again!!  The breakfast made up for the horrible noises!!
Manager Response: Dear Lyndee,  We appreciate that your family choose to stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine and are very sorry to hear that your evening was disrupted.  We do contract additional security throughout summer when our occupancy runs very high to help patrol and close down the atrium so that all guests have an opportunity for some well-deserved rest.  We are very happy to hear that breakfast continues to win you over and hope to see you back at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I booked this hotel for our high school sport team during a tournament. The best thing is the breakfast buffet that  is included in the room rate. It worked out perfectly for our morning games. They were able to either grab something to go or come back after the game to finish the breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Kay,  Thank you for bringing the team and we’re very happy to hear that breakfast worked out even for the early games.  We hope to see you back at the hotel sometime soon whether it’s with the team or a quick vacation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Rooms were clean, quite spacious and even though it's very close to the airport, you cannot hear the airplanes at all.   Negatives: 1. No safe box in the room. Which is very surprising to me. As these days any hotel would have one  2. No cutleries or plates in the room. For a suit, you would expect these as the minimum  3. The sofa bed had loads of m&m's stuffed under it!!! Which could only mean they didn't clean it
Manager Response: Dear OVS83,  Thank you for staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine and we greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate the generous comments and wanted to share that we will be adding in-room safes to all suites later this year.  We do apologize for the M&M’s as that is not up to our standards and has been shared with our housekeeping team.  We certainly hope to see you back at the hotel on any future travels to Southern California.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I love the layout and how it looks.  Good location as well. The parking was a little confusion but was clarified by the staff.  Complimentary parking would have been nice.  Overall however the stay was a success.  Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Jeff, Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine and great to hear that the family found the location and layout made for a successful trip.  We hope you were able to take advantage of our complimentary breakfast and look forward to your next visit to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The best thing about this place: free breakfast in the morning. The breakfast was good with tons of options, but the rest of the hotel was just plain boring.  Sorry Embassy Suites, it just was.  I'll probably stay somewhere else next time.  OH yeah, and it didn't help that when I landed at 10pm and got to the hotel, they had no room for me and I had to sit around for 20 mins while they "found" a room for me.
Manager Response: Dear Gabriel,   Thank you for your recent stay and happy to hear that you liked the free breakfast.  We do appreciate guest feedback as a way to improve the guest experience and our service.  Our suites will take on an existing new look by the end of the year and in 2016 we will be recreating our entire atrium area.  Thank you for understanding part of our water conservation as California is in a serious drought.  The state has many mandated water regulations and beyond that we want to ensure that the hotel is doing everything possible without interruption to our valued guests.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel has everything you need.  We attended  softball tournament in Irvine so this location was perfect. Close to Costco, restaurants, Newport beach, shopping. Evening reception and daily breakfast is very generous
Manager Response: Dear Lancelotc105,  Thank you for the shout out on Super Location!  We are very happy to hear the hotel was convenient for the games and other places you visited while staying with us.  It’s great to hear you were able to enjoy the complimentary breakfast and evening reception and hope to see you back again next time your team is in town.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My family and I waited 1.5 hours for shuttle service from John Wayne International Airport to the hotel, which is five minutes away by car. We called three times to ask for the shuttle, and were assured one was on the way. If you want to be sure to get to the hotel in a timely manner, use the cab service.
Manager Response: Dear John,  We are so sorry to hear about your experience with our airport shuttle.  You are correct that it should never be more than a 10-15 minute wait and mostly it’s about 5 minutes.  Your comments were shared with our drivers and the rest of the team on how important it is to meet our guest’s airport and local transportation needs.  We do hope the rest of your stay was pleasant and that the family was able to enjoy their time.  We do hope that this doesn’t sour your decision to stay with us in the future and would definitely like to welcome you back.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Embassy Suites always delivers. We always try to stay with this brand because of the yummy hot complimentary breakfast, and also because of the room size + amenities within the rooms (microwave etc. which other hotels charge you extra for). We chose this particular hotel because of its location, which is close to our family. It's within a corporate area, so parking might seem tricky, but there is an overflow lot right next to the main garage, just ask the front desk about it if the main lot is full. We didn't get to enjoy the swimming pool because the chlorine smelled very strong, but I guess that's a good thing, for cleanliness.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle,  Thank you sincerely for being such a fantastic Embassy Suites supporting and for staying with us on your recent family visit.  We hope you had the time to relax and enjoy our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  It sounds like you may have been staying over a very busy time so we do apologize if we had recently been treating the pool when you stopped by.  We are excited to be changing over to a salt water pool system later this year.  We hope to see you back at the hotel next time in you’re in town to see family.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great Experience and a great staff!!
Summary: A perfect stay at this gem of a hotel.  Really a great staff.  Very helpful and friendly.  Great location in a very high end area with shopping and restaurants near by.  This hotel is spotless!!!  Fun little restaurant/bar and as always great breakfast and happy hour drinks.  I really recommend this hotel!!
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share.  It’s always great to hear a family adventure ends up with a memorable hotel experience.  We appreciate the great comments and glad you were able to take advantage of our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We hope if travel brings you back to Orange County that we will be seeing you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is a typical Embassy Suites, parking is a nightmare as there were not adequate spaces.  It was a bit noisy as there were several softball teams and their talking, yelling echoed through the atrium.  The fitness center had some equipment with malfunctioning electronics.  Breakfast could use some upgrades, it appeared they used the same dried up danish for 3 days.  Overall the staff was friendly.  The room was clean and in good condition.  The Internet needs improving, some sites I used could not be accessed.
Manager Response: Dear ASeasonedTravler54,  Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate your kind words for the staff’s friendliness and the accommodations.  I’ve shared your comments with our engineering department to make sure all fitness equipment is working order.  I also wanted to share with you that we are in the process of upgrading the Wi-Fi system to improve connectivity.  We hope that if travel brings you back to Orange County that we will see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Remind me again why I stay at Embassy Suites?
Summary: Only stayed overnight to catch a flight the next morning.  The hotel was nice.  The room was great - very clean and modern, comfy bed, the traditional suite that the brand is known for.  Wifi was less than stellar - I don't know why every Hilton brand I stay at has deplorable wifi access.  Breakfast was excellent as is expected.  Front desk staff was accommodating, professional, and worked with a smile.  Parking is right there at the hotel - I think it was around $15 a night.  So, why my title for the review?  The hotel is great - but every time I am at an ES I feel like most of the parents leave every aspect of politeness and parenting at home.  Kids were running around and screaming and generally unruly.  Not the fault of the hotel, but something to consider as you make your
Manager Response: Dear malawikime,  Thank you for your recent stay and that our location worked well for catching your early morning flight.  We appreciate the kind words for the accommodations and attention to cleanliness.  I did want to share that we’ve recently updated our Wi-Fi capacity and will be expanding the access points very shortly to stay with the increased demand.  We do hope that if travel brings you back to Orange County that we will see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great Oasis and great for Business Travel
Summary: A great example of classic Embassy Suites.  I was especially impressed with the size of the made to order breakfast in addition to the buffet.  There is a cool little Irish Pub in the lobby.  Service is as expected of a Hilton Property.   This place convenient to John Wayne Airport, South Coast Plaza, McCormac & Schmick's, and the local offices around the airport.
Manager Response: Dear SledMan,  Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites on your most recent business trip to Orange County.  We have a great breakfast team and so glad you were able to enjoy the cooked-to-order station.  We’re just about ready to launch a full menu change at Ha’Penny so hopefully we’ll see you back again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Friendly, helpful staff that makes you feel welcomed. All operate under the mode of "the customer is always right" The rooms are clean and well maintained and spacious. Breakfast  go beyond expectations. Manager reception was very good with healthy food options such as wraps and vegetables, coffee and teas. The pool and hot tub were clean and well maintained. The whole family had a bast! The front desk staff were super friendly and very helpful and even offered Spa water for all guest! We will be returning next month to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Fidel,  Thank you for your recent stay and we’ll be looking forward to your return stay next month.  We appreciate you taking the time to recognize the staff and very happy that the entire family had a blast.  Safe travels and we will see you soon!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Beautiful hotel, excellent service, delicious breakfast
Summary: This is a beautiful hotel with a grand downstairs with fountains and Koi ponds. The kids loved looking at the fish and turtles. The staff is very friendly and accommodating. We had to make a room change for medical reasons and they were very willing to help us. The breakfast is excellent with an omelet station, potatoes, bacon, sausage, pancakes, assorted pastries, cereal, fruit, coffee and juice. It is very popular so if you are in a hurry, go earlier in the morning. This hotel is 15 minutes from Disney and about an hour and a half from San Diego. We made day trips and it was perfect. We are very glad we chose this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear JMaggz,  Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites Hotels and we are glad to hear your most recent stay was a success.  While we have everything you enjoyed it sounds like you were at our sister property a couple miles away in Santa Ana.  We have fish but they have the Koi and turtles.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have stayed here several years in a row(5 to be exact), for multiple events from a wedding to soccer tournaments and softball tournaments. The hotel is in a great location and it is easy to get everywhere. The hotel itself is clean and the rooms are well set up so if you want to relax in your room it's peaceful and quiet, with the bedroom in the back of the suite. You really can't hear any noise and I am a light sleeper. The staff has always been amazing and helpful. Jasmine is a lifeline for our team visits and she literally goes above and beyond to accommodate everyone and make everyone happy. That's not easy with 15 families. I have also contacted Jasmine on other occasions and she is quick to respond and ALWAYS helps out even if it's not her department. The hotel staff are
Manager Response: Dear Gina,  It’s so great to hear from such a loyal guest and we appreciate all of your stays and look forward to many more.  Thank you for recognizing Jasmine Stewart in our sales department.  She’s been helping families like yours for the last 8+ years enjoy their hotel stays.  We also appreciate the kind words for the staff and glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of our great breakfast and the evening reception.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We are a family of four with two young children (3 and 10 months). This hotel was perfect for us, as we could put our kids to bed at 7:30, but still have a room to ourselves to have a beer, relax and watch a movie without sitting in dark silence. The value is incredible - the free breakfast is amazing - it has something for just about every eater. We didn't take advantage of the Manager's Reception in the evening as it didn't really have much to offer us, but another great addition to the hotel. Just a couple of low points: super noisy the first night of our stay (Saturday night) when a large number of families with older kids were in town for a baseball event (they were loud in the reception area until 11p when quiet hours were enforced), but VERY quiet on our other nights
Manager Response: Dear Ryan,  Thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  It’s great to hear that the suite worked well for the family and we do apologize that the crib was not placed in the room prior to your check-in.  It’s great to hear your family enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and that the location worked well for your visit to Orange County.  We hope travel brings you back our way in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great Value for a Great Hotel Experience
Summary: This hotel was an older version of Embassy Suites models but it was extremely well kept and updated.  The value proposition was the same good value that all Embassy Suites provide.  The staff was very friendly and very willing to help make the stay a nice one.
Manager Response: Dear L WL,  Thank you for taking the time to recognize the staff and the hotel.  We’re glad to hear that our complimentary breakfast and evening reception added to the overall value of your stay.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Erwin was excellent during the check in process. The remainder of the staff was absolutely fabulous and when returning to the area i will definitely consider this location again. The food was very very very good in the mooring I am a diabetic and I was able to ear with no problems.
Manager Response: Dear Sheila,  Thank you for your recent stay and for recognizing Erwin at our Front Desk.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and it’s especially great to hear that the breakfast team was able to meet your dietary needs.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Booked a 3 night stay beginning Thursday.  On Friday, the hotel became Soccer Central.  Kids running through the halls, no control from the hotel staff.  It was ridiculous.  I will never stay at this Embassy Suites again - and probably none of the others.
Manager Response: Dear Evansmme,  We are very sorry to hear that your stay was affected by some of our younger guests.  The hotel contracts additional security over high occupancy days to help ensure that all of our guests have an enjoyable stay.  I’d be very happy to speak with you personally and please do contact me directly at the hotel if we can continue this conversation.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: I love this hotel.  Stayed here a few times before and I keep coming  back.  The suites are very spacious and comfortable.  Whether it be used for a single, a couple or a small family; you can't miss.  The hotel is very modern and conviently located near SNA  Airport.  The breakfast was very good and they offer made to order omlets.  In the evening  the happy hour features nice wines and drinks free for guests.  The interior view is very open and scenic.  You will love the hotel, the staff and tthe food.
Manager Response: Dear Nate,  Thank you for continuing to come back and support the hotel.  We really appreciate your loyalty and taking time to share your experience.  Glad to hear you have been able to take advantage f our complimentary breakfast and we look forward to welcoming you back again to the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: The Best Hotel in Southern California
Summary: This hotel has excellent suites. They are clean, nice, and smell fresh. There is complimentary breakfast that has fruits, cereals, eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes, yogurt, oatmeal, coffee and tea.  In the evening complementary alcoholic drinks and cocktails. The best staff that is there to cater to your every need. We stay every time we go to Irvine area and that is quite often.
Manager Response: Dear Niki,  Welcome back and thank you for making the Embassy Suites Irvine your place to stay!  We appreciate the great review and mostly the shout out to our team for making it happen.  We hope to see you back really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The Embassy Suites Irvine is a great place to stay, especially for large groups and families. We have stayed here twice, and the staff is fantastic. I would definitely recommend this property if you are in the area (I consider this location one of the nicer Embassy Suites). The rooms are clean, and spacious. There is a large living room, with a fold-out bed and a back bedroom with a separate door-the bathroom separates the two. To put it in perspective, the back bedroom alone is the typical size of most hotel rooms, so I feel for families, the extra living room space is wonderful. It was clean too, and I’m a stickler for cleanliness at hotels. Breakfast is also included and is one of the best. We have stayed at other hotel chains which offer “free breakfast”, but the food is
Manager Response: Dear AH858,  Thank you for your recent stay and bringing the family back to the Embassy Suites Irvine.  We appreciate the loyalty and personal recommendation.  We very much appreciate the awesome five star review and hotel much detail you’ve provided.  As always, we love hearing the great stories about the team members and service at the hotel.  We hope to see you back real soon the next time you’re in the area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I love the room breakfast and happy hour but I definitely loved the staff more! They were all so friendly and were so nice during our entire stay. We went with our friends during the Spartan Races. We just decided to book in Irvine because we were familiar with the area. The hotel is not really walking distance to any restaurants but if you have a car driving is less then 10 minutes. Thank you for making our stay an enjoyable one.
Manager Response: Dear Tinetina77,  Thank you for staying with us for the Spartan Races and bringing friends.  We very glad to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and evening reception and most importantly thank you for acknowledging the staff.  We’re so glad the team made your stay and hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: If there is information that will cause a guest less inconvenience, they should be informed.  My experience was that I should have known what to ask.  As an example of one of our problem, we should have asked if there are elevators at each parking level.  I had no way of knowing to ask such a question since I have never checked into a hotel with no elevators in the parking lot before!
Manager Response: Dear Esther,  We appreciate your recent stay and are sorry to hear about your parking experience.  The hotel does share a common parking structure with two other office buildings and it is located behind our building.  I’ve shared your comments with our front office team to make sure we are communicating about the best process of checking in and out that eliminate any inconvenience of moving between the parking structure and the hotel.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel has friendly staff.  Clean place with up to date furnishings.  Hotel gym was slightly disappointing with limited weight training equipment.  Overall nice hotel with great location and close to many points of interest in the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Dear Peter,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate the kind words for the staff, accommodations and location in Irvine.  We do listen to our guest feedback and are always looking at opportunities to improve the guest experience.  We do hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine next time you are traveling to Orange County.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stay at this Embassy Suites every time I travel to Laguna for business.  Its location is fantastic - right down the street from JW Airport - the evening reception is top-notch, and the rooms are always perfect.  I can't say enough about Embassy Suites in general, but this one ranks close to the top!
Manager Response: Dear William,  We would definitely like to thank you for your continued loyalty and the awesome 5 star review.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments and will look forward to your next trip to Orange County.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have regular visits to the orange county area and even though this hotel is a little further from my work location, I prefer to stay here because of the overall package they deliver. Thet staff is always attentive and you can tell they are treated well by their management as they pass that attitude along to us customers. I especially appreciate the cleanliness and operating condition of the hotel as well as the fun manager's reception and breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Kirk,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and very kind comments regarding the staff and accommodations.  We certainly appreciate that you drive the extra mile just to stay with us and we’re looking forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is located in good location easy to reach any freeways and any destination. The breakfast is good and they have sanks at the evening starting from 5 pm. Rooms are dark and bath is old; need to renewal.  The hotel sysetm did duplicate transaction to my credit card on the second day of my stay while the person on the front desk already reserve the whole amount of my stay from the first day.  I went to the front desk who explain that there is a miss through thier system and the amount will be released to me after applying the payment. The good thing i recieve sms for any transactions applied to my credit card otherwise won't find that until i retain back home. The room lights too dark and suites are samll than what looks in real.  Staff service is good however all the
Manager Response: Dear Thamer,  We really appreciate your recent visit to our hotel and I sincerely apologize for the system error and am glad that it was corrected before your departure.  Thank you again for taking the time to speak with me directly and I did want to let you  know that I reviewed your comment, as we do with all guest feedback, stressing our value of being a top performing hotel with the best service.  We really hope that if you are traveling back to Orange County that we will have the privilege of welcoming you back to our property.  Please don’t hesitate to contact me anytime at the hotel for assistance.  Sincerely, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary Heading: Great Value & Space for Large Family
Summary: This property was just what we needed for our large family of 6 and we were very pleased overall with the location, price and amenities.  Some highlights of our experience:  Airport Shuttle: Once we called from the airport the shuttle was there in a flash.  We were told about 15 minutes and it was maybe only 5 minutes.  The driver was friendly and helpful.  When we checked out the shuttle was ready to whisk us to the airport with no issues.
