Check in/check out: I've stayed at many hotels over the years and this has to be the quickest check in ever!  In no time I had my room keys and the agent told me about the amenities and breakfast and we were up in our room.  This hotel offers express checkout which was nice and easy.  Room: The room was a good size and felt comfortable for
Manager Response: Dear Christina,  Thank you so much for the awesome Five Star review.  It’s always great to hear such positive feedback and we’re glad to hear that the family got to experience so much of the property amenities.  We do hope the family travels back to Orange County in the future and greatly appreciate the Family recommendation.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel was very crowded and noisy, the hallways and downstairs eating/lounge area very noisy during manager's reception and late at night, the parking availability was poor, and the hotel is quite pricey.  Except for the staff, the quality was less than what we expected.
Manager Response: Dear David,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We do appreciate the kind words regarding the staff and do apologize for nay noise disturbance during your stay.  Our parking structure can get pretty busy over weekends; however, we do have access to overflow into the upper floors.  We do hope that you may consider the Embassy Suites Irvine for future travel to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our family continues to come back here for the large rooms (we have 3 kids), and the breakfast. It is one of the few complimentary hotel breakfasts that I know my kids will enjoy eating.  Even when we travel to different sport tournaments and the hotel is filled with kids the rooms are quiet, and you are able to sleep comfortably.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher,  Thank you so much for bringing the family back to our Hotel.  It’s great to hear the suite accommodations work out well for the family and that the kids love our complimentary breakfast.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Have stayed here many times and this hotel always delivers...great location, clean and modern guest rooms, great amenities, and attentive staff.  Evening receptions and morning breakfasts are outstanding.
Manager Response: Dear Steve,  Thank you so much for your continued loyalty and bringing your business to the Embassy Suites Irvine.  We appreciate the kind comments about accommodations, amenities and our staff.  We’ll be looking forward to your next business trip to Irvine and thank you for sharing this experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: very clean room and the beds where great. easy parking and a great drink reception. the breakfast was very good.the layout of the hotel works great. there is a great restaurant across the street. elevators worked great and we had a room near one and you can not hear them.
Manager Response: Dear Lvtwoeat,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share your experience and the great comments.  We definitely appreciate the kind words and glad you found one of the fantastic restaurants close by the hotel.  If travel brings you back to Orange County we hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed with a group of friends and family during a cheer competition in Anaheim . Hotel is very nice inside has the whole tropical feel. Rooms are nice  and real roomy , that extra room is awesome . We really enjoyed the managers reception at night with free drinks ! Pool is small and indoors but very clean .very short drive from Anaheim and was cheaper than hotels by Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Rchavoya,  It’s so great to hear that your group enjoyed your time at the Embassy Suites Irvine and we are a great alternative to the Anaheim area yet just a short drive.  Thank you for the very nice comments regarding our guest suites, complimentary breakfast and the awesome evening reception.  We hope if travel brings you back to Orange County to see you back at the hotel again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Minor Hiccups, But No Real Issues
Summary: I stayed here with my family because we love the Embassy Suites hotels. It is worth every penny for the room, plus the manager's reception, and the complimentary breakfast. There was an issue when I came back to the hotel to park my vehicle for the night (some event was going on in the lobby), but the staff was helpful in directing me where to park and ensured I would get out of the other parking structure with ease. The stay was pleasant as always and the staff, regardless of which Embassy Suites, is always helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Sara,  Thank you for bringing the family and thank you so much for your continued support of Embassy Suites.  We’re happy to hear it was a pleasant stay and very happy to hear that the staff was accommodating to get you in the overflow parking structure.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Embassy Suites, Dyer Rd, Orange County, CA
Summary: Nice hotel, comfortable rooms, food in sports bar was reasonable-pricey & okay. I stayed overnight with daughter n 2 grandchildren in a 2 queen bed room with sofa sleeper (for kids). We were not crowded and  breakfast is provided. Staff at breakfast was The Best!!
Manager Response: Dear DaisyS01,  Sounds like you had a great time at our sister Embassy Suites Hotel in Santa Ana.  We do hope you come back to Orange County in the future and stay at any of our Embassy Suites Hotel’s.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My suite was clean and spacious, the bed was very comfortable. Beautiful atrium area and good breakfast. Room service food was excellent. Would like bottle openers in the room and also the lighting in the room seemed a little too dim. Will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Corey,  Thank you for staying with us on your most recent business trip.  We appreciate the kind comments and so glad to hear it was a great stay.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine on your next trip.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We were in town for a wedding and to visit friends. The typical suite at Embassy Suites is like home and this was no exception. The totally separate living room and bedroom allow visitors to live normally. The bed was exquisite and my wife and I slept like babies.The complimentary made-to-order breakfasts were as good as any commercial breakfast restaurant. Employees were exceptionally polite, housekeepers were professional and thorough, late dinner room service was quick and excellent. A complete A+
Manager Response: Dear DelPeggy,  We are so happy that you chose the Embassy Suites Irvine for you recent trip to Orange County.  It’s great to hear how the spacious suites made you feel a little more at home and glad to hear that you slept like babies.  If travel brings you back to Southern California we hope to see you back at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have been telecommuting to Irvine, CA for over three years, spending 20+ weeks there a year. In that time I have tried several different hotels but I keep coming back to the Embassy because of their friendly staff, great food and the overall value.  If you find yourself needing a hotel in Irvine, I strongly recommend the Embassy!
Manager Response: Dear Dwayne,  Thank you so much for your continued loyalty to the Embassy Suites Irvine.  20+ weeks a year for three years is a huge testament and the staff greatly appreciates hearing such positive feedback.  We’re looking forward to your next stay already.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: As a business traveler, on the road most of the year, I appreciate clean spacious rooms, a good breakfast and mostly how I am treated by the staff.  Embassy Suites, just around the corner from John Wayne Airport in Orange Co. Calif. is my first choice. I often travel here and have stayed at the Marriott, Residence Inn, Spring Hill Suites and a few others.  Although I can't complain too much about the others, the Embassy Suites is now my hotel of choice. Their morning breakfast isn't just a buffet, it has cooks preparing you whatever kind of omelet, french toast, eggs any way you like 'em, and all the bacon and sausage you can eat...mmmm. Their staff is outstanding.  Professional looking and acting.  Jordana and Lawrence working check-in always give me a warm fuzzy feeling
Manager Response: Dear Paul,  Thank you so much for the team recognition and it’s just awesome to hear that we are your first choice for travel to Irvine/Orange County.  We will certainly share and celebrate your review with the staff and greatly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience.  We’re looking forward to your next and every stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: As a professional business executive I travel extensively and was totally impressed with this hotel.  Not only were the rates acceptable, but the quality experienced was in the top ten of my many stays.
Manager Response: Dear Ernest, Wow!  It’s just such a great feeling to open our TripAdvisor page and see such great five star feedback.  Thank you so much for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine on your most recent business trip and we look forward to remaining part of your top ten.  Until next time, safe travels.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The Embassy Suites is an excellent place to stay for business or pleasure. The rooms are spacious, well equipped and very quiet. The staff is great and if you go there, be sure to say hi to Art, Patty and Ascension in Ha' Penny Pub, Daniel, Lawrence and the front desk crew and Mike the driver!
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for your recent stay and awesome comments.  Thank you for bringing your business to the Embassy Suites Irvine and we’re happy to share your comments to all the team members you’ve mentioned above.  Looking forward to your next trip into Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The shuttle drivers and welcoming staff were very helpful when I arrived.  I was feeling bad with a terrible headache and they all got me in a room quickly.  Later, they sent someone up to bring more pillows to choose from.  The made-to-order breakfast was awesome.
Manager Response: Dear Kirk,  Thank you for recognizing our shuttle driver and front desk staff.  We are glad to have had the opportunity to help make your day a little more comfortable and we hope the rest of the stay was beyond expectation.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine on your next trip to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Close to Airport, FREE Food, Clean
Summary: The hotel has friendly staff that are very helpful.  There are a couple of restaurants in walking distance from the hotel within a 5 minute walk. Hotel is practically right next to the airport, but is very quiet.  Airport is about a 5 minute drive away, 2 miles.  Indoor pool, average gym.  Nice complimentary snack and drinks in the evening!
Manager Response: Dear Chris,  We are very happy to hear about such a great experience.  Thank you for recognizing the staff’s helpfulness and glad that our location and hotel amenities exceeded your expectations.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine on your next trip to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: the amenities were great. The reception a nice treat and totally unexpected.  Breakfast was outstanding. Plenty of quality food and a helpful and courteous staff. I would recommend it for business or pleasure. Very family friendly.
Manager Response: Dear George,  Thank you so much for sharing these great comments.  It’s always nice to see the staff recognized and we greatly appreciate the referral.  We do hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Decent hotel, disappointing and unusual visit
Summary: I stayed here for one night in April 2014. I was in LA for business and stopped in Irvine to visit family. I chose this hotel because of brand and proximity to the freeway and my family. The hotel was pretty good, clean, updated. The staff seemed nice. The breakfast and happy hour were quality (Free drinks and breakfast; what's not to like!). I was able to check in early which I really appreciated!  I have a couple complaints:  I reserved a double bed studio room; wrong move. The room was nice but much smaller than the website picture let on. When I looked up the room online to make sure I got what I had reserved, I noticed that I paid some $30 more than what it was advertised for that day.... not cool, ES, especially when I booked in advance.   I also had to move furniture
Manager Response: Dear Taxmdtravler,  Thank you for sharing your experience and I’m very sorry that we fell below your expectations.  We take all commentary very seriously and I have meet with our department heads to discuss your stay and our service commitment.  I would very much like to speak with you about your stay and an opportunity to Make this Right.  We sincerely hope to have the opportunity to bring you back in one of our spacious two-room suites and please contact me directly at any time.  My email is Swietlana.Cahill2@hilton.com and my direct office number is 949-705-5151.   Best regards,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Our room was entered, unannounced, by an employee in the middle of the night and management would not speak directly with us about the incident.  SCARY when a male employee enters your room in the middle of the night, unannounced, for no reason and management sidesteps the issue and lies about it!!
Manager Response: Dear Mr. C.  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay. Please accept our sincere apologies for falling short of your expectations.  Please know that the safety and security our guests and associates is our number one priority.  I do appreciate that you were able to meet with me the following morning to discuss the incident in person.  Based on our conversation we did review the hotels safety and security policy with our associates.  Once again I’m very sorry for any inconvenience we may have caused during your stay. Please contact me directly if you have any additional questions or comments.   Warm Regards,  John Pease Front Office Manager 949-553-8332

Summary Heading: Average Hotel in comparison to other chains
Summary: Overall the hotel was OK.  It didn't not exceed my expectations as I expected it would being a member of the Hilton Family.  My room did have Hypoallergenic bed linens which was good since I am very allergic to goose and duck feathers.  The work space was rather small and uncomfortable but the noise level was low.  I am figuring because I was placed in a room away from the the highway.  The cleaning staff did forget a couple of times to replenish the coffee, creamer, and sugar supplies even though I left everything laid out where they could see it was needed, but I survivied and it was really no big deal.  The resturant was just mediocre, but since there are a few resturants in walking distance and basically right next door it was no big deal.  I would have really liked to have
Manager Response: Dear SurvivalGirl,  Thank you so much for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We are glad to hear that the location was very convenient to your local office and that breakfast was enjoyable and had the right mix of healthy.  We do apologize that our housekeeping missed the coffee refresh and your comments have been shared with the department head.  Based on the work space description you may have been in one of our guest studios which make up less than 6% of our total inventory.  We do hope to see you back at the hotel on your next trip in one of our spacious guest suites.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We are Hilton Honors members, and this is our favorite stay when we visit family in OC, but the last visit put us off just a bit, in regards to the breakfast.   Our first morning, the buffet was filled with the usual assortment of eggs, bacon, sausage and all the other things we have known to be a part of the buffet...however on the following days, with groups of team sport families, the meat things were missing.  If you are going to "placate" those for one reason or another  that don't "do pork" I think you owe it to the rest of your guests an explanation why those things are missing from your breakfast buffet.   There was no alternative for the rest of us.
Manager Response: Dear Ivinjxnhole,  We certainly appreciate that we are your favorite stay when visiting family in Orange County.  I will be sharing your comments with our Food & Beverage team as we do have the complete breakfast available seven days a week so we will want to dig into what happened over your stay.  Thank you for sharing and we hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine the next time you are visiting family.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Finally an Updated (corp travel approved) Hotel in OC
Summary: Super glad to find this Embassy Suites. I'm in the area for business at least monthly and have bounced among a handful of the usual suspects of economy-corp approved chains.    This one is by far the most recently updated including lobby and in room furniture, gym equipment and restaurant bar area.  The bright atrium, a signature of Embassy doesn't disappoint with rich colors, ample seating, flat screenTVs, etc.  Close to the airport and convienamt to plenty of restaurants, I've found spot for business trips.
Manager Response: Dear Jaime K,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your experience.  It’s always great to read on TripAdvisor that a frequent business traveler like your self has found us and made it their go to place when coming to Irvine/Orange County.  We appreciate the great comments and look forward to you and all of your fellow business travelers returning to the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: The hits keep coming! Just what I would expect from this chain.
Summary: I stayed here two nights and wished it were longer. Front Desk was very helpful in answering questions, at least after my initial check-in during which the staff member asked me the same questions several times. I thought she might have been kidding me but more likely she was about to get off work and was distracted.   This is a great location 5 minutes from the airport and on the main thoroughfare aptly named Main Street. There are several restaurants within walking distance including a gourmet burger place and a Mc Cormick's across the street. (I reviewed this restaurant separately, but to save you a search I suggest you try the burger place).   This is a place you're sure to like, the breakfast bar is excellent, the rooms clean (with a scenic view of the covered parking lot)
Manager Response: Dear SoundviewWest,  Thank you for your recent stay and we wish it could have been longer than two days as well.  We appreciate the great comments and hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here two nights on business. Free breakfast and manager’s reception and I didn’t like either, always a cattle call but that’s not the hotel’s fault, there was a good selection of food.  Lots of business travelers, very convenient to the local Irvine businesses.  Comfortable bed, surprisingly good food in the restaurant.  Had room service too and that was excellent.  Good climate control in the room, great bed, great tv.  I noticed something that many people would often overlook - this is an atrium-design hotel, all the rooms face the center atrium and the restaurant (breakfast tables) are located within a lush planting of well-maintained and healthy plants, it was kind of surprising to see how healthy and well-tended they were.  Someone is really doing a good job with
Manager Response: Dear FamilleSB,  Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate your comments.  It’s great to hear that you found a nice selection of the breakfast and very happy to pass along to the F&B team your dining experience at both Ha’Penny and room service.  We employee a full time team member that takes care of the hotels plants and its especially nice to hear the great comment.  We have a complete recycling program at the hotel and our suite keepers are trained to support all efforts.  We hope to see you again back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here before our visit to UC Irvine. Whenever I travel, I try to stay at an Embassy Suites. The  rooms are spacious and comfortable and the hotels are just beautiful. The beds were semi-firm and had many pillows. The room was clean and spacious. The only part of the room I'm a little disappointed about is the bathroom. This room doesn't have a separate vanity and sink from the shower. That would allow several people to get ready at the same time. Other than that, everything else was great.
Manager Response: Dear David M,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your comments.  We’re glad to hear the Embassy Suites continues to deliver for your hotel stays.  We appreciate the feedback and hop to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I was in town on business. The hotel itself was modern and clean.  As a business traveller it was disappointing that I had to pay extra for the WIFI service even though I am a Silver level HHonors member, especially when  the WIFI signal was on and off, and weak when it was on.  We ordered hot chocolate one night through room service.  A half hour later I had to call back to see if it was coming, after which they brought it right away.  When we got it, It was cold and hadn't even been stirred, so much that when I did stir it, the dry powder came to the surface.  By this time room service was closed, but they did offer to take it off the bill. As we thought we weren't getting good value for our money we called down to the front desk and told them that we were checking out a few
Manager Response: Dear Derek N.,   Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your stay. I was very sorry to learn that we were unable and resolve your service concerns, before you departed. I have shared your comments with my team and I can assure you that we will all work extremely hard to correct these issues you've pointed out  so they do not occur in the future.      If you should have the time, I would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you personally and discuss your stay.  I'm sure that I will be able to make it right for you and maybe even win you back as a fan of our Embassy Suites.   Please feel free to contact me with any additional comments or suggestions you may have in the future.    Warmest Regards, John Pease  Front Office Manager Embassy Suites John.Pease@hilton.com  949-553-8332

Summary Heading: Great Front Desk and Restaurant Personnel
Summary: Front desk personnel were very welcoming and friendly. Restaurant hostess is very friendly and seems to remember returning guests.  She's always smiling and greats every visitor with a nice welcome.  While suites could use some updating,the rooms are clean and the happy hour each night seems to bring energy to the main floor. Families like this hotel too as rooms are suites and like happy hour, breakfast is included each day.
Manager Response: Dear Great2TravelCA,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share your comments.  We really appreciate hearing the service comments for our front desk and restaurant.  It’s also great to hear you were able to enjoy our free breakfast and happy hour.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My wife and I stayed for only one night and overall the experience was very good.  I stay at many Embassy Suites and I would rate this in the top quartile.  It is clean, contemporary, and the décor is updated.   Two negatives:  1) the parking situation is not very good.  You have to park in a structure behind the hotel and it is not very convenient.  For a couple of bucks more, you may just want to valet. 2)  the breakfast buffet is not set up as well as other Embassy Suites. One big positive:  The layout of the room has the bed on a diagonal that angles it towards the big picture window.  On a high floor, we were able to leave the drapes open and see the lights of the city with complete privacy.  It was really nice.  Ask to be placed on a high floor on the "hypotenuse" of the
Manager Response: Dear Ken T,  Thank you for your recent stay and we’re glad to hear that you and your wife had an enjoyable stay.  It’s great to hear such nice comments and thank you for rating the hotel towards the top of the brand.  We hope to see you again back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great hotel...rooms have been updated and are very nice.  Complimentary breakfast and manager reception are very good; the staff is excellent.  I would recommend this hotel for business travel.  It is an excellent location.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen M,  Thank you for you loyalty to the Embassy Suites Irvine and we appreciate the great feedback regarding accommodations and breakfast.  The team appreciates the recognition and recommendation and we’re looking forward to your next stay.  Until then, safe travels.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Note: When rating properties I try to rate them against other similar hotels (so other Embassy Suites or same): this means that this is a 3 for this type of property, not a 3 compared to say, a Motel 6.  So this is a decent property, just not as nice as other Embassy Suites.  There just wasn't anything special about this property.  It feels a bit dark and frankly, it kind of made me depressed to be in it.  Part of that vibe is the fact that this is a straight up BUSINESS hotel.  It is in the heart of businesses in the Santa Ana area and really just seemed to be a bit dated.  The rooms were of course suites and nice.  But really, it is the feeling that the hotel gave me that gives it a 2.  Perhaps it is just the fact that it is such a business hotel that kind of drives that
Manager Response: Dear ILikeCheckingBags,  Thank you choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine on your most recent trip.  We appreciate the feedback and thank you for the great comments regarding our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We are always looking to provide the best ambiance an accommodations and thank you for taking time to share your experience.  We do hope you will consider the Embassy Suites Irvine on any future trips to Orange County.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We chose this location to be close to Huntington Beach.  It is a really nicely appointed hotel.  It was very clean and in good condition throughout.  Our room was very nice.  It was a little odd having the living room "picture window" looking out on the hallway, but this an atrium hotel.  We didn't have any issues with noise or unruly teenagers, even though there were a few sports teams staying.  The breakfast was ready right on schedule and the employees were very courteous.  We would stay again.  Just as a side note, there aren't really any shops or restaurants within walking distance...One steak place across the street.  Otherwise, you would need a car.  Also, unless I missed it, there is no way to get into the hotel from the parking ramp other than walking back outside and
Manager Response: Dear welltraveled2008,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share your experience.  We’re glad to hear that the services and accommodations were pleasing and our location near Huntington Beach worked out well.  There’s a lot to do in Orange County so we hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine should travel bring you to Southern California.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Was here for business trip in June 2014.  Unfortunately it must have coincided with graduation weekend at the local high school and of all the places the kids decided to stay, the entire school was in the room next to me.  They were loud, constantly walking in and out of the room with booze, and slamming the front door each time.  I could hear every word they were saying through the paper thin walls.  I called the front desk multiple times to complain and each time they said they would send security up, but they never did because the noise continued into the wee hours of the morning.  I was very exhausted going to work the next day and disappointed with the lack of responsiveness from the staff in dealing with rowdy customers.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Shellster1  Thank you for taking time to share your experience from last year.  I am sorry to hear that you had noise issues as the hotel does have a strict no party policy.  We do sincerely apologize that your stay was interrupted and if I can provide assistance with any future travel please contact me directly at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Worst customer service ever at a Hilton property
Summary: I exclusively stay at Hilton properties every week  (diamond member) and I   have always had great experiences until this one at the Embassy Suites in Irvine CA. The most unfriendly staff I have ever experienced  I suggest that no one stays here, I will stay at the a Marriott on my next trip
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Rodneybell  I am very sorry to hear that you did not have a great experience at the hotel.  I would very much like to find out specifics and can be reached anytime at Swietlana.cahill2@hilton.com or 949-705-5151.  We appreciate your Hilton loyalty and would like the opportunity to hear about any issues so we can make this right.  Best regards, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Reserved a room to stay at while visiting family in Irvine.    The stay was part of a vacation.   Overall the rooms were clean, well appointed.   Staff friendly,  the breakfast was fresh; well presented, and included a broad range of options.  From omelets to order or a more simple fruit and coffee choice.   But. ..   I requested the "Arrival Package" of strawberries,  mineral water to be waiting for my wife when she checked in.  She would be arriving before my arrival.     No arrival package,   even after I reminded the front desk twice       The wifi is charged for even if you are a loyalty member.     The parking is a ridiculous charge and in an adjoining structure so if it is raining bring an umbrella.   Overall the beds comfortable,  rooms clean, housekeeping and resturant
Manager Response: Dear Jim,  Thank you for your recent stay and choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine while visiting family.  We are glad to hear that the accommodations and breakfast were up to par.  I’m very sorry to hear that your arrival package was not executed.  Please note that I have reviewed this with our staff including an updated procedure for pre-arrival requests so this does not happen again.  Please reach out to me directly if I can assist with any future reservations and please know we want to make this right.  You can reach me anytime at Swietlana.Cahill2@hilton .com or by calling the hotel.  Sincerely, Swietlana General Manager

Summary: The suite was very spacious and very clean. The front desk staff was very helpful and courteous. The complimentary breakfast had a number of items to choose from and had many healthy options.  We arrived very late in the night and had a good meal at the restaurant, which was open till 11 PM.
Manager Response: Dear Partha,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome five star review.  We are so happy to hear that it was a great stay and that you had fantastic dining experiences both at our complimentary breakfast and our Ha’Penny restaurant.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Woke up to water dripping on me from the room above (6 am).  Moved to another room and asked if the manager would adjust my invoice.  Upon checkout - not adjusted.  Asked to speak with the manager, apparently 9 am is too early for him to work.  Left my info for him to call - never heard from him.  Called back the following week, left another message - never heard from him.
Manager Response: Dear Steelhost,  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience and overall stay experience.  I very much appreciate being able to speak with you about the incident and do please contact me directly at the hotel if we can continue our conversation.  It’s our top priority to deliver a top customer experience and Make it Right.   Best regards, John Pease Front Office Manager 949-553-8332

Summary: Very nice stay, room clean, nice happy hour and friendly staff. Tasty complimentary breakfast with hot options and omelette bar. Good location near airport. Beds are comfy, sattelite tv service was a little skippy. Check in was fast and very efficient because checked in online as a Hton honors member.
Manager Response: Dear Angelia,  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine on your most recent business trip.  We appreciate the great comments and especially our friendly staff.  It’s great to hear that the accommodations and complimentary breakfast were spot on and we hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Business hotel, rooms are comfortable and spacious. Friendly staff. Value for money not okay, breakfast was dissapointing if not worse. Sterile atmosphere. WiFi not for free. Realy close to JohnWayne AirPort.
Manager Response: Dear JJAA54,  Thank you for your recent stay.  We appreciate the kind words regarding our spacious accommodations, location and friendly staff.  We are sorry to hear that our complimentary breakfast missed the mark on your stay.  We are always open to new ideas to improve our dining experience and hope that you will consider staying with us again if travel brings you back to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Those familiar with Embassy Suites know its an excellent brand by Hilton.  The spacious accommodations, free breakfast and evening reception make it the best in my mind.  I stay at this particular location every other week for business and it truly is my home away from home.  I've never been disappointed at any Embassy Suites hotel...anywhere!
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for the awesome five star review and we sincerely appreciate your continued loyalty.  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and it makes us so happy to hear that we are your “home away from home.”  Looking forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed 4 nights at embassy hotel , one night room was not serviced at all, no towel , no sheets, garbage still in the room, ....Front desk did not help either. Next day after  I complained to the manager, he offered to give one night at 1/2 off, but he never fulfilled his promise . Dirty room something but don't offer something that you are not going to fulfill.
Manager Response: Dear HDakhah,  Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your December stay.  We hope that you enjoyed your four night stay and we do apologize that your room was not serviced on one of those days.  We have reviewed your comments with our operations team stressing the importance of follow through.  If there is anything we can assist with please feel free to contact us at any time.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The option of 2 queen beds with the suite was a great option for our family. Dining area is very open and pleasant, with a variety of seating options. Food was delicious! This will be our place of choice for future stays in OC>
Manager Response: Dear Kevin,  Thank you for your recent stay and we’re so glad to hear the family loved the two queen bed suite.  We appreciate the great comments regarding our food service and we are looking forward to your next stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed at this hotel last year.  While I was in California I lost a valuable and sentimental value ring.  It never occurred to me that I might have lost it in my hotel room.  As it turns out, Housekeeping found the ring sometime later and placed it in Lost and Found.  Luis Perez, the Housekeeping Manager conducted an investigation and was able to find me by markings inside the ring.  I was surprised when I got his call.  I have my ring back and new-found appreciation for Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: Dear Bill,  Thank you for sharing your story.  The entire hotel team was so excited that Luis was able to connect the dots based on the engraving and get your ring back to where it belongs.  If travel brings you back to Southern California we hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Some great things and others not so good.
Summary: Bathroom was not clean and the room itself did not have a desk to work from, however the evening reception and staff were great.  The location with respect to the Orange County airport can not be beat.
Manager Response: Dear Gail,  Thank you for your recent stay.  We are very glad to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary evening reception and that the location was perfect.  We are sorry to hear that you experienced some housekeeping issues and your incident has been discussed as part of our ongoing training.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall quality and experience was great. The managers reception and cook to order breakfast is well worth it. The location for business in the Irvine area and John Wayne Airport is convenient. I would stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Timothy,  Thank you for your recent business stay and we’re very glad to hear you had a wonderful experience.  Thank you so much for sharing your experience and we hope your business brings you back to the Embassy Suites Irvine very soon.  Until then, safe travels.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Staff & management were very welcoming & accommodating. Although we encounter some problems during our vacation the hotel staff and everyone there made it there all to Make it right for us. Overall our stay was awesome
Manager Response: Dear Anna,  Thanks bringing the family down and staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  We greatly appreciate the five star review and hearing your comments about our staff and accommodations.  Thank you for staying with us and for allowing us to Make it Right!  We hope to see you back soon at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My wife and I love this hotel due to its available refrigerator, microwave, and complementary breakfast and Happy Hour times. The rooms are great and the staff are courteous. There are times something is not quite right about a room and the staff react swiftly to any concern.
Manager Response: Dear Gregg,  It’s so great to hear how much you and your wife love to come visit us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  We appreciate the awesome five star review and it’s always great to hear the staff is taking great care of our guests.  It’s always our motto to Make it Right!  We look forward to seeing you back soon at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great location, comfortable beds and the awesome breakfasts
Summary: Located just off the 405 freeway the hotel is centrally located for the attractions in and around the Irvine/OC area, including the airport. The staff are super friendly, the rooms are very clean and spacious and the beds are very comfortable. The Ha'Penny Inn is a small but nice addition to the hotel and serves some good beer. On the downside, the manager's reception is limited to Bud and Bud Light plus wines. If not free, a discount on the good stuff would   The breakfast is the usual Embassy Suites offering of made to order omelette plus all the fixings but the one bizarre thing on the weekend was that you had to join the made to order line to get bacon and sausage. Usually these are in the self-serve area with the eggs and potatoes so that was a pain having to wait with the
Manager Response: Dear Si405,  Thank you for bringing the family on your recent Orange County visit.  We’re glad you choose the Embassy Suites Irvine and that the location worked out very well.  We appreciate your thoughts on the food and beverage operations and have talked this over with our team.  Just wanted to mention that the complimentary evening reception not only offers free beer and wine but also a full array of cocktails, juices and soft drinks if available.    We hope if travel brings you back to our area that we will see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I wish there was much easier access from garage into hotel without steps.  Must walk in the driveway up and down if you have luggage and can't pick it up. Love the hotel for all other areas of business stay.
Manager Response: Dear Ikosbo,  Thank you for your recent stay and the very nice comments.  We’re sorry to hear that parking may have poised any kind of challenge for your stay.  On any future stay please feel free to drop your luggage with our front desk or the van drivers to assist while parking a vehicle in the structure.  We definitely want to make everything as easy as possible.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The price is very reasonable. The rooms are huge and the living area is perfect to hang out and relax. The managers receptions is the best part about staying at Embassy Suites, free drinks. The breakfast in the morning is always good. I love staying here just to get away from everything for a day.
Manager Response: Dear Bernie,  Thank you making the Embassy Suites Irvine your location for a quick getaway.  We are glad to hear the spacious suites were perfect for relaxing and always great to hear the evening reception was a big hit.  Glad you were able to enjoy the complimentary breakfast and we look forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: A little disappointed. While the bed and pillow was comfortable and room was quiet, there were a few negatives; -Shower mold -Shower head 5 1/2 high - this really stinks when you're -6 feet tall -Very small fitness center for a hotel this size
Manager Response: Dear Mylzez2Go,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share your comments.  While were very glad to hear about the comfort of the suite it was disappointing to hear we fell short on the housekeeping end.  We reviewed your comment with the housekeeping team stressing the importance of maintaining our high standards.  We hope that if you are traveling to the area again that we will have a second opportunity to make this right at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Nice place. Good breakfast. Crazy busy with water polo tournament in the area.   Rooms seemed small and weird shape for ES  My only suggestion is to be more consistent with parking.  Sometimes open and sometimes need room key. Then once Checked out needed key to exit and already gave it to desk.    There is a very nice decanter for fruit flavored water. It was empty the entire 3 days we were there. Plenty of ice but always empty. At 9am one day I asked the desk said we refill it at 11.  ?????
Manager Response: Dear Brucerap,  Thank you for your recent stay and glad to hear you felt the hotel was a great value.  We do apologize that you had some challenges with parking and I;ve also shared your comments regarding our lobnby water station to the Food & Beverage team.  We hope to be seeing you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: breakfast and reception is great. I enjoyed my stay. I wil definitely be staying here again. Rooms were clean. Bed was super comfortable. Furniture in my rooms was a little bumped and bruised but no big deal. It was not a huge turn off
Manager Response: Dear Brandi,  Thank you for your recent stay and the solid review.  We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We hope your business brings you back again to Orange County and we will be seeing you at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed here over a holiday weekend along with, apparently, every water polo player in southern California.  The hotel was incredibly busy, and the hotel staff tried to keep things under control with a lot of pre-teen and teenagers running (literally) around.  We saw active security every night stopping games of tag and hide-and-go-seek.  The breakfast was good (again, super crowded).  The parking situation is stupid and expensive.  And, no free wi-fi (come on - in this day and age, that is ridiculous).  Everyone in our group had trouble with the televisions and/or remotes.  We pre-requested extra towels, and we didn't have them.  We called each night to get additional towels (there were four of us in the room and they always gave us three towel sets).  The last day we didn't
Manager Response: Dear JVBuff,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We did have a very large water polo event in the area filling many of the hotels.  We definitely do everything to ensure a great stay for all our guests including additional security.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and have also shared your comments regarding the towels with our Housekeeping team.  We do appreciate your business and hope that when you are returning to Orange County that we will have another (less busy) opportunity to take care of you and your family.  PS – It’s odd to hear anything about airplane noise as we are not near the flight path but may have been a product of what we call the “Santa Ana” winds which cause the airplanes to take off in the opposite direction.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Something, dumb waiter, elevators, ice machines, makes a horrendous noise through the evening but eventually grinds to a halt as you would think people are finally sleeping.  I called down to ask for a new remote or batteries for the TV. The "we'll be right up" was never fulfilled. I went to bed an hour later.
Manager Response: Dear Dave92107,  Thank you for your recent stay and we apologize that you experienced some noise issues.  Our operations team has reviewed the service comment and will bring that back to their individual teams as dropping the ball on the TV remote is not our service standard.   We sincerely hope if travel brings you back to Orange County that you will give us another try so we can Make this Right.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Everything from the price to the service was outstanding! We love the rooms, the excellent free cocktail receptions and breakfasts make Embassy an excellent experience and value. If I could give them higher than a 10, I would.  Embassy Suites is always the first place we look for when traveling and our preferred place to say.  The value, service, and quality cannot be beat!
Manager Response: Dear Kristi,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome 5 star review.  So glad you were able to enjoy both the complimentary evening reception and breakfast during your visit and it’s so great to hear your comments regarding outstanding service.   We appreciate your Embassy Suites loyalty and can’t wait for you and family’s next stay.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Dated bathroom. Broken TV. Poor Service.
Summary: We sometimes find ourselves at an Embassy Suites and are usually very happy there.  This time was different.  The showers were terrible.  Not only were the fixtures extremely old and leaky, but the water smelled horrible (maybe that is more a SoCal problem).  On top of that, the TV did not work and when we called down to notify them/ask them to send someone up, we were told that someone was on their way.  They never showed.  And that's not all.  When we ordered room service, we didn't have a bottle opener for the Sparkling Water we got from room service.  So even though they should have known to put one on our tray and deliver it with the order the first time, no problem...we'll just call for one.  When we called for one, they told us that they might have to charge us for the
Manager Response: Dear Chip,  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments and I’m very sorry to hear that we did not deliver the experience expect for all our guests.  Our standard for room service is the sparkling water is opened before delivery so I have reviewed this with our Food & Beverage Department.  I’d very much appreciate the opportunity to speak with you personally to make this right and give you a reason to visit us again.  I can be reached via phone at 949-705-5150 or email at Swietlana.Cahill2@Hilton.com  Best regards, Swietlana General Manager

Summary: I had an excellent weekend stay @ the Embassy Suites Hotel, Irvine, CA. The hotel staff afforded excellent customer service, our room was terrific & the am breakfast was great! I will stay at this hotel again!
Manager Response: Dear Brian,  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine on your recent Business Trip and the fantastic five star review.  We're always to hear the happy comments and that our complimentary breakfast was a big hit.  We're looking forward to your return!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed in January, we had a great weekend. Coming to the front desk they were very helpful. I was looking for great places to go and Dorothy gave us maps and great ideas of where to go. Since we love the beach it was fun. Kudos to the all the staff.  Excellent Hotel!
Manager Response: Dear A Y,  Thank you for your recent weekend stay and the fantastic 5 star review.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and it’s just awesome to hear about the great service from Dorothy at our front desk.  We’re glad you choose the Embassy Suites Irvine for this trip and you made it to our fantastic beach area.  We hope to see you back soon at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have been staying at this Embassy Suites for 15 or 16 years. It is my hotel of choice whenever I come to the Irvine area. The staff has always been accommodating and the service excellent. The close proximity of the hotel to the airport is very convenient. The happy hour and the breakfast sets the Embassy Suites apart from all of the rest. I have hosted a number of gatherings in your banquet room, that have always been well served by your staff and made our stay even that much more enjoyable.  Thank you !!
Manager Response: Dear Mike,  Thank you for your most recent stay and the 15+ years of Embassy Suites loyalty.  We greatly appreciate the awesome 5 star review and so glad to hear that time after time our team has continued to deliver superior results.  We are looking forward to you next return!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good people but noise in room
Summary: Hotel staffs were nice however the each room has individual air condition and I couldn't stand the compressor noise when A/C kicks in..  Had to change room 3 times to find one with quieter compressor...
Manager Response: Dear Takeaki,  Thank you for your recent stay and we’re sorry to hear that you experienced noise issues with the AC units.  Our suites do feature individual units so guests can adjust to their personal preference.  They should not be making excessive noise and by reporting any issue gives us the opportunity to correct.  If you are coming back to Irvine in the future please feel free to reach out to me directly and I will personally block your room and make sure everything is well in order.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales ken.beck@hilton.com

Summary: We enjoyed our week-long stay in Dec '14, but there are some areas that need improvement.  Pros: - Large rooms. Ours was very clean, everything worked properly, and we loved having so much space to relax after a long day. - Good location. Quiet area, with a few restaurants and a convenience store very close by. Near several major freeways. - Breakfast and evening reception. The breakfasts had something for everyone, nice for a freebie. The evening receptions usually had okay food (nachos, Chex mix) but the free wine, beer, and mixed drinks were really nice. - Nice front desk staff personnel, they were always helpful  Cons: -No free wifi, not even in common areas. In this day and age, this is just ridiculous. -Poor parking situation. You have to pay to park ($15 per day), and
Manager Response: Dear SmithsAustin_TX,  Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  We really appreciate hearing your positive comments on how the family enjoyed our hotel and will bring the challenges up for discussion at our department meetings.  There’s no excuse for the trays not being picked up timely and this is something we have addressed with some added measures.  Regarding WiFi, there’s changes coming early this year as we complete some upgrades and move to a new tiered system.  It’s all great and we hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I love this hotel, my husband loves this hotel, and it meets our needs on all levels.  It is a perfect example of a well-maintained, clean, professionally-managed Embassy Suites.  Lobby / Atrium:  Always lovely and clean Staff:  Always professional and nice Quiet level:  In a business park, so very quiet...just PERFECT.  Stayed here probably 20 times in the last 10 years Suites:  Clean, comfortable, and updated Breakfast / manager's reception:  cooked to order breakfast included!  It's always great. Ease of getting around:  Two minutes from any major street / freeway / airport.  What more could you ask for.  My only question is the charge for parking?  Apparently this does not apply to weekend stays.  Other than that...well worth the stay and hotel rates.
Manager Response: Dear Sun_Traveler08,  Thank you for your recent stay and continued loyalty over the last 10 years.  We appreciate the awesome five star review about out complimentary breakfast, accommodations and central location to everything Orange County.  We are looking forward to your next visit at the Embassy Suite Irvine  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: CLOSE ENOUGH YET FAR ENOUGH AWAY.....
Summary: We enjoyed staying at this hotel because of its location is in the business area of Irvine.  Nearby restaurants (within walking distance), are McCormick and Schmidts and El Torito (that we noticed). Close enough to John Wayne Airport, Newport Beach and freeways to take you where ever you want to go.  Far enough away where it's quiet, because of being located in a business area of Irvine, not a lot of traffic, and you're not right next to the freeways or airport. Great location..... Our suite was clean, breakfast was good, and the service was excellent.  We will definitely stay again at this hotel in Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Whimsical33093,  Thank you for your recent stay and sharing your great experience.  We certainly appreciate your loyalty and very glad to hear that our central location was close to everything yet far from the noise.  We’re looking forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Staff was short and snippy when we were checking in (and very rude to the woman ahead of us who did not seem to speak English very well). Parking was confusing and the gate was never working properly. Our room was large and would have been great if it had been cleaner. Complimentary breakfast? More like an insult. There are other options in the area. Go there instead.
Manager Response: Dear Leah, Thank you for  your recent stay and taking time to share your comments.  Our hotel prides itself on service and accommodation so I’m very concerned to hear about your experience.  I would be more than happy to discuss this in person and can be reached via email or phone anytime.  We have so many great comments about our complimentary breakfast that I’d really like to hear from you and so how we can Make this Right  Best regards, Swietlana  General Manager Swietlana.cahill2@hilton.com 949-705-5151

Summary Heading: Returning hm after holidays outa state.
Summary: Had room 610..! Only planed to stay a day n teenage son disagreed we stayed approximately week r so.. Nice King suite huge large sleeping area separate from spacious living area sofa sleeper mini kitchenette two plasma TV for everyone to enjoy. Free made hot to order breakfast very delicious and evening social dwn in atrium in pub hrs of 530-730pm where all mixed drinks my favorite are free and best part they are delicious perfect amounts unlike any bar where they go cheap on alcohol n watered dwn n ice over load.. Had pleasant evenings there n bar staff very pleasant n friendly. Its front desk where customer service is rude one blond female ambassador in particular tried to extend r stay and was refused n over charged n level of tone inappropriate.. Embarrassed yes but gentlman
Manager Response: Dear Jnmherrera,  Thank you for your recent stay and we’re very happy to hear how much you enjoyed the accommodations, breakfast and complimentary evening reception.  Thank you for extended your stay to the whole week and we also appreciate your comments regarding service.  Your experience was shared with our team members and prompted discussion on what we need to do better and to always make sure we are Making it Right for the guest.  We hope to see you and your son back at the Embassy Suites Irvine for a future stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great Hotel.. Professional staff, Large rooms.The hotel had alot to offer we are planning our next stay. I love the Manager's reception, the Breakfast was excellent, the staff was amazing. I love Embassy Suites!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Jacquelyn,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome five star review.  We’re so happy that you love everything about our Embassy Suites Irvine and look forward to you and the family coming back.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great location for me, nice facility. Extremely Poor problem resolution program! at 06:00 and into a nice hot soapy shower, the water went cold and STOPPED! Called the front desk SEVERAL TIMES OVER TEN minutes before speaking with someone. I was informed that maintenance was not in the building and would I mind waiting? After explaining (more than once) that I was soapy, the offer was to open a different room to use the shower and another wait as I dripped on the carpet. Breakfast: Disaster! Plates in one place, trays in another, silverware somewhere else. the hot buffet was hot and good, labels on each covered tray would have been nice. One last thing Melmac plates?
Manager Response: Dear Richard,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to provide feedback.  First of all we sincerely apologize for the water and have discussed this with our Engineering team to determine the cause so that it doesn’t happen again.  I’ve also shared your comments about the breakfast setup and appreciate your point of view.  I am happy to hear that you found the location and facility overall to be great and we hope that if you are traveling back to Irvine that you will give us another chance to Make it Right.  Please feel free to contact me directly for any assistance.  Best regards, Swietlana General Manager

Summary: Spent 2 nights here late Dec '14.   Very nice looking hotel (especially inside).  Check-in was to be 3pm.  Sat for 1.5 hours (3PM to 4:30PM), then got key.  Others waited up to 2+ hours for a room. My room:  Spacious, very good bed/pillow, toiletries ok, no coffee for the coffeemaker, internet was $7.95+ (per day) NO complimentary internet in common areas i.e. lobby, etc., and bottled water was $5 per liter (this hotel is in a business area complex - never saw a 7-11 or Ralph's near). Room service did come by to check if there was a need for extra towels, etc.  I asked for coffee, for the coffeemaker. Reply, 'be right back.'  Never saw anyone again!!!   There were issues (shortages) with food but not sure who was at fault.  Ran out of wine before end of Happy Hour (they were
Manager Response: Dear Isle ‘n Sun,  Thank you for your recent stay and for sharing your experience.  I’m sorry to hear that the check-in was delayed and that our associate did not return with the coffee.  That is certainly not our standard and I have brought your observation to the attention of our staff.  We are glad to hear that overall you walked away with a good opinion of the hotel and I hope you will give us another opportunity to show you our commitment to service on a future stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Swietlana General Manager

Summary: Star rating is for room 916  THE GOOD:  The hotel's location is the reason to stay here; it's situated near several major highways and within a few miles of a shopping center.  On weekends the area is quiet because the hotel is in a business park and most businesses are closed on the weekend.  THE BAD:  Do NOT stay in room 916 as there is mold in the tile grout.  Maintenance has made attempts to cover the mold, but under the soap holder, around the faucet, in the tub corners the mold is visible.  OBSERVATION:  McCormick & Schmick's is across the street; the food and beverages are much tastier than in the hotel's food court and bar.
Manager Response: Dear Shinazy,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your comments.  Thank you for the positive comments on location and as well the guest suite condition comment.  Our Engineering team has an ongoing preventive maintenance program to catch anything falling below standard and it looks like we missed this suite.  This room was taken out of order and corrected following your stay.  We appreciate the heads up and for allowing us to make it right.  We hope that if you are traveling again to Orange County that you will give the Embassy Suites Irvine another chance.  Best regards, Swietlana General Manager

Summary: Stayed as part of a group Rose Bowl trip and found everything to be "up to snuff".  Staff did yeomen's service in getting a group of 300 fed in the early hours of the morning to meet travel plans to the events.
Manager Response: Dear Merwyn,  Thanks for being part of the Rose Parade group and the 5 star review.  We have a great staff and a special thanks to the Food & Beverage team for coming in at 3AM to have breakfast ready for all the Rose Bowl attendees.  We hope that you might be back again next year.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel. very close to a the airport and restaurants. Easy access to the freeway
Summary: This hotel was amazing. it was perfectly located very close to the airport.  there were several restaurants across the street and it was right off the freeway interchange as well as a lovely shopping center. it also offered free shuttle to the airport and the shopping center (sorry, brain is blank and can't remember the name but it was huge and it had tons and tons of high end stores)  the hotel had a heated indoor pool which we were able to use after a long day at my sister's wedding so super nice way to end the long day. It also offers happy hour with complimentary drinks and snacks, which was great because kids were super hungry, they had nachos from the happy hour which let us buy time to find  a real restaurant for decent dinner.  I have (for once) nothign bad to say about
Manager Response: Dear VeNuSeena,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome 5 star review.  We’ve so happy you choose to stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine for your sister’s wedding.  Thank you for pointing out our great location and by your description sounds like you found South Coast Plaza which is one of the top shopping destinations on the West Coast and less than 3 miles from the Hotel.  We hope you have additional great stays at other Embassy Suites and hope to see you back in Irvine if travel returns you to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed in the hotel many nights since before I settle my home in Irvine, including weekday and weekend.  The overall experience is great especially for those business trip traveler, the hotel is convenient to airport and some food area in Irvine like diamond park full of Asian style food in 5 minutes drive, or you can reach south coast plaza or new port fashion island shopping mall in 20 minutes. The hotel offered breakfast and light food around 5pm to 7pm, which can help you save money a little bit.  The room was always clean and all the thing you need.  The room was with macro waves, coffee maker, one small refrigerator.   Since I was Gold Hilton member, they also upgraded me to better room, I appreciate that.
Manager Response: Dear Lisheng227,  Thank you for staying with us as you were settling into your new home.  It’s always great to hear about a great experience and we hope that if you have the need to stay with us in the future or would recommend to friends visiting that Embassy Suites Irvine is the place to be.  We’re glad to hear that you were able to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This property is five minutes from the John Wayne Airport (SNA), and near entrances and exits to the freeway. During our stay, we never heard a plane or road noise. Our room was a 2-room suite, quiet and comfortable. The breakfast was extensive, one of the best of any hotel, and included custom-made omelets and other things. The staff was very efficient, and the room and bathroom were clean. This place is great for families with kids. The room key can be programmed for the very nice, bright garage next to the hotel, but keep in mind there is a daily $15 charge for parking. Similarly, there is an $8 charge for Wi-Fi, although there are computers available for free in the business center. Factor in these charges to get a true picture of the total cost for your stay.
Manager Response: Dear LA901,  Thank you for your recent stay and the wonderful comments.  It’s great to hear that on previous stays as well that our accommodations are always up to par.  We appreciate the kind comments regarding our complimentary breakfast and look forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Thank you for also mentioning our shortfall on Green efforts as the Hotel does have a very extensive program that is monitored.  We’ve discussed this with guest services to ensure we continue to support our partnership with the California Green Lodging Program and TripAdvisors GreenLeaders.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed at the hotel for 4 nights. When we checked in, we were told we booked a standard home with one double bed and that would not accommodate the 3 of us. Mentioned to the front desk we bought the king suite off of hotels.com, but showed in their records we didn't and we had to pay an extra $10 a night to upgrade, which we did. The next day i went back to the front desk and spoke with someone abd showed him. that we booked a king suite. He looked at our info again in their system and realized we did original book a king suite and sonething went wrong on their end. He was really nice and waived the parking fee for us for the mistake. great service. The room was spacious and clean and we loved the morning breakfast. Great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer,  Thank you for your recent stay and for talking the time to share your experience.  It’s always great to hear the positive feedback for our guest services and we’re very happy that we were able to accommodate the family in a full suite.  If travel brings you back to Orange County we hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stay away when during busy times.   There was a lot of people for the Rose Parade staying.  Called for some things i needed, never was delivered.  Parking was difficult to get out.  Ran out of towels and toilet paper.
Manager Response: Dear 824Migueld,  Thank you for staying with us earlier this year and I’m sorry to hear that your experience was less than perfect.  Even though the hotel was busy you should have no encountered these service issues.  If you would like to discuss any further please fee free to reach me at the hotel at any time.  It’s our pledge to Make it Right for all our guests and we hope to have another opportunity to welcome you back.  Best regards, Swietlana General Manager

Summary: I arrived at noon and was able to check in right away.  Room was very spacious and clean.  Loved the complimentary breakfast with omelet station.  I also enjoyed the Manager's Reception every night after work.  I would stay again next time I am in town for business.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabeth,  Thank you for your recent stay and we’re very happy to hear about the smooth check-in and that you loved the complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We certainly hope your business brings you back to Orange County and that we will see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Wonderful staff, great location - but property needs a little work
Summary: Stayed at this property in November 2014. Landed late at night, and they had some water related issue on the level I was assigned a room, so they put me up at Wyndham a couple of blocks away for the first night. Initially (esp. after a long flight from DTW) I was upset, but the staff was very helpful - they drove me to the Wyndham and picked me first thing in the morning so I made my breakfast business meeting right on schedule. The reception counter staff as well as the management apologized once again and took care of all the logistics/luggage to ensure I was all set at their property for the next three days. They also sent a "we are sorry for the inconvenience" note - along with a fruit and cheese platter to my room later that day, which is rare to see these days.  The
Manager Response: Dear Avaidya4,  Thank you for your recent stay and for allowing us to Make it Right with your accommodations for the first night.  We’re very glad to hear about the guest service recovery and that you had an enjoyable stay and were able to take advantage of our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  Our engineering team takes pride in continuous improvement throughout the hotel and we will see some significant capital improvements in late 2015.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our first room 829 seemed worn and dirty (stained carpet, desk...) The second room 629 was completely different. The breakfast staff is overwhelmed and needs more help. Many breakfast items were left empty most of the time. I still recommend Embassy Suites but this hotel needs a little work.
Manager Response: Dear Raymond,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  I’m am glad that our staff was able to find you a new room and I’ve shared your comments with our engineering team so they can go through that suite and correct any deficiency.  We appreciate your HHonors loyalty and hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Parking garage is a pretty long walk around the hotel with no entrance from inside garage.  No ramp, so rolling luggage has to be taken into street. Room service food was terrible.  Don't order the flatbread. Staff was excellent, courteous and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear FoodieMom59,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  Thank you so much for the great staff compliments.  We’re very sorry to hear that the Flat Bread fell short of expectations and will certainly share this comment to the F&B team to make sure we are delivering top notch food service.  We hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: For Irvine, it is conveniently located and also one of the best in offering good services. I have stayed at this facility for more than couple of months till now and it always gives me a pleasure to recommend this hotel to friends. Usually all my colleagues would come here in evenings for location, suites are big to accommodate guests and we enjoy evenings here with Manager's specials at times.   The reason I like this hotel is because I have stayed here for business development purpose, then for my routine consulting visits and this time I went with my nephew.. I found it the best for all requirements.  The suites, arrangements, food and reception.. all comfort me.. as always...!!  Thanks to Hotel management and staff..
Manager Response: DearNiranjanPandit,  Thank you for your continued loyalty and the awesome 5 star review.  It’s great to hear that the accommodations, service and amenity are perfectly located for business and leisure travel.  We are looking forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: One Of My Favorite Places To Stay
Summary: The service and rooms are really nice and comfortable. I would highly recommend this location. Room service is really good too. I usually get in room service. The food is really good and they serve it hot. Love the interior atmosphere inside. Enjoy your stay at this location.
Manager Response: Dear Ufloss69,  Thank you for your recent staff and the great review.  We are very happy to hear how much you enjoyed the hotel atmosphere and room service.  We are looking forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Mobility Issues?  This is the Place for You.
Summary: In response to some other reviews, let me say that during 2014 we have Gold Status for HHonors, which makes the internet free, but we still had to pay the $15/night parking fee.  In 2015 we won’t be at Gold and will be sorry to have to pay for internet access.  In spite of the extra charges, I will still stay at Embassy Suites when in Irvine.  It is terrific having the space in one of the suites there.  The suite was clean throughout our stay.  The breakfast is a bonus as is the “happy hour” in the evening.    The bathroom is just what someone like me needs.  I have to use a walker now and getting into a shower over a tub is usually extremely difficult.  At Embassy Suites they have set up everything in the bathroom to make it as safe and easy as possible for travelers like me.
Manager Response: Dear ArniePalmerFan,  Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  We’re especially happy to hear the kind comments regarding friendliness of staff and that our complimentary breakfast and evening reception were a big bonus.  It’s also great to hear one of our ADA suites was available and made for a very accommodating and comfortable visit.  We’re looking forward to seeing you back in 2015.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great prices, Great Service and Clean Spacious Rooms.  Complementary Happy Hour and breakfast, indoor pool, easy parking, location are all reasons why I would come back and stay here.  Staying here has all the amenities you need.  Whether you are single, couples or a family, Embassy suites caterers to eveyone.
Manager Response: Dear Ray,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome review.  We appreciate your business and look forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Only hotel chain I know that still charges for Internet.  Otherwise it was great.  Just cheapskates.  I don;t have anything else to say but Trip Advisor won't let me post unless I have 200 characters.  So here's hoping the Redskins get an offensive line for Christmas so we can start playing professional football in DC again.
Manager Response: Dear Ronald,  Thank you for your recent stay and I’m glad to hear that you had a great stay at the hotel.  There’s going to be a lot of changes for Internet service throughout the hotel industry in 2015.  Our hotel will be moving to a tiered system in 2015 with complimentary basic WiFi.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nice staff, decent location, dated rooms, terrible WiFi
Summary: The upside of this hotel is that it's right around the corner from the OC airport, but not under the flight path so it's fairly quiet.  The staff is also unfailingly nice and helpful, all the way around.  I ordered room service one evening and the order was wrong.  They were prompt and gracious in correcting it.  The front desk staff, breakfast staff, bar staff and housekeeping were all quite nice.  On the downside, the place is a little dated, especially the bathrooms (eye-level showerheads, and I'm only 5'11").  The furniture has been updated but many of the fittings seem to date back to the 90's, giving the room a tired feel.  Worst of all, the WiFi is pretty spotty.  I tried to stream an online class that I was taking and it was infuriating, dropping at least a dozen times
Manager Response: Dear Grammarfreak,  Thank you for your recent stay and we’re happy to hear that your overall experience and the staff were friendly and accommodating.  We are in the process of updating our entire WiFi system which will be a great improvement and keeps us on pace with the rapid changes in technology.  We hope that you will consider the Embassy Suites Irvine for any future stays in the area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was our 2nd experience with Embassy and enjoyed everything from the cleanliness and neatness of the rooms, helpful staff, and ease of hotel parking. Kids enjoyed the see through elevators.   Happy hour was great, free nachos, goldfish crackers, sodas, free beer and mixed drinks. Complimentary breakfast was awesome with cooked to order omelets with all the fixins, waffles, pancakes, bacon, sausage, fruit, cereals, muffins, pastries, juices, breads, potatoe hash.  I highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Rodolfo,  Wow!  Thank you for bringing the family back again and the awesome five star review.  We sincerely appreciate your continued loyalty and taking the time to share your experience.  We can’t wait to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Good place to stay on the south side
Summary: We stopped here on the way to San Diego and were very satisfied.  The hot and made to order breakfast items were yummy.  You had to stand in line for them, but it was well worth the wait.  My daughter slept on the pull out and she had no complaints.  I would stay here again.
