Manager Response: Dear Ms California Red,  Thank you for making the Embassy Suites Irvine your stop over on the way to San Diego.  We’re very happy to hear you had an enjoyable stay.  PS – our queen size sofa sleepers feature upgraded six inch memory foam mattress to make sure your daughter had a good night’s sleep.  We hope you have reason to stop in again and stay with us.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for one night. Its only 20 minutes away from NewPort Beach which is the reason we stayed there. Love the complimentary happy hour and breakfast. Fast check in and the staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Amy,  Thank you for your recent stay and sharing with everyone our quick drive to Newport Beach – just one of the great areas of Orange County.  We’re glad to hear to stay was very nice and appreciate you taking the time to share your review.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This strutture is good for family even if the sofà bed was awful and  really not confortable.the linen were bad . They didntrepare the bed for the  there person. The breakfast time is very crowded and space for sitting there.
Manager Response: Dear Elena,  Thank you for your recent stay and I’m sorry to hear that your experience was less than perfect.  We maintain very high standard for our guest suite cleanliness, bedding, etc… and I’m sorry that it sounds like we missed the mark on your stay.  I’d be happy to discuss this in further detail and can be reached at the hotel or by email at Swietlana.cahill2@hilton.com  Best regards, Sweitlana General Manager

Summary: The service received is impeccable-at all of the locations we have stayed at in southern California. The price is good. The breakfast is outstanding. We always stay at Embassy Suites, when they are available. Strongly recommend to fellow travelers.
Manager Response: Dear Roberta,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome five star review.  It’s always great to have our associates’ passion for service recognized and thank you so much for the strong recommendation.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Best Hilton property in Orange County  Service is great, Food and hospitality are excellent, Close to everything in South Orange County and the rooms are very clean - have made this our hotel of choice in OC. ( we travel there ~ 1X per month and have stayed in several hotels we won't go to again
Manager Response: Dear Michael,  Thank you for making the Embassy Suites Irvine your continuing hotel choice.  We greatly appreciate the shout out and sharing with everyone our central location to all things in Orange County.  We are looking forward to your family’s next stay and please contact us at anytime if there’s something we can assist with to make an awesome experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Any other Embassy or Hilton besides this one
Summary: Front desk works were rude! If you want some rest or even sleep doesn't matter what floor your on the elevator is so loud it will keep you up .The heating and cooling system in the room is dated and just as loud as the elevator. Over all not a great stay for us. But we have had wonderful stays at other Embassy's
Manager Response: Dear Brian,  Thank you for your recent stay and I’m sorry to hear that your experience was not up to par.  We hold high standards of service and I would really like to hear more about your stay.  Please reach out to me any time at 949-553-8332 or by email at Swietlana.cahill2@hilton.com.  We’d certainly like the opportunity to make this right.  Best regards, Swietlana General Manager

Summary Heading: Potential to be a much better hotel
Summary: Stayed at the hotel end October 2014. I chose it for the convenient location, free airport transportation and complimentary breakfast. Overall the stay was fine but I found it to be quite poorly run. The cleaning staff for my room were really having it easy. I understand the policy regarding reusing towels and bed sheets and am fine with that. However, the tables were not being cleaned and the tea, creamer etc we're never replenished. The suites had a nice layout and we're spacious but looked a bit on the shabby side now. Wifi charges were not very reasonable in my opinion and I made a call to another state and got charged almost $2 per minute. Perhaps this is the standard but I found it on the expensive side. Breakfast was fine but no provision for people with allergies so they
Manager Response: Dear Sab Z,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  I’m sorry to hear that your stay was not perfect and I’ve shared your comments with our operations staff.  The housekeeping is certainly not our standard and we do apologize and have addressed.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and shuttle and do hope if travel brings you back to Orange County that we will see you at the Embassy Suites Irvine.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very comfortable bed with crisp while linen, clean, soft and perfect.   Bathroom was clean, with fresh towels, hand towels and hand towels, nice and spacious.  I would recommend staying here you get your money's worth.
Manager Response: Dear Isha,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We’re very happy to hear the great comments regarding our accommodations.  Thank you for the recommendation and we hope to see you back very soon to the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: The welcoming staff made all the difference!
Summary: Dorothy at the front desk went out of her way to greet & assist us.  The bartender, after a spill on her counter, was gracious.  The breakfast servers remained courteous, even though we stayed too long and held them up from clearing our table.  Nice rooms, beautiful courtyard, convenient location.  We hope to stay there again on our next visit.
Manager Response: Dear Petenpolly,  Thank you for your recent stay and the wonderful five star review.  Dorothy is one of our front desk superstars and thank you very much for noting her service.  We’re also extremely pleased to see so much of the staff and hotel recognized and we are looking forward to your return to the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Every single staff member I encountered during a brief one night stay were fantastic. I've stayed here a number of times and it continues to serve as an excellent Orange County lodging choice. There are a couple restaurants within walking distance. I was here on a Sunday night and there was not a single person at the evening reception and just a handful at breakfast. It must have been an abnormally slow night. The free shuttle to the airport is convenient and the newer Mercedes shuttle van was very comfortable. The layout of my room was a bit odd as the doors between my room, the closet, and bathroom kept running into one another...strange configuration. I do however, highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Jski529,  Thank you for your most recent stay and your continued loyalty.  We appreciate your comments and we are all very excited about getting the new Sprinter van for airport and local area transportation.  We hoping your next stay will be a couple more days when you see the atrium come to life for breakfast and the evening reception almost every day during the week and weekend.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed at this hotel on business.  The rooms have been updated and are exceptional.  The complimentary breakfast was one of the best I have had in a long time.  The check in was a very good experience.  I did not love the parking situation as it was a little bit of a walk with luggage, but it really was not that bad.  I would definitely recommend this hotel and plan to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Kmbrown021393,  Thank you for selecting the Embassy Suites Irvine for your most recent business trip.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and kind words regarding accommodations and breakfast.  We hope that travel brings you back to Orange County and that we see you and some more of your colleagues at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Minor issues with the water pressure in the shower and lamp not working properly but other than that had a nice stay.  The all you can eat breakfast and evening reception were both good.  Could have used more staff to make it run a little smoother.
Manager Response: Dear Marlene,  Thank you for your recent weekend stay and I do apologize for the minor mishaps.  I do hope that this was reported so we can Make it Right.  We’re very glad to hear that you were able to enjoy our complimentary breakfast and evening reception and look forward to any future stays you might have in Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I had a high school group of Marching Band students traveling to California for a competition. I had 129 students traveling and about 30 staff, chaperones, volunteers, and bus drivers. The hotel that we had originally booked at called less than two weeks prior to our trip saying they would be unable to accommodate us as planned renovations in December had been moved forward to start in November. The previous hotel, which was also an Embassy suites did assist by contacting all of the Embassy suites in the area to identify availability for my group. Jasmine at the Embassy Suites, Irvine offered to help accommodate us in a combination of Queen and King rooms.  Jasmine was very helpful, friendly and efficient. We were able to book enough rooms for our group and Jasmine was also
Manager Response: Dear Julie,  We were so pleased to be available and help your organization for your event in Orange County.  The band was so well behaved and the chaperones and everyone else involved made our job even easier.  We see a lot of bands during the competition season with our spacious suites, free breakfast and ample bus parking and we sincerely thank you for the opportunity and recommendation.  We certainly hope to see the whole band back again for your next trip to the area.  Special thanks for the kudos to our Senior Sales Manager, Jasmine, who has been with us for eight years now!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: If you want to know Irvine from the inside out, come to the Embassey Suites.  Lovely room that looked out to a parking garage.  Complimentary breakfast (free with the price of admission) that gave you all you wanted, without flavor.  Very clean, very sterile.  If you like chlorine and crowds, the small indoor pool is for you.  The staff are decent not to fail when it comes to checking you in and out.  Located on Main Street, but don't expect to find a town center.  Had the feel overall of well maintained airport ambiance, where you are neither here nor there but will have a modicum of comfort in the meanwhile.
Manager Response: Dear John,  Thank you for your recent stay and for taking time to share your experience.  Irvine features a diverse geography of business, residential and outdoor areas to explore and is one of the most central cities for Orange County.  We are located in one of the more prominent business parks in Irvine; however, just minutes away from shopping, dining and entertainment.  We do appreciate you kind comments regarding the overall ambiance and level of comfort and should your travel bring you back to the area hope to see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Have many relatives and friends in the area but we prefer to stay at this hotel which we consider the best in the area.  Also transportation to and from the airport is quick because it within five minutes there.
Manager Response: Dear 6Squirrelly,  We can’t ask more than “Home away from Home.”  Thank you so much for your continued loyalty and for taking time to share this great five star review.  We’re looking forward to your next trip down South.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed with Embassy Suites for 2 nights for business. The hotel is located at a prime location, less than 5 minutes drive from John Wayne Airport, lots of business on main street, a handful of good restaurants within walking distance, also super easy to get on highways. The staffs are extremely helpful. One of the staffs walked out of the lobby with me just to show me the parking structure and the other parking options. Room is lovely (got a free upgrade to a king suite with the view of main street and the mountains, absolutely no complaint). They also have complimentary breakfast and happy hour.   The minor suggestions I have:  The guest room keys get demagnetized very easily. I had to get new cards three times. Can you do something about it?  Leave some meat in the breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Sophie,  Thank you for staying with us on your recent business trip to Orange County.  We’re glad to hear our location was central for your business, dinning, etc…  I’m sorry to hear about the room key and is not something we hear much about but definitely noted.  We hope that your business needs will bring you back to Irvine so we can see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine – and, there are some WiFi changes coming in the new year.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Large hotel in the center of Irvine, convenient to John Wayne airport
Summary: This is an older Embassy Suites ... large central courtyard/atrium, with restaurant and bar on the ground floor, and balconies along the hallways overlooking from each floor.  The rooms look out into the hallways with picture windows (in my opinion, this is an annoyance, because you have to close the curtains whenever you're in the room, even if you're on upper floors ... bad design, again - in my opinion).  The suites are large, but poorly laid out.  Good location.  Hot cooked breakfast included.   Nice hotel, but could use some major renovation.
Manager Response: Dear MassCouple2,  Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our location and cooked-to-order breakfast and look forward to welcoming you back if travel returns you to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: If you are looking for a place to stay and just get away from home with your significant other. I recomend the Embassy Suites the 2 room 1 King bed suite. It reminds me of a small studio. My boyfriend and I enjoyed our stay. The price was great and the free breakfast was even better. The only thing we dislike was the $15 charge of parking. That to me is a little bit too much. Of course every Hotel has different charges. Overall I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Cristina,  Thank you for the awesome five star review and we are so glad to hear that you and your significant other had a great getaway.  We love our spacious suites and complimentary breakfast and look forward to your next escape!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed 3 nights for business. Staff was friendly and professional. My room was nicely appointed and extremely quiet...to the point that I felt I was the only guest in the hotel. I will recommend this property and stay there whenever possible.
Manager Response: Dear Nottypical,  Thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine for your most recent business trip.  We really appreciate your kind words and that even though the hotel has been running over 80% this month you still felt like the only guest.  Thank you for the recommendation and we are looking forward to your next visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is consistent with others in its brand.  The bed was comfortable and the room was clean. The wifi worked well.  the hotel is a very close drive to John Wayne Airport and walkable to the Main Plaza area.  Two issues: the 20-minute spaces for registration were all taken when I arrived (the garage is hotel key card access) and the breakfast area is poorly configured, with the beverages and food in disjointed locations.
Manager Response: DearMarylandTraveler75,  Thank you for staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  We appreciate the feedback and very happy to hear our accommodations and location made for a great stay.  Our complimentary breakfast is one of our brand pillars and the most important start to our day.  We continually look for ways to improve the guest experience including breakfast so thank you for your input.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Really ? Everyone else is doing it !
Summary: I had an uneventful stay and those employees I came in contact with were extremely nice and helpful.  I was there on business and was hopeful of getting guest Wi-Fi access to at the very least read and respond to my e-mails on my laptop or I-Pad and not on my phone. I usually don't patronize this brand so wasn't aware that they don't provide free Wi-Fi service, not even in their lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Scott,  Thank you for your most recent stay and talking the time to share your comments.  We appreciate the feedback and very happy to hear positive notes regarding your interaction with our team members.  The Hotel does feature two work stations in the business center which do offer complimentary Internet.  Additionally, both Gold and Diamond Honors members receive complimentary Internet across over 4,100 Hilton Hotel worldwide and there will be some more changes coming in 2015.  We do hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine should travel bring you back to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Very Good Amenities and customer service
Summary: The service and amenities at this hotel location was very good. The hotel showed some signs of age but the furniture and the other amenities were in good condition. I was particularly impressed with the service from the front desk personnel. Very good place for a business trip.
Manager Response: Dear Andrew,  Thank you for selecting the Embassy Suites Irvine on your most recent business trip.  We are glad to hear that the accommodations and service made for a comfortable and enjoyable stay.  We definitely appreciate your kind words regarding our associates at the front desk and look forward to your return.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel was clean, spacious suite, two televisions, great service .  The breakfast is fairly good. In all we were fully satisfied.  The location was perfect, you had the airport at a walking distance and freeway access very close too. I stayed at different hotels were the service was not great; at the Embassy Suite the service was great.
Manager Response: Dear Jean,  Thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate your comments.  We’re very happy to hear your experience at the Embassy Suites Irvine was much better than other choices and we look forward to your next return.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This was a really nice hotel - great for business travel.  There is a shuttle that takes you anywhere you want to go within a 2 or 3 mile radius, so you won't need a car.    The breakfast buffet was a nice addition.  The quality of the food was middle of the road.  I wish they had healthier items in addition to the regular fare.  The suite was quite nice, with a living room area and a separate bedroom area.  The bed was very comfortable.  I had a nice view of the city as well.  Overall, I really enjoyed my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Angie,  Thank you for choosing Embassy Suites Irvine for your most recent business trip.  We appreciate the kind review and we’re very glad to hear our central location with complimentary shuttle worked well for you.  If business brings you back to Orange County we hope to see you again at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: I noticed a difference this time!
Summary: I have stayed in this hotel several times since 2012. I have noticed several differences since my last stay a year ago.   First, the front desk staff has been upgraded to people who are three times as great as the old staff. I was impressed with the fast check in, being handed my water and snack (silver level). Everyone was polite and on top of their game.   The elevators are moving smoothly, unlike a time before where it was so slow I was ready to take the stairs. Noise levels were to a minimum this time around. I was on the 7th floor in a corner 2 room king. The bed was cozy, with a stack of pillows. There were plenty of towels in the bathroom. Lighting had been changed so there are more lights than my last stay.   Thankfully, the sofa was upgraded from last time, the fabric
Manager Response: Dear Jessicarbt,  Thank you for your recent stay and continued loyalty since 2012.  We really appreciate you taking the time so share your experience and with such great detail.  We have recently changed our menus and sorry that you were missing the Shepherd’s Pie.  Please note that we value this feedback and will be implementing menu changes at least three times a year to keep fresh for our frequent travelers.  We’re looking forward to your next return at the Embassy Suites Irvine.     Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed here on business. Friendly staff and great breakfast. Rooms are spacious and well appointed. The only downside is $15 per day for car park and paying for wifi.The situation of thisnhotel is that most people will come by car. Definitely stay again but just put car park and wifi in the price somehow.
Manager Response: Dear acetrainer2014,  Thank you for your recent stay and we really appreciate the nice comments about our spacious guest suite accommodations.  We’re very happy to hear you enjoyed our great breakfast and look forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is a very nice Hotel to stay at and we will definitely stay again.  Just be prepared to pay 15 a night to park your car and 8 a day if you want to use their Wifi.  The computers in the computer rooms are free. Breakfast was superb!!
Manager Response: Dear Tyler,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We’re very happy to hear you enjoyed our great breakfast and look forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Words cannot express the positive experience our team encountered throughout our recent stay at the EMBASSY SUITES – IRVINE.  From the moment we arrived and were greeted by the front desk, to our interaction with your Engineering Department, Guest Services, the morning breakfast crew, the restaurant, and the cleaning crew.  EVERYONE was fantastic.  Had we not traveled so far from the deep south, we would have thought we had landed in the deep south.  The friendly welcomes, the passing greetings, along with the warm welcome backs, made our stay a welcomed home away from home.  The comfortable beds made sleeping a dream!
Manager Response: Dear Steve,  Thank you for your recent stay and bringing the rest of your team.  We greatly appreciate the awesome five star review and shout outs to the various departments.  We’re definitely looking forward to your return in 2015.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had large family, multiple rooms. Convenient to airport, most of the staff accommodating. We felt very safe with multiple generations traveling, coming in at various times. It Felt intimate. Will stay again! They do need to improve on parking.
Manager Response: Dear IGotUBabe,  Thank you for your recent stay and bringing the whole family.  We appreciate your comments regarding our staff and the intimate feeling.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here since I was visiting Disneyland and going to a wedding. Great central location. Pretty quite on the weekends and not much that's walking distance but close to the freeways. Close enough to the beaches and Disneyland. Would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear t_chin415,  Thank you for your recent stay and very happy to hear our location was excellent for both the wedding and Disneyland.  Irvine is definitely the center of Orange County.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is very clean.  The staff are very helpful and we would definitely stay here again.  Breakfast and room service food was top notch.  Only negative is $15 per day parking fee.  However, the positives definitely outweigh this one negative.
Manager Response: Dear 331lindae,  Thank you for your recent stay and generous comments.  Always great to hear about our great breakfast and hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Clean hotel and near good restaurants that you can walk to. Nice afternoon reception and breakfast in the morning. Staff is very nice and was accommodating. We have stayed here a few times and will be back again!
Manager Response: Dear Bill,  Thank you for your recent stay and for sharing some great comments.  We’re so glad you had a great stay and definitely look forward to your return.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great location close to the mains business area. impecable facilities and the service was great. One of the few places that I have no remarks. The reception is a great addition after a long day at work and the restaurants across the street are perfect for a quick diner after coming from the east coast.
Manager Response: Dear Ayala Paraguassu,  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome 5 star review.  It’s great to hear the accommodations, staff and location made the perfect location for your trip.  We appreciate your loyalty and look forward to seeing you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: There was a lot of good about this hotel. It's one of the more affordable options in the area and you do get a lot for the price, like an extensive, complimentary breakfast buffet, a pub/restaurant right down stairs, nice suite rooms, etc. The staff is very helpful and courteous. However, I did encounter some issues with payment when I first checked in- primarily my/my bank's fault but I also don't entirely understand why they say it's inadvisable to pay with a debit card. This is my preferred method of payment, always, and it's never been a problem in any other hotel I've stayed at, anywhere. There is probably some very logical reason for this that I don't yet understand but as of now it is/was very frustrating. The parking situation is also not great and paying for wifi
Manager Response: Dear Michelle, thank you for your recent stay and for taking your time to share the experience.  It does sound like you were staying with us over sold out nights.  We appreciate your commentary and we do look for any opportunity to improve the guest experience at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Long story short on the debit card is the authorization amount will be processed as a transaction versus a hold on a credit card.  Banks can take several days to reinstate authorized funds that were not used by a guest.  The hotel just wants to advise our guests prior to check in.  We do appreciate the kind comments regarding our team members and hope that we might see you again back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Always a great stay.  No exception this time.  Wish I could spend more time there.  Breakfast is always unbeatable.  Too bad parking was $15.00, probably average for area.  At least it was covered.  Thanks.
Manager Response: Dear Mark, thank you for the great 5 star review.  We’re so happy to have had you back to the Embassy Suites Irvine and hope that someday it will be for a longer trip.  Until next time have safe travels.     Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: liked everything about this hotel except paying for  wifi and parking  even saw fireworks from great city view rooms  staff nice and hardworking  room tip high city view rooms  look for discounts on web site
Manager Response: Dear Travellingyamo, thank you for your recent stay and we greatly appreciate the kind words regarding our hardworking staff.   That’s a great tip for high floors on the Main Street side of the building which faces Disneyland about 12 miles north of the Hotel.  The fireworks do go off every night about 9:30pm.  We hope to see you back really soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I don't ever recall having a bad stay at an Embassy Suites. This was no different. We got the room for a great rate. The room was very nice and included all the amenities I care about. The fact that it is a suite is also great. The hotel on the whole was beautiful as well. It has a hot made-to-order breakfast every morning included with your room. Our service was great and I would gladly stay again. It took us about 15 minutes to get to Disneyland in light traffic. The only complaints I had were the length of the walk to the parking and the charge for internet. Those aside, I still thought it was a great value.
Manager Response: Dear NicelyNicely02, thank you for bringing the family on your most recent trip to Disneyland.  We certainly appreciate the 5 star review and especially for you taking the time to share.  There’s a lot more to do in Orange County including the beaches so hope next time you visit from Arizona we will see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Breakfast was great.  Super location and clean rooms.  We stayed there with our two teenage boys.  Lots of room to move around.  Great location right next to airport and lots of places to eat.  15 minutes from the beach.
Manager Response: Dear Lori, thanks for bringing the family.  Sounds like it was an action packed trip and hope that you will have a longer stay next time travel brings you back to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: On the surface, this hotel appears to be a quality place to stay...very comfortable beds/pillows but over my brief stay, I saw many chinks in the armor.  Maintenance issues and neglect in the bathroom (peeling paint and poor repairs around the tub, ventilation problems and no trained maintenance staff available to respond.  The quality of the food served for breakfast was good but the layout/design of the food area was poor.  Long lines and no smooth flow for the guests, the breakfast staff appeared overworked and unhappy. The front desk staff were kind and courteous and apologetic about the problems with the room (no ventilation during a heatwave) but did not offer a reduced rate or seek the advice of a manager to compensate or correct the deficiencies during my stay.
Manager Response: Dear Sandra,  Thank you very much for your stay with us and for your comments. Please accept our sincerest apologies for not meeting your expectations. Our guests are our priority, and we truly appreciate you giving us the opportunity to “Make it Right.”  We reviewed your concerns about room maintenance and Food and Beverage with our Team Members.  They are as disappointed as you were for not providing you with superior service as part of our culture at this hotel. This is definitely is not our standard, and I would like to have the opportunity to speak with you and Make this Right! Please feel free to reach out to me directly at Swietlana.Cahill2@hilton.com at any time. We value you as our guest, and hope to welcome you back to our hotel in the near future!  Sincerely,  Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary Heading: Good location but needs cleaning and maintenance
Summary: The location is convenient and the complimentary shuttle is nice (it runs every half hour).  Since everything is close by, it did not bother me to have to first do a stop at the airport before heading into my office in Irvine.  The checkin process was simple but I had to ask about breakfast and reception - no proactive mention of that.  Also, was told internet had a charge but when I inquired later, it was confirmed that my rate actually included internet so I actually lost a day due to perceived price.  Breakfast was nice.  The fitness room was small but functional.  Rooms could use some serious attention to detail.  The bathroom shower had mold (see photo) and some phenomenon of hair stuck to the ceiling (see photo - not my length or color).  The desk chair's arm was falling
Manager Response: Dear SuburbtoSuitcase , thank you for your recent stay and I’m so sorry to hear that we missed the mark in a couple areas.  I do appreciate the kind comments regarding location, shuttle and breakfast.  I will be reviewing your comments with department heads and ensure that we are bringing this back to our associates as training.  It’s definitely not our standard and I would really like to have further conversation with you.  Please feel free to reach out directly at Swietlana.cahill2@hilton.com at any time.  We value your business and hope to have another opportunity to Make this Right.  Best regards, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: Very nice Hotel that lives up to the Embassy suites reputation.  The shuttle/van service is very accommodating.  The evening reception is just usual and the cook to order breakfast is the usual for Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: Dear whs7, thank you for your recent stay and the five star review.  It’s always great to hear about outstanding service and I will definitely be sharing your comments with our van drivers.  We hope to see you again soon back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great Room and Breakfast for Good Price in Irvine; Parking the Pits!
Summary: I haven't stayed in an Embassy suite in over 15 years.  Needed a room in the Orange county area.  Got on Trip Advisor, and Embassy suites Irvine was rated high and had a really good price.  Read reviews, and decided to make reservation.  We had a 2 room suite.  A large room with king bed, a kitchenette w sink, table small fridge, etc. and a queen sofa sleeper.  The room was clean.  The bed very comfortable. The best part was a fabulous made to order breakfast! There were omelets and French toast to order.  There was eggs, bacon, sausage, potatoes, pancakes, muffins, cereals, fresh fruit, yogurt, hot oatmeal, watermelon, cantaloupe, then all the juice, coffee, tea, etc. I could not believe the spread.  Only downfall is the parking situation. we parked in a 20 minute load, so one
Manager Response: Dear Judy, thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share your comments.  I’m so happy to hear the accommodations and breakfast were great.  I’m sorry to hear that you had challenges to find parking.  The parking structure has entrances on both sides of the hotel.  When our side is full our associates should be directing to the overflow entrance which is available to us on weekends.  We will definitely discuss your experience with our guest service team.  Thanks and we hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine sometime soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: A nice Suite in Irvine, with special features..
Summary: One of the reasons I always try to stay at an Embassy Suites Hotel is that this is truly a SUITE, with a Living Room, Kitchen area, and separate Bedroom and Bath.  Depending on where you want to end up, another Embassy Suites is just 10 minutes away, off the 55 Freeway at Dyer.  They have FREE Parking there!
Manager Response: Dear Kent, thank you for your recent stay and your loyalty to Embassy Suites.  We appreciate your kind comments regarding our accommodations, hotel amenities and service.  We hope to see you back soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our youth soccer team, along with many others in town for a soccer tournament, stayed at this Embassy Suites.  Hotel staff managed the crowd quite well.  No complaints from our group.  Large crowds due to the soccer teams staying there meant occasionally long lines at breakfast and evening receptions, but staff handled it quite well.  My room did not have a clock or clock-radio of any sort, so had to depend on my cell phone to check the time and as an alarm clock, but that seems to be a trend in hotels.  There is a swimming pool, but it is very small, lap swimmers won't likely be satisfied.  Decent workout room facilities.  There is a small laundry room for guests to use.  We found the location convenient for several destinations:  UC Irvine, Huntington Beach, Newport Beach,
Manager Response: Dear PJM, thank you for bringing down the soccer team and so glad to hear the accommodations, service, location and amenities made for a great experience.  All rooms should have a clock radio and upon reviewing your comments had the housekeeping team dispatched to check this out.  We have a lot of soccer tournaments in Southern California and hope if you are returning to the area that it will be back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Always look forward to staying here.
Summary: I always try and make sure that I book this hotel during my stay in Irvine. It is close to my work as well as the airport.  The staff is always polite and friendly.  The managers special is always nice to have and you can't beat the nice breakfast offerings.
Manager Response: Dear John, thank you for your most recent stay and making the Embassy Suites Irvine the place you like to do business with while on business.  We appreciate the kind words and five star review.  Looking forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: DISTURBED- witnessed indoor security employee leaning against guest room doorway, with head/ear over door area (door was slightly ajar). Very CREEPY! He supposedly was seeing where noise was coming from ( which I personally did not hear anything coming from there - there was more noise coming from below in the atrium). Then as the guests came out of room, they appeared a bit off guard with this man's head in their face as they opened door all the way- security guard did not expect that. he slyly stood there & did not immediately say anything. so I spoke up and told those guests what I saw. He claimed that there was too much noise coming from there. It seemed an odd way to see if guests would keep noise down.... I would think they are trained to rather, knock on a door to
Manager Response: Dear Anonymous918273645, the safety and security of all guests is a top priority of the hotel.  The hotel does contract security for weekends over summer when the hotel is running high occupancy.  The security guards are always under the direction and supervision of hotel management.  It’s likely in this scenario that the room was called by management and security dispatched in the case of a noise complaint.  I want to ensure you and any guest that the security is there to help control busy weekends when the number of guests is very high.  The security team does patrol the floors.  Best regards, Swietlana Cahill General Manager

Summary: I am team member of the Hilton Hotel. I made the reservation on the website. Got there earlier than the normal check in time so I asked the  MORNING STAFF, the  one young gal I dealt with was not only un accommodating, she didn't seem to know much. I asked, how long for the room to be clean? I can wait. Then we waited and waited for 2 hrs, she not only  didn't acknowledge us  waiting in the lobby she completely ignored us.    We then finally check in again after 2 hrs of waiting, which I thought I did already before I waited for the room to be clean. We then got to the room and the bed was so small. They have FULL SIZE bed. I, being a Front Desk Clerk myself  in Las Vegas Nevada on "THE STRIP" didn't know of any hotel uses FULL SIZE BEDS other than Motel 6. And I was told "sorry
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ha Penny Irish Pub in Embassy Suites, Irvine.Very disappointing. We had a group of nine people and the service was terrible. Took a long time for the waiter to even acknowledge us. After the food was ordered, it took 45 minutes to get it delivered. Granted it was a hotel restaurant, but there were only three other tables! The food was presented well and very tasty, but the poor service had already ruined the meal.
Manager Response: Dear Owenthomas, thank you for sharing your experience at our Ha’Penny Pub.  I am so sorry to hear of this bad experience which is definitely not how we manage our restaurant.  Our staff expectation is for superb service and food which you only received half off.  I’ve shared your comments with our team and stressed the importance of prompt and attentive service.  I hope that if you are back in the area that we will have another chance to make this right.  Best regards, Arturo Director of Food & Beverage

Summary: I stayed here for a couple nights. The rooms are clean and updated. The bed was really comfortable with nice pillows. All interaction with hotel staff was great. Everyone was friendly and helpful.  The hotel is located near the airport but I don't remember hearing planes!  My only gripe is the parking. There are a ton of spots outside the garage that say "20 minute registration parking only" but they are all taken all day and all night long. When I was checking in I had no place to park! And there was no crowd at the registration desk. My guess is that these people didn't want to pay the $15/day parking and Embassy Suites doesn't enforce the 20 minute rule since all those spots are filled overnight.
Manager Response: Dear Michael, thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.   I’m glad to hear the staff, service and accommodation made for a great stay.  Both the parking garage and exterior spaces are monitored for overnight parking.  We hope to see you back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We loved the fresh cooked to order breakfast and the evening receptions. Well kept and rooms were spacious. Staff were very personable and overall a very well managed hotel. Kudo's to the management team,
Manager Response: Dear Crownanaheim, thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share this awesome five star review.  I’m so glad to hear the staff, service and accommodation exceeded expectations.  We hope to see you and the family back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Not what it use to be
Summary: We stayed said here before and was pretty good. this last week was just ok.. ... Went to the happy hour and it was so under staff and crowded, so we ended up going elsewhere. Same for breakfast no place to sit down and the waiting time for eggs was about 25 minutes. Again very under staff.. II called the front desk to get  a later check out and they said only 15 min more and they ended up giving us an extra hour, but almost sounded unhappy to give it to us. Overall I think the night was ok, however next time i don't think we will stay there.
Manager Response: Dear Ed, thank you for your recent stay and I apologized that we missed the mark.  The hotel runs at maximum occupancy across summer and our staffing is increased to make sure we are able to take care of all guest needs.  I hope you will give us another chance to make this right and please feel free to contact me directly any time at the hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: two rooms for the price of one
Summary: large suites...two nice big rooms...just like getting two rooms for the price of one....and they are very very nicer...well furnished...the hotel is very attractive inside and the people are very nice
Manager Response: Dear Lowell, thank you for your recent stay and that our suite accommodations gave you plenty of room to spread out.  We appreciate the five star review and friendly staff comments.  We hope to see you back again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great location to stay if you have activities planned in the Southern California area.  The staff is very friendly and accommodating.  Each time I stay, I experience excellent customer service.  The rooms are clean, the furnishings are very good, the breakfast and evening reception are a good way to start the day and end it.  Excellent value for the cost!
Manager Response: Dear Mark, thank you making the Embassy Suites Irvine your place to stay in Southern California.  We really appreciate the five star review and recommendation.  We hope to see you back again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Check-in was fast and easy. Rooms were very nice, this is what you expect from a newer Embassy Suites. It is very close to the airport. I would highly recommend this hotel whether traveling for business or leisure.
Manager Response: Dear Kari, thank you for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine for your most recent business trip.  Thanks for the awesome five star review and recommendation.  We hope to see you back again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel itself if your standard Embassy Suites which is to say very nice. Where this hotel shines are the staff ...everyone goes out of their way to make you comfortable. Only downside is the parking in the garage behind the hotel. A bit inconvenient and a charge. Instead, take the rental car back to the airport and use their local area-airport shuttle to get around.
Manager Response: Dear GBBB66, thanks for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine for your most recent business trip.  Great to hear you found the staff so accommodating and hope to see you back again really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Everything you expect from an Embassy Suites. Always enjoy the breakfast and happy hour!  Room was clean and service was good.  Water pressure was a bit low in the mornings, but not enough to really complain about.  Maybe something to do with California drought??  Good location for business in Irvine, LA, and SD.  I will come back to this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Roy, thanks for choosing the Embassy Suites Irvine for your most recent business trip.  Appreciate the kind words and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My family stayed for 2 nights for a weekend get a way. The room was clean and housekeeping was quick with the extra blankets, pillows and towels. The managers reception and breakfast was excellent as always with Embassy Suites. The only issue we had was the pool and jaccuzzi needed some serious attention.
Manager Response: Dear Windy, thanks for bringing the family for a weekend stay.  Glad to hear the accommodations and services were on par and hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel was clean and professional as always.  It was a good location for my business meetings in Newport Beach.  Centrally located and the front desk  employees went out of their way to be accommodating and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl, thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  We’re glad to hear that our location was perfect for your business and appreciate the kind comments regarding staff and cleanliness.  Hope to see you back again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: If you are already a Hilton Honors member like our family or if you like Embassy Suites like we do then you already know, these rooms all come with two rooms at least, some with two queens or one King room and a full sized pull out couch in the other room. Walk in to room you see pull out couch, table for office or computer supplies. Flat screen television, kitchen area has sink, microwave and small fridge. Hallway with large closet and marble floors. Large bathroom with door, supplied with hair dryer, lotion, shampoo, conditioner.... Plenty of fluffy towels. The master bedroom in our suite had a king bed with comfy bedding, flat screen television, vanity with ottoman and plenty of space for plugs and electronics. Downstairs, the central area is decorated modernly, the bar
Manager Response: Dear Anna, thank you for the fabulous 5 star review.  We are so glad you brought the family and stayed with us.  It sounds like you were able to take advantage of all the hotel amenities including the complimentary breakfast and evening receptions.  We’re also glad to hear that our Orange County location was close to everything you were looking for.  Thanks again and hope to see you and the family back again soon at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The best suite for the money, they treated us great and made us feel very relaxed and comfortable.  The evening wine and the breakfast made the stay that much more enjoyable. I would stay there again when we travel.
Manager Response: Dear Sammy, we appreciate the 5 star rating.  We’re happy to hear the glass of wine at the complimentary evening reception and breakfast in the morning were very enjoyable and we’re thankful for the awesome comment of our staff.  When you need some more of that relaxing time hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our stay was very pleasurable and exceeded our expectations...the free reception in the evenings were outstanding and the free breakfast in the mornings were wonderful. Easy walking distant to local resturants in the area. Would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: Dear George, thank you for the 5 star rating.  It’s always exciting to share with the staff that we exceeded guest expectations.  We’re serving that complimentary breakfast and evening reception daily so when you feel the need to come back to Orange County we hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I recently stayed at your hotel for business.  Your front desk was amazing especially Lawrence.  He was not only pleasant, but accommodating and a joy to speak with.  I work in an industry that is customer serviced based and I would say Lawrence has this down pat!  I will be back in September and look forward to seeing Lawrence again. I would highly recommend you make sure to treat Lawrence as the gem he is or someone will steal him away with his skills.    Free breakfasts were great as well as the free happy hour!  sbgoodin
Manager Response: Dear Shana, thank you for taking the time to share your experience and we really appreciate the 5 star review.  More than that, thank you for recognizing Lawrence and you are correct – he’s a keeper!  We’re looking forward to your next stay in September!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: good location room smelled and front desk did not resolve workout room was a sauna it was 80 degrees everyday I worked out parking was not worth it , the keys would not let you in and I spent too much time calling front desk , then going to front desk to get cards rekeyed  room was hot the entire time . we could not get temp under 70 the happy hour was lame  there were kids running around day and night
Manager Response: Dear Chrys, thank you for taking the time to share your experience and sorry to hear we missed the mark during your stay.  We did recently have an AC unit go down in the fitness center that required a special order for parts.  I am happy to say that this was resolved within a couple days and the unit is back to full strength.  We hope you will give us another opportunity to show you we’re more than just a great location and if I can be of assistance please feel free to contact me at the hotel anytime.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Hotel close to airport but nothing special
Summary: I chose this hotel as it was a 5 minute drive to Orange County Airport.  I am a platinum Hilton Honors member and expected this to be nice.  The first room they gave me was a small corner room which was right by the air conditioners.  The room literally vibrated so I asked to be changed.  They moved me to another room which was bigger and better.  I cannot imagine that they had not had complaints about this before.  I found this hotel to be noisy.  Make sure you are on the front side of the hotel and not back with the A/C units.  You have to park in an underground parking garage which is not close to the hotel.  When you check out, you have to drag your luggage down the steps to the garage - poor planning on their part.  Another thing that really turned me off was the morning
Manager Response: Dear Stargazer, thank you for taking the time to share your experience and sorry to hear we were less than a 5 star stay.  I’m glad we were able to move you into a larger suite and hope you will give us another opportunity to show you we’re more than just a great location.  I can be of assistance please feel free to contact me at the hotel anytime.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed for a week on a business trip and the staff was great from day one.  Thank you, Terry!  The food, bed, desk - all of this was perfect for me.  Biggest disappointment was the daily parking fee!  Waaaay too much.
Manager Response: Dear Carmen, thank you for taking the time to share your experience and comments about our team member, Terry.  It’s great to hear that your week long stay was fantastic and hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine again in the near future.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed for one night recently while attending a lacrosse tournament for my son. Great central location. Clean, comfortable room. I asked for a quiet location and got it! Breakfast is a welcome addition and adds to the value here. We ended up popping over to Downtown Disney for dinner and it was less than 15 minutes away. I would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Mary Anne, thank you for taking the time to share your experience and the 5 star review.  It’s great to hear that the accommodations, location and complimentary breakfast made for a great stay in Irvine and that you had time for a Disney visit.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine again in the near future.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed here for 4 days for a wedding. The room was nice, clean with comfy beds. But the staff was not friendly at all. So many Spanish speaking who too boot never smiled at you and the cooks made you wait and were so rude!
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. Williams, thank you for staying with us for the wedding and taking the time to share your experience.  We’re glad to hear that the accommodations were up to your expectations and sorry to hear that your interaction with team members was less than perfect.  We will certainly sit down with the departments and share your experience as hospitality is our business and we look for nothing but the best from our associates.   We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine again in the near future.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My husband and I took a mini get away.  We are avid road cyclist so it was nice to ride from the hotel to Newport/Huntington Beach and back!  Great location and easy to get to the trails.  And because of the large size of the rooms we easily fit our bikes in the room.   The room was large and comfy.  Miss though having the mini kitchen (plates, silverware, hot plate) that Embassy Suites used to have.  Otherwise, the room was ample.  Love having the separate bedroom. Used the pool but the water was a bit cloudy. The evening reception was appreciated but we eat a clean diet and could not partake of the nachos and chex mix type of snacks.  Fruit or veggies would of been nice.   Breakfast was very good.  And being able to get a vegetarian omelet made with only egg whites and cheese
Manager Response: Dear Z4093XGdavidw, thank you for your recent stay and it’s great to hear the location was perfect for your cycling.  Irvine and the surrounding areas have the most open spaces, trails and bike path in all of Orange County so there’s definitely a reason to come back and explore.  It’s also great to hear that our breakfast options were a fit for your dietary needs.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine again in the near future.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Mostly nice place, some improvement needed
Summary: We are here for a wedding in Long Beach and chose this place based on location, amenities and cost. We were given a non-suite on arrival, much to our dismay. It was a corner room tucked away furthest from the elevator and very tiny. Sarah at the front desk arranged for us to get the king suite and we were very happy. The room was clean and tidy, with extremely fresh linens and comfortable bed and pillows. The customer service of every person working here was wonderful and helpful. The breakfast buffet was yummy, per usual with Embassy suites, but can get pretty darned crowded on the weekends. The furniture was very nice, with a great vanity in the master bedroom for women. The lighting was good and there was a decent sized work desk with power outlets.   The cons: parking cost
Manager Response: Dear Peetieswie, thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  I’m glad to hear that Sara was able to upgrade you from a studio to a suite and that you had a great breakfast experience.  I apologize for your challenges with the TV system and although our provider does have pay-per-view options there are over 30 free channels with many in HD.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine again in the near future.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Typical Embassy property (not a bad thing).  Room was clean.  Food was good.  I would think they should give free internet or maybe a bit less on the parking fees.  But no complains about the property, service or quality.
Manager Response: Dear Douglas, thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  I’m glad to hear that the accommodations and food were up to expectations.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine again in the near future.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great for Families with Budget, Close to everything!
Summary: Love the breakfast buffet, the rooms are suites, staff are friendly and helpful, and the location of the hotel is close to everything, driving distance to the beach, restaurant, and shopping malls. Great for families with budget the fact that the breakfast comes with the rate and it's not just continental breakfast,,, full on breakfast and the highlight is cook to order breakfast and alot of selection for kid's who are picky!
Manager Response: Dear Chiqui, thank you for your recent stay and sharing your comments.  We’re glad to hear that the accommodations were great and that the entire family loved the breakfast experience. We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine again in the near future.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great stay at a great hotel.  Value was amazing with the breakfast and nightly reception.  Hotel was clean staff was friendly and the rooms are amazing!  This is a great location for business and we were literally 5 minutes from John Wayne airport which is convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Christine, thank you for your recent stay and the awesome 5 star review.  Sounds like a great trip and we hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine again in the near future.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: It was our 45th anniversary, we requested a king suite and received a small studio, until I asked 4 times for a correction.  Finally we received a king suite, which was nice.  No one there mentioned our anniversary at all. Also my husband uses a cane to walk but did not receive any help with luggage, since parking was far for him.  We will not stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband travels for work, so my daughter & I wanted to go with him & hang out at the hotel & swim while he's working. The pool is teeny tiny and the spa & pool water stinks like feet!!! P-U!!! As soon as the water touches your skin, you are now clothed in stink!! The water isn't clear either! It's cloudy. The guy on the night shift didn't really care, so I asked again someone else this morning & they said they would let engineering know. But who knows when engineering will actually come check the chemicals! The front desk guy last night said "This is a busy time of year, so...." So that tells me you should check the chemical balance more often!! P-U!! Embassy Suites... Your pool stinks!!!! Literally!
Manager Response: Dear TwinklesMom3,   I was very sorry to hear about your experience while staying with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine. I am truly not aware of anything that would have caused our Jacuzzi to have cloudy or tainted water. We take pride in checking and maintaining the water quality of our pool and Spa on a daily basis. Our Engineering staff continuously monitors and documents all chemical readings to ensure our water quality meets or exceeds all Federal, State and local, regulations. We do value you as a guest and appreciate your feedback.   Thank you, Joseph Comaduran Dir. Of Engineering

Summary: This hotel is very nice and clean, great location.  All the staff members are a pleasure and they make your stay a good one. Complimentary Breakfast and Evening reception makes this Embassy Suites the place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Dena.  Thank you for your most recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate the kind staff comments and glad to hear you were able to take advantage of our complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We hope to see you back really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights during a softball tournament. Entered room to shower and shave and shower select knob is broken and went to shave the sink is broken. Also realized the lock on the bathroom door is, you guessed it, broken too. Instead of insulting guests with an outrageous $15 dollar per night parking fee, why not just add it to the price of the room (if you need the money that bad) instead of finding out at check-in about this fee? At that point what am I going to say, that I don't want the room any longer and sleep on the street? Fee for wi-fi (no thanks and survived without t without paying the fee). Free breakfast, you get what you pay for, while a decent selection eggs were runny and bland, sausage was nasty (mystery meat), bacon was.. That was bacon? One day we
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect Hotel for Staying away from Home
Summary: Hotel worked perfect for my visit with my family in Irvine.  Reservation staff,  Front desk staff, Room accommodation, Restaurant and food, all were in sink.  Smiles on all  faces.  My compliments to the Manager.  Also, bed was very comfortable.  We had 2 rooms - front desk made sure we were on same floor. CH
Manager Response: Dear Claudette.  Thank you for your most recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We appreciate the kind staff comments and hope next time you are visiting family in Irvine that we’ll see you back at the Embassy Suites.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stay here once a month, and know almost all of the staff by name.  They are so friendly, they make me feel like family.  it is a home away from home.  very convenient to John Wayne Airport via hotel shuttle, say hello to Jim and Eduardo
Manager Response: Hello David and thanks so much for your continued loyalty to the Hotel.  We love the BSH bunch and look forward to your next stay.  I just stopped by the front desk to pass your message along to Jimmy who’s on shift this morning.  Until next time, have safe travels.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stay at Embassy Suites frequently and was impressed with their location and facility! The rooms were in great shape and were very clean as expected. Welcome reception was lively and breakfast was great. As one of the least expensive rooms you will pay for in the Anaheim/Disney area...you sure do get a lot of value. I believe there was a large renovation completed a couple of years ago and it shows with many interior upgrades. I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Brandon.  Thank you for your recent stay and the awesome five star review.  We appreciate your loyalty and great to hear your experience from start to finish was spot on.   Our central location for Orange County keeps us nearly 15-20 minutes from everything including Anaheim and the Disneyland Resort.  Thank you for the recommendation and we hope to have you back to the hotel soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Booked this hotel for our softball team. What an awesome experience! Checked all the boxes on our list: generously sized suites, cook-to-order breakfast, on-site laundry facilities (detergent even provided!), evening reception with complimentary adult beverages, wi-fi, newspapers, and later than normal checkout. Daily on-site parking is the only additional charge and it was $5. The hotel is also conveniently located near the Orange County Airport and free shuttle service is provided to the Airport and for a 3 mile radius, with many restaurants nearby. The marketing staff that arranged the block (Jasmine and Mo) couldn't have been easier or nicer to work with. All the staff at the hotel were also very friendly and helpful. Hands-down, our team's favorite hotel!!!
Manager Response: Dear Softballmom532.  Thanks for the awesome review and checking all 5 boxes!!!  We really appreciate your mention of our sales team, Jasmine and Moe.  They work tirelessly all year to make sure that our visiting sports team have a great and hopefully “winning” experience at the hotel.  Thank you for making us your favorite and we hope to see you back for the next local tournament.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This room is spacious in comparing with other Embassy Suite.  I have been stayed with many Embassy Suite hotels, this's the only one offers breakfast until 9am so far. The front desk person didn't mention the breakfast schedule to us upon our arriving, so we missed the breakfast next morning. When I got to downstair @9:30am next morning, they're in the middle of cleaning up. I asked if I could get something for our family, the gentleman (who's pretty rude) refused. I had to negotiate with them. I told them I am the Hilton gold member, and I never had such issue with other Embassy Suites. Finally, one of the service ladies offered me some yogurt, breads and bananas that I appreciated her very much.  If I didn't have the morning glitch, I would say it's a good stay
Manager Response: Dear Peace96.  Thank you for your recent stay and I’m sorry to hear about your breakfast experience.  It’s our standard to review both breakfast and the evening reception hours upon arrival and sounds like we missed this opportunity.  Our complimentary breakfast hours follow the Embassy Suites standard and are 6am – 9am Monday through Friday and 7am – 10:30am on weekends and major holidays.  I am happy to hear that one of our associates was able to deliver you some breakfast items.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Stayed at this property for 3 days for business in the area.  For a near-airport hotel, this was a good experience.     The noise and traffic were not too bad in the area, expect for normal congestion during rush hours.  The hotel was clean overall - slightly worn, but its a hotel - and friendly staff from my experience.  As others have said, the breakfast is outstanding for free,  and there is plenty of seating unlike some dining areas.  I found the room to be sizable and comfortable;  just fine for business travel.  There were 3 elevators which never had long waits from the upper floors.  Maybe I got lucky, but it seems like someone configured these properly for a change.   Parking was $10 daily.  Not ideal but understood for the area given limited space.  Outside of business
Manager Response: Dear IndyTravel999.  Thank you for your recent stay and we as well hope it’s sooner than later.  Thank you for the great comments and glad you were able to experience a few of the great local areas in your off time.  We’re at the center of Orange County with most everything just 15-20 minutes from the hotel.  If we can offer any suggestions please let us know.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: easy place for quick overnight stay, easy location and near everything ie shopping, restaurants, etc. Only problem was the smell of inside room, not fresh smell...  Evening reception, i hope it had little more selections!
Manager Response: Dear Matthew.  Thank you for your recent stay and glad to hear the location worked well for you.  The hotel is located within three miles of two major shopping facilities and we do have a great variety of restaurants close to the hotel.   We hope the next time you’re looking for a quick getaway to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The reservation clerk were not very honest with me and caused me to lose time and money because of gas and driving time. The staff was friendly but the location was in a area that did not have sufficient eating facilities.
Manager Response: Dear Ricardo.  Thank you for your recent stay and I do recall your comments appearing on the Hilton survey.  We’re glad you found the staff friendly and we certainly apologize that during the reservation process our hotel was confused with another Embassy Suites location.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is in the middle of office parks, so would be business clientele.  Happy hour daily.  Infrastructure is aging with quite noisy A/C in the rooms, which is fine if you're just in the bedroom, but if you want to use the pull-out, noise could be a concern.  I changed rooms over this, but same thing.   Service was good.  Beds comfortable.   Very nice open atrium, perhaps this was a Hyatt in a former life.  Overall is fine, but showing some wear.
Manager Response: Dear Tinger17.  Thank you for your recent stay and for the positive service comments as we love to share this with our associates.  We are committed to the upkeep of our hotel and have some great upcoming projects in the pipeline.  We hope if travel brings you back to Orange County that we will see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is a very clean and appealing hotel. It is conveniently located and easy to find.  The beds are very comfortable and linen fresh and crisp and of better quality than most hotels. Good front desk service,   No free parking and no internet service in lobby.  For a business hotel this is a must.
Manager Response: Dear Dieter, thank you for your recent stay.  We’re very glad to hear that the hotel location was easy to find and conveniently located for your business needs.  Great to hear your positive service comments and we look forward to your next stay.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Attended a convention during my stay that was just up the street. Great location and service. Loved the breakfast too! My ac wasn't working the first night, but as soon as i called maintenance in the morning, they had it fixed within an hour. Very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Alexis, thank you for the great 5 star review.  We’re so glad to hear the location was perfect for your convention.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine on your next trip whether it’s for business or pleasure.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed at the Embassy Suites in Irvine near the John Wayne Airport this past week while in CA on business.  We had a great stay as you can never really go wrong with Embassy.  The food was great and the rooms were very clean.  My only gripe was the internet seemed pretty slow.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear JSIEGELUF,  thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  Always great to hear that the food was great and the suites clean.  We appreciate your Embassy Suites loyalty and are looking forward to your next stay in Irvine/Orange County.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Ok for Business, great desk staff
Summary: Stayed at the hotel for three days and the room was OK except the A/C.  It took the staff to show me to get the room to 72 you had to set the thermostat at 60.  Crazy way to work but I adapted.  I also thought the parking changes should have been included in the room rate.    Walking distance restaurants were excellent and they will be the reason I return to this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Tim, thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  Thanks for the comments and glad that the walking distance restaurants and location makes us a prime choice on your next trip to Irvine.  We’re looking forward to your next stay and please let us know if there’s anything we can do to make it an even better stay.      Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: A little pricey, but probably because of the great location.  Some union protesters (housekeepers) were picketing at the entrance very early in the morning.  Could hear them in my room on the 7th floor.  Wasn't a big deal, as I was already awake for the day.  Day shift shuttle driver was great.  Quick airport pick-up.
Manager Response: Dear TEF2125, thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  I am happy to hear that overall the stay was good and our location for your business was just a shuttle ride away from the airport.  We look forward to seeing you on your next stay in Irvine/Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel, we did have problems but they made it right.
Summary: Our room was at a cozy 80 degrees for all three nights of our stay and even after numerous calls to the front desk it was never fixed.  The temp outside was 100+.  We finally were able to speak to the manager....after leaving a message with the sales director, and he really did make everything right.  Overall I do recommend staying here.  As always, the benefits that separate Embassy Suites from other hotels are fabulous.  We love the breakfasts and the additional living space for our family.
Manager Response: Dear Toypup13, thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  I do apologize for the rather warm weather you experienced and that your suite was running a little warm.  I do appreciate you sharing and giving us the opportunity to “Make It Right” during your stay.  We do hope that you will choose Embassy Suites Irvine again for your future travels to Orange County and not just because we have awesome omelets.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had the opportunity to stay at this hotel twice in the last 3 months.  The staff is very helpful and eager to please.  The Suites are spotless and roomy.  The breakfast bar each morning is staffed with two cooks who make your selections to order, with a serve yourself area to compliment  your choice.   The evening Happy Hour also provides a great selection which also includes beverages. Easy access to the 405 Freeway and 55 Freeway, close to Orange County Airport.
Manager Response: Dear Redbird918, thank you for the great 5 star review and for visiting with us twice in the last three months.  Thank you for sharing your experience in our spacious suites, the complimentary breakfast and evening reception.  We’re looking forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I arrived from Northern California on a Friday night the front desk staff were friendly, professional "Daniel and Moe" were my favorites.. I was impressed with happy hour all drinks were complimentary.. The morning breakfast was also free. The menu for breakfast was so complete 5 star for sure..I would stay there again..The only thing that was of any concern was the carpet in the hallways were stretch and could possibly become a hazard but I was impressed by everyone and service was 5 star for me.
Manager Response: Dear Linda, thank you for the awesome 5 star review and for recognizing Daniel and Moe.  We’ve made sure to pass your note along with a “Catch of the Day” for them both.  It’s great to hear you loved the breakfast and evening reception and we are currently in the approval process to replace guest corridor carpet.  We hope to see you back again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great stay even with upgrades taking place
Summary: Checked in and saw many workers around in the guest rooms doing upgrades.  It was not of any concern to me and they were quiet and the hotel was still comforting.  I love the location of this hotel, right on the San Francisco Bay Trail, perfect for my 3 mile run after dinner and late night cigar stroll!
Manager Response: Dear Brian, thank you for the 5 star review; however, sounds like you’ve mixed us up with our sister hotel near San Francisco area which we do love as well.  If you are ever in Irvine/Orange County we can point you in the direction of some great walking areas.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Staff was wonderful, rooms clean and very large. Fantastic breakfast that i was surprised was complimentary. Very close to the airport which is helpful. The staff also provided directions to some local grocery stores which we appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear Tina, thank you for the 5 star review and so glad to hear that you had a great stay and that you loved our complimentary breakfast.   We appreciate your kind comments about the staff’s helpfulness and look forward to your next stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have stayed at this property before due to its location. It has always been hit or miss. Sometimes the hotel is good and sometimes it fails to meet basic expectations.  This time I checked into my room, and I found the bathroom was dirty and the towels had not been changed out. I brought the dirty towels down to the fronnt desk to show the manager on duty. The room also smelled stale.  Regarding the food and beverage experience, the breakfast area has been dramatically improved. It was actually clean.  As far as the manager's reception, I have spoken with Svetlana Cahill (hotel G.M.) about this in the past. It was disappointing three years ago, and it still has not improved. Foul tasting, cheap, liquor and the still the same tortilla chips and COLD nacho cheese.  This is my
Manager Response: Dear WineAuctioneer,  I sincerely would like to thank you for your most recent return stay and do appreciate your time to share comments.  I do apologize for missing the mark on housekeeping issues and any inconvenience.  Cleanliness is one of our key values and your experience was not up to our standard.
