One of our core pillars at Embassy Suites is the complimentary reception because it’s something guests do not get at almost any other hotel.  The evening reception features a full array of complimentary beverages, beer, wine and cocktails along with a variety of lite snacks which are rotated daily.  We’ve increased the number of healthy selections and have never included hot items.  Additionally, we have a full selection of craft beers and premium spirits available for purchase at our Ha'Penny Pub.  Thank you again for your time and opinion and we are looking forward to welcoming you back in the near future.   If I can be of any further assistance, please do not hesitate to contact me directly at Swietalna.cahill2@hilton.com.  Best regards, Swietlana General Manager

Summary: I would highly recommend this hotel -- Embassy Suites at Irvine, CA. The hotel is located within walking distance from the John Wayne Airport, and very close to the pacific coast.  Has friendly, willing to help staff, and serves an excellent breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Ata, thank you for the 5 star review and so glad to hear that you had a great stay and that the staff was very accommodating.  We hope you have a return planned soon.  There are some great attractions in just about every direction from the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The two-room suites make it a really nice place to stay for a reasonable price, especially if you have multiple people staying there.   The toilet runs a lot, but I'm not sensitive to noises, so it didn't really bother me.  The free breakfast was of excellent quality.  The chef makes superb omelettes with lots of optional vegetables you can mix in.  Their sleeper sofa is very comfortable too by the way.
Manager Response: Dear Timothy, thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your story.  We love the two room suites and our queen-size sofa sleepers in the parlors do have six inch memory foam mattresses for your comfort.  I’m also glad to hear that the family enjoyed breakfast.  Hope to see you back at the Hotel in the near future.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This Embassy Suites perfectly serves our needs, for my husband and me as a couple, and for me by myself. It is a great location close to the airport and close to the home where my son and daughter in law, and new granddaughter live.  It is ideal for me, for example, as it was on my last trip to visit my new granddaughter for Mother's Day and it was very comfortable and nice to have a breakfast and to use the fitness center.  Everyone who works there is so friendly and helpful and I plan on staying there whenever I go to Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Kristin, thank you for your recent stay and glad to hear you had a great Mother’s Day.  We hope you come to visit the family soon and look forward to having you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I brought a tour group through on the way to visit colleges.  The accommodations were excellent, the staff was helpful, and the price was great.  Our contact, Jasmine Stewart, was wonderful.  The location is central for exploring the area.  Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Aaron, thank you again for bringing back your annual student group to explore Orange County.  We always look forward to your group and thank you for recognizing our Senior Sales Manager, Jasmine.  Until next time have a great summer!  Best regards, Ken   Director of Sales

Summary: The location of the hotel is good.  It is located right near the airport.  Breakfast was delicious, especially the omelets and french toast.  The rooms are very nice.  You should be sure to get one with a window facing the atrium.
Manager Response: Dear 506cynthial, thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share your experience.  I’m so happy to hear that you and your family had a great time and that breakfast was very enjoyable.  We hope that travel brings you back to the Embassy Suites Irvine in the near future.  Best regards, Ken   Director of Sales

Summary: Spent a single night for a quick getaway with my husband.  Staff is nice but hotel is not super clean and getting housekeeping to respond wasn't quick or easy. Managers reception was ok, snacks were below average. Breakfast is good, nice to have cooked to order.
Manager Response: Dear Bryndley, thank you for your recent stay and your nice comment regarding our staff.  Cleanliness is a top priority at our Hotel and I do apologize that we did not deliver a perfect “10” stay for you and your husband.  We do hope that if your are traveling back to Orange County that you will consider a repeat stay with us.  Best regards, Ken   Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel has problems. The staff is trying to unionize and as a result they are not doing anything even remotely similar to any Hilton property.  Last evening I ordered room service. My server asked that I call to have my tray removed or leave it outside to be picked up later. I left it outside at 6:15 PM and so did 25+ other guests apparently because it is now 1:10 PM the next day and everyone's trays, mine included, are where they were left last night. If you are wondering housekeeping came by hours ago. The tray is still there.  Today I went down for breakfast, arriving at 9:03 AM, only to find the buffet area being cleaned. I asked if they were still serving breakfast to a server who responded with major attitude as follows "Breakfast ends at 9:00". Not I'm sorry we serve
Manager Response: Dear PK, thank you for your recent stay and I’m very sorry to hear that we did not deliver to your expectations.  While I am glad to hear that the suite conditions were immaculate your experience at breakfast was not at the service level we expect for all guests.  Your comments are not taken lightly and have been reviewed with our Food & Beverage team.  We appreciate your loyalty to Hilton and Embassy Suites and hope that if you are back in the Orange County area that you will give us a second opportunity to make it right.  Please reach out to me directly for any assistance I can offer on future stays at ken.beck@hilton.com  Best regards, Ken   Director of Sales

Summary: -Friendly and fast check in. -Parking convenient, but a charged $15.00  a day. -Restaurant area clean but carpeted area's showing age. -Room was clean but furniture is in pretty bad shape, stained. -Bathroom cleanliness above average, carpet in room is also showing age. -Bed comfortable and room was quiet. -Wireless is offered for a charge and the speeds are awful.  No wired access offered in room.  Why is it so hard to offer decent internet speeds without charging after $159 room and $15    parking?   -Strictly average other than the staff who were excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Mark, thank you for your recent stay and taking time to leave comments on your experience.  I’m very happy to hear your experience with the staff was good.  We are currently looking at upgrades to our Internet service and public area carpet replacement.  It’s always our goal to have the property fresh for a great guest experience.  We hope that if your travel brings you back to Orange County that we will see you again at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken   Director of Sales

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel three times.  Each time, I was impressed by the facility, the staff, and the offerings (restaurant, bar, fitness center, etc.).  The hotel is also very conveniently located next to SNA airport and I-405, in the center of Irvine's business district.  Quality restaurants are close by.
Manager Response: Dear GSNUSMC – Thank you for your most recent stay and we were so glad to have you back.  We appreciate the great comments on service and location.  We appreciate your service to our country and look forward to your next stay in Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had went to Irving to attend a relatives wedding. We were originally going to stay on the USAF base in San Pedro, but decided to stay with family at this hotel instead. We are so glad we changed our minds. Our stay at the Embassy Suites was outstanding. The rooms were spacious, the breakfast was wonderful, the staff was attentive and professional. I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear rengstrom230, thank you for making that choice to stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  I’m so glad to hear that your stay was great and the staff exceeded expectations.  We appreciate the thumbs up referral and hope to see you back at the hotel in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We were in town for my parents 50th wedding anniversary. Several family members stayed at this hotel. At first we were concerned because there were several youth groups staying at the hotel that weekend, but the security and hotel staff did an excellent job of keeping them under control. The noise was kept to a minimum, and we were able to access the brunch on Sunday. All of us were satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear Kelly, thank you for staying with us for your parent’s 50th anniversary.  I’m glad to hear it was a great experienced and that the staff was out there taking care of all our guests.  We hope that when you’re back in Orange County that you’ll be back with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Outstanding service from first contact to checkout for group of 20 rooms per day, 85 guests. Sales department took care of everything necessary, assisted with party planning, bus and truck parking and the staff went out of their way to make everyone feel like they were the only guest in the hotel.  Beautiful property for being so close to Disneyland, Segerstrom Hall and easy access to freeways.  Already working on next year! Only 4 out of 5 for spa as difficult fitting 75 high school kids into spa.
Manager Response: Dear Rim2RimFlagstaff – Thanks again for allowing us to host the band.  You were a great group and we’re looking forward to your return next year.  We’re so glad the students, parents and chaperons had an enjoyable stay and our location was central to all your activities.  Have a great summer vacation!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I booked this hotel just to get away, I really love this place, I'm coming back. The free breakfast with Omelette bar food was very good and the free happy hour really came at the perfect time for us. I will definitely come back with hubby again.
Manager Response: Dear 283elsal, thanks for making the Embassy Suites Irvine your getaway destination.  We’re so glad to hear that you had a great stay and look forward to seeing you again soon.  We’re cooking up a great complimentary breakfast seven days a week!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The service at this Hotel was excellent.  Loved their made to order complimentary breakfast and the evening snacks and drinks.  It was only a short distance from the Irvine Park and Discovery Science Center.  Will definitely stay at the Hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Debra, thanks for your recent stay and sharing.  Glad to hear our location was perfect to area activities like Irvine Park and the Discovery Science Center.  Hope you got to play in the bubbles.  Thank you for the nice comments on great guest service and we look forward to seeing you again really soon..  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: One of the best hotels I ever stayed at. The rooms are spacious, modern, clean and really nice. The bed is comfortable. The evening reception was fun! And the breakfast was fresh and had good quality food. I really wouldn't change a thing about this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Jessy, thank you for your recent stay and talking this time to post these wonderful comments.  I’m so glad to hear everything was perfect and we hope you have a return trip soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We had a family Barmitzvah and took 6 rooms. The staff were amazing and we were extremely comfortable in the rooms and was fun having breakfast in the mornings. Would definitely stay there again. I needed change and the hotel did not have enough--one of the staff offered to drive me to a bank in one of their shuttle buses. I was very impressed.
Manager Response: Dear Rita – Thank you for bringing your family Bar Mitzvah group to our Hotel.  I’m always so happy to read stories about great family vacations and glad we were able to exceed your expectations.  We hope to see you back again and thanks for telling your friends about the Embassy Suites Irvine. Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Nice, clean hotel with friendly staff. However, we awoke to screaming protestors very early in the morning (prior to dawn) who were clearly unhappy with Embassy Suites. This made our stay extremely disappointing and no attempt was made to apologize or compensate us for this inconvenience.
Manager Response: Dear Tamara – Thank you for your recent stay and I sincerely apologize that your visit was disrupted by people outside of the Hotel.  Our motto is “Make it Right” and based on your story it does seem that we felt short.  I’d be happy to further discuss your stay and can be contacted anytime at ken.beck@hilton.com  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is totally above par.  I have absolutely no complaints.  The staff are super friendly, the food is great and the morning complimentary buffet is better than any restaurant I've been to for breakfast.  The suite was immaculate, room service was prompt and exact.  I will definitely pay a little more to stay here when I'm in Irvine.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa – Thank you for your recent stay and “Best Stay Ever” comment.  I really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience and we look forward to your next Orange County visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We flew from Scotland to a family wedding in Irvine and booked in to this hotel for 4 nights.  We were so impressed not only with the accommodation ( Very spacious living room and bedroom ) but with all the facilities provided from the very attractive atrium lay out to the excellent breakfast and the free bar from 5pm to 7pm(which was greatly appreciated) There was also a keep fit room and an indoor pool.   In short we felt it was up to 5* level we can get in UK and all for a very modest price. All in all   EXCELLENT1
Manager Response: Dear kelshergirl -  All the way from the UK to the Embassy Suites Irvine for a wedding!  Thank you for choosing our hotel and sharing your great experience.  I’m so glad to hear that the suite and other amenities made the trip a success and superb value.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great for families. During our stay children were running around unattended for most of the time. During the excellent reception deal the same thing-children out of control. Parents seemed more interested in chatting like they were at their own homes rather than a hotel and generally ignored their kids. If you are looking for a romantic getaway stay somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear 651shellya – I’m sorry to hear that your stay was less than perfect.  Whether our guests are here on family travel or a romantic getaway they all deserve a quality experience.  I do apologize that your stay was disrupted by other guests and can assure you our team does everything possible to ensure a safe and peaceful hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Excellent staff! Great value! The staff was able to accommodate our family after the 5.1 earthquake to a lower floor almost immediately after the quake at my request! Truly a great staff (especially the night manager and his crew that night), clean surroundings, good security at night to keep down the rowdiness of large groups.  Would be my "go to" hotel whenever I'm in Irvine!
Manager Response: Dear Harry – So glad to hear the staff pulled through for you during the earthquake.  We are looking forward to your next not so “shaky” stay in Southern California.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: very comfortable close location to Musink Festival great complimentary Breakfast ! There were alot of people from the event staying at this hotel as well very cool to see them there after the days events or in the morning  really nothing bad to say about stay it was  very enjoyable for my wife and I .
Manager Response: Dear Shaun - Thank you for your recent stay during the Musink Festival and very glad to hear that you and your wife had a great experience.  We hope to see you back next year if not sooner.  There's always something fun going on in Orange County including the OC Fair this summer.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have always really enjoyed staying at Embassy Suites...the cost includes an awesome breakfast, and a manager's reception with drinks and snacks if you make it back in early enough in the evening (5:30 to 7:30), the two-room suites are perfect for families, decent housekeeping, etc...This stay, however, was a disaster!  We did not have internet connection in our suite.  We tried connecting since we are HHonors member AND AT&T customer, but it will not connect.  AT&T have really crap cell coverage at the hotel, so we could not use our phone's cellular service to go online.  Finally, I went to the lobby and tried to go online in their business center (take a nap because the connection is like dial-up).  All I want to do is order some theme park tickets!  I come out of the
Manager Response: Dear J.C., thank you for your recent stay and I sincerely apoligize for your Inernet experience at the Hotel.  The Hilton Stay Connected system for WiFi runs much better then you experienced so not sure if there was a system issue or location of your suite which just did not work to your satisfaction and needs to get attraction tickets.  I will share this with our chief engineer.  If you could let me know what webpage you were using regarding parking I'd very much like to make sure that our information is current.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This Embassy suites is one of two in the area so make sure that when you get in a cab at the airport you know which one you are going to.  This is a good choice in the area.  The large comfortable rooms, good service and fabulous short order breakfasts make it a pleasure to stay there.  The room was also impeccably clean (and I’m picky about hotel cleanliness).  Do check you bill. I will mistakenly charged for parking even though I had not car.  It was quickly removed from my bill.
Manager Response: Dear Consultantgal, thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  We’ve very happy to hear that the accommodations and services meet your expectations.  We’re looking forward to your next Stay at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  PS – we do have complimentary shuttle service from John Wayne Airport.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This property has great rooms, spacious suites and awesome service for happy hour.  The driver, a girl who usually works at the Front Desk was very helpful and friendly when she drove us around on their complimentary shuttle service.
Manager Response: Dear Brian - Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  I'm glad to hear that our facilities exceeded your expectations and that our front desk staff was delivering the great service.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine really soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Clean hotel with great service from the airport shuttle to check in and a great reception with Art the bartender!  The rooms are nice, updated, and the bed is very comfortable.  Great staff with friendly professional employees.
Manager Response: Dear Patrick  – Thank you so much for your recent stay and such wonderful comments.  I’m looking forward to sharing your comments to Art and our evening reception team.  Next time you are in Irvine we hope to see you at the Embassy Suites again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The rooms were average not super modern but suitable for our stay.  Beds were comfy & the rooms were clean.  Even the pull out sofa bed was ok.  They have all of the standard amenities in the room.  The fridge is nice size to store your beverages.  Good location if you want to be close to the airport.  It’s a business area so not much going on.  It’s Cali so food places are close by but driving close not really walking distance.  I enjoy Embassy’s because of the fresh breakfast that’s always included!  They also have the cocktail hour but didn't have time to enjoy it.  Staff was friendly overall an enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Luv-2-travel-36DD  – Thank you so much for your recent stay and such wonderful comments.  It’s always great to hear about a fantastic experience and sorry you were not able to take advantage of the complimentary evening reception.  Next time you are in Irvine we hope to see you at the Embassy Suites again.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is an excellent Embassy Suites.  Extremely stylish and clean.  Great service, and great location!  The rooms are very impressive.  A nice living room with desk for working, comfy couch and HDTV.  Bedroom is excellent with another HDTV.  Kitchenette is perfect with fridge and microwave.  Spacious bathrooms.  I would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen – Thank you so much for your recent stay and such wonderful comments.  It’s always great to hear about a fantastic experience and we hope when travel brings you back to Orange County that we’ll see you at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: overpriced,uncomfortable, stuff rooms. poor customer service
Summary: no ventilation in bathroom. A/C very weak. Room gets very stuffy. WIFI is super slow and $8/day. Parking 15/night. room 179/night. These are ridiculous prices for this class of hotel in this poor a quality. A very poor representation of Irvine and Orange County. This hotel is not at all representative of the high level of quality that is expected in Irvine. Bed is uncomfortable.  So in summary of the negatives. expensive, many surcharges, poor A/C, uncomfortable bed, poor wifi, poor ventilation and stuffy room. The positives the lobby looks nice. the breakfast is very good. The location is convenient to the airport and 405 freeway. The evening happy hour is free so can't complain about something that's free.  If you can get a competetive rate for this hotel than the
Manager Response: Dear Djayomid, Thank you for your recent stay and I’m sorry to hear we didn’t meet all your expectations.  I am glad to hear that our location, breakfast and evening reception were enjoyable.  I’ve rarely heard a mention regarding our beds which are top quality hotel beds and would be happy to discuss your stay further at your leisure.  You can reach me anytime at ken.beck@hilton.com  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Careful, you have to pay for internet access PER DEVICE at this location.  Heaven help a family of 4 with multiple laptops or tablets, your bill could go up by 50 a night at least.  At least the breakfast was good, and the staff very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Andrew - Thank you for your recent stay and comments.  Although our Hilton Stay Connected WiFi system does track users by individual MAC addresses we do credit those charges so that there is only one daily charge for Internet.  Please contact our Front Office Manager, John Pease, or myself and we'd be happy to Make this Right.  I was glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the free breakfast.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites on your next trip.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: After doing alot of research we chose the embassy suites. We stayed simply for a valentines getaway. We chose this hotel for it's location but mostly for the made to order omelette bar. We were not disappointed breakfast was first class and expertly prepared. We will be back...
Manager Response: Dear Michele - So glad to hear your Valentine's Getaway was great.  Next time your craving an omelet or just a night a way we hope it will be back at the Embassy Suites.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I was in Irvine for business.  Location to airport and business complex was perfect.  Hotel staff was fantastic.  First room I was given was on ground floor.  I walked into room and it smelled like skunk.  I walked into bathroom and saw bug crawling in tub.  I went to front desk and was given a new room on upper floor.  This room was perfect.  Breakfast was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Robert - Thank you for your recent stay and comments.  So glad to hear that the hotel's location was perfect and that you enjoyed your stay.  I will certainly share your overall comments with the rest of our staff.  On your next business or leisure trip to Irvine we hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I had to be in OC for a meeting and decided last minute to take the family and do a Disneyland trip as well.  I found a great deal at this Embassy Suites and booked it.  The hotel is clean and in a safe and quiet area, which was great.  It was close to South Coast Plaze and several other shopping aread.  The accommodations were good but not great...much of the furniture in the room was a bit outdated and needed replacing.  The TV's in the room have limited channels and you have to pay even for the kids shows (on Disney Channel, Cartoon Network, etc.).  It is a suite, but don't expect a true suite feel.  The "Kitchenette" is a sink and a VERY MINI fridge (barely fits small water bottles).  The hotel site said it was 8 miles away from Disneyland, but it was more like 15 miles
Manager Response: Dear VCAngels - Thank you for your recent stay and for bringing the family.  I'm going to check our webpage for the Disneyland mileage as you are correct and should read 12 miles.  I'm very happy to hear that our location worked out very well for your trip and that you had great service including the complimentary breakfast.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Embassy Suites have complementary breakfast but this location in particular has a wider, nicer, cleaner area, food doesn't run out, is a great place to stay, specially if you are not familiar with the area.
Manager Response: Dear Guest - thank you for your recent stay and very happy to hear you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast.  If travel brings you back to Irvine we hope to see you back at the Enbassy Suites.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Not all Embassy Suites are created equal.  They are individually owned & managed.  This one was ok.  3 night business trip.  Convenient to the high rise businesses, but lifeless area, unwalkable and without personality.  The good:  breakfasts, free and pretty decent.  On site pub is small and ok.  Rooms are a good size.  The bad:  they have a labor problem.  A union pickets in the morning & from the credible folks I spoke to on the picket line, this particular ESuites pays their workers poorly & refuses reasonable work related requests (like allowing the one armed, middle aged Hispanic woman a vacuum cleaner equiped with a handle that would make it easier for her to push).  My room felt warn (in fact, the shower didn't work until they replaced the entire faucet) and warm --
Manager Response: Dear 66 - Thank you for your recent stay and for sharing comments.  I'm sorry to hear that your stay was less than perfect.  There is no labor dispute at the Hotel and I can confidently state that the Hotel pay scale is at the top of the Irvine market.  Once again, I'm terribly sorry if people from the local union in any way disrupted your stay.  This is certainly not the goal or mission of our Hotel and enthusiastic team members.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The people make the difference at this location.  Good hotel and nice amenities.    But the staff really shined.  They were friendly, helpful, and most important, capable.  Room service food was great and was delivered 10 minutes ahead of promised time.  Had a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Peter - Thank you for your recent stay and great comments about the staff and service.  Thank you for the Gem reference which is our Embassy Green.  We hope to see you back again real soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great Hotel -Except for Internet and Parking
Summary: Embassy Suites is my go to hotel.  I love having the extra space in the rooms especially when I am travelling with my children.  The breakfast buffet and cooked to order items please even my finicky eater.  This hotel is conveniently located off the 405 near the airport.   However, I dislike that they charge for internet access ($7.95/day) and parking ($15/day).   I got a great deal on a non-refundable rate but definitely would rethink staying if I were paying full price.
Manager Response: Dear TheMom79 – Thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  I’m glad to hear that your overall experience was a success and that the location was good for your family.  Nearly all Hotels in Irvine have parking charges and we do keep ours on the lower end of the spectrum.  If travel brings you back to Irvine please check our website for packages including Internet and/or parking.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We have a son in the area and this was a great place to stay to see them. The room was great, the breakfast outstanding and the service marvlous. We will stay there again. It is in a quiet area but has a lovely area to walk around. Not South Coast Plaza but quiet at night.
Manager Response: Dear Lhosix  - Thank you for your recent stay and glad to hear our location was so close to your family.  Thank you for the nice comments about the rooms and service and on your next visit please stop by the front desk if you need a ride to South Coast Plaza or The District.  Both shopping areas are within range for our courtesy shuttle.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Free internet facility to be provide in the rooms. other than this every things are fine. Internet wifi is charging $ 7.98 is too much it has to be free considering the hotel room cost. however this a good experience & recommended by our business partner to stay in this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Tuan – Thank you for joining us all the way from Saudi Arabia.  I’m glad to hear your business partners recommended the Hotel and your stay was enjoyable.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine should travel return you to Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very clean nice hotel.  Room was super clean and very spacious.  Breakfast could be improved as pancakes were kept in a "steamer" so they were soggy. Getting the shuttle back and forth to the airport is super easy and very friendly drivers.  Would definitely use this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear BchBaby21 – Thank you for your recent stay and always happy to hear that the location was perfect and the suites spacious and super clean.  I will definitely share your comment about the pancakes with our food & beverage team.  99% of the time their breakfast execution is spot on, feeding up to 800 people a day.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Don't plan on relaxing here on the weekend.  Too many kids and parent gorging themselves on free food and alcohol.   Nice venue and clean facility.  Weekend clientele does not meet what you'd expect from this Hilton facility.
Manager Response: Dear Mark - I'm sorry to hear your weekend had some disruption.  We often run high occupancy on weekends with family and leisure travel to Orange County but rarely with any guest issue.  We do schedule additional staff and security on busy weekends to ensure that all of our guest have an equally enjoyable stay.   Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Nice size clean and comfortable 2 room suites.  Only complaint was the shower - fixture was dated and worn and the water pressure was low. The complimentary breakfast and manager's evening reception (but don't expect too much of the snacks!) are hard to beat. I generally stay here when on business and I added a weekend.  The hotel was very busy with families - the 2 room configuration is perfect for parents with kids. I have had to pay ($10) for parking in the past but it was free on this visit making for good overall value especially considering the OC location and being so close to John Wayne (SNA) airport. This hotel is definitely a good choice when staying in the Irvine area.
Manager Response: Dear UKNickUS  - Thank you for your loyalty and continued travel to the Hotel.  Glad to hear you mixed it up with a weekend stay.  We're looking forward to your next trip to Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Very Nice Accommodation for the money
Summary: Embassy Suites always deliver for us from the time we checked in until we checked out. The service is good, the room suites is nice and clean and food is great specially the cooked to order complimentary breakfast. We always look for Embassy Suites when we go travel somewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Marimil - So glad to have you back at the Hotel and that the Hotel and staff continue to deliver for you.  We love our complimentary breakfast and great to hear you do to!  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall experience was great.  Layout for breakfast needs improvement.  Items are not in intuitive locations.  Rooms are very clean.  Needed an extension cord for CPAP machine - Front Desk promptly had maintenance bring up to room.  Walk from parking lot/structure is lengthy.  Routinely saw security driving the grounds and parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear Mark - thank you for your recent stay and talking time to share your experience.  So glad to hear the hotel and staff delivered up to your expectations.  We hope to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Not what we expected from a usually fine hotel
Summary: Typical Embassy Suite Hotel from the outside. Hotel check-in staff very accommodating and friendly. Nice spacious two room suite, nicely equipped, and easy access. That's where it seemed to stop this stay. AC/heater unit ran like an old garage refrigerator. Loud when running and clunking sounds when it turns off. It seemed to gasp as if it was tired. After manually turning unit off, all we could hear is a constant hum or vibration of the hotel HVAC unit on the roof, we were on the top 10th floor. Also, don't be fooled with the "City View" and extra cost. Nothing like the beautiful San Diego skyline. When booking for someone sleeping on the soda bed, make sure there are enough pillows and blankets. Had to use pillows from the king bed. No extra pillows or blankets in the closet.
Manager Response: Dear iRland – thank you for sharing comments regarding your recent stay.  I sorry to hear we missed the overall mark on this stay and appreciate your past loyalty.  I have shared your comments with our operations staff and this is certainly not our standard.  Recently the Hotel had a significant improvement to the HVAC system which we expect to provide a better guest experience.  Should your travel bring you back to Irvine please reach out to me directly.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales .

Summary Heading: Everything but the shower was good
Summary: I enjoyed the suite and the service level from the staff, but since the shower was not working, and were not fixed after mentioning it, my ratings are low. The two main things for a hotel will always be the bed and the shower, so I have to give it this low rating.
Manager Response: Dear Allan - thank you for your recent stay and comments.  I'm very sad to hear about your experience with the shower and I truly apologize if this is something we were not able to correct and make it right during your stay.  I will certainly share with our maintenance staff and hope that if you are returning to the area we can make sure you have a top notch experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great Staff nice hotel but protesters got old
Summary: First of all I would like to say the hotel staff was great and attempted to make my stay enjoyable even with the protesters out side screaming at 0600 each morning. This is the second year in a row that this annoying demonstration has occurred and much as I like the hotel and it's location I will check before my next stay. The manager did offer to relocate me to another room but it's just such a hassle to move I elected to stay where I was ( big mistake should have moved ) I'm not sure what the issue is but I wish someone would resolve it.
Manager Response: Dear Slocumb - Thank you for your recent stay and happy to hear overall that it was a good experience and that the staff was great.  Our staff and management take great pride in running the Hotel and delivering true hospitality to all our guests.  It's unfortunate that occassionally we do have people not related to the Hotel causing noise.  It's infrequent and short lived.  We look forward to seeing you back at the Embassy on your next trip to Irvine.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: a very practical and comfortable hotel, very good value for the money. the staff is very friendly, they don't have bell service but there are luggage trollies, they have a nice small bar and daily happy hour
Manager Response: Dear Anas - Thank you for you r recent stay and 5 star review.  I'm glad to hear everything worked out so well and that you found us very practical.  We hope to see you back at the Hotel should you be returnng to Southern California.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great location for family activities. Near Disney & several shopping malls. Also, very good restaurants in the area. Sara, front desk agent was very polite and attentive to my family's needs. A great example of what hospitality should be. Hilton should be proud to have her as an employee...
Manager Response: Dear Herman - thank you for making us your home away from home for the BCS Championship game.  I'm glad to hear our location to Disneyland and other area attractions was appealing for your family.  Thank you for recognizing Sarah at the front desk.  She's definitely one of our Superstars.  We hope to see you back in Orange County for future vacations.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Another Great Stay at Embassy Suites
Summary: We are Embassy Suites fans, usually stay in Brea however, do to a work function we stayed at the Irvine Location.  It is very modern and a little different feel.  Still a great experience always very clean and quite.  You never hear noise from other rooms and besides our key card not working it was a pleasure staying with Embassy Suites.
Manager Response: Dear Del - thank you for your recent stay and so glad to hear it was another great Embassy experience.  Thanks for spliting time with our friends in Brea and hope to see you back in our area if business brings you this way.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel was very nice from the outside. The area where you park your car is little tight and confusion. It did need an elevator from the parking to the hotel. Your experience staying is very enjoyable.
Manager Response: Dear Richard - thank you for your recent stay with us and that everything was good.  We look forward to your return should trravel bring you to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I enjoyed my 1 night stay. Room was clean top to bottom, no noise at night and the hotel staff was very friendly. The hotel was centrally located right off the freeway which made my trips for my daughter very easy.
Manager Response: Dear Tramar - thank you for your recent stay and the 5 star review.  I'm so glad to hear everything worked out fantastic and our location is great for your daughter.  We look forward to your return visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: accommodated large crowd quite well only lacking item choice for meal other than breakfast desk really quite efficient albeit quite understaffed for 5-8 pm rush room as usual comfortable and restful really quite bit more room than needed for this stay
Manager Response: Dear John - thank you for your recent stay and comments.  I'm glad to hear your group had an enjoyable experience and we look forward to having you back at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great for kids and sporting events
Summary: Jasmine was a great person to work with.  She was able to hold rooms for us for a Socccer tournemant and even help us set up a dinner for the team at the hotel.  Rooms were clean and hotel was close to the soccer fields.  Would definitely go there again when we gave soccer tournaments in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Yeman - Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  I’m glad to hear you had a great stay.  Jasmine is one of our superstars on the sales team and loves to help sports teams make arrangements.  PS – thank you so much for also booking your team dinner with us.  We look forward to having your group back.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have to say that  the hotel staff, especially the lady on duty at the front desk, on Dec. 26 are attentive, fast-responsive and appropriately addressed to my complaint of the hotel room that my wife and I stayed. I look forward to staying in your hotel during my next visit to Irvine. Thank you for taking care of us!
Manager Response: Dear Ankenyhamster – thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  I’m glad to hear our staff was responsive and able to “make it right” during your stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back to the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The AC did not work and the room was hot.  Its not possible to open a window so we had to sleep in a hot room.  The toilet stopped flushing but the water in the tank ran and ran making it loud in the room.  The breakfast was good and the room was clean.  If it wasn't for the AC and toilet that we did report to management then the rating would have been much higher.
Manager Response: Dear Ivan – Thank you for your recent stay.  I’m glad to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast and I do apologize about the air/heat issues you experienced on your stay.  Please be assured that our engineering department will take all measures to correct any malfunctioning equipment.  We hope to have you back for an improved experience next time you are in the area.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great location, specially for business travel
Summary: The hotel is very centrally located, near a lot of stores, restaurants, freeway and specially near a lot of office buildings and company's headquarters.  The room was nice and spacious (the embassy suite standard) very clean and everything felt new.  I checked in later in the evening and the front desk person was a little unprofessional for my taste. Breakfast was great as usual (one of the reason I always try to stay at embassy suites) just be aware that they stop serving breakfast earlier Monday-Friday.
Manager Response: Dear Castro_boom.  Thank you for taking the time to review your last stay with us at the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Not sure if the August date posting is a glitch but we're glad you were with us in 2013 and hope to see you back again in the New Year.  You are correct that our complimentary breakfast hours do run 6am - 9am Monday through Friday and 7am - 10:30am on weekends and major holidays.  We want to make sure we're there for thos early risers midweek and let people sleep in a little later on the weekends.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My husband and I brought our 2 grandchildren down this past weekend and had a great time.   The hotel is lovely and very clean. Everyone working there was nice and had a smile.  Perris   (Not sure of the spelling) at the front desk was wonderful.  He was helpful, professional    and made us feel so welcome.  A+ for him.  The breakfast was delicious, and everything   was very fresh. The water pressure in the shower needs some adjusting, and also the a/c.  The room was very warm and could not cool it down.   The location was great, close to everything. I will be coming back and soon.
Manager Response: Dear Judy - Thank you for your recent stay and for bringing the grandkids.  We're glad you liked the view and our breakfast.  We hope to see you back at the Hotel soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is very good, with well decorated public spaces and nicely appointed rooms.  I enjoyed my stay very much, with the exception of the shower.  It was a dribble.    Take it for what it is… a very nice stay with a bad shower.  This will need some attention from management, but won't prevent me from staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Richard - Thank you for your recent stay and taken time to share your experience.  Thank you for the kind comments regarding the Hotel and based on your SALT survey to Hilton I've shared your comments with our engineering staff to look at that specific room.  We will certainly look at the hardware in that suite to make sure there's not a mechanical problem.  Thank you for your loyalty and we hope to see you back at the Hotel soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I had a wonderful stay at the Embassy Suites hotel in Irvine, CA.  The hotel was very clean and the hotel staff very courteous and accomodating.  There were sufficient accomodations in the hotel so I did not have to leave for meals and/or entertainment.  Most importantly, I was able to rest well and that made a world of difference with the work I was performing while in CA.
Manager Response: Dear Michael - Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  I'm so happy to hear that you had a great stay and the staff meet your expectations.  We're hoping to see you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine on your next trip to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great Hotel, Professional Staff, Beautiful Comfortable Clean Rooms and Decor! ONE REASON I'm taking the time to write this review is because of the staff and ONE STAFF PERSON in particular stood out from the rest, Aaron, the Omelette Chef! Aaron exhibits a level of customer service, pride in his work and sheer pleasantness that is rare especially early in the morning! He was always cheerful and friendly every morning. I witnessed him do his best to please a most unpleasant guest, with a smile. Great Job, Aaron! I'll be back!
Manager Response: Dear Donna.  So glad to hear about your great experience and thank you for recognizing our team members.  Hoping we'll be seeing you back at the Embassy Suites Irvine for another week of great breakfast meals to start the day.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I just spent 5 nights here at the Embassy Suites Irvine and I have to say it was a great experience.  Erik, the chef, was friendly and served our needs with great skill and always with a smile.  The room was perfect.  Our housekeeper did a terrific job everyday.  This hasn't been the case in several of the last hotels I have stayed in.  Sorry Marriott Tampa Convention Center :(. It was just a nice and easy place to stay and enjoy.
Manager Response: Dear Cat1tac.  Thank you for your recent 5 night stay and for calling out Erik and the housekeeping staff for a job well done.  We hope that if travel brings you back to California that we'll be seeing you at Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken DIrector of Sales

Summary: I was here with my family over Thanksgiving.  The Suite is great with kids.  Put them to bed and you get to watch a movie or surf the web in the other room.  Also, complimentary breakfast was a hit.  The hotel is close to Irvine, Newport Beach, Laguna Beach, Disneyland, etc.  It's a very good location.  Also, they did not happen to charge us for parking, which was appreciated.  All in all, I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Robert - Thanks for spending Thanksgiving with us.  Glad to hear the suite was great for the family and our central location to all of Orange County was perfect.  We hope to see you back really soon.  Best regards, Ken

Summary: This hotel was a great deal for the $129 for a family of four.  Breakfast is a big buffet and included.  Also includes drinks and a nice pool.  This hotel was recently rennovated and is the nicest Embassy I have stayed at ever.  Much more modern and comparable to a W or Hilton.
Manager Response: Dear Dirrol.  Thanks for bringing the family and so glad to hear it was a great experience and value.  Embassy Suites is both a great family and business Hotel and we hope to see you on yuor next visit to Southern California.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: My last stay at this hotel was a very pleasant and exnjoyable experience. The room was nice and large. The bed was very comfortable.The staff  was friendly and helpful. The location was convenient to the airport,business areas,restaurants,beaches,etc. The rate was very good for this area. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Mark.  Great to hear about your recent experience.  We strive for an excellent experience and hope you'll be returning soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This location was awesome very clean with nice restaurants in walking distance & HOW NICE IT IS TO HAVE SOMEONE THAT UNDERSTANDS CUSTOMER SERVICE!  I was elated with how he helped me and made me feel that as a customer I was appreciated.
Manager Response: Dear Tim.  Thank you for your recent stay and so glad to hear about your excellent stay.  I wish I knew more about the great service and perhaps what team members made your day so I can thank them.  We hope to see you back at the Hotel in the near future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This is a great place to stay ! Staff was great and food is delicious ! overall great experience. Bed was not the greatest not comfy but decent. Very clean but the room I was in had a stains everywhere. Tv channels was good !
Manager Response: Dear Marleny.  Thank you for your recent stay and glad to hear it was excellent.  I've shared your comments with our houskeeping staff and to ensure that proper checking on rooms is maintained to our high standards.  We hope to see you back again should travel bring you to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Recent business trip to Irvine, had a chance to stay at this Embassy Suite facility near our office.  On the plus side: + As with every Embassy, the breakfast is quite nice (couldn't attend "happy hour") + Facility appeared well maintained & my room was typical Embassy quality However, on the minus side: + Charged $7.95 per day, per device for internet connection.  As a business traveler, I use both my company laptop and personal tablet/laptop device.  So - $16/day to hook up to the internet. + $15 per day for parking.  This is NOT some downtown location, it's in suburban Irvine + "Workout facility" is the typical treadmill & elliptical with a few free weights shoved into a room the size of your average hotel room  As for the "nickel & dime" charges, just raise the room rate to
Manager Response: Dear RedSooner.  Thank you for your recent stay and talking the time to share your experience.  I’m glad that the accommodations and service made for a good experience.  Regarding your Internet charges, the Hotel does have a $7.95 per day charge.  The system does track by MAC address so will post charges based on each connection.  Where you should have seen us do better is adjust the secondary charge.  I do apologize and if you’d like to further this conversation please reach out to me at ken.beck@hilton.com.  I hope we can change your mind on returning to the Embassy Suites Irvine.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Very Nice and Safe Hotel for Family.  Complementary breakfast was very nice with twin 3yr old boys.  No need to get up and go to breakfast,  breakfast in bed allowed the boys to sleep in and not be cranky through out the rest of the day.
Manager Response: Dear Lanell - Thank you for bringing the family on your recent trip.  Got to love the breakfast in bed for the boys.  We hope if travel brings you back to Orange County that we'll see you and the family back at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Although I was there for a very short stay, and am not a regular traveler, I hate it actually but was there on business.  I would like to take the time to compliment Carla from the 'Ha Penny Pub & Grill Restaurant' for her thorough customer service.  She knew how tired I was and accommodated me in any way she could.  So I wouldn't have to be bothered with visiting the restaurant, she brought the restaurant to me.  It was a lovely, enjoyable evening and she was a pleasant delightful Lady. The room was luxurious and I enjoyed my wonderful "Shephards Pie and Chicken Quesadilla" comfort food while eating in bed and watching TV.  Carla was accommodating and made sure to bring me 'to-go' boxes as there was no way I could eat as much as I was initially hungry for. Thank you for helping
Manager Response: Dear Catherine - thank you for your recent stay and fantastic comments.  I was thrilled to read about our associate, Carla, bringing the restaurant to you.  We appreciate the recommendation to friends and hope if you are traveling back to Orange County that we will see you at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Went there for a weekend "stay-cation", but pool is small and run down and the lines for breakfast were out the door. Reasonably clean and not noisy (considering how many kids were around). Great, central OC location.
Manager Response: Dear Raluca - thank you for your recent stay and taking time to share your experience.  I'm glad to hear overall that you had a good experience.  We are currently working on upgrades to the pool area after finishing mechanical work over the last two weeks.  Should you be looking for another stay-cation we hope you'll give the Embassy Suites Irvine another opportunity for your business.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Love the Head Breakfast cool Aaron!
Summary: I travel to the Irvine area every week for business and I must say that I truly enjoy the service I receive. Although I have not achieved too status yet I always feel like an elite guest. The head breakfast cook Aaron serves up delicious cooked to order breakfast and is always happy and engaged with his customers. DYI I am a historically a Starwood guy but have made the switch based off of the incredible service I have received.
Manager Response: Dear Trey - thank you for your loyalty and continued stays with our Hotel.  Thank you also for the kind staff comments and we're looking forward to your next stay as you work towards Diamond status with Hilton Honors.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Buffet was good but the to order food was great!
Summary: Both chefs made great tasting food, but the omelet chef (Aaron) was great.  Attitude was great for the first service encounter of my day.  I asked for extra veggies in my omelet and his response was "what ever you, how you like, im making it for you".  Wow! The house keeping staff was really great, very friendly and extremely professional.  BUT THE DOWN SIDE..... saturday night I returned to the hotel late around midnight, there was no parking left in the parking lot.  Every possible space was taken (25 min, handicap). I asked the front desk clerk if he could move one of the embassy suite vans and put it maybe in front off the entrance (two van both in parking spaces).  He stated "I could move it but Im not" and said "you can park in the paid lot across the street".  I didnt
Manager Response: Dear Soulshackparty - Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to share your experience.  I'm happy to hear how much you enjoyed the complimentary breakfast and appreciative comments for the housekeeping department.  I was disappointed to hear your challenge with parking and will be addressing with our desk staff.  The Hotel shares the adjacent parking structure with two office towers.  When our portion of the garage is full we overflow into the same garage but through the office entrance.  You should not have experienced this challenge and I do apologize.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Wonderful free hot breakfast & evening reception with free adult beverages! Beautiful, clean and perfectly appointed suites! Staff was very friendly and helpful and the restaurant/lounge are was pretty with many plants and comfy seating!
Manager Response: Dear Lisa - thank you for your recent stay and fantastic comments.  So glad to hear that you had a great stay and we look forward to seeing you back at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I've been staying in Santa Ana/Irvine hotels about once a month for three years and have always wanted to try the Embassy Suites Irvine. I finally got an opportunity and was pretty impressed. The hotel is beautiful - new and modern look and feel. The rooms were great. Nicely appointed, large bathroom, great furniture. Beds were very comfortable. Elevators were pretty quick. I didn't use the pool but it looked pretty nice but perhaps a little small. Wireless internet worked great (for a fee - but they clearly disclose it and I don't pay it anyway as a HH Diamond so no complaints here). They charge for parking ($15/night, $10 for HH Diamond). I noticed lots of cars parked in the "10 minutes only" spots for check-in only and was told by the front desk "we're not allowed to tow cars
Manager Response: Dear FJSjr2  - Thank you for staying with us this weekend and for sharing your comments.  We appreciate the kind overall review and am also terribly sorry to hear about your experience a the Ha'Penny.  That is not our level of service and this will be reviewed with our food and beverage team.  We appreciate your loyalty as a Diamond Honors member and hope you will give us another chance on a future visit to Orange County.  Please feel free to contact me directly for assistance at ken.beck@hilton.com at any time.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We have stayed here twice and both times were excellent.  The front desk staff are very helpful and funny!  Aaron cooks a great egg white omelet AND engages all the customers standing in linein a friendly morning chat...this says a lot about him as a person and the hotel as being customer oriented.  Cannot wait to stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Angela - thank you for your recent stay and we appreciate you taking the time to share the experience.  It always makes me happy to hear stories about friendly staff and we hope to see you back at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Once a month my wife and I take a weekend trip to the LA area from Las Vegas.  The hotel is located close to the beaches and is easily accessible without having to fight  LA traffic.  The service by the staff is exceptional.  Most notable is Aaron, a breakfast chef, who goes above and beyond and always starts our day off right.
Manager Response: Dear Fred - thank you for your recent stay and taking time to comment about your experience and letting us know about great service.  We look forward to being your above and beyond getaway next time your in Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed here for 3 nights while I was on a recent business trip. The hotel is located about a mile from John Wayne Airport but there is absolutely no noise. You wouldn't even know the airport is there. The hotel also provides free shuttle service to and from the airport.  This hotel is situated in a corporate park and surrounded by office buildings. There are several restaurants nearby. This is not a place to stay if you're on vacation but if you have business in the area it's ideal.   The hotel itself is very nice. The staff is extremely friendly. The rooms are very clean and the bed was very comfortable. Each room has a large flat screen TV. There is a free breakfast every day that has something for everyone. They will also cook your breakfast to order. There is also a free
Manager Response: Dear Steve R - thank you for your recent stay and the extensive review.  I'm so glad you had a great stay and we certainly hope to be seeing you in the future.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hotel is conveniently located near Orange County airport. Lots of options at the breakfast bar including made from scratch muffins and pastries. Best of all Chef Aaron cooks eggs your way to perfection.
Manager Response: Dear Amp 1892 - thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience - especially your breakfast experience.  It's something we pride ourselves with and glad to have Aaron on the team.  We're looking forward to your next stay in Irvine/Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have stayed at this hotel many times since one of our offices is right next door, very convenient and great location.  We luckily got Aaron each morning who cooked us PERFECT omelets, he is fantastic, and has a great sense of customer service.  He is definitely a fantastic employee, definitely a keeper for this location.  Rooms were clean as usual.  Had no complaints.
Manager Response: Dear Tammy B – thank you for your continued loyalty and sharing your experience.  I’m glad to hear that our location is perfect for business and the staff is exceeding your expectations.  Happy to share your breakfast experience with Aaron and the team.  We are looking forward to your next trip to Irvine/Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great hotel and wonderful staff. Comfortable beds, convenient to SNA Orange County/John Wayne Airport and the Macarthur/Jamboree area of Irvine. Evening reception was nice. good snacks - very friendly bar staff.  Had dinner in the lobby restaurant and the food was good. Breakfast was nice - great chef ! Only downfall was the old-fashioned shower head and shower/bath faucet!
Manager Response: Dear SFDutchman – thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  I’m glad to hear that our complimentary breakfast was a standout for you.  We hope to be seeing you again on your next trip to Irvine/Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Aaron is awesome when it comes to making cooked to order breakfast items.  The eggs and french toast are fabulous.  Aaron's attitude and friendliness make the food taste that much better.  Definitely will be staying again at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Dan G - thank you for taking time to recognize one our breakfast team members and I will absolutely share with Aaron.  We hope that you will be back and we can take that great breakfast experience and elevate your next stay to a 5 star experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel is fine for those doing business nearby or visiting friends and family.  Everything is a drive away such as tourist attractions or business meetings.  It is a nice hotel outside the Orange County airport.
Manager Response: Dear kgrif0581 – thank you for your recent stay and sharing your experience.  I’m glad to hear that our location was ideal for your trip and we hope to see you back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Almost every time we travel to the area we stay here. Embassy Suites always provides a good value with the free happy hour& snacks in the evening and the cook to order breakfast in the morning. Although, this Embassy only had Bud & Bud Light as their beer offering for the manager's reception. The rooms are super clean and the beds are very supportive and comfy. It is close to Newport Beach and South Coast Plaza. There is an El Torito on the adjacent property to the North if you would prefer something a little more quiet away from the travelers and families that one usually finds on the weekends. We have found this specific property to be the least expensive of the other Embassy/Hilton properties in the area.
Manager Response: Dear SLOCALOCAL - thank you for your continued loyalty ans so glad to hear about your most recent experience.  Thanks for sharing and we're looking forward to your return.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for 3 nights on business. The room was very clean and comfortable. They did a great job with the managers reception and breakfast. The location is walking distance to one restaurant. I think other options you'd have to drive.   Overall I was very pleased with the hotel and staff.
Manager Response: Dear JW - thank you for choosing Embassy Suites Irvine for your recent business trip.  I'm glad to hear that you enjoyed the Hotel.  There's a couple restaurants within walking distance and our shuttle drivers are more than happy to take guests to the many restaurants within 2 miles.  We hope to see you back at the Hotel again soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Nothing good to note: just a run of the mill hotel, food is below average. Workers are protesting every morning starting at 7AM with bull horns. Weekend are over run with sport teams and teenagers running around making noise, not a place to get any rest.
Manager Response: Dear David - thank you for your Hotel stay and I am sorry to hear that it was less than perfect.  I do apologize for the outside noise and please note these are not employees, but rather people paid by the local union.  They have not been successful in their intention to disrupt our business and force their organization into our Hotel.  Fortunately we have a great staff that does not wish to be represented by the union and work closely with local city and law enforcement to keep them in check and minimize any disturbance.  We hope that if you do return to Orange County that you will give the Hotel another opportunity for your business.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Hard to find better value than this family friendly hotel in the area. Very close to major on-ramps/fwys and attractions. Parking was $15 p/ nite.  The breakfast was worth $30-$40 for a family of 4.  We missed the evening happy hour, but hosted wine and beer makes the overall value of this place pretty darn amazing.
Manager Response: Dear Dan - thanks for bringing the family and enjoying some breakfast on us.  The complimentary reception is 5:30pm - 7:30pm daily so hopefully you'll be around on your next trip through Orange County.  Thanks for sharing your experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: except for 2 mornings at 6am when union organizers with bullhorns woke us up and scared the heck out of us we had a fine stay. Beds were comfy, bfast was very good, evening reception was good, staff were very nice, location is very convenient to John Wayne Airport but quiet and safe area. Did not have opportunity to use pool or gym. As a Hilton Honors member it was a great value.
Manager Response: Dear Yiggie44 - Thank you for sharing your comments and I’m glad to hear you had an enjoyable stay.  We appreciate the positive comments on our amenities, service and location.  I do apologize for the outside noise and please note these are not employees, but rather people paid by the local union.  They have not been successful in their intention to disrupt our business and force their organization into our Hotel.  Fortunately we have a great staff that does not wish to be represented by the union and work closely with local city and law enforcement to keep them in check and minimize any disturbance.  We hope that if you do return to Orange County that you will give the Hotel another opportunity for your business and to turn "pretty good" into "pretty great.".  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: We stayed three nights on Business. The Breakfast Buffet was Outstanding. The Omelet Chef (Aaron) was great. He prepared our unique omelet request with a smile and was very cordial.  The room was spacious and comfortable. The business center printer was out of order for more than 24 hours, and it had me questioning whether there was any motivation to get it repaired.   Other than that we really enjoyed the experience.
Manager Response: Dear Michael - thank you for your most recent business stay and can’t wait to share your comments with Aaron and the complimentary breakfast staff.  I'm sorry to hear of your challenges with the business center printer and I hope we were able to accommodate any needs at the front desk.  Please know that we are waiting on an entire system upgrade for the business center.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I like Embassy Suites, but this particularly hotel nickel-and-dimes you. First, there is a $15/night parking charge and then there is a $7.95 WI-FI connection fee. Yeah, there's free drinks and snacks at happy hour, but I'll pass on those if you can give me free parking and Internet. The hotel staff are friendly. Next time, though, I'll go for better amenities over the ones at this hotel. Oh, and the printer in the business center was broken.
Manager Response: Dear Brian - thank you r for your recent stay and comments.  Being an Embassy Suites we'll always have a free cooked-to-order and full breakfast buffet along with the evening reception and host bar.  I hope overall that our Embassy amenities, quality accommodations and service will have you consider a return visit.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Great value for this neighborhood, though some parking issues
Summary: With the fridge and wetbar, and great breakfast, this is one of the better orange county hotel values.  However their parking facility fills up early, so you often need to use the shopping mall's parking next door -- a longer walk, and more cost. Also around check-out time, there are darned too few luggage carts to go around. Combining these two problems isn't nice -- you can end up hand rolling your luggage, without a cart, to/from the far-away parking.  Besides this the hotel is a great deal for families staying in the area,
Manager Response: Dear Tim - thank you for your recent stay and sharing our value in the neighborhood.  Parking on some weekends can get tight; however, we have an adjacent parking structure for overflow that is the same rate as the hotel.  We hope to see you back at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Large room - very convenient to John Wayne Airport
Summary: We stayed over on a Friday night in order to catch the first flight out of John Wayne the next morning.  The hotel is very clean, offering a restaurant and a "pub".    There is a 5:30am airport shuttle, and you can park at the hotel I believe for $13/day.  Breakfast included, starting at 7:00am.  Room was large and very clean.  Super comfortable bed and pillows!    Would definitely stay here again.  We got an amazing price on Expedia (less than $100/night).
Manager Response: Dear sulphursister - so glad to hear we were a great location for your early morning flight.  We hope if you are in the area again we'll be seeing you at the Hotel.  PS - we do offer a Park n Fly package including discount parking for up to 7 days for people flying out of SNA.  Nothing better than a little extra sleep, free breakfast and a courtesy shuttle to the airport.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall, the experience was good with the exception of the business center, which I needed to make additional reservations and print confirmations. The first night we could not adjust the a/c to our satisfaction but when reported, it was addressed to our satisfaction.
Manager Response: Dear guest - thank you for your recent stay and that you had a positive experience.  We are currently waiting for a system upgrade in the business center which will definitely make for improved performance.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: They promised out rooms would be ready by 3..2 were but the third was not ready until 3:45..very annoying when you have to get ready for a wedding that evening..All they seemed to keep saying was sorry , so sorry and did not make any effort to compensate for it.. However the breakfast in the morning was excellent and we all enjoyed it very much,,They had several tables that were large enough for a group of 10, which we were. I believe that Anthony was the name of the employee that was in charge of the breakfast buffet and he did a great job although there we long lines but it was also a Sun morning.
Manager Response: Dear Kelkiley - thank you for your recent stay and I apologize we couldn’t get you all three rooms at 3pm.  That's definitely our goal and can be challenging over sold out weekends.  Glad to hear you enjoyed breakfast and hope you enjoyed your time in Orange County.  Bets regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: 3 nights with our high school team for a tournament- we were well care for by the staff. Aaron at the breakfast bar juggled multiple omelets, French toast, fresh cooked eggs with a smile and speed; made our large group of sixteen year olds happy and on time for their match, despite the full house. Rooms big enough and clean, good location near airport and freeway access.
Manager Response: Dear tripar0undthew0rld - thank you for sharing your group experience and so glad to hear the great comments for Aaron at the breakfast kitchen.  We'll be looking forward to the team's next stay in Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Just ok - not best Embassy Suites but clean with good housekeeping
Summary: I have stayed at many Embassy Suites locations across the country and was disappointed with some things at this one. Breakfast and the happy hour food were not nearly as good as other locations. When we asked the staff about it they said it is up to the discretion of each location. The restaurant food was also not very good. The service was good, the hotel was clean, and this location was convenient to where I needed to be. The shuttle to the airport ran on time and had great service. The room was fine and I was able to stay in the room until late afternoon and still have the room cleaned when I left later in the day so that was nice. Housekeeping was very accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear Gina - thank you for your recent stay.  I'm happy to hear the room accommodations, service and location worked well for you.  I'll be sharing your concerns with our Food & Beverage team as we do pride ourselves on an excellent breakfast and evening reception.  I'm also looking forward to our new menu rollout for Ha'Penny by the end of the month.  I hope if your travel brings you back to Orange County you'll have a better food experience.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Our trip was made to attend another family member's wedding in Irvine. We stayed overnight to avoid a trip home in the evening hours.   i have stayed at Embassy Suites many times before. One time, my daughter and I stayed over in the Arcadia location, while they fumigated the house for termites. We got to stay two nights and enjoyed the morning breakfasts, and the large suite. Not home, but pretty close
Manager Response: Dear Lina - so glad you chose to stay with us and happy we came in second for home away from home.  We hope to have you back at the Hotel.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: The hotel is very good. I stayed there three night this summer during a vacation.   I like the free breakfast. The room are spacious and clean. The only thing is not satisfied is that the parking fee is quite expensive.
Manager Response: Dear Fli2013 - thank you for your stay with us over summer and so glad you took the time to share your opinion of our Hotel.  We hope to see you back again should your travels bring you to Orange County.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Was taking my 13 year old on an overnight for her birthday.  We were very disappointed in the appearance of the property.  The carpet was not installed properly and looked awful.The Pool...forget about it. GROSS. The Dyer Rd Embassy has had waterfalls, rock formations, fish and ducks.  Live ducks not plastic rubber duckies which are at the Irvine E.S. NEVER AGAIN!
Manager Response: Dear Robert B,  I'm sorry to hear we didn't meet your expectations on your recent stay.  The Hotel does have pay parking which is listed on all websites and with reservations so I apologize if this somehow was not conveyed.  We’ll be reaching out to you personally to better understand your concerns with carpeting and the pool to make sure we are addressing anything to enhance the Hotel.      Best regards, Ken  Director of Sales

Summary: Landed at LAX so we had a bit of a drive to our hotel, but hotel is closer for my business. Landed LAX very early due to red-eye flight so i ask the hotel if we could have an early check-in and they let us. We also got to change our 2queen room into a king suite. That was awesome due to we having an infant and no sleep from the flight. Check in was quick and easy. Room is spacious and clean. Breakfast is good, though it does get crowded. Staff are friendly. Just some minor flaws (AC is a bit loud at times, parking fee is a bit high, fee for internet) hence the 4star. Overall great stay. Would recommend.
Manager Response: Dear jp49lion, we're glad to hear our location was very good for your work location.  Also glad to hear we were able to accommodate the bed type change and early arrival.  Hopefully if travel brings you back to Irvine flights into Orange County Airport (SNA) will be a good match for you as we are about one mile away with courtesy shuttle.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Great facility. Great Breakfast buffet. Aaron our cook helped the whole family with a smile on his face the whole time. He was great to talk to while waiting for my omelet and was extremely friendly. With this kind of service my family will definitely come back.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin - thank you for taking the time to share your Embassy Suites Irvine experience.  We so glad to hear about breakfast and looking forward to sharing your story with Aaron tomorrow.  We hope to see you and the family back soon.  Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: Overall a good stay. Managers reception was good. Breakfast was nice. Got a corner room which was nice and spacious. Near the airport, I guess that's why the additional charge for parking? Luckily I'm diamond, so it was discounted to $10. I probably would look for other nearby alternatives just for this reason. No charge to park would be a 5 star review.
Manager Response: Dear Cryoking  - thank you for your recent stay and your Loyalty as a Diamond Honors member.  We're glad to hear that your accommodations and service were up to par and hope you will consider staying with us again.    Best regards, Ken Director of Sales

Summary: I have a friend that works for ES and she always gets me an awesome F/F rate! This hotel was EXTREMELY NICE!!!
